story:
Who We Are:

Sovereign Strong is a women’s wholesale apparel brand who has a heart for people and cares about safe working conditions for those we do business with, which is why we are passionately committed to producing apparel ethically and locally. We are dedicated to giving hope and help to those who have fallen victim to human trafficking in our communities. A percentage of proceeds will be donated to Freedom House, an independent organization that supports the expansion of freedom around the world, and other organizations who are working to free people from sex slavery and forced labor.

We see lives changed through our organization in years to come, but first we need YOUR help. We are calling on our family, friends, and your friends :) to provide a nest egg to get our business up and running. This brand is more about the cause rather than the clothes themselves. The clothes are merely the tool we are using to bring people out of bondage. Anything you can contribute financially would be of great help. By sharing this message with your family and friends you are elevating awareness of this issue to our communities.

What We Need:

We need anywhere from $1 to an infinity amount of dollars from you to bring this dream to life. :) You can contribute via the "Claim this perk" buttons; however, you may also contribute any amount you wish via the "Contribute Now" button to the right or bottom of the page. Once you've clicked on "Contribute Now" scroll down to "No Perk, just a contribution!" and you can type in any amount you are comfortable with. :) THANK YOU!

The funds from this campaign will be directly applied to:

  • Sample production

  • Workspace/mailbox

  • Legal business start up documents

  • Open business checking account

  • Business cards & stationery

  • Hiring employees & contractors

  • Sample sewers, cutters, sewing contractors, marking and grading services

  • Fabric & trim

The Impact:

This cause is important to us because it affects millions of people globally. The fashion industry is often criticized for producing apparel in sweatshops or under forced labor (otherwise known as human trafficking or modern-day slavery), which is the largest growing criminal industry in the world. According to CNN’s Freedom Project, “$15.5 billion dollars are generated annually from industrialized countries, the estimated number of slaves in the world today is between 10 and 30 million, and 70% of those trafficked are women and children.”

The long-term goal of Sovereign Strong is to open and operate a manufacturing facility in the Bay Area that will provide the survivors of slavery with a safe place to work, fair wages, and childcare.

Thank you for taking the time to learn about us. Please contact us if you want to learn more about our clothes and our cause. Even if you can’t contribute monetarily we’d still appreciate your partnership in getting the word out - THANK YOU!

story:
Do you believe that every shape must be celebrated?

Do you believe that it's time for a more positive, inclusive, attitude towards fashion?

Well, so do we.

We are Cinched Tight, a small design house located in Toronto Ontario and we've been given an opportunity to spread a positive message through fashion, and you can help!

Cinched Tight Corsetry and Latex has been invited to take part in Toronto Alternative Fashion week, and with your help we will bring our vision of inclusiveness and empowerment to a wider audience than ever before.

 

Our Story

Cinched Tight Corsets is a design partnership focused on making quality clothing that matters.  We believe that through our corsetry, separates and accessories we can help women feel more confidant, empowered, beautiful and sensual.  We believe that this is an important difference from most design houses who focus on industry sizing and creating pre-fab garments.

 

As a small design partnership we don't have all the opportunities that a corporate design house does, but we more than make up for that in passion, vision, and an amazing group of supporters.

 

We are a design partnership, but it's your support that makes it possible, and makes it matter.  Without you we wouldn't have kept at it these last few years, and now you have an opportunity to get involved in our biggest event yet.

 

Our message of inclusive empowerment will be hitting Toronto Alternative Fashion week for the first time this year on April 26th.  Your help is needed to make this possible.  

 

For more information on Toronto Alternative Fashion week, visit their website:  http://fashionarttoronto.ca/

 

For more information on Cinched Tight Corsets, visit our website at http://www.cinchedtight.com


 

The Impact

The Cinched Tight Message is a unique mix of inclusiveness and empowerment. Our clothing celebrates all women, and encourages women to see their struggles and their challenges as part of what makes them powerful and  beautiful. 

 

By bringing Cinched Tight to a wider audience you can help spread that message.  You can help prove that what we wear and how we feel about ourselves as women does matter and is something we can control. 

 

There are two sides to this story; the first side being the Anne-Marie, the designer behind Cinched Tight Corsets. As a self-taught and self funded designer Anne-Marie is a role model for women and for survivors.  Creating beauty through clothing allows Anne-Marie to tell a compelling story of reclaiming her life and making a positive change in the world.  The other side of the story is the women who wear our designs and understand the change it makes for them.  This is clothing that makes you feel confident, sexy, powerful, unique and beautiful.

 

This is clothing, and a message, that matters.  Help us bring it to a wider audience.

 

For the Toronto Alternative Fashion week show we will be showcasing 12 outfits, featuring a range of body types and design concepts.    

Normally when a designer or a design house prepares for one of these types of events the funding would come from venture capital, private sector sponsors and financial institutions.  We have looked at these options and we have looked at our message;  they don't line up.   

 


Instead we believe that since this is your clothing, we want you to have a change to get involved.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our costs for the show will include the following:
Entrance fee: $600.00 for the 12 designs showcased

Fabrics / R&D / Production: $1,500.00 for all 12 outfits

  - Please be aware that as a corsetry house our expenses per garment include specialty fabrics and findings.

Staging (including accessories, shoes, props etc. and day-of expenses): $900.00

Fundraising efforts : $500.00

 

We have put together some very interesting perks to say thank you for your help, each sponsor will receive credits on our main website and an awesome amount of karma, but if you can find it in your heart and budget to give more there are some great goodies in store.  (See the Perks for more specific details)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

This campaign isn't just about the show itself, we want to see this as a way to get the message out as far as possible.  Spread the word.  Post this to your facebook, tweet it, put it on Tumblr,  PIN our images from Deviant Art or the webpage (www.cinchedtight.com),  +Fav our stuff on DA.  Let's let the world hear it;  You are a beautiful woman no matter your circumstances;  there are designers out there that know that and celebrate it.

 

There is one other way you can help, and this might be the most important: celebrate your body just the way you are.

story:
What is "Wear your Heroes"

We are proud to present the superhero T-shirt! It works with inspiration, and is based on factual, great stories of today's wonderful people! People who have  achieved impressive results in their lives and are the real-life superheroes of our time.. Wear this and you will also have incredible superpowers which you never even knew you had before!


... A little bit more that you’d like to know ...

And how exactly do you connect a piece of clothing, stories of great achievements, and the feeling of being a superhero yourself? This is a mission for which we created a special task force, formed by the professional elite of different fields of activity, joining together to deliver the ultimate T-shirt.

Our first innovation in this mission was to put a BARCODE on the tees. Yes people, we know it is crazy, but our shirts actually have a barcode that can be scanned. And when you scan it, you will find the second great innovation we, well… innovated: your phone will pop up a webpage, where you will get an inspirational story every day. You will be introduced to regular people with amazing stories of achieving success in their personal lives. 

Nothing spectacular, some people may say. But this is how you actually take your daily pill of superhero. We will deliver 365 stories, through your shirt, directly to your phone, for one full year of transformation. All you have to do is to support us, get the ‘Wear your Heroes’ T-shirt, and each day you can scan your barcode to get your daily dose of inspirational stories on your mobile device. 

You will get inspired by people achieving great success, starting from no special context or resources, within the last 5-10 years. In other words, people just like me and you, regular people, having extraordinary results.  

And even more, by wearing the T-shirt you will tell yourself and  the world that you are committed to become a superhero, and that you take yourself seriously with this task - or at least as serious as you can (especially if you fancy becoming Batman).


We believe in connecting people

What we want is to spread the word. We want to touch and inspire as many people as possible. So buy one shirt for yourself, and why not help out a friend too?. That friend will be someone who will thank you later for this. 

However, we don’t just stop there! We also want your story too. If you have achieved something beautiful in your life, and believe it could inspire others, please share your story with us, and we'll be glad to make a superhero pill out of it too. We are  really excited to hear all about you.

So join our growing community of heroes hidden inside regular people. Support our project, grab yourself a T-shirt (or more), and start your journey. At the end, we might not make the world a better place, but we could help in making ourselves  better people.


And just to make it all perfect ...

What could we do with profits (if any) that we get from selling these tees? Well, we could bring some drinking water to very, very poor children. 

We do this by joining the efforts of charity: water organisation, a group of great people aiming to provide one of the simplest, and most important needs of life to the unfortunate ones: drinking water.

This is where you can see more about what and how they do it, and how we will also support them:


Or, a little more technical and clear:


Basically, we want to help these folks

... by doing this ...

...  to have this ...

Because now, this is what they drink:

So let's do something good for others, what do you say?

story:
An accountant… a designer… and an astute entrepreneur! Born over three decades ago in Nairobi - Kenya, Kenneth Chiaji grew up in a conservative mid-level Christian family. His fashion sense became apparent during his juvenile years when he would often modify his inexpensive threads in a bid to look stylish and keep pace with evolving fashion trends.

After graduating from high school in mid-90, Chiaji took up a financial accounting job with a real-estate company at the same time enrolled for part-time accounting course at a local college. Nevertheless, barely two years into the institution, he abandoned the course and concentrated in designing and selling hand-crafted handbags to compliment his employment income; although he had not taken up any fashion design courses.

A fashion student by night in the comfort and confines of his rented apartment and an employee by day, Kenneth teamed up with his coworkers (Betsy Kendi and Danish Wajero) and incorporated KAYWORTHS INTERNATIONAL LIMITED which began operations in early 2011 as a private-equity fashion company. Kenneth’s debut into the fashion industry was largely inspired by an inborn passion and love for fashion coupled with inventive design skills nurtured progressively over the years.

It is such meticulous passion about fashion that saw the birthing of KAYWORTHS trade slogan: "Passion Inspired Fashion” With prime focus on originality and quality, KAYWORTHS team has developed an exclusive Handbag Brand known as DIVABAG.

Above: KAYWORTHS TEAM: From L to R: Rossie, Phina, Kenneth Chiaji (Founder & Director), Betsy Kendi (Shareholder), Samuel and Danish Wajero (Director)




Our PRODUCTS

DIVABAG handbags are classified in two main categories namely:

#1 - DIVABAG Designer Handbag

Made using 100% genuine Italian leather, this category comprises Privately Labeled Designer Handbags; outsourced and assembled in China by a reputable manufacturer. DIVABAG guarantees that all its Genuine Leather Handbags are made by first-class Italian leather and warrants the original purchaser that the product will be free from defects in materials and workmanship.




#2 - Designer-Inspired Collection

This synthetic collection consists mainly of Totes and Cross-body bags which are manufactured using Premium quality PU Leather and sourced from a reputable fashion house in California, USA. We hope that at the end of this campaign, you will enjoy this exciting shopping experience as much as we have enjoyed presenting it to you today.



Our Cross-body bag Collection looks stylish and yet leaves your hands free to engage in important activities (eating ice-cream, sipping flat-white coffee, etc). Whether you are walking in the countryside or attending a red carpet event, this latest craze is an incredibly easy one to get in. It's perfect for the young at heart; in particular teenagers and the busy woman. Chances are you won't have to spend so much at KAYWORTHS to be a proud owner of one.
 



We believe that giving you a quality product or something you truly value increases the likelihood that you will look beyond the price tag, pay the full price and enjoy the benefits long after the cost is forgotten.


Our MISSION

For countless decades, the fashion industry has put emphasis on clothing as the principal item on the fashion runway. However, at KAYWORTHS fashion goes beyond clothing and that is where the DIVABAG™ Handbag brand comes in!

DIVABAG seeks to Re-define Handbag Fashion by placing this forgotten yet very useful item back into its rightful place on the red carpet.We aim to create highly distinctive, branded handbags with impeccable quality, but with price points which are affordable to the average person... the kind of product that is only currently available at the very high-end of the market to very few consumers!

We aspire to attain a significant niche in the world of contemporary fashion by using exceptional marketing skills, merchandising strategy and brand positioning. We believe that giving you a quality product or something you truly value increases the likelihood that you will look beyond the price tag, pay the full price and enjoy the benefits long after the cost is forgotten.




Divabag IN THE MARKET PLACE

In order for us to find out if others were as excited about DIVABAG as we were, we had to test the market! We participated in numerous runway shows and trade expos with impressive outcome. A number of boutique owners were very keen to stock our products in addition to individual orders. We literary sold-out every time we participated in a trade fair or a fashion event - often struggling to satisfy the demand. The total sales revenue within the first six months of operation cloaked an inspiring $ 7,500.


The SETBACK

Unfortunately before the company could break-even, it was in late 2011 when Kenneth fell-out with his employer and lost his job - which was at the time the principal source of funding for the project. Although DIVABAG has generated considerable excitement within the fashion circles, we had no option but to gradually cut-back on brand marketing in order to keep the company afloat and satisfy our growing host of DIVABAG enthusiasts.


With barely sufficient inventory amidst cash-flow constraints, we have often turned-down purchase orders. At one time we approached a commercial bank hoping we could get a 'start-up' loan to finance the company's capital costs, but did not succeed due to the stringent and prohibitive requirements for funding newly established businesses in Kenya. Many are the times we have felt like giving up... times when everything seems to be running against our strategies and plans... yet in all, we keep holding firmly without wavering to the hope of realization of our dream!


Our COMEBACK STRATEGY

We spent the better part of the last 12 months or so basically doing further market research and developing the brand around the product. Secondly, we have developed a fantastic Magazine dubbed ‘DIVABAG™ which showcases our handbag brands and is envisioned to become a powerful marketing tool for our handbag-line.

BELOW:  Kenneth scrutinizing a DIVABAG Magazine

BELOW:  An up-coming DIVABAG Magazine Cover



Next, we are planning a DIVABAG™ Premiere Launch slated for or before the 14th December 2013. It is going to be a time of Celebration… a time of Dedication and Launch of this unique business initiative! We intend to release DIVABAG Handbag-Fashion Line into the market place as we share cocktail bites, drinks and gifts with invited guests, friends and loved ones.


We will showcase an assortment of DIVABAG handbags via runway shows complemented by mini-boutique exhibition sale. The projected revenue for the first 6 months after the launch is US$ 48,600 or an average of 50 handbags per month. We also envision the launch as a precursor to establish the first DIVABAG retail outlet in Nairobi in the very near future.


BELOW: the KAYWORTHS planning Team consulting on an issue over a round-table!

With thousands of man-hours our planning team has invested in developing this exclusive handbag brand, we strongly believe now is the time to dress up the vision to absolute realization. We strongly believe that DIVABAG is a master-piece that will inject a whole new life into handbag fashion and change the general perception that runway fashion show is all about clothing! However, to begin we require a sizeable inventory… and that is where your support comes in handy!

Recently we considered Equity Financing as an alternative funding option for the proposed Launch. The three shareholders of KAYWORTHS suggested a buyout-deal that would see the exit of two shareholders, and bring on-board one willing buyer to take up their combined equity in consideration for the required funds. “A promising idea it sounded at the first mention, but sadly no business ever wants to sacrifice its Human Resource for whatever reason..! ”

Fortunately, before we implemented this drastic measure, we gladly came across the INDIEGOGO crowd-funding platform and resolved that it was the best and sure way of funding this noble initiative.




How Much Money Do We Require?

Our Initial goal is to raise US$ 17,850 out of which approximately   $ 10,500 goes towards the Premiere Launch event and $7,350 for the first Production Run of DIVABAG Designer Handbags:

We have come up with a modest Budget as entailed below: Once we receive the funds, we shall set everything rolling in preparation for the launch event.


Each Divabag Designer handbag will retail for $270 on average, so in appreciation of your contribution, Pre-Ordering them here for $199 is indeed a great deal.

Here's a sneak peek into our initial style from different angles:


You may also view these bags in different colors from our gallery on top of this page or from our Facebook fan page: "Divabag Fashion". Choose the color you like best and take advantage of this great offer by selecting the Perk Package dubbed " LIMITED EDITION"


We accept donations via PayPal and Credit Card. You may call us on +254.707.420.750 or email: divabag@kayworths.com should you have any further queries.




Your Return

As a gesture of appreciation for your donations, we have prepared some amazing and priceless perks for you. We have put together some incredible incentives and sure believe you will love them! They include:

1)   A collection of African Hematite Jewelry;

2)   Limited-Edition DIVABAG™ Designer Handbags – made entirely of

      100%  genuine Italian leather;

3)   FREE Annual Subscription to DIVABAG Handbag Magazine 



Here's How you will claim your perk with your donation.

When you decide how much contribution you want to make, just select the incentive package from the list on the right of this page. The following is a sneak peak of what we have prepared for you:








When do you get your Perk Package?

All items will be shipped at the end of this campaign. We expect the contributed funds to reach us in about 2 weeks after the end of the campaign; therefore you should receive your perks within 4 weeks after the end of the campaign! Rest assured we shall endeavor to expedite the process to get them to you soonest possible.



In what other ways can you help?

Even if you are not able to make any donation now, there are many other ways you can contribute to our campaign and help KAYWORTHS fulfill its mission!

You can share this campaign with your friends and loved ones: Whether they  are on Facebook, Twitter or Pin-interest e.t.c.

Please share the link with your friends on Facebook and Twitter! "Like" us on Facebook ( “Divabag Fashion” ) and share our Passion with the people that have made a mark in your heart.

Send us a message if you have any feedback, questions, or concerns about DIVABAG. We'd be delighted to talk to you and hear what's on your mind about DIVABAG. Email us on divabag@kayworths.com or call us on +254.707.420.750.


Dear friend, we have proven that DIVABAG is marketable on a small scale and now we need your backing to release this fantastic product to the mainstream audience.


Our Gratitude and Promise

Words aren’t enough to express how grateful we would be for receiving your support. We would consider it a privilege to contribute our enthusiasm, dedication and integrity in managing your contributions towards fulfilling our prescribed mandate.

We also want to give you an update on our progress during and after the fundraising campaign. Again, please email us at:  divabag@kayworths.com .You may also want to join the conversation on our Twitter handle: @DivabagFashion

Betsy Kendi

Publicist (Shareholder) – Kayworths International Limited –

and an employee by day, Kenneth teamed up with his coworkers (Betsy Kendi and Danish Wajero) and incorporated KAYWORTHS INTERNATIONAL LIMITED which began operations in early 2011
as a private-equity fashion company. Kenneth’s debut into the fashion industry
was largely inspired by an inborn passion and love for fashion coupled with
inventive design skills nurtured progressively over the years. 
It is such meticulous passion about
fashion that saw the birthing of KAYWORTHS trade slogan: "Passion Inspired Fashion” With prime
focus on originality and quality, KAYWORTHS team has developed an exclusive Handbag Brand known as DIVABAG.

Above: KAYWORTHS TEAM: From L to R: Rossie, Phina, Kenneth Chiaji (Founder & Director), Betsy Kendi (Shareholder), Samuel and Danish Wajero (Director) 




Our PRODUCTSDIVABAG handbags are classified in two main categories namely:
#1 - DIVABAG Designer Handbag
Made using
100% genuine Italian leather, this
category comprises Privately Labeled Designer Handbags; outsourced
and assembled in China by a reputable manufacturer. DIVABAG guarantees
that all its Genuine Leather Handbags are made by first-class Italian leather
and warrants the original purchaser that the product will be free from defects
in materials and workmanship. 



#2 - Designer-Inspired Collection
This synthetic collection consists
mainly of Totes and Cross-body bags which
are manufactured using Premium quality PU Leather and sourced from a reputable fashion house in California, USA. We hope that at the end of this campaign, you will enjoy this
exciting shopping experience as much as we have enjoyed presenting it to you
today.
Our Cross-body bag Collection looks stylish and yet leaves
your hands free to engage in important activities (eating ice-cream, sipping
flat-white coffee, etc). Whether you are walking in the countryside or
attending a red carpet event, this latest craze is an incredibly easy one to
get in. It's perfect for the young at heart; in particular teenagers and the
busy woman. Chances are you won't have to spend so much at KAYWORTHS to be a
proud owner of one. 



We believe that giving you a quality product or something you truly
value increases the likelihood that you will look beyond the price tag, pay the
full price and enjoy the benefits long after the cost is forgotten.


Our MISSION
For countless
decades, the fashion industry has put emphasis on clothing as the principal
item on the fashion runway. However, at KAYWORTHS fashion goes beyond clothing
and that is where the DIVABAG™ Handbag brand comes in! 
DIVABAG
seeks to Re-define
Handbag Fashion by
placing this forgotten yet very useful item back into its rightful place on the
red carpet.We aim to create highly
distinctive, branded handbags with impeccable quality, but with price points
which are affordable to the average person... the kind of product that is only
currently available at the very high-end of the market to very few consumers! 
We aspire
to attain a significant niche in the world of contemporary fashion by using
exceptional marketing skills, merchandising strategy and brand positioning. We
believe that giving you a quality product or something you truly value
increases the likelihood that you will look beyond the price tag, pay the full
price and enjoy the benefits long after the cost is forgotten. 

Divabag IN THE MARKET PLACE
In order for us to
find out if others were as excited about DIVABAG as we were, we had to test the
market! We participated in numerous runway shows and trade expos with impressive
outcome. A number of boutique owners were very keen to stock our products in
addition to individual orders. We literary sold-out every time we participated in
a trade fair or a fashion event - often struggling to satisfy the demand. The
total sales revenue within the first six months of operation cloaked an
inspiring $ 7,500.



The SETBACKUnfortunately before the company could break-even, it
was in late 2011 when Kenneth fell-out with his employer and lost his job - which was at the
time the principal source of funding for the project. Although DIVABAG has
generated considerable excitement within the fashion circles, we had no option
but to gradually cut-back on brand marketing in order to keep
the company afloat and satisfy
our growing host of DIVABAG enthusiasts. 


With barely sufficient inventory amidst cash-flow constraints, we have often turned-down purchase orders. At one time we approached a commercial bank hoping we could get a 'start-up' loan to finance the company's capital costs, but did not succeed due to the stringent and prohibitive requirements for funding newly established businesses in Kenya. Many are the times we have felt like giving up... times when everything seems to be running against our strategies and plans... yet in all, we keep holding firmly without wavering to the hope of realization of our dream!




Our COMEBACK STRATEGYWe spent
the better part of the last 12 months or so basically doing further market research
and developing the brand around the product. Secondly, we have developed a fantastic Magazine dubbed ‘DIVABAG™ which showcases our handbag brands
and is envisioned to become a powerful marketing tool for our handbag-line.BELOW:  Kenneth scrutinizing a DIVABAG MagazineBELOW:  An up-coming DIVABAG Magazine Cover
Next, we are planning a DIVABAG™ Premiere Launch slated for or before the 14th
December 2013. It is going to be a time of Celebration…
a time of Dedication and Launch of this unique business initiative! We intend
to release DIVABAG Handbag-Fashion Line into the market place
as we share cocktail bites, drinks and gifts with invited guests, friends and
loved ones.





We will showcase an assortment of DIVABAG handbags via runway shows complemented by mini-boutique exhibition sale. The projected revenue for the first 6 months after the launch is US$ 48,600 or an average of 50 handbags per month. We also envision the launch as a precursor to establish the first DIVABAG retail outlet in Nairobi in the very near future.

BELOW: the KAYWORTHS planning Team consulting on an issue over a round-table!

With thousands of man-hours our
planning team has invested in developing this exclusive handbag brand, we strongly
believe now is the time to dress up the vision to absolute realization. We strongly believe that DIVABAG is a master-piece that
will inject a whole new life into handbag fashion and change the general
perception that runway fashion show is all about clothing! However, to begin we require a sizeable
inventory… and that is where your support comes in handy! 
Recently we considered Equity Financing as an alternative funding
option for the proposed Launch. The three shareholders of KAYWORTHS suggested a buyout-deal that would see the exit of
two shareholders, and bring on-board one willing buyer to take up their combined
equity in consideration for the required funds. “A promising idea it sounded at the first
mention, but sadly no business ever wants to sacrifice its Human Resource for
whatever reason..! ” 


Fortunately, before we implemented this drastic measure, we gladly
came across the INDIEGOGO crowd-funding platform and resolved that it was the best
and sure way of funding this noble initiative.



How Much Money Do We Require?


Our Initial goal is to raise US$ 17,850 out of which approximately   $ 10,500 goes towards the Premiere Launch event and $7,350 for the first Production Run of DIVABAG Designer Handbags:
We have come up with a modest Budget as entailed below: Once we receive the funds, we shall set everything rolling in preparation for the launch event.


Each Divabag Designer handbag will retail for
$270 on average, so in appreciation of your contribution, Pre-Ordering
them here for $199 is indeed a great deal.


Here's a sneak peek into our initial style from different angles:

You may also view these bags in different colors from our gallery on top of this page or from our Facebook fan page: "Divabag Fashion". Choose the color you like best and take advantage of this great offer by selecting the Perk Package dubbed " LIMITED EDITION"


We accept donations via PayPal and Credit Card. You may call us on +254.707.420.750 or email: divabag@kayworths.com should you have any further queries.



Your Return
As a gesture of
appreciation for your donations, we have prepared some amazing
and priceless perks for you. We have
put together some incredible incentives and sure believe you will love them!
They include:
1)   A collection of African
Hematite Jewelry;
2)   Limited-Edition
DIVABAG™ Designer Handbags – made entirely of 
      100%  genuine Italian leather;
3)   FREE Annual
Subscription to DIVABAG Handbag Magazine 

Here's How you will claim your perk with your donation.
When you decide how much contribution
you want to make, just select the incentive package from the list on the right of
this page. The following is a sneak peak of what we have prepared for you:












When do you get your Perk Package?

All items will be
shipped at the end of this campaign. We expect the
contributed funds to reach us in about 2 weeks after the end of the campaign;
therefore you should receive your perks within 4 weeks
after the end of the campaign! Rest assured we shall endeavor to expedite the
process to get them to you soonest possible.


In what other ways can you help?
Even if you are not able to make any donation
now, there are many other ways you can contribute to our campaign and help KAYWORTHS
fulfill its mission!
You can share this
campaign with your friends and loved ones: Whether they  are on Facebook,
Twitter or Pin-interest e.t.c. 
Please share the link with your friends on
Facebook and Twitter! "Like" us on Facebook ( “Divabag Fashion” ) and share our Passion with the people that have
made a mark in your heart.
Send us a message if you have any feedback,
questions, or concerns about DIVABAG. We'd be delighted to talk to you and
hear what's on your mind about DIVABAG. Email us on divabag@kayworths.com or call us on +254.707.420.750.

Dear friend, we have proven
that DIVABAG is marketable on a small scale and now we need your backing to
release this fantastic product to the mainstream audience. 

Our Gratitude and Promise Words aren’t enough to express how
grateful we would be for receiving your support. We would consider it a privilege to
contribute our enthusiasm, dedication and integrity in managing your
contributions towards fulfilling our prescribed mandate.
We also want to give you an update on
our progress during and after the fundraising campaign. Again, please email us at: 
divabag@kayworths.com .You may also want to join the conversation on our Twitter handle: @DivabagFashion
Betsy Kendi
Publicist (Shareholder) – Kayworths
International Limited –

story: This campaign has ended, thank you for your interest.
story_txt: This campaign has ended, thank you for your interest.

story:
Our Story

Mission

As the market continues to become saturated with overly complex, cluttered designs, Creatistic’s mission is to provide high-quality products with creative, fresh graphics.

Creatistic is the labor of one Charles Thomas, started nearly ten years ago. Creatistic started off as just a design label and has now evolved into a brand well on its way to the stars. Creatistic has become an intricate logo design for an urban clothing line including shirts, hoodies, and jackets. The essential goal of Creatistic is to capture the eye of the urban market and show people that there is more to the clothing than just a design. It’s a state of mind, a conquest to unleash one’s own creativity; inspiration. Creatistic is a brand that Charles holds near to his heart because to them it’s become more than just an idea; it’s become a lifestyle.

WHAT WE NEED

To me, $5000 is a extremely good number to get a clothing line out there. I believe with hard work and a Creatistic attitude, you can start any business with that amount. For Creatistic Apparel, this is what it means:

1. $2000 for the opening fabric order which will produce enough units to make and manage production

2. $1000 for more fabric to produce more units as they sell

3. $700 for help of wholesales garments

4. $500 for great photography and a catalog for all my collateral materials

5. $300.00 for web development and advertisement

Every contributer will have there name posted on my blog and store.

Other Ways You Can Help

I have a facebook for this clothing line and an online store so you can get a fell of what the clothing line. if you could please visit the fan page and "like it" and share it with your friends it would greatly help out alot. "Creatistic Urban Wear" that is the name it is under

 

THANK YOU FOR READING AND FOR YOUR TIME


Check out the online store, blog, twitter, and facebook page. 

http://www.creatistic.com

http://www.facebook.com/creatistic

http://www.twitter.com/creatisticjuice

story: .

Former NBA G League James Siakam (NBA Pascal Siakam's Brother)

 Brother to Toronto Raptors Rising NBA Star Pascal Siakam. James Siakam stands as an official NXTLVLETE Athlete!







 

8 Unrivaled Characteristics

1) Anti-Stink & Anti-Bacterial Our Nanonite Silver is infused into all our fabrics. No more smelling bad when you sweat! Workout harder without worrying about any odor. Wear the same shirts over and over again without washing it, & STILL be clean and smelling fresh! Nanonite Silver kills ALL odor-causing bacteria so your shirts never get smelly. (You can still wash your shirt whenever you like, you just wash it a lot less often!)

2) Premium 2-way stretch Fabric Our shirts are made of Premium Cotton + Lycra where our tank tops/stringers are made of Premium Polyester + Lycra. These premium additions help make the fabric stretch and contour to your body perfectly!

3) Anti-Wrinkle No more wrinkled clothes anywhere, ever! Save time so you don't have to iron your shirts after every wash. 

4) Anti-fade No more shirt color fading away after several wash cycles & wear. There's nothing more annoying than your black not looking black anymore because of the cheap fabrics used!

5) Anti-Shrink No more shrunken shirts after using the dryer too much. Your shirt will always fit you perfectly... well at least until you start bulking.

6) Breathable! No more cheap or thick clothing materials that make you sweat more. Sweat less, Conquer more. 

7) Moisture Wicking! No more waiting too long for your shirt to dry off. Workout harder, Worry less about sweating too much. 

8) Ultralight No more heavy shirts that weigh you down. And perfect for easy packing when traveling.






This is the PERFECT shirt, and we made 3 different styles to match each man in the world. 



 Even perfect as an everyday shirt or when you want to dress up and go out!

Our Stringer has only one Design: The NXT LVL ALPHA STRINGER

Our shirts are PERFECT for traveling - because sometimes you might end up in a desert and need to wear the same shirt for 30 days; WHAT THEN?

Our shirts are ANTI-STINK and ANTI-BACTERIAL so you can wear the same shirt for days and weeks and NEVER have to worry about washing it constantly. Our shirts carry NO bacteria/filth even after days of wearing. This makes it the PERFECT travel companion. 

They have a perfect flex combined slim fit and a premium feel to it, but best of all, they're ULTRALIGHT. This makes it even easier to pack on any vacation.


The NXTLVLETE Difference

This journey started two years ago when we said enough is enough. Guys shouldn't have to smell so bad when they workout or travel. There had to be a better way - with NXTLVLETE we found just that. We care about looking good & smelling good. Our primary goal was to create PREMIUM quality shirts that make you LOOK, SMELL and PERFORM your BEST. This is the NEXT LEVEL of PREMIUM fitness + travel shirts, and we're excited to bring it to the world!
 

Risks and Challenges

We are all ready for production! All we have to do is put in the order and produce the first large batch of shirts for our indiegogo supporters, and ship it out right away!

We are beyond excited to go through this process and will ensure perfect communication with our supporters.

We want to be apart of the fitness industry and create a community to help inspire within the fitness world - with that said, we want to uphold two promises:

1. We will ensure all our shirts are of the highest quality possible for each and every supporter. We don't want to just make great fitness and travel shirts, we want to make the BEST fitness and travel shirts in the world!

2. We will always be 100% transparent through good communication with our supporters always. We will update regularly and always take in your feedback to improve our products and service. Customer Service is extremely important to us as you guys are the only reason we can make this dream a reality!

Customer Service is extremely important to us as you guys are the only reason we can make this dream a reality!

story:
Hey everyone! Thanks for checking us out. We cannot be more excited about launching swaggr socks and sharing them with you. Did you know there are 8 million tons of plastic waste getting dumped into our oceans each year? When our eyes were opened to the damage plastic bottles, bags, and straws were causing in our oceans, we were moved to action. We hope you are, too! 

Last October, we got sick of having to deal with athletic socks always wearing out and being uncomfortable. So, in March of this past year, David flew to North Carolina for an intensive training on how to manufacture socks. Since then, we have been working with a team of specialists to come up with the perfect blend. And we think we've nailed it!

First and foremost, thank you! This platform is amazing! We appreciate each and every one of you who gives us your time, donation or not, to check out swaggr. We hope you can get as excited as we are to change the world and wear amazing socks at the same time. We want to be completely transparent with everyone, so here is where your money is going and why we need your help:

The money is going towards manufacturing socks! That’s it. Pretty simple. We are looking to raise $20,000, and to be honest, that will not get us very far. It will allow us to fund our first full run of manufacturing, but will not put a dent in what we expect and hope to gain out of this experience.

We are using Indiegogo as our platform to engage with you awesome people and to get the word out about these awesome socks that are doing awesome things for the environment. We want every single person who sees our page, whether they donate or not, to leave our page with a smile on their face, and give a fist pump because of their excitement to work with us to conquer plastic pollution.

Can these socks actually be comfortable if they are made out of plastic?

They are horribly uncomfortable! Just kidding!! They are amazingly comfortable! In all seriousness, every person who has been fortunate enough to get their hands on a swaggr prototype says “I did not expect them to feel this way!” We may be a little biased, but we have never worn such comfortable athletic socks. Ever. Period. However, the only way for you to know for sure is to support us along this journey and get some pairs for yourself!

Do your feet get stinky after wearing swaggr socks?

Nobody likes stinky feet! Luckily, everybody that has worn these socks has said their feet did not stink. Yay!!

Why are there no sizes to choose from?

There is only one size! Swaggr socks are engineered using a specific yarn that allows us the perfect fit from a kids size 1 up to a men's size 16! I know it sounds crazy and companies say this all of the time. Seriously, though! We have designed the socks specifically to be able to do this! Don't take my word for it. Try it for yourself!

Two plastic bottles are used for every pair of socks that we manufacture. Think about how cool that is. When you are at home, drinking water out of a plastic bottle, or drinking a Gatorade after working out, RECYCLE those bottles. For all you know, the bottles that you are drinking today, could be one of our socks tomorrow. How cool is that!

The more we are conscious of our plastic consumption, the cleaner our oceans remain and marine life saved. By 2050 it is estimated that there will be more plastic in the ocean than fish! Pretty disgusting if you think about it. Are we going to eradicate that issue ourselves? Absolutely not. If we continue to educate, get the word out, and get swaggr’s in people’s hands, the more people will be aware, the quicker we will be able to turn this issue around.

If you like what we are about, please help us get the word out. Fighting plastic pollution is not a one person (or two person in this case) job! We need your help! We absolutely appreciate your donation, but if you could share our campaign page with friends and family we would love you forever.  Ways to share:

*Share the campaign across social media (share buttons at top of page) #getswaggr!

*Like our pages to stay informed on updates throughout the campaign and beyond (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter)!

*Email your friends, family, colleagues, and acquaintances with the link to this page! 

*Embrace a waste reduction lifestyle. There is no more powerful changemaker than you. Help us win the war on waste by talking to friends and family about the changes you are making and the brands that are helping support your journey!

The more people we can get our campaign in front of, the higher the likelihood of us exceeding our goals, and the higher likelihood swaggr can begin to make its imprint on the world! HELP ME HELP YOU…...HELP ME...HELP YOU!!!! Can’t ever go wrong with a good ol Jerry Maguire reference to sum it up. MANY, MANY, MANY THANKS!

story:
Who Am I?

My name is Marla, and I am 20 years old. I live with 2 roommates in Montreal, and I work at a bakery to support myself. I am currently attending Lasalle College in Fashion Design. 

My Passions : Fashion and Modeling! 

I was always into fashion, and my dream has always been to start my own line of clothing. Why not start now? I have a ton of ambition, and dedication to my dream, but lack the means to start pursuing it.

Why Help Me?

I love to make clothing, and I aspire to go far doing so. I am however struggling to support myself through college. I work part time at a bakery, but I don't make enough to spend on luxuries such as fabric. This pays for, and barely even so, the bare minimum.
I am asking for help simply as a small kick to my career. This money will be used for buying a new sewing machine and fabrics in order to keep pursuing my passion. I am not asking for much, and it may seem like a small amount, but It could really help me a lot! :)

What I Do

I like to design dresses mostly, and I learn a lot about it in College. I have also designed handbags, hats, and shirts. I use some resources at the College to sew dresses on my spare time, such as this one I completed a few months ago.

This black dress took me a little over 15 hours to make, and I am very proud with the result! My style varies a lot, from fancy ornamental clothing, to simple elegant dresses. Here is another Dress I have designed. This one has a bit more of a creative pattern on it, and supports long sleeves and a V-neck.

I have also been experimenting with designing Bra's, and have recently finished making my first prototype for them. Here is the first one I have made.


The Impact

Your donation will help fund not only my passion, but my dream career. I will use this to buy a new sewing machine, and tons of fabric to be able to design clothing. This clothing is not only for personal use however. I have met a lot of people in the fashion industry at Lasalle College, and once my portfolio is diverse enough, I will show my creations to various Canadian and American Companies.
If you are unable to donate, please share this with your friends and coworkers, in order to spread my campaign!
Although I am hoping to go big, or even just become a local designer, you can know your donation went towards helping a young girl achieve her dreams. 
Thank you !!!! :)

story:
HONEYLOVE is "re-shaping" traditional shapewear to allow women to highlight our best features, support posture and get a smooth fit in favorite clothing. As a female-founded startup, we know the power of confidence, so we created Sculptwear to be the most supportive, sexy and effective shapewear to ever hug your curves. 

Join us as we bring innovation to shapewear and give you the freedom to feel fabulous in your clothes!

 

You can Pre-order Sculptwear in just three easy steps! 

1. Decide how many pairs you want (1 pair, 2 pairs, 3 pairs or 4 pairs) from the options on the right

2. Click 'Get This Perk' under the package that you'd like.

3. Choose your colors and sizes and click 'Continue to Payment.' 

 

 

 

 
 

 

We never could have gotten here without the help of a vocal community of friends, product testers, and wise souls who have guided and supported us along the way. We want to show our appreciation to those of you who speak up and share our campaign, even if you're not ready to pledge. Click one of the buttons below, screenshot your post and message it to us at www.facebook.com/gethoneylove. We'll send you a free download link to Betsie's 1-hour DJ mix as a thank you.

 

Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. This allows you to PRE-ORDER Sculptwear before it gets made. You will not only be one of the first people to receive Sculptwear, but you will get a special backer discount as a thank you for the early support. Want to buy more than one pair of Sculptwear, or a mix of 'Runway Black', 'Sand' and 'Vamp' Sculptwear? You've got options! Check out the different reward packages (on the right side at the top of this page), spread the word and get friends to order with you so you can take advantage of increased discounts with the bundled rewards. 

 

 

 We will use the funds to produce the first full factory order of Sculptwear across our complete size range, which also includes plus sizes. We obsessed over the selection of every fabric and trim in order to achieve the amazing comfort and shaping that we are promising. Our factory uses state of the art production methods, provides a clean and safe working environment and fair wages to workers. 

We'd like to say a heartfelt thanks for your support in helping us to bring innovation to undergarments, and are so glad you're joining our journey!

story:
-We are told to limit the amount of UV radiation we are exposed to.

-We do this by wearing protective creams & clothing to block the sun's damaging rays in ALL other circumstances.

-Remember, the light source, unlike the sun billions of miles away, is 1 cm above the top of our skin.

-Getting a gel manicure is the same as sitting in the sun (without sunblock) for 20 to 40 minutes!  If you don't start protecting your skin today you can count on premature aging tomorrow.  Don't risk it!

-A lot of us have been getting gel manicures regularly for the past several years.  In as little as 8 to 10 visits (5 months!) the lamps "may produce enough UV exposure to cause skin damage," according to the Skin Cancer Foundation.

-Even if you do gel manicures infrequently, UV damage is cumulative, this means the damage you received 2 months, 6 months, a year ago is still present & additional UV exposure will bring you closer to causing irreparable skin damage.

Endorsed by Dr. Chris Adigun

 

                                                

Dr. Adigun, after extensively examining the data contained in published studies, determined the amount of UV radiation we are exposed was enough to merit protecting our skin.  She proudly endorses YouVeeShield.
    

                                             
                                      
-UV light is damaging to our skin.  
-UV light during a gel manicure is generated from a light source that is 1 cm from the top of our skin.  
-Each gel manicure equals 20 to 40 minutes of direct sunlight and that is if your manicurist is even following the directions, which most are not.  
-This means you are receiving even more exposure than what was "deemed" safe.
 -In as little as 8-10 visits, some lamps "may produce enough UV exposure to cause skin damage," according to the Skin Cancer Foundation.

The .003 inch shield is made from a thermoplastic elastomer that contains titanium dioxide, an inert and safe FDA-approved additive, giving the shield it's white color and UV blocking capabilities. YouVeeShield has received an UPF 50+ rating from Solar Light Company and a certification YVS blocks 99% of the UV light from G & R Labs. The company was founded in 2014 by Renee Albera and is located in Menlo Park, CA. Made in the USA, the Shields are distributed exclusively by YouVeeShield, LLC.

     

 

 

 

 

Simply slip your hand into the YouVeeShield glove before placing hands into the UV nail lamp.

 

 

 

 

The .003 inch shield is made of FDA- approved materials including titanium dioxide, giving the shield it's white color and UV-blocking capabilities.

 

 

  • Light Measurement SpecialistGeorge Richardson at G&R Labs has confirmed that YouVeeShield blocks 99.9% of UV Light emitted from the UV/LEDLamps examined. The reflections from the glove at 365nm (UVA) are negligible for both the LED and UV Lamp sources. Read: the light is not "bouncing" out of the lamp because of the Shield.

  • The Solar Light Company certified YouVeeShield for a UPF rating of 50+.
 

 

 

                                                         

 

I love gel manicures!  I wanted to continue to get them even after my skin was badly damaged with sunspots.  After determining the other "solutions" did not work, I invented YVS.  Now I would like to share this with the rest of the world.  We as women need to bond together & insist YouVeeShield is present in the nail salon for us to protect our skin.  I understand many believe the short time under the lamp (especially LED lamps) means the exposure is the same as "seconds, minutes" in the sun.  If that were true, you could apply a coat of gel polish, go out in the sun for 30 seconds & see if it drys.  It will not because they are NOT EQUAL!  Each gel mani is equal to 20 to 40 minutes of direct sun & that is only if your manicurist is following the manufacturer's directions, which most of them are not.  So now, even the amounts deemed "safe" are being exceeded.  We are smart enough to know to protect our skin in all other circumstances.  Insist your nail salon starts caring about your skin.  Use YouVeeShield.

 

 

 

We want to bring YouVeeShield to individuals and salons across the globe to protect patrons from the damaging effects of UV rays, but we can't do it without your help! In exchange for backing the campaign we are offering YouVeeShield at a special price. You can be the first to reap the benefits of YouVeeShield in your beauty routine!

 

 

 

 

YouVeeShield is a wonderful solution for who people don’t want to compromise their gel manicure/pedicure beauty routine due to the potential health hazards. They will also be shielded from premature aging, wrinkles and sunspots during gel-polish nail services. This makes going to the nail salon an enjoyable and safe process!

 

 

     

     

    • UV/LED lamps used to cure the gel emit UV radiation, and this can cause damage to our skin.

    • UV and LED lamps are classified as moderate risk by Dr. Sayre & Dr. Dowdy, industry titans which is not as safe as you might think.

        • This sounds benign; however, moderate risk or “risk two” lamps are the highest risk group of lighting systems allowed to be used by the general public in unsupervised conditions. So it’s actually quite high. See the "Photobiological Safety Evaluation of UV Nail Lamps study" 

        • These “safe exposure” limits also do not take into account anyone with a photosensitivity, such as blond hair, blue eyes, certain make-up and perfumes or even handling of a citrus fruit. All of these things can make people sensitive to light without their knowledge - and any exposure to UV during this time can now “turbo charge” any damage that is occurring.

    • Nail Salons are not educating their customers on the danger or properly training their nail professionals

    • Nail Salons nationwide are not properly training their nail professionals to use these lamps according to the manufacturer’s conditions

    • The Nail Salons are not providing any adequate protection from the UV radiation.

    • Nail professionals are routinely not following the manufacturer’s instructions for the proper curing times of each coat of gel polish.  They are “guessing” to cure longer than what has been determined as “safe” (if you happen to be light sensitive, this does not even include you) often curing 3 times the required amount.

    • Many nail professionals do not use the nail lamp manufactured by the same gel polish company. This can cause severe chemical burns.
       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

      1. What do the shields look and feel like?
        The elastomer material is soft and comfortable to wear during your service. Its high elasticity provides a no-slip fit and allows the shield to "stretch" to adapt to your hand size. 

      2. Does this protect the actual nail bed as well?
        The nail plate serves as a natural UV protector. According to the
        "Photobiological Safety Study of UV Nail Lamps", the UV exposure risk to the nail bed is comparable to that of skin protected by a durable high SPF topical sunscreen.

      3. Where can I find the studies and credentials?
        All UPF 50+ certifications and third-party studies are hosted on www.YouVeeShield.com

       
      AS SEEN IN:

       

       



      Share YouVeeShield with your friends who get manicures & pedicures on any of the social media channels below. They'll love you for it!
                                                          Photos by Splash Studio Inc.

story:
www.enclaveeyewear.com


Two years ago we started Enclave Eyewear with the simple goal of offering polarized sunglasses made from unique materials. The idea was to expose the sunglass industry and create a pair of sunglasses that rivaled the high end frames without the brand inflation.

What we didn't realize at the time was just how monopolized the industry is and how difficult it is to convince a reputable manufacturer to work with such a small company. 

Over the past two years we have learned so much about the optic manufacturing industry that we decided to go back to the drawing board and re-launch Enclave from the ground up.

-Daniel and Austin



Sunglasses can be broadly categorized into two extremes. 

On one end of the spectrum you have a few powerhouses that own nearly every big sunglass brand (see: Luxottica and Sticker Shock). They create an illusion of competition and prices disproportionate to quality.


And on the other end of the spectrum are the cheap sunglasses you can buy practically anywhere.

Although it is pretty tough to admit, until now we may have fallen in the latter extreme. You see it over and over again, promises of "high quality, affordable sunglasses" without explaining what that means. The reality is that most affordable sunglasses are made at the same factories with pre-existing moulds from a low quality polycarbonate. The company just chooses the colors and their logo to screen-print or engrave on the side.

We came to the realization that we needed to find a new manufacturer, but all of the factories that produce higher quality glasses wouldn't work with a small company due to extremely high minimum order requirements. 

At first our new manufacturer was reluctant to work with us, which is understandable because they produce sunglasses for some of the bigger brands out there. Over the past few months, we've built a strong relationship and they are working with us despite their smallest client being 50x our size!

We have the samples and now we just need to finalize the moulds and hit the minimum order quantities to be able to make the switch.

Every pair of Enclaves will come in our new box that consists of an outer kraft paper slip, an inner embossed carrying case that closes via two magnets, and a white microfiber cleaning cloth. 

For the Bradfords, we wanted a unisex frame based on a classic design. The 53mm lens size compliments both men and women and the slightly winged temples really make them stand out.

The frames come in your material choice of our lightweight nylon composite (Flex Series) or Acetate (Classic Series) and have a 5-barrel stainless steel hinge.

Our flex series is made out of a super light nylon composite. It is designed to be incredibly light and flexible so you can wear them comfortably all day. Preferred by those who find themselves outdoors a lot or live an active lifestyle.



dimensions:   53 ◻ 15 ◻ 145 
lens ◻ bridge ◻ temple

Acetate is the gold standard in sunglass frames and has a very hefty, solid feel to it. It is generally found in the higher end heavy sunglasses. Our Bradford Classics are carved from a solid block of acetate and hand polished.

dimensions:   53 ◻ 15 ◻ 145 
lens ◻ bridge ◻ temple

What really separates a quality Aviator frame from the cheaper ones is the materials and the shape of the frame. As well as a solid stainless steel frame and temples, the Mavericks have a slight tilt and concave lens that really shape to your face. We have a large and a small frame size to fit your style and face. 


                             dimensions:                                small:  58 ◻ 15 ◻ 145
                             lens ◻ bridge ◻ temple          large: 62 ◻ 15 ◻ 145



All of our lenses are a Polarized TAC (triacetate cellulose), which combines the durability of polycarbonate with the optical clarity of a glass lens. 

They block 100% of all UV400 A&B rays and are CE certified as well as exceeding all ANZI Z80 shatter resistant standards. 

Unlike other tints, the green tint in our GR-85 lens provides a neutral balance that retains depth perception and vibrance.

A lot of people have asked us why we need crowd funding after a successful campaign last year. And the truth is that we simply don't have the capital or resources to make the switch to such a great manufacturer without your help. With much more complex moulds at a cost of 3x our previous manufacturer, we would need to exceed our goal to even come close to their minimum order quantities. 

We're offering our first production run of the Bradfords and the Mavericks at a discount from their final retail price.

To pledge, just select your perk from the right and follow the shipment and payment options on the next screen. When the campaign ends, we'll ask for your color and frame selection. 

We're aiming to have all of the perks shipped by early August!

We want our customers to always ask questions and never settle. In return, we promise to do the same as we learn and grow Enclave into a brand that truly offers the highest quality products at a price point largely absent in sunglasses. We hope you’ll share our passion!

www.enclaveeyewear.com

Two years ago we started Enclave Eyewear with the simple goal of offering polarized sunglasses made from unique materials. The idea was to expose the sunglass industry and create a pair of sunglasses that rivaled the high end frames without the brand inflation.What we didn't realize at the time was just how monopolized the industry is and how difficult it is to convince a reputable manufacturer to work with such a small company. Over the past two years we have learned so much about the optic manufacturing industry that we decided to go back to the drawing board and re-launch Enclave from the ground up.-Daniel and AustinSunglasses can be broadly categorized into two extremes. On one end of the spectrum you have a few powerhouses that own nearly every big sunglass brand (see: Luxottica and Sticker Shock). They create an illusion of competition and prices disproportionate to quality.And on the other end of the spectrum are the cheap sunglasses you can buy practically anywhere.Although it is pretty tough to admit, until now we may have fallen in the latter extreme. You see it over and over again, promises of "high quality, affordable sunglasses" without explaining what that means. The reality is that most affordable sunglasses are made at the same factories with pre-existing moulds from a low quality polycarbonate. The company just chooses the colors and their logo to screen-print or engrave on the side.We came to the realization that we needed to find a new manufacturer, but all of the factories that produce higher quality glasses wouldn't work with a small company due to extremely high minimum order requirements. At first our new manufacturer was reluctant to work with us, which is understandable because they produce sunglasses for some of the bigger brands out there. Over the past few months, we've built a strong relationship and they are working with us despite their smallest client being 50x our size!We have the samples and now we just need to finalize the moulds and hit the minimum order quantities to be able to make the switch.Every pair of Enclaves will come in our new box that consists of an outer kraft paper slip, an inner embossed carrying case that closes via two magnets, and a white microfiber cleaning cloth. For the Bradfords, we wanted a unisex frame based on a classic design. The 53mm lens size compliments both men and women and the slightly winged temples really make them stand out.The frames come in your material choice of our lightweight nylon composite (Flex Series) or Acetate (Classic Series) and have a 5-barrel stainless steel hinge.Our flex series is made out of a super light nylon composite. It is designed to be incredibly light and flexible so you can wear them comfortably all day. Preferred by those who find themselves outdoors a lot or live an active lifestyle.dimensions:   53 ◻ 15 ◻ 145 lens ◻ bridge ◻ templeAcetate is the gold standard in sunglass frames and has a very hefty, solid feel to it. It is generally found in the higher end heavy sunglasses. Our Bradford Classics are carved from a solid block of acetate and hand polished.dimensions:   53 ◻ 15 ◻ 145 lens ◻ bridge ◻ templeWhat really separates a quality Aviator frame from the cheaper ones is the materials and the shape of the frame. As well as a solid stainless steel frame and temples, the Mavericks have a slight tilt and concave lens that really shape to your face. We have a large and a small frame size to fit your style and face.                              dimensions:                                small:  58 ◻ 15 ◻ 145                             lens ◻ bridge ◻ temple          large: 62 ◻ 15 ◻ 145All of our lenses are a Polarized TAC (triacetate cellulose), which combines the durability of polycarbonate with the optical clarity of a glass lens. They block 100% of all UV400 A&B rays and are CE certified as well as exceeding all ANZI Z80 shatter resistant standards. Unlike other tints, the green tint in our GR-85 lens provides a neutral balance that retains depth perception and vibrance.A lot of people have asked us why we need crowd funding after a successful campaign last year. And the truth is that we simply don't have the capital or resources to make the switch to such a great manufacturer without your help. With much more complex moulds at a cost of 3x our previous manufacturer, we would need to exceed our goal to even come close to their minimum order quantities. We're offering our first production run of the Bradfords and the Mavericks at a discount from their final retail price.To pledge, just select your perk from the right and follow the shipment and payment options on the next screen. When the campaign ends, we'll ask for your color and frame selection. We're aiming to have all of the perks shipped by early August!We want our customers to always ask questions and never settle. In return, we promise to do the same as we learn and grow Enclave into a brand that truly offers the highest quality products at a price point largely absent in sunglasses. We hope you’ll share our passion!

story:
We want DUFFLER bags to be carried by people traveling the world, hunting for outstanding experiences. All your achievements and victories celebrated will make up wonderful stories to be remembered. A DUFFLER bag is made for carrying all the things you need together with the stories you are proud of.


We, and many others, believe DUFFLER One is a fantastic bag. DUFFLER One is cabin sized and made only from durable high quality materials and components. Timeless without feeling simple and with little details that makes it something special. You can easily fit the necessary things for a few days trip – clothing, extra shoes, tablet, a good book, and whatever else you need to make the perfect trip. Each bag is an individual, identified by a unique identity number.

Outer lining: Coated polythene fabric
Components: YKK brass Zippers and high quality buckles
Size: 570mm * 250mm * 300mm / 22.5” * 10.5" * 11.8"
Volume: Approx 45L / 2,746 cu.in
Weight: 1 kg / 2.2lbs
Colors: Coyote (Medium Beige) and Tarmac (Green/Gray)
Warranty: 10 Years

One pocket on the outside and three pockets on the inside. And one concealed pocket on the inside where you could put the beacon, passport or money. 

It comes with a detachable shoulder strap and has 24 slots for fitting our DUFFLER badges.


"We go to some pretty extreme places and are always churning through gear on our adventures. Finally, the Duffler One has been able to keep up! Rugged on the outside, beautifully refined on the inside. It's a bag that suits anyone from the most intrepid expeditioners to the image focused modern man." -Ryan J, thisworldexists


As an owner of a DUFFLER bag you get access to the DUFFLER Digital world via a mobile app in your smartphone. The central part of this world is your private travel journal where you store notes, images and memories from the adventures you have made. Connect the journal to your existing social media; like Facebook and Instagram so that you instantly could share your achievements with friends and family.

Secondly you could search among all the challenges we have set out to inspire you. Browse by location, category or type of activity and add it to your list with Favorites.

In the app you also keep track of your different DUFFLER bags and beacons. And you could also see which achievements and badges you have on which bag.


The DUFFLER Beacon is a small gadget that is provided by our great friends at Estimote, Inc. The beacon has no buttons, weights approx 30 grams and has an expected battery lifetime of 3 years. You simply put it in the bag to establish a digital connection, via the app in your smartphone, to your journal in the DUFFLER Digital World. With help of the beacon you get automatic updates in the journal with data like your position, surrounding temperature and your movements.


Another unique feature of the beacon is that you now could alarm your bag. If the bag starts to move away from you, your smartphone will start to sound and vibrate to make you aware of what is about to happen.



DUFFLER is not just about great bags, it is equally much about lifting your eyes to find new goals in life. There will be a solid base of challenges that we hope will inspire you to find new corners of the world.

For each challenge we set out, there is a little badge you get when you have made it. The badge is made for being attached to your bag as a token of your achievement. You are using the app for browsing among all the challenges. Add the ones you like to your list of favorites. The app will keep track of your achievements and we will happily put a little badge in the mail for you when you have made it. And yes, you will also get a digital badge in your journal.

For some badges it will require you to really stretch your limits while others could be accomplished just because you are in the mood.


We have spent almost two years developing and perfecting the DUFFLER concept and the first set of bags are on their way. Now we are reaching out to you because we hope that you will take an active role in forming what we believe will be and vibrant and inspiring community, the DUFFLER World. As a special token of your support we will fit your bag with the special "Crowdfunder" badge. The funds we receive from this campaign will be used for shipping the first bags, finalizing the mobile app and to order a second set of bags. We also have some new models in the pipeline that we hope to be able to realize too.



We would love if you could consider helping us by promoting the DUFFLER community and our campaign among your friends. And to show you our appreciation we will reward you a 10€ refund on your contribution for every successful referral you make. To help us keep track of your referrals, you will need to create an account at the INDIEGOGO site to generate a special referral URL for our campaign. Read more about how it works here.

Sharing is Caring

You could also support us by just sharing DUFFLER with your friends! Just press any of the buttons below and you are ready to tell the world.





35,000 € - If we reach our goal we will also add, with each bag, a little led-flashlight with a snap link so it could be attached inside the bag.

45,000 € - On top of the led-flashlight we also add a waterproof sack with every shipment. Great for protecting a camera or phone.

55,000 € - For this amazing level we have a couple of cool ideas but we don't reveal them just yet.

Some risks are always associated with delivering a brand new products within a certain time frame. We believe that we’ve minimized those risks by working with established and experienced partners with a proven track record. But since the first 500 bags is already manufactured and we are waiting for them to arrive, you could feel safe that you will get your bag delivered as long as there are no unexpected hiccups with the shipment. We don't expect any major risks for the app development but there might always be some issues that could require additional time to be solved. But we will keep all our backers fully informed and updated during the whole process.

We have a collection of FAQ's at duffler.com.

story:
TIRR Memorial Hermann Hotwheels was founded in 1997, first competing in the 1997-98 basketball season with only five players. As the seasons have continued we have had over 75 wheelchair athletes participate on the Hotwheels basketball team.

Five players from the 2007 TIRR Memorial Hermann Hotwheels team were awarded scholarships to colleges with collegiate wheelchair teams and are continuing to play the sport they love on a college level. One member from the 2009 Hotwheels team continued his basketball career with a scholarship to University of Texas in Arlington and another was selected to the residency program at the US Olympic Training Center in Denver, CO for swimming. A senior on the 2010-2011 team was offered a full athletic scholarship to the University of Texas in Arlington. In 2011-2012, a senior was offered a spot with the University of Illinois fighting Illini Ladies wheelchair basketball team.

story:
Visus watch inspired by the compass built for aircraft, with the same criteria and the same simplicity we realized this wonderful watch, with the winning design, but with a sense of vintage

Mykonos Design is a Italian watches design company founded by designer Luca Vitiello. Italian brand takes its inspiration from Mykonos— a geographic leader in entertainment, design, and culture for centuries. Mykonos keeps its finger on the pulse of fashion and world markets with attention to contemporary trends and global wants but the brand is markedly Italian in our choices of material, and general tastes. The ultimate objective is to manufacture a design with beautiful facets and technical specs.

How will the funds used?

With 5 years of experience, our team  create cool watches at an affordable price. With the funds we receive, we will be able to follow  the design process until completion of the product, create the new molds necessary for manufacturing, and  insure a fantastic end result.

We need Your support!

Despite  presence in the design watches industry, Mykonos design is a small design lab that has never received any outside funding and by contributing to this campaign, not only do you get a truly unique timepiece and you also help support Mykonos Design.

FAQ

Please read through the FAQ before supporting our project.

1.  When will I get my Visus ?

Our goal is to ship the watches to the awesome Indiegogo supporters by the end october 2015. As we have produced timepieces for the last 5 years, we are confident in our projected time of completion.

2.  Is Visus unisex? Will it fit my wrist?

Yes, this watch is unisex 

size dial diameter 4 cm

dial thickness 0,8 cm

band lenght 24 cm

band width 2,0 cm

3.  Is the Visus waterproof?

Yes, although we do not recommend diving with it. Visus  is waterproof 3 ATM

4. Is there a warranty?

You will receive our standard 1-year warranty. Battery Life 2 Years

5. What materials were used to build the Visus?

Case :  Steel

Band :  Steel (model Milano)

Movement : japan quartz

6.  Is there a number for Customer Service?

For any questions, problems and send another email to our customer service (support@mykonos-design.com) our staff will be available to answer all your needs or concerns.

story:
Questa è una campagna di pre acquisto della nuova linea di Eco lingerie in cotone bio certificata ICEA GOTS che sarà consegnata a Settembre presso i nostri rivenditori.
La collezione andrà in produzione indipendentemente dal raggiungimento del goal. In questo modo potrai acquistare un completino ad un prezzo vantaggioso e ci aiuterai a sostenere i costi di produzione. 

Le spese di spedizione ammontano a 5 euro per l'Italia isole comprese e il reso sarà gratuito in caso di taglia errata o prodotto non di tuo gradimento. 

Ora non ti rimane che leggere il nostro progetto, scegliere il reggiseno con lo slip che più ti piace e far girare la nostra campagna crowfunding per favore! Grazie!

Questo progetto  ha vinto il bando della Regione Lazio "Innovazione sostantivo Femminile" !

This is a pre-order of the new line of Organic cotton Eco lingerie with ICEA GOTS certificate.

The collection will be produce  regardless of the achievement of the goal. This way you could buy a better pricing and you will help us to support the costs of production.

Shipping costs for Europe are 15€ or rest of world contact us to info@retroecoaporter.com

Now, you read our project, choose a bra with the panties and share this crowfunding please! Thak you!

This project won the competition announcement of Lazio Region 2014 "Innovation noun Female" !





Scegli il tuo slip/Choise your panties

       vita alta/higs waist                culotte / knickers                  slip/pantie
      digital stamps/plain colour                 con stampe digitali/ tinta unita      

     slip/pantie         slip tagli diagonali /pantie oblique     pizzo/panties lace

                                          tinta unita/plain colour  


THANK YOU!!

                                             www.retroecoaporter.com
                                             info@retroecoaporter.com
