story:
Prepare yourself for the next generation smart watch that features a flexible, YES FLEXIBLE screen, that covers approximately 90% of the outer surface.


As a service to you, We offer you a FULL REFUND if you by any chance should regret a donation or purchase. If that is the case, Please do not hesitate to write us.


Has been created with Danish design in mind, no useless functions, no useless buttons, in fact, there isn´t even a single button on the device,
Also the interface, as standard, only contains only the most basic info that is needed, yet powerful enough to be fully customized. 



Click here to see

Team MANIC dates back 7 years to 2007, where the work for a faster yet portable charging station began, utilizing what the team’s engineer calls buffer charger.

In 2011 the team started working on their first smart watch, which then looked more like a square watch with a screen,

Version two was dubbed "Band" and featured a flex led matrix to show all the information. Nevertheless, the team was not satisfied, and with a motto saying "never settle" they kept working on the design and features, until now, three years later, a baby is born.

During the next 6 Fridays, we will be releasing six HUGE media releases / updates for this campaign.

All of them will include a presentation video explaining the topics on hand, pictures and text – for those that do not want to watch an awesome video, you know, the same people that lives among unicorns, squirrel, "Size Doesn't matter" and Elver girls (we all know that they only exists in our imagination) – We have chosen to release the information like this mainly due to not overfilling this campaign at day one, Keeping focus on what’s important and, well, to keep you wanting more.

Below you can see our scheduled releases, release time is 12:00 PDT

story:
Hi, my nameis Dak Eubanks and I'm a professional dancer, teacher, and choreographer with experience in the entertainement industry of over 25yrs.


I have dreamed of creating Dak Anthony underwear line for many years now.  I wanted a to make underwear for men..while focusing on dancers and performers. Dak Anthony underwear will be a sexy, comfortable, fun line, while still focusing on great support letting you rock it out on stage without worrying about too much movement.Personally, this has been a dream of mine for a long time and is a project I have been passionate about to help me regain myself spiritually while having fun and helping to build some security for my family.


What We Need

All funds raised will help create Dak Anthony the brand. Not only having the underwear made but also the business portion: finding models to be the face of the company,  hiring a photographer, creating and maintaining a website, advertisements, and booking underwear shows/ parties are all part of getting this business (and myself) up on it's feet.  


The Impact

 Dak Anthony underwear will be fashionable, made with great quality, and sold at very afforadable prices.I love to hear feed back from everyone...positive and negative. .I feel this will only make my product better for the company as well as the consumer.I want to make men of all types comfortable in my underwear, but most of all comfortable in their own skin. The Dak Anthony brand will have an assortment of underwear that will help do just that.


Other Ways You Can Help

I know some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Dak Anthony underwear line. Please help by sharing this Indiegogo page. Every bit of buzz and every single dollar helps me get the brand some exposure!


THANK YOU!!

DAK Anthony
story_txt: Hi, my nameis Dak Eubanks and I'm a professional dancer, teacher, and choreographer with experience in the entertainement industry of over 25yrs.I have dreamed of creating Dak Anthony underwear line for many years now.  I wanted a to make underwear for men..while focusing on dancers and performers. Dak Anthony underwear will be a sexy, comfortable, fun line, while still focusing on great support letting you rock it out on stage without worrying about too much movement.Personally, this has been a dream of mine for a long time and is a project I have been passionate about to help me regain myself spiritually while having fun and helping to build some security for my family.What We NeedAll funds raised will help create Dak Anthony the brand. Not only having the underwear made but also the business portion: finding models to be the face of the company,  hiring a photographer, creating and maintaining a website, advertisements, and booking underwear shows/ parties are all part of getting this business (and myself) up on it's feet.  The Impact Dak Anthony underwear will be fashionable, made with great quality, and sold at very afforadable prices.I love to hear feed back from everyone...positive and negative. .I feel this will only make my product better for the company as well as the consumer.I want to make men of all types comfortable in my underwear, but most of all comfortable in their own skin. The Dak Anthony brand will have an assortment of underwear that will help do just that.Other Ways You Can HelpI know some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Dak Anthony underwear line. Please help by sharing this Indiegogo page. Every bit of buzz and every single dollar helps me get the brand some exposure!THANK YOU!!DAK Anthony

story:
Short Summary

With a goal to bring forth quality clothing, a group of designers, artists, and models from Philadelphia assembled to create what is simply known today as Major Envy. Equality being one of our biggest inspirations, we try to implement diversity not just in the individuals we work with but also in the products we offer as well as the audience we are trying to reach, as there is always something that brings us all together as people. 

Through art and clothing we challenge ourselves to appreciate people for who they are and the positive energy that they put out into the world.

In fashion and entertainment it is said that image is everything, and as consumers we idolize others from what we see them wear, or how they look, and aspire to have that look. What rarely crosses the mind is that as people we all posses the same qualities. No matter our diversities we have common interest and common faults that bring us back on common ground.

We all are different physically and have different styles of fashion but some see these distinctions as flaws, imperfections. That needs to change. We need to embrace ourselves, respect our physical appearance as is, and be comfortable with the skin that we are in and the clothing we decide to wear. As people we are all beautiful and posses certain qualities of Perfection.

We ask for your help as we continue to redefine what perfection truly is. Please join us in this journey of accepting ones flaws, for these flaws are part of what makes us perfect. 

What We Need

The funding will help us in acquiring printing supplies such as, a 6 color screen printing station, inks, screens, shirts, etc so that we can cut down on both the price and speed of production. The funding also affords us the opportunity to give back to our communities, as we have plans in donating our pieces to different shelters, and also to continue in our efforts in changing the perceptions of Perfection

It is important to note that we have not profited from any of the proceeds from the Perfection Project but that 100% of the money from the sell of our shirts and paintings has and will continue to go back into funding the project.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially you are not excluded from our project. Here are a few ways you can contribute to our project.
  1. Share our project with you friends to spread this powerful message.
  2. Upload a photo from our gallery to your social network and tag/hashtag "MajorEnvy" & "ThePerfectionProject"
  3. Continue to be great! Accept yourself and others and embrace the perfection within everyone. 
  4. Simply tell someone that they are perfect.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

I'm Marlo Wright. Business Developer. Author. Founder of the Global Entrepreneurial Christian Women's Association. I am about Women living the best life possible. This includes understanding God's plan and purpose for your life! I started the GECWA for women, though you don't have to be a Christian to join, to: 

  1. Get vital information necessary to build better businesses
  2. Build synergistic relationships with like minded women
  3. Have a safe place to learn and exchange ideas
In the midst of this formation, I am a true entrepreneur who seeks to help women develop more acumen and have the tools needed to grow and develop! These things are essential because we are the ones who pickup and develop economies after they've fallen, we are employers and community builders! 

As business women, I believe we need just the right finishing touches that speak to our womanhood. I certainly don't believe in putting on a "man suit" as I step into corporate meetings. My favorite accessories are:

  • Scarves
  • Nails
  • Sunglasses
  • Pinky Rings
  • Petite earrings
This Campaign is raising money for a VEGAN nail polish line MADE IN THE USA (right here in SoFla). These colors are distinctly chosen for BUSY PROFESSIONAL WOMEN like you and me! WHY?? 
  1. Hands are one of the things people look at the most. Especially women talk with their hands. 
  2. Harsh chemicals in nail polish are not good for you.
  3. Acrylic nails are not good for you. Nor do they offer versatility.
  4. Beautiful bold and subtle nail colors are attractive, and a great way to add your personal expression while maintaining professionalism! 
When you join our campaign, you will receive awesome perks. But most importantly, you'll be a part of something bigger! I mentioned the GECWA earlier so that you would know my heart. 
Well, the rest of my vision, with the GECWA, is to help women in domestically and internationally, start and grow businesses. We are donating $.10 per bottle sold retail towards these efforts. We are so excited about the global connection and sisterhood we are building! 

What We Need & What You Get

Ok, so this is what we need: MONEY & Your Support!

That's why we are here! Specifically, $5,000. These funds will be used for production of an initial batch as well as a marketing budget to spread the word! 

We've already started by getting the website, logo, and label design underway! 

SKIN IN THE GAME

You want to know my contributions and competencies. My contributions to date are market research, sales strategy configurations, purchase of logos, websites, samples, marketing strategy outline (ready for implementation), team assembly, etc.

 My background is in Marketing, product development, sales strategy, management, sales, and many connections underway to get this product moving! THIS IS A SUCCESS! Are you as excited as I am? WE ARE SUPER EXCITED! 

PERKS:
$25 = 1 bottle + hand written thank you note from me!

$50 = 3 bottles + TY note + swag

$100 = 5 bottles + all the above

$250 = All the above + one bottle/month for 90days(consecutive), choice of new colors before any one else!

$500 = 100$ level + one bottle/month for 6months(consecutively), shoutout on our SM and website as a supporter for 15days

$1000 = 100$ level + one bottle/month for 1year(consecutively), shoutout on our SM and website as a supporter for 30days

When we reach and exceed our goal, there'll be a knarly party that all are invited to!!  (let's stay positive, we HAVE REACHED OUR GOAL because of you!)

In addition, we are building a team, looking to be apart? Let us know! 

    The Impact

    This is a movement. It's about being apart of something bigger than you or me! It's about recognizing the need for developing local sustainable economies globally, and women (Proverbs 31 women) leading the way. 

    Why should you join? Now is the time to move forward! 

    My history with raising money has been successful in other businesses. I've raised and successfully managed money from investors for my CCorp. I have a strong fiduciary duty to those who entrust me with their seed to be sown. This is why I've built trust with those giving to other projects.  

    Risks & Challenges

    THIS IS AN INVESTMENT. NOT A LOAN. MONIES COLLECTED ARE USED TO MOVE FORWARD IN THIS BUSINESS! There are no refunds. This is an opportunity to invest in a company that is changing lives holistically, mind, body and spirit.

    I can't expect you to contribute to something I haven't. I, have set aside 20% of the total amount asked for to add to the fund. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute now, we can use your help. Help us

    1. Raise awareness by sharing with your SM, all your FB friends, INSTAGRAM, Twitter, etc. Send out/forward Emails thru the indiegogo share tools!
    2. Purchase a single bottle retail in the future, remember a portion of that sale goes towards the GECWA fund.

Raise awareness by sharing with your SM, all your FB friends, INSTAGRAM, Twitter, etc. Send out/forward Emails thru the indiegogo share tools!
Purchase a single bottle retail in the future, remember a portion of that sale goes towards the GECWA fund.

story:
I'll Take All Three (www.illtakeallthree.com) is a New Zealand based online fashion destination offering a world class shopping experience. We hand pick your favourite brands and apparel from around the world, then deliver conveniently straight to your door. 

We offer inspiration for dreamers. Take a look through our shop, blog and lookbooks our fashion forward staff have put together just for you.

After all, in the right outfit a girl can conquer the world.


What We Need 

  • We have developed a website which will be our main platform (www.illtakeallthree.com) and need $$ to continue to improve the functionality of it so we can provide you the best service possible. 
  • We are sourcing the best brands from around the world to put together an attractive online store for you, we need more $$ to bring you more brands.
  • We have got amazing, talented and creative photographers, models, bloggers and writers onboard our team, we need $$ to pay them for their hard work and efforts in order to keep delivering the best content for you.


What You Get: In return, our perks include:

- Gift Vouchers to spend at www.illtakeallthree.com for yourself, or give to a friend, a family member or that girl you've been eyeing up as a gift. Couldn't think of a better way to let a fashion fanatic know that you appreciate them.

- A Facebook or Skype session with the Director of ITAT 

- A personalised photoshoot of our ITAT models customised JUST FOR YOU

- 1 Page on our website dedicated to all the individuals that have supported us through our journey - Your name will appear on this page.

- A holiday to New Zealand (Flights and accommodation inclusive) + Invite to our launch party with local NZ celebrities, DJ's and more!


OTHER WAYS TO GIVE!
> Like our Facebook and Instagram Pages
> Share your thoughts, impressions and ideas with us and let us know what brands or type of clothing YOU would like to see in our store. 
Drop us a line! i.liu@illtakeallthree.com

With your help, we can continue to bring you what you value the most...

    Some of you can't give financially, but you can still help!!

story:
Perks Images


Featured Perk

Perk #2

Perk #3

Perk #4

Perk #5

Perk #6

Perk #7

Perk #8

Perk #9

Perk #10

Perk #11

Perk #12

Perk #13

Perk #14

Hi again,

Even if you cannot support with money, please support by sharing the campaign with your friends (links above)

Background

I like to think outside of the box. I always look for ways to make something different, to make things that no one has done before, but keep it simple. You can recognize my art thanks to a technique that allows precise cutting of letters or shapes through materials like wood and stone. The effect of the design creates a mysterious vibe.

Jewelry

I was encouraged to make jewelry, but it took me a while to figure out how to successfully transfer that same uniqueness and simplicity to jewelry.

However, when I found the way, I was thrilled with the reactions. The most unique "wearable art", like my friend calls it, are the pieces made in glass. The glass I use is transparent, and has beautiful happy colors. When it moves through different lighting the effect is mesmerizing, and truly spectacular.

The motivation for my work, is to make things that have positive values.
I believe in the ability to "raise" the internal vibrations of a physical object and to inject positive thoughts into it so that it will provide extra benefit to whoever wears it.

Just like a meal tastes better when made by someone who loves you, you feel the love and the energy in my jewelry.

The spiritual process applies to every aspect of my work. An effort is made to be as environmentally conscious as possible, I am keeping the work in the USA, and my vision is to give jobs to people with disabilities.

It's exciting to hear

customers' feedback

that when they wear my jewelry, they can feel the energy that I put into it.  And it also doesn't hurt that the price is right!


Here's why I need your support:


Increase the volume and quality of the product: 

The work to make the stones nice and clean, is not part of the creative process.  It is extremely laborious, frustrating to do and limits the ability to make large quantities. With your pledge I will be able to purchase them in a way that better controls the colors, size, thickness, and eliminates the cleaning step completely.

Also, at the moment, in order to make the stones into jewelry, I am bonding an external piece onto the stones.  It IS beautiful, however, I would really like to offer a higher quality line that functions better, and that is made using precious metals. I have collaborated with craftsmen who have mastered the art of silversmithing and together we have created a strong, high-quality, beautiful solution, which will hold the stones properly. Your pledge will also help create the branded molds.

Space:

My business requires a dedicated space, for the sake of my family!

My office and studio are inside my home, and the kids really enjoy exploring... All you moms out there know what I'm talking about...

story:
ALZHEIMER'S/DEMENTIA AND WANDERING. 

A GLOBAL CRISIS REQUIRING A GLOBAL SOLUTION. 

Hello my name is Ardelia Mays I am a registered nurse in the state of Georgia,  I currently work as a  case manager in the home healthcare field. 60% of my patients have some form of dementia. When a loved one has Alzheimer’s or dementia, it affects everyone in the family. One of concerns of a family member or caregiver is what to do to keep them safe and keep them from wandering off.

Please take a moment to watch this short video.

 

I CAN'T IN GOOD CONSCIOUSNESS SIT BACK AND IGNORE THIS PROBLEM as families look at us as Caregivers for answers or problem solvers. Family members and caregivers are overwhelmed, not getting enough sleep and feeling like they are going out of their minds all because all of the continuous  worring of their loved ones safety. The fear of them wandering off and getting lost, hurt or worse ending up in an unsafe area and getting killed.Alzheimer’s disease causes people to lose their ability to recognize familiar places and faces. It’s common for a person living with dementia to wander or become lost or confused about their location, and it can happen at any stage of the disease. Six in 10 people living with dementia will wander at least once; many do so repeatedly. Although common, wandering can be dangerous — even life-threatening — and the stress of this risk weighs heavily on caregivers and family. 

Family members and caregivers often reach out to me inquiring about how to help keep their loved ones safe with this debilitating disease. One question I often get asked is how can they keep their loved one from wandering off during the night or when they're home alone during the day for fear of them getting lost or hurt or worse ending up in an unsafe environment and getting killed.

I am a very compassionate person,  I love being a caregiver. It breaks my heart to see the pain and stress that the families endure on a daily basis when caring for loved ones with cognitive Impairments.  My heart aches for the ones who suffers with this awful disease.  I don't have a cure for this disease but my husband and I have created a way to help keep the patients safe and give the family and caregivers a sense of security and peace of mind. We want to introduce to you our KOLOS GPS TRACKING BRACELET. We created this bracelet for the purpose of keeping people safe who tend to wander off for instance people with Alzheimer's and Dementia.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have a functional prototype and a dream.  We have no products for sale at this time. We're hoping to find compassionate contributors like yourself to help fund a very serious crisis. What can you do to help get this product to Market so we can help solve this Global crisis. No amount is too small

We are asking for $300,000 to help fund our project. The funds would cover the cost of Software development (description of mobile app plan) phase 1: Product Discovery ($8,800) Phase 2: UI/UX Design ($14k-30k), phase 3: Development (38k-60k),  phase 4: Testing and debugging ($10k-30k). Estimates approximately $128,800

In addition to Software development we'll also need funding for manufacturing and production which has an approximate cost of $150,000-$175,000.

We are asking that you jump on board with us to put an end to this global crisis and be a part of a global solution. 

The Impact

The need is great as our populations are living longer and Alzheimer's and Dementia are on the rise (Alzheimer's Association facts and figures). 

From World Health Organization (WHO) the impact on families and caregivers . Dementia can be overwhelming  for the families of affected people and for their caregivers.  Social, physical, emotional and financial impact can cause great stress to the families and caregivers .  Worldwide, around 50 million people have dementia, and there are nearly 10 million new cases every year,  one every three seconds and set to Triple by 2030. 

Your contributions would make a tremendous difference in the world as we together solve the Missing person with dementia crisis. 

Unfortunately, it is a very common occurrence. Nearly everyday in the press there are reports about elderly people who have gone missing. These episodes are almost invariably cases of people with Alzheimer’s or dementia. According to the Alzheimer’s Association, about six of ten seniors with Alzheimer’s will exhibit signs of wandering.

Missing: Alzheimer's, Dementia, and Wandering

www.assistedliving.com/assisted-living-news/whe...

Risks & Challenges

 

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Six in 10 people living with dementia will wander at least once; many do so repeatedly. Although common, wandering can be dangerous — even life-threatening — and the stress of this risk weighs heavily on caregivers and family. 
Family members and caregivers often reach out to me inquiring about how to help keep their loved ones safe with this debilitating disease. One question I often get asked is how can they keep their loved one from wandering off during the night or when they're home alone during the day for fear of them getting lost or hurt or worse ending up in an unsafe environment and getting killed.
I am a very compassionate person,  I love being a caregiver. It breaks my heart to see the pain and stress that the families endure on a daily basis when caring for loved ones with cognitive Impairments.  My heart aches for the ones who suffers with this awful disease.  I don't have a cure for this disease but my husband and I have created a way to help keep the patients safe and give the family and caregivers a sense of security and peace of mind. We want to introduce to you our KOLOS GPS TRACKING BRACELET. We created this bracelet for the purpose of keeping people safe who tend to wander off for instance people with Alzheimer's and Dementia.
 

What We Need & What You Get
We have a functional prototype and a dream.  We have no products for sale at this time. We're hoping to find compassionate contributors like yourself to help fund a very serious crisis. What can you do to help get this product to Market so we can help solve this Global crisis. No amount is too small

We are asking for $300,000 to help fund our project. The funds would cover the cost of Software development (description of mobile app plan) phase 1: Product Discovery ($8,800) Phase 2: UI/UX Design ($14k-30k), phase 3: Development (38k-60k),  phase 4: Testing and debugging ($10k-30k). Estimates approximately $128,800
In addition to Software development we'll also need funding for manufacturing and production which has an approximate cost of $150,000-$175,000.
We are asking that you jump on board with us to put an end to this global crisis and be a part of a global solution. 
The Impact

The need is great as our populations are living longer and Alzheimer's and Dementia are on the rise (Alzheimer's Association facts and figures). 
From World Health Organization (WHO) the impact on families and caregivers . Dementia can be overwhelming  for the families of affected people and for their caregivers.  Social, physical, emotional and financial impact can cause great stress to the families and caregivers .  Worldwide, around 50 million people have dementia, and there are nearly 10 million new cases every year,  one every three seconds and set to Triple by 2030. 
Your contributions would make a tremendous difference in the world as we together solve the Missing person with dementia crisis. 
Unfortunately, it is a very common occurrence. Nearly everyday in the press there are reports about elderly people who have gone missing. These episodes are almost invariably cases of people with Alzheimer’s or dementia. According to the Alzheimer’s Association, about six of ten seniors with Alzheimer’s will exhibit signs of wandering.
Missing: Alzheimer's, Dementia, and Wandering
www.assistedliving.com/assisted-living-news/whe...

Risks & Challenges
 
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
Describe your plan for solving these challenges.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

"Triple Threat Hat's" are the newest innovation in the hat industry. "Triple Threat Hat's" are a three in one hat which let's you choose how you're going to wear your headwear.

Hello, my name is Anthony and I enjoy wearing hat's just like the next person. One day as I was getting ready to enjoy a day of outdoor activities,  I was unsure if the clouds where going to keep the sun hidden. Not knowing left me undecided on what to wear. Should I wear a visor or a hat, turns out I decided to wear a visor, and as I was enjoying my day those clouds went away resulting in the top of my head getting burned. The following day with the top of my head hurting I brainstormed idea's on way's to make a hat product which conveniently changes with the weather, without the hassle of taking a visor and a hat with you on your outtings and that's when I designed the "Triple Threat Hat"................................

During this tough economy people are trying to get more for less.  Who wants to carry with them three different hat products, when you can have them all in one hat.

"Triple Threat Hat's"                                                                                                            1.  Triple Threat Hat - $ 45.00(USD)                                                                          2. Visor -$0.00(USD)                                                                                                      3. Skull style hat -$0.00(USD)                                                                                         (Total -$45.00)      

"Other hats"(average price)                                                                                            1. Hat -$20.00(USD)                                                                                              2.Visor -$17.00-$22.00(USD)                                                                              3.Skull style hat -$15.00-20.00(USD)                                                                 (Total -$52.00 to 62.00(USD)

 "Triple Threat Hat's" are: Fashionable, Crowns are Changeable, Can be changed to adapted to weather conditions, Allows you to show your creativity, Lets you show your individuality, Take the worry away of having to choose what hat to wear. "Order your "Triple Threat Hat" today".                

                              ABOUT THE TRIPLE THREAT HAT                                                                                                                                                                                                         100% COTTON                                                                                                                   SIX PANEL                                                                                                                           FIVE METAL BUCKLES ON VISORS                                                                               EMBROIDERED- ONE 3D LOGO ON CROWN AND LOGO ON FRONT                   VISOR/BACK OF CROWN                                                                                                   SIX LINES ON THE BRIM          

                                                                                                                                                                                 Avaliable Colors for Visors and Crowns    

blue, red, yellow, orange , green, purple, pink , brown, black, white, gray                                (All Colors are Standard Colors)                             

                              

                                WHERE THE FUNDING IS GOING. 

Marketing...

Website...

Manufacture cost...

Inventory...         

                                          "HAT SIZE CHART"                                                  

CHILDREN: 6 3/4 TO 6 7/8  (UNIVERSAL SIZE)                                                       ADULT MEDIUM: 7 TO 7 1/8  (UNIVERSAL SIZE)                                                       ADULT LARGE: 7 1/4 TO 7 3/8 (UNIVERSAL SIZE)                                                   ADULT XL: 7 1/2 TO 7 5/8 (UNIVERSAL SIZE)                                                           ADULT XXL: 7 3/4 TO 7 7/8 (UNIVERSAL SIZE)                                                       ADULT XXXL: 8 TO 8 1/8 (UNIVERSAL SIZE)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       PLEASE SPECIFY HAT SIZE WHEN ORDERING.                                                      

ORDERS WILL BE SHIPPED 3 TO 4 WEEKS AFTER THE CAMPAIGN HAS ENDED.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           "OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP"

PLEASE TELL FAMILY AND FRIENDS ABOUT TRIPLE THREAT HAT'S.

PLEASE TELL FAMILY AND FRIENDS TO GO TO FACEBOOK AND SEARCH TRIPLE THREAT HAT'S AND LIKE/SHARE.

story:
Thank you to everyone for your amazing support of our 
indiegogo campaign!
If you did not contribute but would like a Ring Clock
please visit our site - www.ringclock.net


Ring Clock background

This award winning time piece was designed by Gusztav Szikszai two years ago and when the initial pictures were posted online there was a lot of interest with many people in various forums asking how they could get hold of one.

Design from 2011

Since then we have been fine tuning the design and technology so that we could deliver the best quality product and building the right team to bring this to market. We are pleased to say that within the timescales below we believe that we can now answer the calls and produce this with your support.

The goal of our Ring Clock project:

  • simple and clean design
  • unique clock aspect around the ring’s band
  • eco-friendly and playful - the time is displayed when you rotate the ring
  • cutting edge technology (wireless charge, ultrathin battery, energy-saving LEDs)

Ring Clock as part of everyday life

There won't be party where you do not get asked by somebody to show off this beautiful gadget. Whenever you need to know the time just spin the ring and you will see the time....and others will see it too!

Ring Clock can improve your sense of time too. How about trying to predict the time before you rotate the ring? It sounds silly but we bet that you will play along with us at some point!

It is also very green with no wasted energy because in real time, when you want, it shows the time. Our next dream is that rotation kinetic energy will give the power to the LED lights meaning that the next version of Ring Clock can be entirely green. If we achieve significant support we will start to work on this dream earlier. 

Design inspiration from Gusztav

“It started with a challenge 2 years ago at CGSociety.org named Moving Innovation. The idea was to create visualisation for a product that cannot exist today, but could exist 10 years from now. I wanted to create something that is innovative, good to look at and can actually be useful. I never wore a watch on my wrist because I don't like the feeling, but I like watches in general, so I used that opportunity to let my mind come up with something that I could wear, the Ring Clock.”

We had to change some things on the original design for the feasibility, because technology has not been able to catch up with Guszti’s dreams in the past 2 years!

Specification of prototype

  • Ring body material: 316L surgical stainless steel (allergy free)
  • Light source: 144 energy safe ultrathin mono-color LED
  • Light color: blue or orange LED (optional)
  • Lighting time: 1 minute time display after the ring rotation
  • Battery specs: 6mAh, ultrathin rechargeable lithium polymer battery
  • Running time: 1 week with normal use (15 times activation per days) or 2 hours constant use.
  • Battery lifetime: 3 years (battery is not replaceable update: battery replacement service, see FAQ)
  • Charger: Qi wireless power charger pad (with universal 110-240 AC DC USB charger)
  • Charging time: max. 2 hours
  • Time setting: by the setting buttons on the Qi charger pad
  • Water-resistant 

Ring Clock dimensions:

  • Width: 14 mm (0.551 in)
  • Thickness: 3-3.5 mm (0.118-0.134 in)
  • Size table: 

Project timeline and budget

Our status as at Aug 2013: 

In the last 4 months we have finished the conceptual model and made some small design changes for feasibility. We have contacted with the potential suppliers: ring turner, micro laser cutter, flexible circuit board manufacturer, battery manufacturer, resin and antibacterial nanotechnology specialist.

We have prepared schematic diagrams and layouts for the prototype board (in 1:1 scale). Printed Circuit Board manufacturing and component purchasing are ongoing. We have  produced 36 ring bodies from 316L stainless steel for prototypes, the micro laser cutting with 30 micron cutting edge is ongoing (see the pictures below).


Project plan:

  • Aug-Oct 2013: prototype building (electrical and mechanical)
  • Nov-Dec 2013: prototype testing and finishing
  • Jan-March 2014: first batch goes into production
  • Apr 2014: first batch ready for delivery
  • Apr-Jun 2014: second batch goes into production
  • Jul 2014: second batch ready for delivery

One third of the funding will be needed to build the prototypes and two thirds will be spent on manufacturing the finished article.

Team

We set up an international team for this project and established a UK limited company. The communication all carried out from the UK, whilst the engineering and production planning are in Hungary.

  • Mark Blair: communication (UK)
  • Gusztav Szikszai: design (Hungary)
  • Sandor Somos: project management (Hungary) - linkedin profile
  • Csaba Albert: electrical engineering (Hungary)
  • Janos Mendler: mechanical engineering (Hungary)

The production will be implemented by carefully selected third party suppliers.
(Our Laser microprocessing partner is Exasol Ltd.)

Perks


Risks and challenges

Our commitment to the Contributors:

  • we will continually inform our Contributors about the progress that we are making 
  • this will include delivery times updates - especially if we are ahead of plan! 
  • we will be transparent with all of the results, unexpected issues and how we plan to resolve them

Prototype: Our conceptual model is based on available smart technologies and standards, so we know that it will work, but our challenge is to make sure that it works in the confined space within the inside of a ring! We will build more than 20 working prototypes and test them in extreme environments in order to produce the best product from your support. Once again updates will be provided throughout this process.

Manufacturing: As you can imagine we have to use the smallest, ultra-thin technologies available. Our chosen manufacturer will be involved in the prototype phase so they will know our product in the embryonic stage.

Delivery time: We have built in some contingency time during the prototype and manufacturing stage to ensure that we can meet the deadlines outlined above. We will inform you immediately if we need more time or of course if we are ahead of schedule.

Please help to support us and then just wear and enjoy every minute of this wonderful gadget! THANK YOU!

Frequently Asked Questions

1, Battery Life / What happens to the ring once the battery has reached the end of its lifetime (expected to be 3 years)?

UPDATE: 

Many of you were asking questions about whether we could replace the battery and we have worked hard in the last few days to provide you with a solution. Our battery is a non-standard size battery due to the fact that there is no standard size to fit within a ring and we need to keep the water resistance. This means that you cannot replace it at home so we are proud to be able to offer you a battery replacement service.

After the battery has died, you can send us your Ring Clock and we will replace the battery (because we will use removable resin around the battery). The planned fee of the battery replacement service is around $25. For the full costs, you have to allow the cost of shipping this item to us (around $15) and we will charge you to send the ring back to you ($15) so realistically the expected cost of battery replacement with shipping cost is around $55.

We will integrate a non-standard size ultrathin rechargeable lithium polymer battery into the Ring Clock. The electronics will be within resin for water resistance. Ring Clock is an electronic gadget with a lot of electronic parts, so the life expectancy is based on our expectations similar to other electronic devices such as a mobile phone. The procurement of components will be an important aspect of life expectancy, but we can not promise more than the parts manufacturers. We hope in the next 3 years there will be a Ring Clock 2.0 with rotational kinetic power supply and therefore a longer life expectancy. We understand your request and we will investigate the replaceable battery, but we cannot make any promises at this stage.

2, Water Resistant / Can I wash my hands wearing it or do I have to remove it prior to washing my hands?

We are currently researching what would be the best solution and have been in communication with a resin and nanotechnology specialist to find out about the current technology. As you will appreciate however we have to test this before we make big promises although we are hoping that it will be WR 100M (Suitable for recreational surfing, swimming, snorkelling, sailing and water sports - wiki) although of course we cannot promise this high level WR at this moment in time.

3, Warranty / What is the warranty period and how will it be handled for international customers?

The warranty offered for Ring Clock is 1 year. It is expected that the customer will send back the ring clock to us at their own expense, we will review it and if it is not abnormal usage then it will be replaced and it will be delivered free of charge. The warranty is not applicable to cases other than defects in material, design and workmanship.

4, Ring size and colour / When will you need my ringsize and colour?

Once the campaign has been successful we will contact you in November 2013 to ask you for your ring size and LED colour choice. We will also send you emails about important events, and we also plan to upgrade our site where you will have a private account (we will send you details on e-mail) and you can add your ring size, colour and change your address if it needs to be changed.

5, Shipping cost / I just funded this, and I forgot to add 15$ shipping, what should I do?

Contribute a further $15 with the same e-mail address so we know it is your shipping cost.

6, Ring Clock function / Are Hours, Minutes and Seconds able to rotate independently of each other or They are on the same ring?

The hours, minutes and seconds are on the same outer ring. The inner ring is the one that is in contact with your finger. The outer ring rotation activates the 
LED's and you can see the time around the ring. Sometimes you see the hours and minutes close to each other (e.g. 13:30) and sometimes you will have to rotate more, because the hour and minute are far away from each other (e.g. 13:55).

The original concept and design from 2011 was that the hours, minutes and seconds would be on separate rings, they rotate individually and automatically however this has proved impossible to manufacture at this moment in time.

It is also very green with no wasted energy because in real time, when 
you want, it shows the time. Our next dream is that rotation kinetic 
energy will give the power to the LED lights meaning that the next 
version of Ring Clock can be entirely green. If we achieve significant 
support we will start to work on this dream earlier. 

Design inspiration from Gusztav
“It started with a challenge 2 years ago at CGSociety.org
 named Moving Innovation. The idea was to create visualisation for a 
product that cannot exist today, but could exist 10 years from now. I 
wanted to create something that is innovative, good to look at and can 
actually be useful. I never wore a watch on my wrist because I don't 
like the feeling, but I like watches in general, so I used that 
opportunity to let my mind come up with something that I could wear, the
 Ring Clock.” 
We had to change some things on the original design for the 
feasibility, because technology has not been able to catch up with 
Guszti’s dreams in the past 2 years!


Specification of prototype






Ring body material: 316L surgical stainless steel (allergy free)


Light source: 144 energy safe ultrathin mono-color LED


Light color: blue or orange LED (optional)


Lighting time: 1 minute time display after the ring rotation


Battery specs: 6mAh, ultrathin rechargeable lithium polymer battery


Running time: 1 week with normal use (15 times activation per days) or 2 hours constant use.


Battery lifetime: 3 years (battery is not replaceable update: battery replacement service, see FAQ)


Charger: Qi wireless power charger pad (with universal 110-240 AC DC USB charger)


Charging time: max. 2 hours


Time setting: by the setting buttons on the Qi charger pad

Water-resistant 



Ring Clock dimensions: 



Width: 14 mm (0.551 in)


Thickness: 3-3.5 mm (0.118-0.134 in)


Size table: 




Project timeline and budget
Our status as at Aug 2013: 
In
 the last 4 months we have finished the conceptual model and made some 
small design changes for feasibility. We have contacted with the 
potential suppliers: ring turner, micro laser cutter, flexible circuit 
board manufacturer, battery manufacturer, resin and antibacterial 
nanotechnology specialist. 
We have prepared schematic diagrams 
and layouts for the prototype board (in 1:1 scale). Printed Circuit 
Board manufacturing and component purchasing are ongoing. We have  
produced 36 ring bodies from 316L stainless steel for prototypes, the 
micro laser cutting with 30 micron cutting edge is ongoing (see the pictures below).














Project plan:



Aug-Oct 2013: prototype building (electrical and mechanical)


Nov-Dec 2013: prototype testing and finishing


Jan-March 2014: first batch goes into production


Apr 2014: first batch ready for delivery


Apr-Jun 2014: second batch goes into production


Jul 2014: second batch ready for delivery



One third of the funding will be needed to build the prototypes and 
two thirds will be spent on manufacturing the finished article.
Team
We set up an international team for this project and 
established a UK limited company. The communication all carried out from
 the UK, whilst the engineering and production planning are in Hungary.



Mark Blair: communication (UK)


Gusztav Szikszai: design (Hungary)


Sandor Somos: project management (Hungary) - linkedin profile


Csaba Albert: electrical engineering (Hungary)


Janos Mendler: mechanical engineering (Hungary)



The production will be implemented by carefully selected third party suppliers. (Our Laser microprocessing partner is Exasol Ltd.)
Perks






Risks and challenges
Our commitment to the Contributors: 



we will continually inform our Contributors about the progress that we are making 


this will include delivery times updates - especially if we are ahead of plan! 


we will be transparent with all of the results, unexpected issues and how we plan to resolve them



Prototype: Our conceptual model is based on available smart 
technologies and standards, so we know that it will work, but our 
challenge is to make sure that it works in the confined space within the
 inside of a ring! We will build more than 
20 working prototypes and test them in extreme environments in order to 
produce the best product from your support. Once again updates will be 
provided throughout this process.
Manufacturing: As you can imagine we have to use the smallest, 
ultra-thin technologies available. Our chosen manufacturer will be 
involved in the prototype phase so they will know our product in the 
embryonic stage.
Delivery time: We have built in some contingency time during the 
prototype and manufacturing stage to ensure that we can meet the 
deadlines outlined above. We will inform you immediately if we need more
 time or of course if we are ahead of schedule.
Please help to support us and then just wear and enjoy every minute of this wonderful gadget! THANK YOU!
Frequently Asked Questions

1, Battery Life / What happens to the ring once the battery has reached the end of its lifetime (expected to be 3 years)?
UPDATE: 
Many of you were asking questions about whether we could replace the battery and we have worked hard in the last few days to provide you with a solution. Our battery is a non-standard size battery due to the fact that there is no standard size to fit within a ring and we need to keep the water resistance. This means that you cannot replace it at home so we are proud to be able to offer you a battery replacement service.
After the battery has died, you can send us your Ring Clock and we will replace the battery (because we will use removable resin around the battery). The planned fee of the battery replacement service is around $25. For the full costs, you have to allow the cost of shipping this item to us (around $15) and we will charge you to send the ring back to you ($15) so realistically the expected cost of battery replacement with shipping cost is around $55.
We will integrate a non-standard size ultrathin rechargeable lithium polymer battery into the Ring Clock. The electronics will be within resin for water resistance. Ring Clock is an electronic gadget with a lot of electronic parts, so the life expectancy is based on our expectations similar to other electronic devices such as a mobile phone. The procurement of components will be an important aspect of life expectancy, but we can not promise more than the parts manufacturers. We hope in the next 3 years there will be a Ring Clock 2.0 with rotational kinetic power supply and therefore a longer life expectancy. We understand your request and we will investigate the replaceable battery, but we cannot make any promises at this stage.



2, Water Resistant / Can I wash my hands wearing it or do I have to remove it prior to washing my hands?


We are currently researching what would be the best solution and have been in communication with a resin and nanotechnology specialist to find out about the current technology. As you will appreciate however we have to test this before we make big promises although we are hoping that it will be WR 100M (Suitable for recreational surfing, swimming, snorkelling, sailing and water sports - wiki) although of course we cannot promise this high level WR at this moment in time.

3, Warranty / What is the warranty period and how will it be handled for international customers?


The warranty offered for Ring Clock is 1 year. It is expected that the customer will send back the ring clock to us at their own expense, we will review it and if it is not abnormal usage then it will be replaced and it will be delivered free of charge. The warranty is not applicable to cases other than defects in material, design and workmanship.
4, Ring size and colour / When will you need my ringsize and colour?
Once the campaign has been successful we will contact you in November 2013 to ask you for your ring size and LED colour choice. We will also send you emails about important events, and we also plan to upgrade our site where you will have a private account (we will send you details on e-mail) and you can add your ring size, colour and change your address if it needs to be changed.
5, Shipping cost / I just funded this, and I forgot to add 15$ shipping, what should I do?
Contribute a further $15 with the same e-mail address so we know it is your shipping cost.
6, Ring Clock function / Are Hours, Minutes and Seconds able to rotate independently of each other or They are on the same ring?

The hours, minutes and seconds are on the same outer ring. The inner ring is the one that is in contact with your finger. The outer ring rotation activates the LED's and you can see the time around the ring. Sometimes you see the hours and minutes close to each other (e.g. 13:30) and sometimes you will have to rotate more, because the hour and minute are far away from each other (e.g. 13:55).
The original concept and design from 2011 was that the hours, minutes and seconds would be on separate rings, they rotate individually and automatically however this has proved impossible to manufacture at this moment in time.

story:
What is PURE about?

We are a team of young gentlemen, passionate about creating a brand that serves one single purpose:

Creating high quality every-day products tailored towards real gentlemen.

PURE as a brand stands for attention to detail, environmental responsibility and the unforgettable feeling of what life is really about: The enjoyment of being a gentlemen, no matter what type of man you are.

The message of PURE is simple. We are uniting all gentlemen out there that live up to a certain codex recently suppressed in our modern society:

  • We are good for our word.
  • We are courteous and understanding.
  • We are classy, and live up to our standards.
  • We treat everyone and everything with respect.
  • We work hard to make our and the lives of others better - every single day. 

PURE Premium Detergent for Men is just the beginning. Our laundry detergent stands for a autonomous, modern, and responsible gentleman that wants to use a simple, but premium product.

Come and join our community. Let's make the great codex of real gentlemen flourish again. Let's make the world a better place. Let's care again!

Gentlemen, spread the word:

LET'S REDEFINE GENTLEMEN!

Gentlemen, jump on board and help us with the first step:

-> Back this campaign to bring PURE Detergent to every gentleman's hand. <-

 

Gentlemen, here is what you get: 

Let's make it simple: With your financial support, we are bringing PURE Premium Detergent for Men to production.

With our funding goal of 3.000 EUR we will produce exactly 300 units and send them to our initial customers. 

PURE Detergent has been in development for over one year. Here is a short wrap up of what we took care of:

  • We worked together with a local, but very experienced soap manufacturer MADE IN GERMANY which was founded nearly 110 years ago.  We decided to use a very eco-friendly but effective detergent that gets rid of any grime and that suits any fabric: PURE Detergent is simple and it works perfectly on cotton, silk and synthetic fabrics of any color! PLUS: All ingredients are carefully selected, completely bio-degradable and economical. The concentrate provides  up to 25 loads on a single 1.0L canister.
  • We tested almost 100 different scents to get it just right. Now we are sure that PURE Detergent smells right before and after doing laundry. The scent is neither too faint nor too pungent. It smells fresh, but clearly masculine and defines a real gentleman. It fits well with all the other perfumes that you might use and works on every fabric: Whether shirts, towels, bed sheets, or underwear: PURE Detergents defines what being a man is all about and totally separates itself from all the laundry detergents on the market.
  • We have redefined laundry detergent packaging: PURE Detergent comes in a completely recycable but classic and generous tinplate canister wrapped in a beautiful black label with a lot of attention to detail. Have a look for yourself!

We have reinvented a laundry detergent being simple and easy to use. With PURE we are simplifying the lives of any gentlemen doing their laundry, 100% worry-free:

Our supply chain is already secure: We have already validated all suppliers and tested many prototypes. PURE Detergent is now ready to go and is waiting for only one last thing:

FOR CLASSY GENTLEMEN THAT WANT TO GET THIS MISSION GOING!

We have divided this campaign into three different and simple perks: The more you buy, the greater the discount!

PERK 1: Get 44% discount on one canister.

PERK 2: Get 50% discount on two canisters.

PERK 3: Get 55% discount on three canisters. That's it. Cheerio.

Shipping will commence early next year and we promise to ship by March 2018 at the latest!

 

What's next?

By backing this project, your help doesn't stop with bringing the first premium laundry Detergent for real Gentlemen to the market. The mission is much greater and you, Gentlemen, are helping with something much bigger here:

PURE will become a brand! A brand designed to fit the needs of real Gentlemen. A brand designed to redefine the modern gentlemen. A brand to bring back the gentleman's codex that has been recently diluted.  

Our team consists of very experienced entrepreneurs that have been working in the cosmetics sector for many years, generating millions of revenue. We already have several more products in the pipeline that will all be released serving one single purpose: 

Creating high quality every-day products tailored towards real gentlemen.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our team has worked hard to eliminate all major risks. Nevertheless, there are a few that we want to share here:

  • A laundry detergent is a low price but heavy product. We hope we calculated all shipping costs correctly to get this amazing product right to your hands, anywhere and anytime.
  • We don't know the exact demand we will generate kicking off PURE on Indiegogo. Nevertheless, we worked out a plan for any scenario.
  • We have tested the product with many great people, who all loved the product! We are looking forward that you do as well!

 

Gentlemen, spread the Word!

Let's REDEFINE GENTLEMEN!

A laundry detergent is a low price but heavy product. We hope we calculated all shipping costs correctly to get this amazing product right to your hands, anywhere and anytime.
We don't know the exact demand we will generate kicking off PURE on Indiegogo. Nevertheless, we worked out a plan for any scenario.
We have tested the product with many great people, who all loved the product! We are looking forward that you do as well!
 Gentlemen, spread the Word!Let's REDEFINE GENTLEMEN!

story:
Connect with us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter @Pappeal.

It's all about the design.

When it comes to bags, there really isn’t anything new and unique on the market to get people excited. We started thinking, what if we could present a well-designed bag out of a paper-like so strong and so durable it could sustain a great deal of wear and tear? What if it could be modern, sleek and even a blank canvas for those who saw opportunities to personalize it? Pappeal was born of our desire to make something beautiful and well-designed for the world of durable bags. Made of Tyvek®, the bag is incredibly durable as you can see from the video, and it is even beautiful in a new and different way. Who says practicality can't be fashionable?


How Can You Use Pappeal?

Our vision for Pappeal is truly limitless. We see our bag as an asset for so many personalities and functions; that's where our motto "Carry Your Life" comes in.

The Messenger

We've got the bag for many lifestyles. For the artists or those hooked on DIY, your Pappeal bag is a canvas for carrying! Use your creativity to make Pappeal your own. For your lifestyle, Pappeal brings a sleek new fashion statement that will look amazing thrown over your shoulder. Students, throw your tablet, laptop, smartphone and notebooks for class into a Pappeal messenger bag, and make your trek across campus. Professionals, it's even a great bag to carry to the office.

  • White paper-like Tyvek® with black accents
  • Measurements 13.4" × 9.4" × 3.1"
  • Inner open space with division
  • Inside pockets for pens and cellphone
  • Front zip pocket 6.7" × 5.9"
  • Flap closure with velcro
  • Adjustable padded shoulder strap 45.3" max. length

Your Pappeal is Your Canvas


So, Exactly What is Tyvek®?

No matter how you choose to use it, Pappeal is going to be a conversation starter wherever you go. It's not everyday that you get to tell people that the stylish bag they inquired about is actually made of, well, Tyvek®.

The look and feel is just like paper, but it is actually made of flashspun high-density polyethylene fibers. For a product that resembles paper, it is unimaginably strong and difficult to tear. Still, just like any other bag or garment, it can be easily cut with scissors. Trademarked by DuPont in the 1950's, the product is used for nearly everything under the kitchen sink. This includes house wrap and insulation, mail parcels and envelopes, and even coveralls at one time. It's breathable and water resistant, but it shouldn't be submerged.

Why Indiegogo?

We wanted to find a way to bring a new idea to the market of bags -- something that would stand out and give people something to be excited about. We’ve worked hard to make that a reality, and Pappeal embodies that dream.

We wanted to share with the Indiegogo community and to give you the opportunity to be by our side in this journey from its inception. We need your help and support to make Pappeal available to the world. As our contributors, you’ll be a valued part of the Pappeal brand from day one.

Our Story

Our company came together as three people looking to make a splash and intrigue the world with something exclusive. Something that was not only standout, but something that was beautiful and even useful in people’s lives. Our product, Pappeal, is constructed from those intentions. Paper has never been quite so attractive, but we have found a way to design something incredibly appealing from a paper-like material, or ‘papel’ as we romance linguists would call it. That’s where we derived the term Pappeal, and we believe in the word to the highest level. We’re so excited about the distinct product we’ve made -- and we are thrilled to share it with you.

Risks & Challenges

In the last couple of years, Tyvek® paper has become more and more popular in various industries other than just for homes. People are coming up with incredibly innovative ways to use this amazing material for different items such as envelops, wallets, clothing and bags.

Our biggest challenge has been to design a product that can bring functionality, a product that not only looks cool but serves a clear purpose in our daily lives. We have spent many hours designing and testing the prototypes we made. There have been endless nights at the drawing board in order to finally come up with the model that we believe will be appealing for everyone and everyday.

In order to make sure that we can supply bigger orders, we started several months ago preparing the manufacturing process with communication and several tests. We did all of this to reduce the risk of production mistakes and to be sure that the creation of our model is proven and reliable.

After production, the next challenge will be shipping the bags and having them delivered on time. To facilitate this we have, in advance, prepared a fulfillment house that we have worked with before. This is a great advantage, as we have reliable partners around us to make sure you receive your bags on time. We are dedicated to a high level of customer service.

We are also aware that communication is key. We want to make sure that you are always up to date on where we are throughout the project. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions by emailing hello@pappeal.com.

story:
Both charming, both from 1975...! Aren't they a perfect match? 

If you wish to contribute to make this little dream come true you can do so in a couple of clicks, and please don't forget: it's a secret...!!

Give however much you want (we'll put a sticker with your name on the part of the 500 you have "offered"!). If we raise more than needed the reminder will go to Kids Home.

All payments are secure.

Merci, Thank you, Grazie !!!

story:
Are you hungry for fashion and like to stand out from the crowd?

Are you tired of magazines that are non specific and just doesn't quite cut it when it comes to fashion and beauty?

Are you ready to be inspired?


Here comes #INSPO: a free bi-monthly fashion and beauty magazine for the North West UK and beyond.

While I was working in yet another meaningless job, thinking that my degree in Publishing and passion for fashion is going to waste, I decided that life is too short and there are too many opportunities waiting for me to take them. I quit my job, gained experience in fashion, worked on my personal style blog and met amazing people that have been working in fashion & beauty industry for years. My secret dream of starting a magazine, created by people from multicultural backgrounds celebrating diversity, started coming to life.

It is not just me. I have the pleasure of working with Lucy Mckeown, Kerryn Grady, Bruce Smith, Al Milerius, Amy Faith, Kelly Ann Garrigan, Rob McGrory, Kirsty Afful, Ruta Gyvyte and other wonderful creatives!

I am hoping to raise money for printing the very first issue of #INSPO magazine and invite you to be a part of a new generation of stylish and creative people, brought together by a high-quality magazine.

I know there are people waiting for this magazine to be published and I just need that last financial push over the line. Please help make #INSPO a success!

Every issue of #INSPO will feature:

  • Exclusive editorials showcasing the work of best photographers, makeup artists, stylists of the North West UK.
  • Interviews with local designers and other industry professionals.
  • Newest fashion books and "must-attend" events.
  • Hottest street style looks.
  • The ultimate peek into beauty trends.
  • Product reviews and makeup tips from makeup professionals.
  • An inside look into the best spas of the North West UK.

    The amount of £5,600 is needed to pay for printing the first edition of #INSPO, to pay crowdfunding and other fees, and to the video production company for making our amazing video.

    I am not asking for any more than I need. Myself and people around me believe in #INSPO. However, if we don't reach the required amount, we will still put the money towards printing and look for every possible way to raise the rest of the money.

    To thank you for your generous donations I have gathered some great perks!

    • Invites to the exclusive launch party and fashion show in Liverpool
    • Signed copies of the magazine
    • Beauty and fashion consultations
    • Photography sessions
                                              ...and more!

    I believe that #INSPO has the power to change how the North West region is perceived in terms of fashion and beauty and to kickstart positive change by delivering inspirational content.

    Risks & Challenges

    As rewarding as creating a publication is, this endeavor comes with some challenges, the biggest ones being deadlines and costs. However, we are already sorting out the contect beyond the initial issue to avoid stressful sleepless nights in the future. We have also gotten estimates from several different printers through extensive research, picked the best one and are sticking to it for the time being.

    Please donate and support #INSPO!

    Even if you can't, share the project on social media and let your family and friends know to get the word out and reach wider audience!
story_txt:
Are you hungry
for fashion and like to stand out from the crowd?
Are you tired of magazines that are
non specific and just doesn't quite cut it when it comes to fashion and beauty?
Are you ready to be inspired?

Here comes #INSPO: a free bi-monthly fashion and beauty magazine for the
North West UK and beyond. 
While I was working in yet another meaningless job, thinking that my
degree in Publishing and passion for fashion is going to waste, I decided that
life is too short and there are too many opportunities waiting for me to take
them. I quit my job, gained experience in fashion, worked on my personal style
blog and met amazing people that have been working in fashion & beauty
industry for years. My secret dream of starting a magazine, created by people
from multicultural backgrounds celebrating diversity, started coming to life.
It is not just me. I have the pleasure of working with Lucy Mckeown,
Kerryn Grady,
Bruce
Smith, Al
Milerius, Amy Faith, Kelly Ann Garrigan, Rob McGrory,
Kirsty Afful, Ruta Gyvyte and other wonderful creatives!
I am hoping to raise money for printing the very first issue of #INSPO
magazine and invite you to be a part of a new generation of stylish and
creative people, brought together by a high-quality magazine.
I know there are people waiting for
this magazine to be published and I just need that last financial push over the
line. Please help make #INSPO a success!
Every issue of
#INSPO will feature:

Exclusive editorials showcasing the work of best
     photographers, makeup artists, stylists of the North West UK.
Interviews with local designers and other
     industry professionals.
Newest fashion books and "must-attend"
     events.
Hottest street style looks.
The ultimate peek into beauty trends.
Product reviews and makeup tips from makeup
     professionals.
An inside look into the best spas of the North
     West UK.




The amount of £5,600 is needed to
pay for printing the first edition of #INSPO, to pay crowdfunding and other fees, and to
the video production company for making our amazing video.
I am not asking for any more than I need. Myself and people around me believe
in #INSPO. However, if we don't reach the required amount, we will still put the money towards printing and look for every possible way to raise the rest of the money.
To thank you for your generous donations I have gathered some great
perks!

Invites to the exclusive launch party and fashion
     show in Liverpool
Signed copies of the magazine
Beauty and fashion consultations
Photography sessions

                                          ...and more!I believe that #INSPO has the power to change how the North West region is perceived in terms of fashion and beauty and to kickstart positive change by delivering inspirational content.
  Risks & ChallengesAs rewarding as creating a publication is, this endeavor comes with some challenges, the biggest ones being deadlines and costs. However, we are already sorting out the contect beyond the initial issue to avoid stressful sleepless nights in the future. We have also gotten estimates from several different printers through extensive research, picked the best one and are sticking to it for the time being.
Please donate and support #INSPO!Even if you can't, share the project on social media and let your family and friends know to get the word out and reach wider audience!

story:
Welcome!

Corbeaux is a fashion-forward brand making a positive impact through social responsibility and environmental consideration.  

The brand was started two years ago by us (a husband and wife team - Darcy Conover & Adam Moszynski) - two professional skiers living in Aspen, CO.  After years of testing clothing and gear for big name companies we have grown frustrated with the fit, performance and style of baselayers, so we decided to design our own!  Our high-performance apparel looks awesome on everyone and is intended for athletes of all levels.  Whether ski touring in the backcountry or ripping the bunny slopes at Buttermilk, running in Central Park or trailrunning an ultra marathon, walking a dog at the farmer's market or lounging at the bar after a powder day, these baselayers are for you!  

We have put a lot of thought into every detail of our products - considering style, performance and function.  Social responsibility is also important to us, so we are using fabric made from a renewable resource (bamboo) AND manufacturing in the USA! 

Another component of our business is geared toward the globally conscious consumer.  Our online customers will have the option to Join the Flight by donating gently-used athletic apparel which we will distribute to charities already established  in developing mountain cultures around the world (think Sherpa in Nepal and porters in Tanzania).  In addition, Corbeaux will be running clothing drives to increase donations and our impact.  

We have spent the past year designing 10 pieces and working with our manufacturer in St. Paul, Minnesota to bring our ideas to life.  After 3 rounds of product revision we have perfected our designs and we know the world will love them... we just need to make them!  We are ready to start production of Collection 1, but we need your help!  We are raising funds on Indiegogo to manufacture this first line of Corbeaux Clothing's high-performance baselayers.

We would be so grateful for any help you can provide.  Please read the list of donation perks to tickle your fancy!  


Why do we need $40,000 (or more!)?

Manufacturing in the USA is very important to us... but it is more expensive than the alternatives.  This $40,000 will be going directly to the cost of manufacturing Collection 1.  

  • We need $40,000 to manufacture 2,000 units 
  • Any additional funds that we raise will go toward marketing and the roll-out of the Corbeaux brand
  • If we don't reach our goal (sad face) we will manufacture fewer pieces - but let's not talk about that

             

        

              

      

       

Stay warm and party hard this winter!


The Impact.

We came up with the idea for Corbeaux on our honeymoon while climbing Mt. Kilimanjaro.  On that trip we were inspired to start a company of our own in the outdoor sports community and to give back to those less fortunate in the process.  We knew we could make a better baselayer product than what is available on the market today, and help provide people in underdeveloped mountain cultures with some essential outdoor gear.  By contributing to the process you can outfit yourself with the best baselayers on the planet, and be a part of our cause to help someone in a distant mountain culture.  It's a win-win situation!  


    The Risks.

    As professional mountain athletes we understand the concept of risk versus reward.  Through our experience in many mountain sports we have effectively learned to achieve our goals through careful planning, risk management, and execution.  As a husband and wife team we work together efficiently and complement each other's strengths and weaknesses...something we will transfer to our business.  Words cannot express how excited we are about our product and how determined we are to make Corbeaux a success!   


    The Name.

    PRONUNCIATION: Korbo

    DEFINITION: Ravens (French)

    IMPORTANCE:  In mountainous areas in Europe and across the globe, the Common Raven is thought to represent the souls of those who have fallen in the mountains- reborn, to watch over and protect.  We, at Corbeaux, find solace and comfort when ravens grace us with their presence high in the mountains…they are our Guardian Angels.  When we are out adventuring and don’t see any ravens, we usually turn around.  


    Other Ways You Can Help

    We know that not everyone can contribute financially.  However, sharing our story with others would be immensely helpful.  

    • Share and share again! Make some noise about us!

    ***Please feel free to contribute any amount you desire!  The perks to the right are simply suggestions.  
    ***Please understand that we incur % losses of donations through payment processing, production of your perks, and mailing of perks.  
    ***For International customers, fulfillment of your perk, and shipping will take longer.  Thanks for your patience.  
    ***We want to send out a special thank you to our friends Will Cardamone and Danny Brown!  They did all of the cinematography and editing to turn our video into a great product!  Thanks guys!
