story:
Hi Indiegogo! Meet our ARMA watch project — a modern timepiece inspired by the most prominent military watches of the WWII era. We are fascinated by the amazing harmony of functionality and incredibly stylish design combined in a single timepiece offered by watchmakers for military purposes.

All ARMA watches are produced already and ready for shipping! Simply place an order and get it shipped immediately. 

That's why, right now, we’re creating our own take on the retro military wristwatch with design is based on the pieces worn by US and European military men in the middle of the 20th century.

The idea behind our project is obvious at the first look but challenging nevertheless. The look and distinctive features became iconic after the war ended, and that’s what inspired us to research this phenomenon further and develop our own wristwatch which draws on the best and most interesting details, converting them into a modern, attractive and fresh shape. Our goal was to create a military inspired wristwatch, but the most important thing was to make it stand out among other products.

We were dazzled by the design of US military watches, German B-Uhr, and British WWW-class timepieces. Our collection strives to reflect on all the iconic models, to rework and revive them. However, we needed to start simply. So we combined their most classic and appealing features into two models – Sherman and Avenger.

The Avenger takes inspiration from two sources. First, the grace and strict functionality of WWII era military wristwatches. Second, the aircraft dashboards of US and RAF jets and airplanes, such as produced by Lockheed, Hawker and Grumman. The model bears the name of the US heavy bomber Grumman Avenger.

There are several crucial points we needed to emphasize in our watch to allow the spirit of the classic pilot watch to shine through. As a result, the dial offers precise time-telling through a sleek, clean design with contrasting indexes, a rounded layout, and 24-hour markings. The seconds dial design is based on dashboard supportive indication elements of WWII bomber planes.

In the center of the dial is a large triangle which was used for quick orientation while in the air during military campaigns. The outer layer indexes are volumetric and covered with a lume coating. This special coating is a reflection of indexes made of luminous material that were common on vintage watches of the WWII era. The strap is stylized as a Kevlar fiber to strengthen the overall military look.

The special edition Stealth Avenger watch has a slightly reworked dial with cream colored digits and hands which are common for vintage watches of the middle of the XX century. The case is worn out artificially to strengthen the vintage-like, yet incredibly stylish look. The strap is made of thick and rough stitched brown leather - the one that will survive through decades easily. The overall design palette is dark as a reference to hard conditions that military men meet through their service.

The Sherman watch offers boldness and rough power in its design. It draws inspiration from Sherman, Valiant and Churchill tank instrument panels and also infantry timepieces of the mid-20th century.

The dial offers a simplified layout with large, easily readable indexes on the hour layer and minute marks on the inner layer, granting accuracy necessary for your typical infantrymen. The differing layer finishings conceptualize the idea of the harsh varied environment which both infantry and tanks encountered.

The seconds dial hand and other elements have a bold, massive structure resembling their source of inspiration. The lume coats the dial's applied volumetric digits and grants clear view even under challenging circumstances. The strap has texture and color similar to WWII flak jackets used by war machine pilots and drivers.

The Valiant Sherman watch is a special edition model and designed to make Sherman model look even more vintage inspired and antique. The bronze case and is the center of it all in Valiant edition with its strong impressive looks supplementing ARMA's masculine design approach in such exquisite and fashionable way. This design feature is a gesture of respect and a reference to military decorations which are often made of bronze or coated with it.

Military watches are a specific niche of watchmaking and watch culture. They have a grand history, clear and strict guidelines in a modern environment, and a lot of fans all over the world. We found the modern take on military timepieces currently available to be too gentle and shy, and there are too few projects that offer something really interesting in this area. That’s what served as a push for us in creating ARMA.

So we started historical research on this matter, looking for old photographs, information and preserved watches to examine. All this was to create a watch that maintains strict yet charming and well-known design elements and make it appealing to the modern watch enthusiast. Of course, you can always buy a vintage watch, but we strive to create something that is stripped of the flaws inherent in a single collectible, improves its features, offers up-to-date technological quality and will become a desirable vintage watch itself.

The conceptual idea behind ARMA watches is not to merely pay homage to classic military timepieces. But also to integrate it into the lifestyle of a modern citizen, as well as make it worthy of any watch collection. ARMA watches meet all criteria for a matching contemporary timepiece, both from technical and aesthetic points of view. Preserving the military chronometers' features, we managed to cover it in a sleek, up-to-date design which will look at home on every wrist, thanks to its universality and conceptual variety.

But don’t think about us as of some kind of warmongering designers. ARMA is a totally anti-war project in its beliefs. We cast aside the circumstances that led to creation of military watches and drew inspiration only from the aesthetics. Our work is pure design and that helps us to inject our ideas into the modern look and lifestyle even easier, which results in one beautiful and stylish timepiece series that is an out of time accessory for everyone.

ARMA watches are not simply a design product. We want to achieve the highest standards of quality with our watches, making it as close in durability and reliability as possible to their sources of inspiration.

The watches are made of high-quality materials and geared with a reliable 17-jewel hand-winding movement. The back lid is transparent and offers a perfect view of the work of the movement, erasing a dividing line between functionality and ergonomic design.

We wanted to maintain a strict ergonomic look even in the color palette and style of the strap. One is a smooth khaki suede, and the other is black with a kevlar-like structure. All straps are made of genuine cow skin by hand or from nylon and are strong and durable, which were tested by us before launching the campaign.

The dial is another matter of exquisite attention to detail. Each model offers different layer finishing and significant depth in dial design. All hour indexes are volume and applied by hand with a bright luminous coating, sticking to the original military watch design with convex digits made wholly of lume material. Both second dials have a sunray texture. Main dials have a rough-grained surface as well, aiming to support a tough overall look for the watch.

The development process turned out to be one of the most challenging parts of all. Our goal was to reimagine the most iconic watches and their features in a contemporary fashion. We studied a lot of timepieces of the past, both in person and through images, consulted the watch community and collectors, learned a lot about watchmaking, as well as on historical aspects of the subject. All of this was done to create something that fits perfectly into the industry for modern military watches.

We began by developing each part of the watch manually — creating, calculating and thoroughly choosing every detail from scratch. We don’t use pre-made parts in our watches. Every smallest detail was specifically created for the watch in order to complete an authentic look and make this timepiece a product desired by watch enthusiasts for years to come.

Another aspect we want to emphasize is movement. The technical side of the project is as vital for us as the design. We spent a lot of time choosing the proper movement mechanism to support our concept. While it was common for WWII era watches to sport simple in design yet reliable movements, we wanted to add something more elegant, beautiful and spectacular to the watch and make it more fashionable with a transparent back lid. That’s why we chose this movement — it offers a great look, is wound by hand, has proven to be reliable and precise, and helps us maintain an acceptable price.

Both models have a case made of lightweight 316L stainless steel with a matt finishing. The back lid is also made of steel, has a transparent glass embedded in it, offering a great view of the movement. The movement is a Seagull TY 3620 with 17 jewels, and the watch construction grants 5 ATM water resistance. Each dial offers different layer finishings, gradating from a smooth to rough-grained surface and sunray finishing on the seconds dial.

Case diameter: 44 mm 
Case thickness: 12 mm 
Band material: Genuine leather / Nylon 
Strap buckle: 316L Stainless steel 
Max / Min wrist size : 225 mm / 155 mm 
Band width: 22 mm 
Total weight: 65 gram 
Case material : 316L Stainless steel 
Crystal: Double Domed Sapphire Coated 
Water resistant: 5 ATM 
Movement: TY 3620 Hand Winding Mechanical 
Illumination: Super-Luminova BGW9

We know that our watches aren't the cheapest available due to several of their distinctive features and the technological resources needed for the manufacturing process. However, we've managed to maintain a marketable price and make it as attractive as possible using  principles and work model. This price is available to you because we're cutting any middlemen and offering our watches directly, fresh from the manufacturer to our backers.

You'll play an important role in the creation of our watches, and you deserve the best price possible, even if it cuts our profits significantly. Because, overall, our goal is to create a timepiece important in the industry.

Rest assured, we've done everything we can to provide the most affordable price possible for those who help us create the new ARMA watch brand — our dearest backers.

We've established a trustworthy connection with the manufacturer as well as with the fulfillment company. Also, testing is complete of different technologies used in producing our watches. So there will be no additional stages and obstacles in the way to getting your brand new ARMA!

We'll be handling and supervising each production stage on our own. From the manufacturing of every watch element, even including the straps, to the final stages of production, assembly and quality control. It'll give us an opportunity not only to tightly control the process but also establish a valuable connection for feedback with our backers. Since the watch is already in production, the waiting time is even shorter! 

If you're interested in our concept (or simply like our watches), please, tell your friends about it, share it with your connections and help us forge a new and unique community around ARMA!

https://www.facebook.com/arma.watches

https://www.instagram.com/arma.watches

https://twitter.com/arma_watches

For the journalists, authors and bloggers, we've prepared a full collection of high-resolution images of our project — visit our Dropbox. Feel free to use them while telling the story of ARMA watches. If you have any other questions — please email us: info@armawatches.com

Each dial offers different layer finishings, gradating from a smooth to rough-grained surface and sunray finishing on the seconds dial.Case diameter: 44 mm Case thickness: 12 mm Band material: Genuine leather / Nylon Strap buckle: 316L Stainless steel Max / Min wrist size : 225 mm / 155 mm Band width: 22 mm Total weight: 65 gram Case material : 316L Stainless steel Crystal: Double Domed Sapphire Coated Water resistant: 5 ATM Movement: TY 3620 Hand Winding Mechanical Illumination: Super-Luminova BGW9We know that our watches aren't the cheapest available due to several of their distinctive features and the technological resources needed for the manufacturing process. However, we've managed to maintain a marketable price and make it as attractive as possible using  principles and work model. This price is available to you because we're cutting any middlemen and offering our watches directly, fresh from the manufacturer to our backers.You'll play an important role in the creation of our watches, and you deserve the best price possible, even if it cuts our profits significantly. Because, overall, our goal is to create a timepiece important in the industry.Rest assured, we've done everything we can to provide the most affordable price possible for those who help us create the new ARMA watch brand — our dearest backers.We've established a trustworthy connection with the manufacturer as well as with the fulfillment company. Also, testing is complete of different technologies used in producing our watches. So there will be no additional stages and obstacles in the way to getting your brand new ARMA!We'll be handling and supervising each production stage on our own. From the manufacturing of every watch element, even including the straps, to the final stages of production, assembly and quality control. It'll give us an opportunity not only to tightly control the process but also establish a valuable connection for feedback with our backers. Since the watch is already in production, the waiting time is even shorter! If you're interested in our concept (or simply like our watches), please, tell your friends about it, share it with your connections and help us forge a new and unique community around ARMA!https://www.facebook.com/arma.watcheshttps://www.instagram.com/arma.watcheshttps://twitter.com/arma_watchesFor the journalists, authors and bloggers, we've prepared a full collection of high-resolution images of our project — visit our Dropbox. Feel free to use them while telling the story of ARMA watches. If you have any other questions — please email us: info@armawatches.com

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jordan Honore

  • B.S. Business Management-Baker University
  • I'm seeking seed capital for Platinum Collection Company, a design company.
  • This is a long standing dream of mine and it would do me WONDERS if you could help me reach my goal.

What We Need & What You Get

Platinum Collection Company needs to raise $1,500 by December.  The funding will go to purchase inventory and equipment need to turn the designs from abstract to concrete.  We will offer an affordable yet high quality and trendy product to our customers in the urban wear market.  If we are not able to reach our full goal then the money received will still go to the same cause just at a small scale.

The Impact

If you are able to give to the cause your contribution will go to helping a young man achieve his dreams in owning a design company.  You will be supporting a product that will appeal to the masses.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't in a position to give financially then moral support carries the same impact.

story:
• Designed in Stockholm, the Aevi comes with a Scandinavian look that focuses on the essentials. 

  • Ultra-thin, domed glass design for a sleek and elegant style. 

  • A watch that will stand the test of time with quality materials such as sapphire crystal glass, 316L stainless steel, and powered by a long-lasting Swiss movement.

  • Handcrafted by watchmakers that are experienced in producing high-end watches in the $1,000+ price range. 

  • Customizable Straps, allowing you to alternate between genuine Italian leather, durable nylon in easy-to-match Scandinavian pastels, and Milanese mesh to fit your daily mood and style. 

  • Free shipping and free returns within 30 days. Risk free commitment and guaranteed satisfaction. 

  • We stand behind the quality of our products with rock solid confidence, reflected in the 10 years limited warranty we provide.

The Leather Collection 
The genuine Italian leather straps come in four shades: Cocoa Brown, Smokey Topaz, Chocolatte and Classic Black. 

The Milanese Collection 
The modern and popular Milanese loop strap in stainless steel gives you a robust and flexible strap to add to your collection.

The Nylon Collection 
The durable nylon straps come in organic Scandinavian pastels and are layered with smooth calfskin on the inside.

Quick Release Springbars 
All of our straps are equipped with Quick Release springbars, allowing you to easily and reliably change straps to match your daily mood and style.

After months of sourcing and prototyping from different watch manufacturers, we finally found the one that had the right technical expertise and experience to meet our demands. Our partners have been in the business for generations and regularly produce high-end watches in $1,000+ price range. To craft our watches, they use state-of-the art facilities, and assemble them by hand.

Customer experience
You’ll always be able to reach us on phone, e-mail or our web, 7 days a week, 9 AM GMT - 7 PM GMT. With whatever questions or thoughts you might have. That’s a promise.

10 years warranty 
We are so certain about our the quality of our product that we are willing to stand behind it with a 10 year limited warranty. The warranty covers all manufacturing errors and faults on our side.

30 day trial period
If you are not satisfied with your watch, you can always send it back and get a full refund.

My name is Michael Truong, and I’m the founder of Aevi. I’ve long been an entrepreneur at heart, starting my first cake delivery venture during high school in Southern Sweden. I’m also a big fan of style and watches, being a collector of quality timepieces for some time. Aevi allows me to combine these two passions while also attempting to create something lasting and that can provide value back to our community and society.

Behind me is a team of partners and advisors with deep experience in the fields of product design, engineering, manufacturing, ecommerce, and marketing. 

Headquartered in Stockholm, we’ve been working tirelessly on realizing Aevi, hoping to have the opportunity to create unique and high quality products for everyone to enjoy, while giving back to society at the same time.
story_txt:
Designed in Stockholm, the Aevi comes with a Scandinavian look that focuses on the essentials. 
Ultra-thin, domed glass design for a sleek and elegant style. 

A watch that will stand the test of time with quality materials such as sapphire crystal glass, 316L stainless steel, and powered by a long-lasting Swiss movement.

Handcrafted by watchmakers that are experienced in producing high-end watches in the $1,000+ price range. 

Customizable Straps, allowing you to alternate between genuine Italian leather, durable nylon in easy-to-match Scandinavian pastels, and Milanese mesh to fit your daily mood and style. 

Free shipping and free returns within 30 days. Risk free commitment and guaranteed satisfaction. 

We stand behind the quality of our products with rock solid confidence, reflected in the 10 years limited warranty we provide.



Modern Scandinavian.




Aevi Venezia. Gold case, white dial, and brown Italian leather.

Aevi Navy. Silver case, dark blue dial, silver Milanese strap.

Aevi Milanese. Silver case, metal dial, silver Milanese strap.






The Leather Collection The genuine Italian leather straps come in four shades: Cocoa Brown, Smokey Topaz, Chocolatte and Classic Black. 
The Milanese Collection The modern and popular Milanese loop strap in stainless steel gives you a robust and flexible strap to add to your collection.
The Nylon Collection The durable nylon straps come in organic Scandinavian pastels and are layered with smooth calfskin on the inside.

Acquire a whole new look on your watch with the Quick Release springbar.
Quick Release Springbars All of our straps are equipped with Quick Release springbars, allowing you to easily and reliably change straps to match your daily mood and style.


Case diameter 40 mm
Case thickness 8 mm
Swiss Ronda Quartz movement
5 ATM or 50 meters water resistant
Domed sapphire crystal glass
316L surgical grade stainless steel
Width of lugs 20 mm
Quick Release straps with one-size-fits-all length
Engraved crown, backplate and straps




                           Our first batch back case, exclusively for our backers.Nowadays, fashion watches are not built to last and classic watches look dated. This inspired us to create Aevi, an elegant watch that is perfectly suited for a modern lifestyle.  
Aevi is a modern brand that creates quality products with heart while also improving the world around us. So, for every watch purchased, we will help PLAN International grant a child in need with 100 school hours. 
We are proud supporters of PLAN International’s goal to give all children an equal chance in life.With Aevi, we want to set an example of how modern businesses should be run, by aiming to do well while doing good.
We poured all our energy into perfecting our first watch - the Aevi. In the many months long process, we obsessed over every detail and questioned every line, angle and measurement, and cut out all unnecessary details to create an original and instantly recognizable design.
Perfecting the Aevi.We believe that the quality of a great product should stand the test of time. So should its design. So we fused the distinct Scandinavian style look with features of timeless classics, so that its design would be as relevant in the next decades, as it is today. 
Gracefully shaped lugs and a fine brush finish on the sides.A subtly domed glass design for even more elegance.Engraved genuine Italian leather, backplate and strap buckle.

After months of sourcing and prototyping from different watch manufacturers, we finally found the one that had the right technical expertise and experience to meet our demands. Our partners have been in the business for generations and regularly produce high-end watches in $1,000+ price range. To craft our watches, they use state-of-the art facilities, and assemble them by hand.

Precise craftsmanship.

Assembled by hand by experienced watchmakers.

High-precision polishing.


Customer experienceYou’ll always be able to reach us on phone, e-mail or our web, 7 days a week, 9 AM GMT - 7 PM GMT. With whatever questions or thoughts you might have. That’s a promise.
10 years warranty We are so certain about our the quality of our product that we are willing to stand behind it with a 10 year limited warranty. The warranty covers all manufacturing errors and faults on our side.
30 day trial periodIf you are not satisfied with your watch, you can always send it back and get a full refund.


By bypassing traditional distribution and instead adopting a direct relationship with our customers, we are able to pass cost savings on to our customers, resulting in an affordable premium watch.




My name is Michael Truong, and I’m the founder of Aevi. I’ve long been an entrepreneur at heart, starting my first cake delivery venture during high school in Southern Sweden. I’m also a big fan of style and watches, being a collector of quality timepieces for some time. Aevi allows me to combine these two passions while also attempting to create something lasting and that can provide value back to our community and society.
Behind me is a team of partners and advisors with deep experience in the fields of product design, engineering, manufacturing, ecommerce, and marketing. 


Headquartered in Stockholm, we’ve been working tirelessly on realizing Aevi, hoping to have the opportunity to create unique and high quality products for everyone to enjoy, while giving back to society at the same time.

And of course, we are all obsessed with beautiful and well-made watches!

story:
My name is Jabbar Washington and I'm a 34-year-old shoe fanatic residing in Minneapolis, MN. As an avid sports fan and athlete, I have been building and nurturing a deep love for shoes for as long as I can remember. As the years have gone by I've  developed a passion for collection and display.

Whatsnthatbox is a simple yet innovative way to organize, personalize, and upgrade even the most extensive shoe collections.  My own shoe collection can become overwhelming at times and like all collectors, I strive for organization and additions to my collection that will set it apart from my peers and their colletions.  It's extremely important to me to develop a product that is useful, personal, inexpensive, and fully customizable. 

I wanted to create a platform to share my idea with people everywhere who own extensive shoe collections and have faced similar challenges.  I have a passion for shoes and want my products to reflect my passion at all times.   Your contributions will allow me to develop a high-end product that will appeal to all with a passion for shoes irrespective of gender, cultural background, or type of shoe collected. Funding will be distributed in the following areas: Web-design, marketing, and materials (printer, labels, ink cartridges).  This funding opportunity is integral to the overall success of whatsnthatbox.  I am looking to raise $6,000 to fund essential components of whatsnthatbox.

3,000  Design & Materials

2,000  Web Design

1,000   Marketing

If my entire funding goal is not reached at this time, I plan to allocate funds to the areas listed above and continue raising funds to accomplish my business goals.

I would greatly appreciate any gestures that will assist me in accomplishing this goal.  Please spread the word to anyone you know who may be interested in this product.  Thank you!

story:
The Collective

Heart Beat Faster (HB) is a 3 dimensional lifestyle brand and statement rooted in the action sport and music industries.  With a history of competing by day and jamming by night, HB is built on that moment in which you feel most alive, 'a la "what makes your heart beat faster?".  Dedicated to integrating this heart-felt statement with the technicallity needed when pushing limits, you can be sure these headwear and apparel products will be unique, comfortable and will perform as well in the field as they will casually. 

Here at Heart Beat Faster, we know how far the action sport and music world has developed and we can't wait to see what comes to be in the future.  This brand was developed to serve as a reminder of what was and what is to be, all while living today to the fullest.  From the laser etched wooden labels to the soft and quick dry material, these products stand as a salute to the pioneers and serve as a means to erasing the impossible. 

 

The absolute foundation of HB is built on guarding your heart above all else because it determines the course of your life.  Part of the whole experience and what makes this a 3 dimensional project is sharing this passion with others while giving back to those who need a helping hand.  A percentage of product and sales will always be given in some form of charitable donation.  (Currently the local homeless shelter and given in the form of cold weather gear and food).

 

This campaign is out to raise funds to expand our operation.  We have outgrown the space this was founded in and need a dedicated space to design and create these products; which are done in house and with a few local and domestic businesses. 

 

The Motivation

Our goal is to raise funds to make the necessary upgrades to keep growing and produce an ever improving product.  What this will provide is funds for restoring and rebuilding the space we have for maximum efficiency. 

It will help us upgrade the production equipment to modern times and energy levels, like the sewing machine, heat press and stitching machine.  It will also help us fund channels to provide and work with the industry professionals on overall research and development, marketing platforms, complete and direct production in the USA and build a trade show and live event quiver.

 

 

Every piece we make is geared towards being used and therefore designed to work for you be it working up a sweat in the mountains or hanging out.

It is also a salute to those who pioneered so many of the activities we enjoy today.  May it serve as a reminder to get out there and chase that goal!  Better to go down swinging than never enter the ring!  But we're not here just to try, we want to thrive!

 

Perks for coming on board:

What we have in return for our friends who want to contribute will be a selection of our headwear and apparel for you to enjoy.  It is exciting to us that the more each one of you takes part in this campaign, the better we can build for tomorrow and the more we can make a diffence in so many lives!

There are a variety of perks so make sure to pick up what works for you as a single piece or a combo pack!  *At the end of this campaign, we will reach out to you for options preferred.

$10 Perk: The Western Bandana:

The everyday go-to piece at HB. Polyester weave to be soft on the skin, breathable and quick to dry. Often used running, under the helmet, face layer in the snow and as an accessory. Color options: Black, Red, Purple, Turquoise, Light Blue, White.

 

$20 Perk: Choice of Radventure Beanie:

Choose any Radventure Beanie with a wooden or woven label.  Cuffed or Straight (Folded or not folded). Color options: Black, Charcoal Heather, Gray, Red, Blue, Green, Blaze Orange

 

$25 Perk: Choice of Trucker Hat

Cadence or Surf Wax or Captain Trucker Hat. Your choice between the wooden labeled Cadence Hat (standard oval wooden label), Surf Wax (wooden fish surf board label), or the Captain (patch logo). Color options- Black/Red, Gray, Green, Camo, Charcoal, Khacki, or Light Blue.

 

$25 Perk: "Basic T"-Shirt

Poly/Cotton blend to wear soft and comfortable yet wick moisture and dry quickly when the going gets awesome! Color options : Charcoal Heather, Green, Red.

 

$50 Perk:  The "Thrive" Hooded Sweatshirt

Unisex 7 oz pre-laundered 80% cotton 20% polyester zip-up fleece.  Comfortable and ready to play.  True to size.  Charcoal or Turquoise. 

 

$70 Perk: Hoody and Hat Combo

Hooded Sweatshirt with your choice of T-Shirt, Trucker Hat or Beanie. See options above.

 

$100 Perk: Combo Set

Hooded Sweatshirt, T-Shirt, Trucker Hat and Beanie combo. Save $20! See individual options above

 

$200 Perk: Combo for 2+

(2) Thrive Hooded Sweatshirts, (2) Trucker hats, (2) T-Shirts (2) Beanies, AND (2) Bandanas. See options above.

 

*Feel free to send us a note if you have any questions with who we are, the product, options or the campaign, we're here to help!

The Impact

Since a huge part of the goal set is to share in the mission and give back, we are partnering with a number of outreach, music festivals and contest events which serve as a funding platform to give above and beyond the standard.  This campaign will ramp up our traveling display and in effect, reach thousands of people rooted in the same passion as us.  If you see us out there, feel free to come say high and share a high five! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We aren't going to reach our goal or go beyond if we don't get the word out so please, please share us, like us and let your friends know about us!  With your help we will get there and as a team WE will make a difference. 

Be sure to stop in to like and say hello on facebook:

www.facebook.com/heartbeatfaster

And follow on twitter:

www.twitter.com/heartbeatfaster

History

My name is David and I founded HB on a love and desire to share the passion for looking over your heart, mind, body and soul.  Be it through activity or dream, know that HB is a statement and a stepping stone to your heart.  This is all very near and dear to me and it has become a part of me to engage as many others to experience the joy of truly living life. 

I grew up in Minnesota where I learned to work hard to be able to play hard.  I had a tendency to chase adventure, push my limits competitively on bikes, skis, motorcycles, snowmobiles and even ball and stick sports; but, only after the was done.  This opened the door to travel the US, Central and South America, which in turn left an imprint deep enough to share this passion.  This was exciting and important enough to leave everything and move to Utah in 2011 to kickstart this project.  Since uprooting and starting over, I work a day job in the auto/powersport performance and efficiency industry, adventure out my door to the countless trails, terrain and resorts surrounding and most importantly fill up my nights and weekends working on this project. 

So, for those of you that have given this project your time and support, thank you!  I have a high five for everyone of you!  Also, keep in mind that this is all part of a bigger picture and every dollar is planting a seed.  A strong tree needs deep roots!

story:
The Story of ROSMIO

Deriving inspiration from a visit to India in 2006 and the colorful culture of the Dominican Republic, this collection literally speaks volumes. Indian craftsmanship sets the tone for this whimsically eclectic collection. The clothing is designed to inspire dancing and laughter. A ROSMIO item is a good time tucked in your closet, waiting to get out there and have fun, with you.


Both Roslyn and myself are formally trained fashion designers looking to share what we love to do with the rest of the world. We met in 2005 when we both worked for the same fashion company; except I lived in NYC and she was in New Delhi. We worked well together in the past and decided this year to start ROSMIO together.
Collaborating once again, from opposite sides of the world we have great hopes for first collection together.


We are looking to raise funds to create this collection that is already in the works. We will looking to raise $3000 to cover costs such as; materials, manufacturing, shipping, marketing, fashion show fees and so on.

By contributing to this campaign you will be helping two young women from different walks of life and different countries fulfill their dream of creating something beautiful and timeless together.


The funding will cover the initial stages of a small production lot, sampling, shipping, marketing materials and secure our spot in Uptown Fashion Week in NYC February 2014.

UPTOWN FASHION WEEK NYC

As for the perks, we are offering a array of items to choose from; art, accesorries or ROSMIO apparel. Stop by the gallery of the campaign for more details.


If by chance our goal is not met, we would downsize the production to include only the first samples and the fashion show. For customers looking to buy the collection, items would have to be made to order.

The Impact

We all know women love fashion and we all love to buy things to make us look better, but how often do we swap that for something that makes us feel better. By contributing to our campaign you are empowering yourself by buying independent. It's that simple. We are not a corporation, we are two women looking to contribute change to the global economy with our small steps. We have to be mindful of the consequences of our excessive consumerism. There are no sweatshops here, it's just us making what we think is beautiful.


ROSMIO is the beginning of our lifes work, your blessing in any amount would be an invaluable contribution to this new stage of our lives and careers.

As a designer in the past, with Roslyn's help I managed to have my designs featured in Macy's, Lord & Taylor and in boutiques across the US under our company name.
Now its our turn to use our own name and our own talents to make our dream reality.

We are so happy you made it up to here, we must have your attention :)

Other Ways You Can Help

    We are obviously crowd funding because we cannot fund this ourselves so if you can't contribute please share this campaign. Our hearts can't thank you enough for that small gesture. Remember there are share tools available on the site so be sure to use them. Smile.


Thanks so much,

Ros + Mio
story_txt:
The Story of ROSMIO
Deriving inspiration from a visit to India in 2006 and the colorful culture of the Dominican Republic, this collection literally speaks volumes. Indian craftsmanship sets the tone for this whimsically eclectic collection. The clothing is designed to inspire dancing and laughter. A ROSMIO item is a good time tucked in your closet, waiting to get out there and have fun, with you.


Both Roslyn and myself are formally trained fashion designers looking to share what we love to do with the rest of the world. We met in 2005 when we both worked for the same fashion company; except I lived in NYC and she was in New Delhi. We worked well together in the past and decided this year to start ROSMIO together.Collaborating once again, from opposite sides of the world we have great hopes for first collection together.


We are looking to raise funds to create this collection that is already in the works. We will looking to raise $3000 to cover costs such as; materials, manufacturing, shipping, marketing, fashion show fees and so on.
By contributing to this campaign you will be helping two young women from different walks of life and different countries fulfill their dream of creating something beautiful and timeless together.




The funding will cover the initial stages of a small production lot, sampling, shipping, marketing materials and secure our spot in Uptown Fashion Week in NYC February 2014.

UPTOWN FASHION WEEK NYC
As for the perks, we are offering a array of items to choose from; art, accesorries or ROSMIO apparel. Stop by the gallery of the campaign for more details.

If by chance our goal is not met, we would downsize the production to include only the first samples and the fashion show. For customers looking to buy the collection, items would have to be made to order.


The Impact
We all know women love fashion and we all love to buy things to make us look better, but how often do we swap that for something that makes us feel better. By contributing to our campaign you are empowering yourself by buying independent. It's that simple. We are not a corporation, we are two women looking to contribute change to the global economy with our small steps. We have to be mindful of the consequences of our excessive consumerism. There are no sweatshops here, it's just us making what we think is beautiful.


ROSMIO is the beginning of our lifes work, your blessing in any amount would be an invaluable contribution to this new stage of our lives and careers.
As a designer in the past, with Roslyn's help I managed to have my designs featured in Macy's, Lord & Taylor and in boutiques across the US under our company name.Now its our turn to use our own name and our own talents to make our dream reality.


We are so happy you made it up to here, we must have your attention :)



Other Ways You Can Help
    We are obviously crowd funding because we cannot fund this ourselves so if you can't contribute please share this campaign. Our hearts can't thank you enough for that small gesture. Remember there are share tools available on the site so be sure to use them. Smile.
Thanks so much,
Ros + Mio

story:
Find us at www.The-EasyLock.com to find out everything about our product.

The Indiegogo campaign finished in August 2014 and we successfully raised our target. We have been invited to offer Indiegogo members a launch opportunity now that we have raised the funding to start our campaign.

The tools and dies have been produced and production has completed on the initial order. Deliveries are under way and we are currently dispatching product to all our early bird special customers.

There is still a chance to obtain a launch offer discounted EasyLock if you order through this site. 

When this campaign started it was because my thoughts were with my grandchildren when I designed The EasyLock. One day they’ll be off travelling the world, and I wanted to create a solution that would keep them 100% safe & sound, no matter where they stayed. My thinking in creating the lock developed into wanting to provide all others that may find themselves in a vulnerable position with complete security… whether a student in cheap lodgings, an isolated elderly person who fears living alone, or simply you or I when we stay in a B&B or hotel…

I talked to manufacturers about the possibility of designing a lock that could have the strength of steel with the lightness of plastic whilst remaining aesthetically pleasing to the eye.

  • It needed to be simple - easy to install and remove in seconds
  • It needed to be practical - to allow the user to maintain security whilst opening the door to confirm visitors
  • It needed to be strong - unbreakable but lightweight
  • It needed to be inexpensive - to allow it to be available to all

We have fulfilled all of my criteria and have now have developed a lock that we believe is the World's lightest and most practical temporary door lock. That will give you security and privacy and is small enough to be carried with you anywhere.

Introducing The EasyLock

It is an incredibly strong yet small & light security solution that the world has been waiting for...it is also the only lock of it's kind that can open just enough to allow you to confirm a visitor or receive documents.

Designed to be lighter than an iPhone and just as easy to slip into your pocket or bag The EasyLock can travel with you anywhere. Wherever you find yourself needing some security or privacy and the door opens inwards you can utilise The EasyLock.

A unique operation of The EasyLock is the ability to partially open the door to see who is outside (see the video below) whilst retaining the security of the lock. Safe in the knowledge that the lock is manufactured with a steel core and stainless steel functioning parts.

The EasyLock in action.

The EasyLock is designed to be effective, and easy to use:

 It only takes a minute to learn, and even kids can use it.

To secure the door.

  • Insert lock into the arrow opening on the latch
  • Open the door
  • Place stainless steel latch into lockplate in door frame
  • Press down until firm
  • Check door security

To see who is at the door or receive documents or ID.

  • Put slight pressure on latch plate towards the door
  • Lift the lock
  • Slide back until door is open
  • Keep pressure against the door

To remove the lock.

  • Put slight pressure on latch plate towards the door
  • Lift the lock
  • Slide back to the end of the latch
  • Open door whilst moving lock away from the door


Developing The EasyLock

I had driven my family mad whilst creating functional prototypes in kitchen and even visiting potential manufacturers whilst on holiday. 

Now that the lock has been developed I have created a team to help make it become a reality. It is our intention to make The EasyLock a worldwide success.

The EasyLock has had many iterations and we have continued to make alterations which I feel have benefited the aesthetics and the practicality of the lock until I arrived at the final design. For the production lock I have decided to edge the lock in a tactile plastic coating by doing so we will be able to prevent the possibility of damage to the door at the same time improving grip.  



The design process took months of development and testing. I made a great many of sketches by hand and on the computer and I drove the family mad whilst I built functional lock after lock on the kitchen table.

Some of the prototypes worked better than others, so I got help with computer aided modelling and 3D printing to define the performance, feel, and look of The EasyLock.

Find us at www.The-EasyLock.com to find out everything about our product.The Indiegogo campaign finished in August 2014 and we successfully raised our target. We have been invited to offer Indiegogo members a launch opportunity now that we have raised the funding to start our campaign.The tools and dies have been produced and production has completed on the initial order. It needed to be simple - easy to install and remove in seconds
It needed to be practical - to allow the user to maintain security whilst opening the door to confirm visitors
It needed to be strong - unbreakable but lightweight

It needed to be inexpensive - to allow it to be available to all

We have fulfilled all of my criteria and have now have developed a lock that we believe is the World's lightest and most practical temporary door lock. That will give you security and privacy and is small enough to be carried with you anywhere.Introducing The EasyLockIt is an incredibly strong yet small & light security solution that the world has been waiting for...it is also the only lock of it's kind that can open just enough to allow you to confirm a visitor or receive documents.Designed to be lighter than an iPhone and just as easy to slip into your pocket or bag The EasyLock can travel with you anywhere. Wherever you find yourself needing some security or privacy and the door opens inwards you can utilise The EasyLock.A unique operation of The EasyLock is the ability to partially open the door to see who is outside (see the video below) whilst retaining the security of the lock. Safe in the knowledge that the lock is manufactured with a steel core and stainless steel functioning parts.The EasyLock in action.The EasyLock is designed to be effective, and easy to use: It only takes a minute to learn, and even kids can use it.To secure the door.
Insert lock into the arrow opening on the latch
Open the door
Place stainless steel latch into lockplate in door frame
Press down until firm
Check door security
To see who is at the door or receive documents or ID.
Put slight pressure on latch plate towards the door
Lift the lock
Slide back until door is open
Keep pressure against the door
To remove the lock.
Put slight pressure on latch plate towards the door
Lift the lock
Slide back to the end of the latch
Open door whilst moving lock away from the door
Who needs The EasyLock?
If you, or someone you know or love, travels away from home you will be aware of the concerns they may have in places where many people have (or have had) access to the room.In HotelsIn the case of a hotel it is not only the management, room service, house keeping and maintenance who might have access but ex-employees, friends of front desk staff and others. Very often we leave our possessions in plain site and the safe open when we are in our hotel room.  Many break-ins occur during the night even though the room is occupied as thieves know that it is a good time to strike.
Modern hotels have card-access systems but in recent years flaws have emerged in the software (see here) allowing locks to be overridden. 
Room keys can be programmed to override even the deadlock and are able to be produced by front of house staff.


In Rented accommodation
In rental homes or apartments or older hotels, owners, management, contractors and cleaning staff all may have a key to the property. 
Because these are normally physical keys it is rare that a new lock would be installed after every tenancy, Everyone would need a new key and the cost of changing locks can be high. Added to that very often the tenant may well have had additional keys cut to provide to family or friends who at some time had access to the property. 


In Colleges
In colleges and university dorms or lodgings it is almost impossible to guarantee that no-one has an additional key to a bedroom door. Sometimes it may only be that you want some peace and quiet whilst you study.


In Offices
Many offices don't have locks on internal doors and so it can be difficult if you need some privacy for a sensitive meeting or whilst preparing an important report.. Similarly there may be times when you need privacy in the office or restaurant toilets and would prefer to secure the main toilet door.

Developing The EasyLockI had driven my family mad whilst creating functional prototypes in kitchen and even visiting potential manufacturers whilst on holiday. Now that the lock has been developed I have created a team to help make it become a reality. It is our intention to make The EasyLock a worldwide success.The EasyLock has had many iterations and we have continued to make alterations which I feel have benefited the aesthetics and the practicality of the lock until I arrived at the final design. For the production lock I have decided to edge the lock in a tactile plastic coating by doing so we will be able to prevent the possibility of damage to the door at the same time improving grip.   The EasyLock core is manufactured from chrome plated steel encased in an ABS plastic case with the functioning parts made from stainless steel. This gives the lock incredible strength whilst being lightweight and compact.The design process took months of development and testing. I made a great many of sketches by hand and on the computer and I drove the family mad whilst I built functional lock after lock on the kitchen table.Some of the prototypes worked better than others, so I got help with computer aided modelling and 3D printing to define the performance, feel, and look of The EasyLock.
Purpose:
The EasyLock has been created to provide a secure entry-prevention system for people staying in rooms or properties that they do not necessarily own. 
Hotel rooms, Rental Properties and University/College rooms can be made secure in seconds and subsequently the lock can be removed in an instant.
In addition The EasyLock can be used on 95% of doors that opens inward.
Thank you
Bob Fitzjohn

story:
Harriette is launching the world’s first line of body hair care essentials for women. Our products are engineered to give you healthy, soft body hair that smells fresh, feels luscious, and looks beautiful.

Our products make great holiday gifts! And we are shipping out perks by December 20.

Don't want to wait for your pre-order to arrive? Come find us in person at one of these fine markets.

If you want to remove your body hair, then you are in luck - there are billions of dollars worth of products on the market for you!

If you want to care for the body hair you have, THEN YOU ARE ALSO IN LUCK! Because Harriette is launching the world’s FIRST line of body hair care essentials.

OUR SIGNATURE PRODUCTS

FRESH FUR | Natural Deodorant

Fresh Fur is chock full of nourishing ingredients that soften your #pitkittens, treat and prevent ingrown hairs, and moisturize your underarm skin. Plus, it doesn’t clump in your pit hairs and it actually works.

MAGIC CARPET CLEANER | Pubic Hair Shampoo

Just like the hair on your head, your pubic mane needs to be cleaned, conditioned, and cared for.  Magic Carpet Cleaner uses a special formula of pure Castile soap and super-nourishing oils to gently clean and naturally moisturize your pubic mane, leaving you fresh and soft. 

BUSH OIL | Pubic Hair Oil

Rub a few drops of Bush Oil into your pubic mane after your shower and experience softer, smoother hair and fewer ingrowns in just a few days.

FRINGE BALM | Lash & Brow Conditioner

Fringe Balm is made with nourishing oils that moisturize, strengthen, repair damage, and stimulate growth for longer, thicker lashes and healthier brows. Plus, our balm provides shaping, separation, and definition - so you can look your best while treating your lil' face hairs right.

 

CAN’T I JUST USE SOAP?

Uhm, sure you could. You could also moisturize your eyelashes with body lotion and slap on some toothpaste as deodorant!

But Harriette products are specifically engineered for your body hair - just as face lotion is engineered for your face, and chapstick is designed for your lips.

 

INGREDIENTS

We understand that your body hair covers some of your body’s most vulnerable areas - including the eyes, genitals, and lymph nodes. That  is why we only use the gentlest, most natural plant-based butters, oils, and waxes  in our products.

 

All-Natural    |    Vegan    |    Cruelty-Free

NO parabens. NO phthalates. NO sulfates. NO silicones. NO synthetic fragrance. NO coritsones. NO harsh chemicals.

See our full list of ingredients at the bottom of this page.

 

At Harriette, we believe that whatever body hair you do or don’t have shouldn’t impact how you (or society) interprets your femininity.

Our mission is to reclaim body hair as a beautiful, clean, sexy, inherently feminine part of the body.

We are creating products for a beauty revolution.

Because in a society that works really hard to convince girls that they can never be pretty or desirable unless they remove their body hair, caring for your body hair is a radical act.

 

IT ALL STARTED WITH DEODORANT

As a woman with underarm hair, I was never been able to find a good deodorant. Every option I tried was either full of toxins, clumped in my pit fuzz, or left me stinky by midday. A few years back, I set out on a mission to create a deodorant that fulfilled my needs once and for all. The coconut oil-based formula I finally settled on was better than I could have ever expected: not only did my concoction completely prevent odor all day long, but it also made my underarm hairs (and skin) totally soft and smooth!

Whaaaa? Soft and smooth underarm hair? Is that even possible? Why don’t people talk about this?!

Despite the *bazillion* products available to keep women’s skin, nails, and head-hair looking and feeling healthy, there were ZERO products on the market providing the same courtesy to body hair.

So I started engineering my own body hair care products, and you know what? I ended up with softer pubic hair, fewer ingrown hairs, longer eye lashes, healthier brows, and smoother pit fur.

You know what else? The act of nourishing, caring for, and generally paying positive attention to my body hair helped me learn to view it as a beautiful, feminine, sexy part of myself.

That is why I founded Harriette: to teach women like me how to care, nurture, and celebrate our body hair.

 

In the past year, I’ve gone from making products for myself, to starting a tiny Etsy shop, to running a full-blown e-commerce business. As the demand for Harriette products increases, our production and manufacturing must also scale. Crowdfunding will help us purchase the equipment and materials we need in order to ensure our production can keep up with demand.

Our first $4.5k will be spent on production and fulfillment necessities such as a shipping label printer, an industrial mixer, and upgraded packaging.

Any additional funding will go towards product development and marketing, so we can continue to grow and spread body hair love and acceptance!

 

Bush Oil - Pubic hair conditioner.

INGREDIENTS: Castor seed oil, golden jojoba oil, lavender oil and/or clary sage oil.

Directions: Rub a few drops into your pubic mane after your shower and experience softer, smoother hair and fewer ingrowns in just a few days.

 

Magic Carpet Cleaner - Pubic hair shampoo.

INGREDIENTS: Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Sunflower Oil, Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, Rosemary Oil.

Directions: Lather. Rinse. Repeat.

 

Fringe Balm - Lash and brow conditioner.

INGREDIENTS: Castor seed oil, shea butter, lavender oil, chamomile oil, rosemary oil.

Directions: Use the wand to separate, define, and groom lashes and brows into place while providing nourishment and moisture for healthier, longer, thicker fringe.

 

Fresh Fur - Natural deodorant for women with underarm hair.

INGREDIENTS: Fractionated coconut oil, grapeseed oil, magnesium hydroxide, lavender oil, tea tree oil, lemongrass oil.

Directions: Massage a pea-sized blob into each pit and banish stank while nourishing and moisturizing your underarm hair and skin.

 

Still have questions? Get in touch at hi@harriette.co.

 

Harriette LLC

Detroit, MI

www.harriette.co

@harriette.dot.co

story:
At SHEERTEX, we invented the world’s first unbreakable sheer pantyhose. We've had thousands of customers crossing all walks of life - and the response has been incredible.

But we've heard one specific call from across the stage - a particularly noisy cry demanding sheers that bring together our unbreakable magic with the traditional features of dance tights.

As we dug into this, we started to realize: dancers and kids actually have a lot in common.

  • Busy bodies? Check.
  • Slipping and sliding across the floor? Check check.
  • Jumping from one thing to the next with no time for wardrobe malfunctions? Check check checkmate.

So for you: the movers and the shakers, from the toddlers to the prima ballerinas, we're ready to Pirouette. Introducing our brand new collection of unbreakable sheers, designed with the needs of dancers, figure skaters, cheerleads, and busy-bodies of all ages in mind.

This is a super limited edition product run that we're doing to better understand the dance and kids areas!

(Special thanks to the amazing and talented dancers who joined our founder, Katherine Hague, for this music video shoot - and a huge shoutout to her gorgeous guest star, @tynomibanks!)
 

 

  • Convertible footed-to-footless design - these are sheers and leggings in one, and allow for optimal grip for running through whatever life throws at you
  • Knit-in waistband won't ever show - no matter what the day's costume changes call for
  • Adult and kid sizes ensure the whole troupe is looked after
  • Seven fabulous colors hit every design note: black, blush, pink, white, and three shades of nude
  • Our patent-pending naturally cooling, antimicrobial, non-toxic unbreakable sheer knit takes you from intense rehearsal to centre stage - and way, way, way beyond

 

 

 

Adult: Available in 5 Shades

Kids: Available in 3 Shades

 

 

In the last year and a half, we have sent thousands of our classic sheers to customers around the world. The reviews are in and they're absolutely glowing!

One of TIME Magazine's Best Inventions of 2018

"These tights are incredible. I’ve worn my Sheertex tights 35 times now, and they still feel like new."
- @thingtesting

 “A day in pantyhose: I have to watch out for that edge of the table. I have to watch out for my nails. I have to watch out for the zipper. I have to watch out for...etc. A day in Sheertex: What a nice day. Oh, and I'm wearing pantyhose. I didn't give it a second thought all day. That's the Sheertex difference. Never give your pantyhose a second thought during your day. I've bought several pairs (5 so far) and I will be getting more as they come out with more products!” 
- Verified Customer Review

 

 

Patent-pending, SHEERTEX is stronger, cooler, and lighter than any knit on the market today. Our knit is made with the world’s strongest polymer, a miniaturized version of fibers traditionally found in climbing equipment and bulletproof vests.

Antimicrobial: With a high resistance to bonding to anything, our fiber is naturally antimicrobial, odorless, and non-toxic.

10x Stronger Than Steel: The tensile strength of our fiber is 4000-6000MPa, which makes it pound for pound ten times stronger than steel - which has a tensile strength of just 400MPa.

Hydrophobic: Our fiber has an absorption rate of virtually zero - making it utterly resistant to water and moisture. The absorption of moisture such as sweat causes traditional fibers to swell and lose their strength - ours never will.

Lighter than Water: Having a specific gravity of 0.928, our fiber is one of the lightest weight in the world - ensuring your wardrobe won't ever weigh you down.

Cool to the Touch: Our fiber has a high level of crystallinity and molecular mass, giving it excellent temperature conductivity - this quickly transfers heat and creates a cooling effect for bodies in motion.  

Every pair of SHEERTEX Sheers is made with love in Canada.

In order to make the world's strongest sheer knit, we had to reimagine the manufacturing process from the ground up. SHEERTEX is based out of Muskoka, Canada and the SHEERTEX Innovation Lab is equipped with state of the art equipment that allows the company to rapidly iterate using the world's strongest polymer.

Every SHEERTEX product is designed, knit, manufactured and shipped direct to consumers out of the Lab, allowing Sheertex to bring products to market faster at the highest level of quality.

International Backers

We're proud to ship SHEERTEX Sheers around the world. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. 

Estimated Delivery

SHEERTEX Pirouette Unbreakable Dance Sheers will ship in August 2019. While we do not expect these to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift. At anytime up until your pantyhose have shipped, you may request a full refund by emailing hello@sheertex.com. **Please note that all VAT, taxes and customs fees are at the  purchaser’s expense. **

30 Day Toughness Guarantee

We believe in our products and every pair of Sheertex Sheers comes with a 30 Day Toughness Guarantee, from the time that your product is delivered. 

Kids Sheers Available in Sizes 3-4 to 11-12

SIZE HEIGHT WEIGHT
3-4 34-41" 34-40 pounds
5-6 38-47" 38-46 pounds
7-8 43-51" 42-50 pounds
9-10 45-55" 46-54 pounds
11-12 49-61" 50-60 pounds


Adult Sheers Available in Sizes Small to 2/3XL

SIZE SHORT (4'11"-5'3") REGULAR (5'3"-5'7") TALL (5'7"-6')
XS 90-105 pounds 95-110 pounds 100-115 pounds
S 105-125 pounds 110-130 pounds 115-135 pounds
M 125-150 pounds 130-155 pounds 135-160 pounds
L 150-180 pounds 155-185 pounds 160-190 pounds
XL 180-225 pounds 185-230 pounds 190-235 pounds
2-3XL 225-300 pounds 230-305 pounds 235-310 pounds

 

Questions? We're here to help.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at hello@sheertex.com or by calling 1.800.715.1658.
story_txt:
At SHEERTEX, we invented the world’s first unbreakable sheer pantyhose. We've had thousands of customers crossing all walks of life - and the response has been incredible.But we've heard one specific call from across the stage - a particularly noisy cry demanding sheers that bring together our unbreakable magic with the traditional features of dance tights.As we dug into this, we started to realize: dancers and kids actually have a lot in common.

Busy bodies? Check.

Slipping and sliding across the floor? Check check.

Jumping from one thing to the next with no time for wardrobe malfunctions? Check check checkmate.
So for you: the movers and the shakers, from the toddlers to the prima ballerinas, we're ready to Pirouette. Introducing our brand new collection of unbreakable sheers, designed with the needs of dancers, figure skaters, cheerleads, and busy-bodies of all ages in mind.This is a super limited edition product run that we're doing to better understand the dance and kids areas!(Special thanks to the amazing and talented dancers who joined our founder, Katherine Hague, for this music video shoot - and a huge shoutout to her gorgeous guest star, @tynomibanks!)  

Convertible footed-to-footless design - these are sheers and leggings in one, and allow for optimal grip for running through whatever life throws at you
Knit-in waistband won't ever show - no matter what the day's costume changes call for

Adult and kid sizes ensure the whole troupe is looked after

Seven fabulous colors hit every design note: black, blush, pink, white, and three shades of nude
Our patent-pending naturally cooling, antimicrobial, non-toxic unbreakable sheer knit takes you from intense rehearsal to centre stage - and way, way, way beyond

   Adult: Available in 5 ShadesKids: Available in 3 Shades  In the last year and a half, we have sent thousands of our classic sheers to customers around the world. The reviews are in and they're absolutely glowing!One of TIME Magazine's Best Inventions of 2018"These tights are incredible. I’ve worn my Sheertex tights 35 times now, and they still feel like new."- @thingtesting “A day in pantyhose: I have to watch out for that edge of the table. I have to watch out for my nails. I have to watch out for the zipper. I have to watch out for...etc. A day in Sheertex: What a nice day. Oh, and I'm wearing pantyhose. I didn't give it a second thought all day. That's the Sheertex difference. Never give your pantyhose a second thought during your day. I've bought several pairs (5 so far) and I will be getting more as they come out with more products!” - Verified Customer Review  Patent-pending, SHEERTEX is stronger, cooler, and lighter than any knit on the market today. Our knit is made with the world’s strongest polymer, a miniaturized version of fibers traditionally found in climbing equipment and bulletproof vests.Antimicrobial: With a high resistance to bonding to anything, our fiber is naturally antimicrobial, odorless, and non-toxic.10x Stronger Than Steel: The tensile strength of our fiber is 4000-6000MPa, which makes it pound for pound ten times stronger than steel - which has a tensile strength of just 400MPa.Hydrophobic: Our fiber has an absorption rate of virtually zero - making it utterly resistant to water and moisture. The absorption of moisture such as sweat causes traditional fibers to swell and lose their strength - ours never will.Lighter than Water: Having a specific gravity of 0.928, our fiber is one of the lightest weight in the world - ensuring your wardrobe won't ever weigh you down.Cool to the Touch: Our fiber has a high level of crystallinity and molecular mass, giving it excellent temperature conductivity - this quickly transfers heat and creates a cooling effect for bodies in motion.  Every pair of SHEERTEX Sheers is made with love in Canada.In order to make the world's strongest sheer knit, we had to reimagine the manufacturing process from the ground up. SHEERTEX is based out of Muskoka, Canada and the SHEERTEX Innovation Lab is equipped with state of the art equipment that allows the company to rapidly iterate using the world's strongest polymer.Every SHEERTEX product is designed, knit, manufactured and shipped direct to consumers out of the Lab, allowing Sheertex to bring products to market faster at the highest level of quality.International BackersWe're proud to ship SHEERTEX Sheers around the world. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. Estimated DeliverySHEERTEX Pirouette Unbreakable Dance Sheers will ship in August 2019. While we do not expect these to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift. At anytime up until your pantyhose have shipped, you may request a full refund by emailing hello@sheertex.com. **Please note that all VAT, taxes and customs fees are at the  purchaser’s expense. **30 Day Toughness GuaranteeWe believe in our products and every pair of Sheertex Sheers comes with a 30 Day Toughness Guarantee, from the time that your product is delivered. Kids Sheers Available in Sizes 3-4 to 11-12

story: My wife and I have a passion for zombies, as parents we know it's not easy to find cute shirts that are zombie related but also cute. We here at Been Bitten Clothing are going to change that, we are a clothing line exclusively for kids. Our goal is to bring zombie lovers better choices of clothing for their kids/family members.You won't find generic shirts with "zombie hunter" printed on them.We have a full line of custom characters and some unbelievable ideas for the new year. As I'm sure you know buying in BULK is the way to go, so we are looking for some help to be able to place a big order. This is not your fly by night company that will be gone in half a year, we plan to grow this company as big as we can get it. With your help, you can get us on our way. We have everything we need to start, now we just need the product. Thank you so much for taking the time to read and even consider contributing to our campaign.

story:
Our story is going to be told through an interview, conducted by Front Office Sports about Raven Performance and specifically its Signature Compression Wrist Sleeve:

Sometimes, a broken bone can have a positive outcome… Just ask Jeremy S. Yarsin, owner and founder of Raven Performance.

A few summers ago, during a pickup basketball game, Yarsin took an awkward fall and broke his wrist. This kept him out of his summer recreation baseball league and was still sore when he returned to the diamond a year later. Because of this, Yarsin bought some reusable wrist support sleeves to help with the rehab process, but realized they had some flaws. Being an entrepreneur at heart, he started thinking about ways to improve the wrist supports.

Founded in the summer of 2016, Raven Performance is a baseball apparel company that is looking to disrupt the industry. Its signature product is a compression wrist sleeve, made of perforated neoprene and performance polyester that is optimal for performance and comfort. Yarsin’s passion for baseball is what led him to start his third company (he sold the other two).

While using the sleeves from other brands during his rehab, Yarsin said the biggest flaw for him was that they were made of nylon, which has no performance qualities, and neoprene, which doesn’t breathe. He figured there had to be a better way to make the sleeves more comfortable and better for performance.

“I knew nothing about fashion or design so I did a lot of research. I bought a sewing machine, talked to tailors to learn everything I could about the fabrics, and got some swatches from companies. I knew I couldn’t change neoprene, but thought ‘what if I perforated it?’ which is something competitors don’t have,” Yarsin said.

The next problem Yarsin had to solve was what fabric to use with the perforated neoprene. Since nylon is bad for skin, he opted for a high quality performance polyester. He found a company in Korea willing to try the performance polyester on perforated neoprene, but because nobody had ever done that before, it took eight months for the company to figure out how to make it work. That was no issue for Yarsin because they were able to figure out how to do it and “can do it again.” That was the spark of the business.

“I really like the feel of the sleeve. It’s a great material that doesn’t feel too bulky and has a great formed-feel when you put it on.”— Ryan McMahon, Professional Baseball Player for the Colorado Rockies.

While waiting for the sleeve to be produced, Yarsin started to have players reach out and ask if he made other products or was planning to make other gear. Those inquiries became the business model for Yarsin and helped him start a catalog of other gear that has continued to grow.

“It’s a bit of a different business model because, reverse of what the big companies do, I wait for the players to ask me about something and put more money towards the product instead of making something and putting more money towards marketing. All requests for other products came before my signature product, the wrist sleeve, had come out, so I knew that would be the turning point,” said Yarsin.

For the compression apparel, Yarsin went through a process similar to the compression wrist sleeve by looking at fabric samples and figuring out which fabric goes where. For his base layer compression shirts, he opts for a super tech fabric and mesh underarms for additional cooling. His compression tights are lighter than competitor’s because “who wants to wear heavy tights under baseball pants in mid-July?”

Yarsin’s fabric supplier, a company in Honduras, is also moving towards converting their fabrics into a 100 percent recycled polyester. It’s one reason he was attracted to the company and thinks it will be a great selling point. Currently, his men’s hoodie sweatshirt and men’s RavenX line of general performance t-shirts are made of fully recycled polyester. He hopes that in the next six to twelve months, all of his gear will be made of 100 percent recycled polyester.

Innovation has been the biggest piece to the formation of Raven Performance, according to Yarsin, because he is innovating solutions to the flaws he found in the wrist sleeves he used.

“I believe that flaws lead to innovation. So it is my goal, and our goal as a business, to innovate the solutions to those flaws. That is why we are disrupting the baseball and fitness apparel industry with my wrist sleeve. Fixing the current flaws, innovating solutions, and creating an end-result that has been unbelievably well received,” Yarsin stated.

“Apparel shouldn’t hold you back. If we’re going to cover our skin, why use fabrics and materials that do nothing to enhance or compliment how amazing our skin really is? It makes no sense which is why we only use performance oriented fabrics with tons of functional features and a nice form fit to act as a secondary skin.”

The wrist sleeve has only been around baseball for a few weeks, but Yarsin said the feedback from players has been tremendous. He plans to use the next six months on a huge marketing push via internet and social media for the wrist sleeve, working to get it on as many players as possible.

He’s also applying for MLB approval on the wrist sleeve, which requires getting at least one player to endorse him and Raven Performance and convincing MLB that the product adds value to players. It would be a big deal for a smaller company like his to be MLB approved.

In addition to increasing sales and players who use his products, Yarsin said he’s also working to expand Raven Performance’s catalog as much as possible. He’s had requests for a three-quarter sleeved shirt from pitchers and a pink arm sleeve players can wear on Mother’s Day in 2018. He also wants to expand the women’s line and is currently working on women’s tights. 

With several years of entrepreneurship under his belt, Yarsin was able to share some insight as to what it’s like when you run your own business.

“There are pros and cons, just like everything in life. I get to make my own schedule and don’t have to answer to anyone, but I’m also the salesman, secretary, janitor, and wearing every hat. It can be stressful, but for me, it’s incredibly rewarding when you know that this is something you started and came up with. You see your finished product, make a sale, get feedback and the person loves it. You feel good knowing you did something right and made something happen, and that feeling doesn’t change.”

Yarsin’s long-term goals for Raven Performance include owning a manufacturing plant in the United States (products are currently manufactured in China) and being able to hire people, so that he’s not running around making sales on a daily basis. With the success Raven Performance has had so far, it’s not hard to imagine that happening.

Risks and challenges

His one pitfall is dealing with athletes endorsed by bigger companies. Some of his competitors don’t have wrist sleeves, meaning their athletes can wear his, but athletes endorsed by companies with wrist sleeves are unable to.

Several ways to deal with this and how we are dealing with this is as follows. We are endorsing players as they rise through the ranks. Players are able to wear our gear throughout the minor league system. If they then get called up I have more leverage with the MLBPA to get certified and then have my logo be shown in MLB.

We have over 50 players that currently wear and endorse my product so getting approval seems more and more likely.

story:
My Story

It’s 4:20 am. I’m in the makeup room with less than 10 minutes to get into the studio to anchor the morning newscast. It’s crunch time. I've spent 5 minutes struggling to ram my microphone and IFB box down the back of my dress and hook them to my bra strap. For a moment, I consider tossing all my dresses and wearing a suit every day. Ugh! I wish there were a better way to do this. Praying I can actually wiggle the zipper of my dress over the bulky box, I feel uncomfortable, rushed, and self-conscious of the hump on my back. I’m starting my day, but already feel off of my game.

I'm Reba Hollingsworth, a television news anchor in Richmond, Virginia, and this has been my daily battle for more than 25 years. Different TV stations, different news positions...but the same ol' problem. Tons of women share in my frustration: TV personalities, business executives, church and political leaders, public speakers, restaurant managers, hair show stylists — anyone who needs to be mic’d up. Every day we attempt to answer the same question: "I'm wearing a dress, so where do I put my microphone?”

We've tried all kinds of DIY leg-wrap solutions: bandages, elastic hair ties, headbands, socks (yes, socks!), and even more humorous options. None of them solved the problem. The microphone eventually shimmies its way down to our ankles. What we needed was a leg wrap sturdy enough to hold a microphone and IFB box, but comfortable enough to wear for hours on the job and accessible enough for us to easily adjust it. 

Instead of another failed DIY attempt, I invested time, energy, and financial resources into a more sophisticated solution for all of us. The AHA Wrap is strong but stylish, just like us. The heavy-duty elastic design, silicone band, and velcro closure keep it snug around the leg. Two rows of snaps give it an extra layer of security and adjustability. With the AHA Wrap, I don't have to worry about that embarrassing shimmy or someone reaching down the back of my dress to turn off the mike so I can go to the restroom. Because we all deserve to feel special and pampered, the AHA Wrap can be monogrammed in your favorite color and style for a personal touch! 

The Appeal

My appeal is $10K from reporters, television personalities, public speakers, and the people who love them! The funds will be used for advertising the AHA Wrap and covering a portion of the shipment paid for out of personal funds. The funds from the campaign will help get my small business off the ground. I’ve dipped into my personal savings to cover the initial order and shipping fees. The finished product is flawless and already being used by a small number of TV women on air. So far, the feedback has been tremendous. One review in particular stands out:

“What a game changing product!  It is so comfortable and well made!”

The funds from this campaign can help me reach even more women struggling to attach their microphone and to help us do our job.

The Impact

I like to believe I’m creating a small solution that solves a BIG problem for women like me. After all, we're working hard and trying to put our best faces forward during a time when it’s not the easiest thing in the world to deliver the news. We’re meticulously careful with our language, deeply committed to our work, and often confronted with emails, voicemails, and letters criticizing us for coverage or even our hairstyles or clothing choices! But despite the hardships that come with the job, I'm driven to do the best I possibly can. By supporting this campaign, you can show a little love for female reporters/anchors like me AND make our lives a little more comfortable! 

I would truly appreciate your support of my campaign. A financial contribution isn’t the only way to help me reach my goal. I need your help spreading the word about my campaign. Word of mouth has been tremendous for my small business. Your support can take me to the next level. Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools to help get the word out.
