story:
LIFETIME WARRANTY

WEATHER PROOF

MADE IN CANADA


Why are we crowdfunding?

  • As a small company that strives to produce gear of the best possible quality, our goal is to keep manufacturing at our facility in Toronto, Canada. In a global market that has not-so-slowly shifted production overseas, we continue to offer our customers locally-produced, handmade products, at a time when similar business models have all but disappeared. Additional capital from crowd-funding ensures that we can continue making this a reality.
  • Funding allows us to continue sourcing the highest-quality North American materials, while also giving us the opportunity to seek out innovative textiles and hardware to expand our product line.
  • We are always in need of more equipment to accommodate for growing demand. Crowd-funding allows us to keep up-to-date on equipment, giving us a competitive edge on those who outsource their production overseas.


Our Perks



Materials and Hardware

  • Our newest line of bags features our unique German-engineered auto-locating hardware. The magnetic hardware slides off when pushed sideways, but will not detach on its own. Both sides automatically locks back together when they are close.
  • If you choose to back our project, the exterior of the bag you will receive will be your choice of 2 materials: CORDURA® Made in the USA nylon, or Army duck waxed canvas, finished in the USA.
  • The interior of our bags are built with tough Diamond Ripstop Nylon, 100% urethane coated for added weather protection.

  • YKK Aquaguard® water repellent zipper, North American Made



Detailed Look at Each Perk





Retail Backers - The shops and brands where you can find the Magnetic Series and who helped make the project possible!

Risks & Challenges

Although we are a small company we always seem to over-deliver. 
  • Although we are a small company, we pride ourselves on our history of exceeding expectations.  Crowdfunding campaigns are ambitious endeavors but we have two successful campaigns under our belts. Stowaway: Camera Bag and the Pan-Yay!: Bike Bags which were both successful and delivered on time.
  • With the help of our software system, we organize production and shipping with ease, ensuring that all of our valued backers walk away happy and satisfied.
  • Crowdfunding can involve an element of risk. Backers often do not know what they are getting themselves into, and perks sometimes do not materialize. YNOT backers can rest assured that their perks will delivered immediately after our campaign ends. We have been manufacturing our products in our own local factory for 6 years, and having total control over every step of production means that you can rest assured you are getting the ultimate quality in gear.
  • We have products in stores in 20 countries and we have our own retail store you can visit in Toronto. 
  • Backers can also expect to be satisfied for years to come because all YNOT products come with our Lifetime Warranty.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Let your friends know about us and share the campaign on social media.
  • Please us the Indiegogo share tools! 

FAQ

  • When do I get my PERK? Unlike most campaigns where you wait months for your perk. We will be sending your perks right after the campaign closes and we receive your confirmed choice of colour. Those who back the project earlier in the campaign and get us their colour choice earlier will get the perk fastest.
  • How do I choose a colour? We will contact you when the campaign is over to confirm your choices.
  • I purchased multiple PERKS do I need to add the international shipping perk for each one? No you you do not. As long as you have added one international shipping perk. 
  • How do I add multiple PERKS? This can only be done one at a time. Therefore you add the first PERK go through all the steps of logging in and then go back to the campaigns main page select another PERK and check out again. You can do this as many times as necessary. 
  • How do I upgrade my PERK? Find the answer here.

Video by Wyatt Clough
Select photos by Allie Mavian
Outdoor and product photos and videos by Ro Creative
story_txt:
LIFETIME WARRANTY
WEATHER PROOF
MADE IN CANADA









Why are we crowdfunding?  
 As a small company that strives to produce gear of the best possible quality, our goal is to keep manufacturing at our facility in Toronto, Canada. In a global market that has not-so-slowly shifted production overseas, we continue to offer our customers locally-produced, handmade products, at a time when similar business models have all but disappeared. Additional capital from crowd-funding ensures that we can continue making this a reality.
 Funding allows us to continue sourcing the highest-quality North American materials, while also giving us the opportunity to seek out innovative textiles and hardware to expand our product line. 
 We are always in need of more equipment to accommodate for growing demand. Crowd-funding allows us to keep up-to-date on equipment, giving us a competitive edge on those who outsource their production overseas. 










Our Perks












   Materials and Hardware  Our newest line of bags features our unique German-engineered auto-locating hardware. The magnetic hardware slides off when pushed sideways, but will not detach on its own. Both sides automatically locks back together when they are close. If you choose to back our project, the exterior of the bag you will receive will be your choice of 2 materials: CORDURA® Made in the USA nylon, or Army duck waxed canvas, finished in the USA.
The interior of our bags are built with tough Diamond Ripstop Nylon, 100% urethane coated for added weather protection. 


YKK Aquaguard® water repellent zipper, North American Made









Detailed Look at Each Perk















   

Retail Backers - The shops and brands where you can find the Magnetic Series and who helped make the project possible!
Risks & Challenges
Although we are a small company we always seem to over-deliver.   Although we are a small company, we pride ourselves on our history of exceeding expectations.  Crowdfunding campaigns are ambitious endeavors but we have two successful campaigns under our belts. Stowaway: Camera Bag and the Pan-Yay!: Bike Bags which were both successful and delivered on time.
With the help of our software system, we organize production and shipping with ease, ensuring that all of our valued backers walk away happy and satisfied.
Crowdfunding can involve an element of risk. Backers often do not know what they are getting themselves into, and perks sometimes do not materialize. YNOT backers can rest assured that their perks will delivered immediately after our campaign ends. We have been manufacturing our products in our own local factory for 6 years, and having total control over every step of production means that you can rest assured you are getting the ultimate quality in gear.
 We have products in stores in 20 countries and we have our own retail store you can visit in Toronto. 
Backers can also expect to be satisfied for years to come because all YNOT products come with our Lifetime Warranty. 

   Other Ways You Can Help

Let your friends know about us and share the campaign on social media. Please us the Indiegogo share tools! 


FAQ



When do I get my PERK? Unlike most campaigns where you wait months for your perk. We will be sending your perks right after the campaign closes and we receive your confirmed choice of colour. Those who back the project earlier in the campaign and get us their colour choice earlier will get the perk fastest.

How do I choose a colour? We will contact you when the campaign is over to confirm your choices.

I purchased multiple PERKS do I need to add the international shipping perk for each one? No you you do not. As long as you have added one international shipping perk. 

How do I add multiple PERKS? This can only be done one at a time. Therefore you add the first PERK go through all the steps of logging in and then go back to the campaigns main page select another PERK and check out again. You can do this as many times as necessary. 

How do I upgrade my PERK? Find the answer here.



Video by Wyatt Clough
Select photos by Allie Mavian

Outdoor and product photos and videos by Ro Creative

story:
Who we are:

We are Allie and Jess, the two designers behind Little.White.Dress., a Toronto wedding dress company with a conscience. We both come from fashion design backgrounds and have experience in cocktail and evening wear. We are passionate about design, the environment and our puppies, all four of them!

About Little.White.Dress:

We strive to bridge the gap between beautiful, quality garments and the perception of what environmentally friendly fashion is. We create one-of-a-kind wedding gowns for modern, alternative, and non-traditional brides who are environmentally and socially conscious.

Whether it’s incorporating the lace from her grandmother’s wedding dress or customizing a design to better suit her body type, Little.White.Dress. understands that each bride is an individual and endeavors to create a gown made just for her while decreasing the environmental impact of the bridal and fashion industries.

How are we green?

Little.White.Dress. grows the ethically and environmentally conscious market with dresses that are stylish, high quality, and sustainable.
We source our sustainable fabrics from small family businesses, second hand items and vintage retailers.

We use eco-friendly fabrics such as hemp silk, vegan peace silks, and organic cotton sateens as well as vintage and repurposed materials.
We choose to design sustainably, locally, and ethically because we love weddings and fashion but we feel a moral obligation to stick to our values and to provide a valid eco-friendly option for an industry that tends to have a large carbon footprint and creates enormous waste.

What it’s all about for us:

- creating local jobs

- supporting our community, city, and country with local manufacturing and design

- creating beautiful family heirlooms

- growing a small niche market that exists

- providing an ethical alternative

- following our dreams and encouraging others

- mentoring younger designers

- proving that ethical and eco fashion is beautiful

- lessening the waste created by the bridal and fashion industries

What We Need and Why:

While we have already done two collections, we are excited to launch the business full time in January and need some extra help. Let us break it down:

1. Trade Shows - Bridal Show registration and booth set-up for one year

$10,000

2. Advertising - create listings as a vendor on some awesome wedding blogs such as Green Wedding Shoes, A Practical Wedding, and 100 Layer Cake.

$1,000

3. Samples - create samples of all designs in three sizes for brides to try on

$5,000

4. Marketing Materials - all the good stuff such as look books, business cards, hangers, boxes for shipping, invoices etc.

$1,500

5. Rent - We want to move into a studio/retail space out of our homes soon and will need first and last!

$4,000

The Impact

LWD is a fashionable yet ethical cocktail and bridal label that proves looking beautiful and doing something beautiful for the environment are not mutually exclusive.

Your wedding day is an incredible and special day for you and your family. Unfortunately, many weddings are also not very environmentally friendly.

LWD endeavours to provide our brides, their bridal party and their attendants with fashion forward designs that are sustainable.

The Impact on You, Us, and the World

  • We save fabrics and dresses from ending up in landfills and giving them a new lease on life
  • We make weddings less wasteful and more green
  • We provide an eco friendly choice without brides having to sacrifice style or luxury
  • Our dresses are appropriate to wear more than once and most can even be dyed another colour
  • We can take a sentimental garment and recreate it for you; incorporate your grandmother’s wedding dress into yours
  • You are supporting us in creating local jobs and keeping fashion production domestic
  • We have had a number of clients mostly online, now we want to make LWD and beautiful sustainable design much more accessible
  • Having a studio and boutique will allow brides and others to see their dress in person, meet face to face with the designers, and try their dress on before purchase

The Best Part...

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word!!

Link, post, and share our blog posts, pictures, statuses, and more! If you can't donate much you probably know someone who can so share the love!

Tell three friends!!

If you tell just three friends about LWD and our campaign, the impact for us is immeasurable but of course, you can tell more people! We don’t mind!

Recommend us!!

Tell your engaged friends, your friend with a wedding every weekend this summer, or the bridesmaid who can’t stand to have to buy and wear one more satin atrocity about us! We promise we aren't your typical bridal salon. 

Recommend us to the bride who wants to get bridesmaids’ dress that they can wear again (for real)

Donate ANY Amount:

If you don't have $10, $5 will do! Every little bit helps. And of course if you want to donate any other amount, we will give you all the perks up to that amount. We are eternally grateful for any and all of your support! 

Press:

After graduating from Ryerson we partnered in 2010 and 2011 to produce two sustainable bridal collections under the label Little.White.Dress. which were presented at Toronto Alternative Arts and Fashion Week (|FAT|).

The collections shown at |FAT| were given positive reviews from numerous local fashion blogs such as She Does the City, appeared in the HuffingtonPost.com, were featured on slice.ca, and in 2012 was listed as one of the top 5 moments of |FAT| on the Toronto Standard.

Our Pleats and Ruffles dress was shot and featured in a post on Weddingchicks.com the wedding blog and recently a few of our dresses were featured in Press The Fashion Magazine.

story:
2 shoes in 1

Do you wear high heels to work?

Do you have trouble walking down stairs in high heels?

How long can you wear high heels before your feet start screaming?

Switcheels is the Solution!!  They are 2 shoes in 1!!

High Heels that transform into flats. 

My Dad is my biggest inspiration. Together we want to make a revolutionary impact upon the shoe industry.  

We have perfected the design for a high heel shoe that easily transforms into a flat heel. Many people have attempted this but we have succeded!

 In the flat position it is a better flat for your foot than your average flat shoe. That is, because it maintains a small arch which gives your foot better support.

So when your feet start to hurt from those gorgeous high heels you love; you can reach down and click off your heels instead of kicking off your shoes.

This is every womens dream fellas! If you really want to make your special lady happy and give her a gift that nobody has ever recieved make a pledge!

And ladies I know you are all shaking your heads in agreement :]

This shoe would solve so many problems that ordinary high heels have created. Reaserch shows that women who wear high heels in the workplace develop long lasting health issues like corns, bunions, bad posture and back problems, also artheritus in the toes and anckles.

Even though high heels are hazardous to your health some professional jobs require women to wear a minimum of a 1.5 highth heel. Over time this is causing these woman alot of pain and inconvenience. Help improve the lives of so many women.

I hate carrying a spair pair of shoes when i wear high heels to a formal function. With switcheels your shoes will always match your outfit. You'll never have to go bearfoot after a night of dancing again.

 Brides you can be the first bride walking down the isle in marvelous high heels and then sporting the same marvelous style at your reception.

I share this dream with every woman out there and I know that my Dad and I can produce a strong, (and adorable) convertable shoe.

We have final pricing, mold producers, shoe manufacturers, and final designs, and we're ready for production. All we need now is the funding.

So just ponder a minute and think how many women would love to own a pair of these. Make a pledge or contact us to team up or invest!

 

This is where you come in!

You help us get us to our first step (pun intended)by making a pledge, and you get a pair of our Switcheels for half price.

It's a WIN-WIN FOR BOTH OF US!!!

Here are designs that we could possibly build. We are requesting feedback from you.  Which designs do you like the best?  Email your favorites to switcheels@live.com.  We would appreciate your opinion.

story:
*** Summer Blossom is now Umbree.co***

 

Umbree Overview

Umbree is a minority and veteran startup umbrella manufacturing company, serving both retail sales and private labeling for fortune 500 companies, nonprofits, and general consumers. The company is located in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

Umbree offers a series of high quality umbrellas to retail stores, organizations, and general consumers. Our signature collection is a double layered polyester canopy, fiberglass shaft and ribs, and EVA sponge handle. Each umbrella is offered in 16 different color variations to include leopard prints, pastel, and seasoned colors. The second collection will include our commitment to changing lives through our community campaigns:     

  •  1 Million Pink Umbrella Campaign: Providing Free Mammograms.
  •  Speak Out Loud: Against Bullying
  •  Feed The Voice: For Kids in Hunger
  •  Operation Butterfly: Helping Battered Women Relocate
  •  World of Colors: A Journey to Equality
  •  Support The Troops: In Support Of The Wounded Warriors Project

Your support will help not only impact the success of our startup small business but it will also impact the lives of millions of women through our corporate campaigns, millions of kids that are in need of food and water, kids who are in need of a voice against anti-bullying, and women who are going through domestic violence. Not to count out the thousands of soldiers, marines, seamen, and airmen who put their lives on the line to keep us free. As present and former military veterans we understand the sacrifices and dedication needed to make this company work and deliver the promises we make.

 

 

Your Support At Work

Right now we are in desperate need of funding to assist us in production of our breast cancer umbrellas, anti-bullying, feed the voice, operation butterfly, and support the troops. We also need your support to help us develop a better umbrella, expand our product offering to include smaller umbrellas, attend more tradeshows, enhance our web platform, and implement our marketing strategy.   If we don’t hit our goal of $48,000 we will continue to use the funds raised to produce as many breast cancer umbrellas as possible. We will also use the funds to improve the quality of our umbrellas and expand our current selection of campaigns. Your support will not go to waste at all. All of our progress will be publicized on our IndieGogo page, Facebook, and company’s blog. 

 

 

 

 **https://www.facebook.com/umbree.staydry **

 

Our Perks

$10 Notable Supporter – Recognition on our website for supporting our causes

$25 General Supporter – Wear our awesome T-shirt and spread the word about our creative umbrella campaigns.

$50 Bronze Supporter - Select your choice of one Breast Cancer umbrella: Pink Design Inside, Pink Design Outside, White Design Inside, and White Design Outside. We will also send you a Breast Cancer Supporter T-shirt to help spread the word about our umbrella campaigns.

$100 Silver Supporter – Select any two umbrella of your choice from our breast cancer collection. We will also send you a Breast Cancer Supporter T-shirt. Your name engraved in a wall plaque.

$200 Gold Supporter – Your name will be featured in our first quarterly newsletter. Any three breast cancer umbrellas and a Breast Cancer Supporter T-shirt. Your name engraved in a wall plaque.

$300 Platinum Supporter - Your name will be featured in our 1st and 2nd quarter newsletters. You will receive all four breast cancer umbrellas, plus a Breast Cancer Supporter T-shirt, and your name engraved in a wall plaque.

$500 Diamond Supporter - Your name will be featured in our quarterly newsletters for 3 quarters straight. You will receive all four breast cancer umbrellas, a Breast Cancer Supporter T-shirt, your name engraved in a wall plaque, and one umbrella from each of our latest umbrella campaigns such as “Speak Out Loud”, “Feed the Voice”, “Operation Butterfly”, and “Support Our Troops”.

$1,000 Hall of Famer – All of the above, plus a signature plaque with our founding team and founding supporters. Your name will also be engraved in our wall plaque that will forever be a part of our company’s history; showcased in our front office.

 

 **https://www.facebook.com/umbree.staydry **

 

Social Impact and Corporate Responsibility

As a philanthropist by heart and a social entrepreneur by trade, we are committed to delivering the best umbrella you will ever purchase while staying true to our foundation and giving back to the community. Our umbrellas are designed to be creative and fashionable while impacting those that are in need. Aspiring to hit our 1 million umbrella goal we will be able to provide approximately 2,500 under privileged women with free mammograms. Think about your love ones who might be affected by these screenings such as your mother, sister, daughter, aunt, or family friend.

Operation Butterfly will help hundreds of battered women relocate through partnered programs. Speak Out Loud will bring awareness to parents, teachers, and students as we partner with local media outlets, after care programs, and celebrities. Our “Feed the Voice” campaign will donate monetary contributions and food to kids in hunger in third world countries. “Support the Troops” is burned deep in our hearts because we have served in the Army and Navy. We know the feeling of being in harm’s way but we don’t know how it is to lose a limb. There are several veterans out there that could use our support.

 

Support Us By Sharing Our Link:  indiegogo.com/summerblossom 

We are changing our company name from Umbree to Umbree.co

Speak Out Loud will bring awareness to parents, teachers, and students as we partner with local media outlets, after care programs, and celebrities. Our “Feed the Voice” campaign will donate monetary contributions and food to kids in hunger in third world countries. “Support the Troops” is burned deep in our hearts because we have served in the Army and Navy. We know the feeling of being in harm’s way but we don’t know how it is to lose a limb. There are several veterans out there that could use our support.

story:
Starting my own clothing line that will bring hope to hopeless, 

             inspiration to uninspired and motivate the unmotivated through

               impact of my ideas, visions, projects, designs and just lifestyle. 

           All I want is to make YOU WIN! Create more harmony and happiness

                                                            in your life!

 

Dear friends and supporters,

My name is Karina Chasijeva. I am an active and motivated person who finished 

her studies of the 7th semester of the international Fashion Design class at TEKO

 in Herning in Denmark. I graduated with a Bachelor's Degree in December 2013

 and now I want to launch my own menswear clothing line.

 

Within my project I have created a mini ``WODAABE`` menswear collection A/W 

2015. In order to promote my brand’s vision I will be working with a creative team

 of people such as photographer, videographer and models. We will produce a 

commercial video that will help me reaching my target audience.

 

With my creative team we are going to shoot a story behind my brand, send 

uplifting and empowering message that will inspire you to go confidently in the

 direction of your dreams. My clothing line will represent the power potions to 

enhance that beauty, comfort, freedom and confidence which will support your 

aspiration during your journey.

 

Our video shoot and photo shoot will take place in Copenhagen in Scandinavian 

locations and atmosphere which will be mixed with African cultural theme, a more 

detailed description of our budget and process can be found below.

 

                                                   Purpose of the project

I have always been an artist! Through my life journey I was facing a lot of different 

situations which allowed me to understand that I want to provide significance to

 life. I always had problems with people who have dysfunctional lifestyle and

 therefore I want to communicate with the world through my artistic visions in order

 to foster for better and positive change.

 

 Today I want to create a fashion line that represents the possibility of what can be

 accomplished. Through our lifestyle, projects and simply stories, together we will

 receive the knowledge of how to avoid obstacles in pursuing your goals, grow and

 learn through the process of striving, regardless of what we attain. Life is about

 creating yourself and building your own wall of confidence.

“Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible.”

—Frank Gaines, mayor, Berkeley, California, 1939–1943

 

                                 Menswear Collection ‘Wodaabe’ A/W 2015

WODAABE

My inspiration has strong influences from three main sources which are:

-Hip hop 80's 

-African culture

-Modern day street life estate trends

‘Wodaabe’ is perfect described brand name that connects my inspiration together

 and creates a powerful story to get my target group on board of possibilities of my 

visions.

‘Wodaabe’ name is coming specifically from one very special African tribe

 ‘Wodaabe’ from Nigeria! They are known for their beauty both men and women, 

elaborate attire and rich cultural ceremonies. Getting deeper in to their cultural

 background I was very inspired by their spiritual strength and strong faith that 

everything is possible even in poor surroundings and circumstances. That is what

inspired me to give my clothes more values and exude them with energy of endless 

possibilities.

 

                                                           TARGET GROUP

For me, clothes are the support network for good comfort in your everyday

 activities. Good designs stabilize your mood, attitude, functionality and keeps you 

hype and stylish for the rest of your day. 

 

I examine my target group from many angles. From a professional point of view

 I am especially interested in their environment, experiences, passions and defining

 moments.

 

For me, being a designer is all about customer service. I am interested in people

 and their dreams, needs and comfort. As a designer, I find it important to develop

 designs that speak to people. This job is about creative problem solving, with a 

strong emphasis on understanding people and materials.

 

My own personal favorite designer is Astrid Andersen because I can very much

 relate to her design universe. While being an intern of hers I got some good 

knowledge and was able to attend her fashion shows of S/S collection twice in 2013

 and 2014. She is very amazing and impressive Danish menswear designer that

 creates athletic-inspired clothes with the twist of hip hop 80's feeling. We both 

have same focus on letting our man feel hot and confident, because that is the true

 ultimate attraction. However her designs are more than just exaggerating man's

 beauty: it is also about the game! She provides powerful uniform with style for the

 basketball game.

 

Astrid Andersen:

.''It’s a sport where they are a team, and the team spirit is so visible there, but it’s

 also like a one man’s game at the same time. It’s about playing up to each other

 and making one person shine. I love that whole mentality around that, they’re not 

afraid to shine, and they’re not afraid to give room to make this other person really

 just go for it.''

 

Those references prove me that clothes speak about something more than just the

 appearance: it is history, inspirational force and the push of your goals behind it.

Therefore with my designs I want to provide not only physical functionality but also

 spiritual and mental functionality for my audience. Once you wear my designs they 

will take you to endless experiences. 

 

I talk a lot about functionality because it is a big part of my target audience dynamic

 lifestyle. My designs are made for man from the age of 18-30, who consider being a

 part of hip-hop cultural environment. He is very talented, confident, positive,

 charming and thinking man who creates a fabulous use of his passion and skills.

 

                                                            Video concept

Within my video I will represent my designs, target group, lifestyle and the spirit of

 ”Wodaabe’’ tribe. In the video I bring in together four very talented and charming 

people whose energy will exude endless possibilities. It is all about inspiring you to

 get out there and win. 

 

Our universe is full of beautiful people and some of them are surrounded by 

tremendous struggles. We all have great plans, amazing ideas — but we just can’t 

seem to launch them. Maybe we have constant money problems, difficulties with 

relationships, weak self-esteem or emotions that drain our energy and enthusiasm.

How can we repair that and take you on the way to the top?

It is pretty simple and clear! Do not invite the broke in to your life! Do not longer

 walk in to direction of dysfunction! Do not depend on someone telling you who

 you are! Only you can decide what is best for you and DO it! And this is exactly

 what our fashion video symbolize! We invite you to surround yourself with us and 

we will tell you more about your blessings and increase your confidence.

 

Challenge yourself to do something a bit beyond your comfort zone to become the

 self-assured ,successful and happy person inside you and my designs!

 

                                                                   Film story:

 

The Idea of the video is to make a short film with different lifestyle forms that

 combines a very spectacular side of hip hop 80's and the identity of ethnic 

‘Wodaabe’ tribe.

 

To create more artistic atmosphere we decided to stay away from a specific plan

 or certain story. It is all about what is happening in different situations, and the

 result of what happens speaks for itself in terms of the value and importance of it.

 

For me as a menswear designer it is very important to emphasize man’s beauty,

 charm and intelligence. Strong focus will be not only on my designs but also on

 their looks, face expressions and the attitude! We also have a lady in the video to

 represent that she is an active and important spectator. She is looking for her one

 of a kind MR. ‘Wodaabe’! It simply represents traditional ‘Wodaabe’ importance of

 impressing our female and for our female to make a right choice! There is a deeper

 meaning of a man being judged by women! It speaks to us that our females have to 

be smart judges, and have realistic decisions in order to have healthy relationships.

 

While wearing my designs my models will invite you inside the moment of their

 passions for you to see how far you can stretch it and in whatever direction move it.

 That is why my designs have so much functionality and freedom to help you get out

 there! 

 

I believe the best inspiration is to see something that is so powerful and fearless,

 something that makes you feel uncomfortable and hungry! Because this is exactly

 what stimulates your mind get down to work!

 

In my video with my designs I bring back the hip hop 80’s because this time period 

is perfect illustration of the true hip-hop cultural essence. It was all about creativity,

 peace, unity and inelegance! I simply oppose to mainstream artists who sacrifice

 artistic integrity in the lure for more money and how they degrade woman. 

 

The video itself is going to be very creative, spiritual and hype! It will raise a feeling 

of certainty, happiness, strangeness and exoticism. If our film is not easy to

 define it means I leave it for creative and imaginative people to draw their 

own interpretation around it!

 

 

                                                       Expenses/Conclusion:

This project requires a considerable investment in the amount of up to

 13,000 DKK. (2,165 USD).

 

1)Video camera rental cost: 3000dkk (499.567 USD)

2)Photo camera rental cost: 1000dkk (166.522 USD)

3)Video editing process: 2000dkk (333.045 USD)

4)Models being paid: 2000dkk (333.045 USD)

5)Transportation cost: 2000dkk (333.045 USD)

6)Lighting equipment cost: 3000dkk (499.567 USD)

 

Within this project we are able to establish clothing line that will inspire you to 

experiment endless possibilities! Our design consists not only of the substantive

 perspective but also spiritual aspiration toward your goals and dreams. WODAABE 

is not only about being stylish and unique but it allows you to wear hope, passion,

 positivity and love! We would really appreciate any financial help toward our 

project. Investing in our project would open the doors for the accomplishments

 of your kingdom goals. No matter who you are we are here to build you up,

 restore and make you WIN!

This project requires a considerable investment in the amount of up to
 13,000 DKK. (2,165 USD).
 
1)Video camera rental cost: 3000dkk (499.567 USD)
2)Photo camera rental cost: 1000dkk (166.522 USD)
3)Video editing process: 2000dkk (333.045 USD)
4)Models being paid: 2000dkk (333.045 USD)
5)Transportation cost: 2000dkk (333.045 USD)
6)Lighting equipment cost: 3000dkk (499.567 USD)
 
Within this project we are able to establish clothing line that will inspire you to 
experiment endless possibilities! Our design consists not only of the substantive
 perspective but also spiritual aspiration toward your goals and dreams. WODAABE 
is not only about being stylish and unique but it allows you to wear hope, passion,
 positivity and love! We would really appreciate any financial help toward our 
project. Investing in our project would open the doors for the accomplishments
 of your kingdom goals. No matter who you are we are here to build you up,
 restore and make you WIN!

story:
Short Summary

GP Wing is our most iconic product that was first introduced in 2009. It all started out with a discussion on NorthAmericanMotoring (a MINI forum). At the time, everyone wanted a wing like this for their R53 MINIs, but no solution was available. As an R53 MINI owner/ enthusiast, I came up with an idea to make an affordable version so that every enthusiast would be able to purchase one. To date, we have delivered more than 150 GP wings and have received numerous positive feedback from our customers around the world. 

Recently we have received a lot of emails regarding the availability of our GP Wing but unfortunately we no longer stock them in our inventory. Therefore, we came up with the idea of using Indiegogo as our pre-order platform in order to bring a new batch to the market. 

The Gen 2 GP Wing will be our best quality GP Wing by far. It will fit both R53 and R56 MINI without any modification to your rear hatch glass. Installation is straightforward and simple with all the provided mounting hardwares.

This is going to be your best opportunity to own a GP Wing at the lowest price ever. We are offering them at the vendor/wholesale price so that you don't need to pay more to have the same quality GP Wing that other vendors offer. Please help us spread the word among the MINI community. 

You can also check out our other successfully funded campaigns on Indiegogo: 

GP Wing ($13,411 funded)

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/gp-wing-for-r50-r53-r56-mini/

Unikey ($17,060 funded)

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/lotus-unikey

UniLink ($2,426 funded)

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/lotus-unilink/

Motor on! 

Terry

What's included?

- 3-piece GP wing in primer (ready to paint)
- mounting hardware (screws & brackets)

(picture of the latest version GP Wing)

What We Need & What You Get

We will need at least $3500 to start a new batch, that is roughly 10~11 committed buyers. How this campaign works is that once we have reached the goal, the product will be made and delivered. If the campaign fails, everyone who has funded will get the money back. 

Timeline of Production

FEB 8 2016 - Campaign starts

FEB 23 2016 - Campaign ends

FEB 29 2016 - Production starts* (if funding goal is reached)

MAY 9 2016 - Quality check* (if funding goal is reached)

MAY 13 2016 - Delivery* (if funding goal is reached)

*all dates are subject to change, however we will try our best to keep everything on schedule. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the word in your local MINI clubs and online MINI communities. Your contribution is greatly appreciated. 

Q&A

1. Will it fit my MINI?

- GP Wing will fit on any R50, R53 and R56 hardtop MINI without modification.

2. Do I need to modify anything for installation? 

- You do not need to cut anything to mount this spoiler. However you will have to drill 2 holes on each side of your hatch to create attachment points for the mounting of GP Wing. There will be more details in the installation guide.

Installation Guide:

http://static1.squarespace.com/static/538bdc9fe4b0c6696be32039/t/57737034d1758e26718a7334/1467183170018/V3+GP+Wing+Installation+Guide.pdf

3. When do I expect to receive my item

- We aim to deliver your GP Wing in May 2016. We will keep everyone updated regularly. 

4. What will happen to my money if the campaign fails?

- You are guaranteed to get your money back within 3 to 5 business days. 

5. How do I contact you?

- sales@fubrication.com

Photos of our cars & customers'

story:
A SPECIAL THANK YOU TO ALL OUR SUPPORTERS!  

WE CAN'T WAIT FOR YOU TO WEAR YOUR EXTRA LAYER OF CONFIDENCE!  IN THE MEANTIME, PLEASE VISIT US AT:

WWW.NUDYPATOOTY.COM

 

Stop stressing, stay cool and start living and wearing the solution to look and feel more confident every day!  Join the movement to start living a more confident life! 

Launching Nudy Patooty is just the beginning!  Whether you are able to support us at this point or not we would still love for you to join our community to inspire and be inspired!

nudypatooty.com

facebook.com/nudypatooty

@nudypatooty

And please feel free to contact us, we'd love to hear from you!

info@nudypatooty.com

Say Good-Bye to Embarrassing Odour & Perspiration Stains and Expensive Dry-Cleaning Bills!

We don’t wash our pants after every wear and that’s thanks to our undies!  But what about our shirts and dresses?  With nothing to protect them from damaging perspiration and antiperspirant stains, it means more costly trips to the dry-cleaners which is expensive and hard on our clothes.  Not to mention the embarrassment of odour and perspiration stains!  As women we have enough things to think about in a day that perspiration stains should not be one of them!

The Nudy Patooty Goal:  To create a practical and comfortable undergarment solution for women to wear under their clothing to protect against embarrassing odour and perspiration stains, and reduce the frequency of laundering.

What causes perspiration stains?  Perspiration is mostly water, but the small percentage of other things - ammonia, sodium chloride, urea and lactic acid - are what cause the stains.

What causes the odour?  Body odour is created when bacteria that is naturally found on the skin's surface reacts with moisture. Bacteria grows quickly in the presence of perspiration, especially if the pH balance of the skin is off or if moisture remains on the skin for a prolonged period. Shaving also contributes to bacteria growth because it removes hair which is used to wick perspiration away from the surface of the skin.

Why isn’t antiperspirant enough? Antiperspirants do not prevent underarm perspiration they simply reduce the amount you perspire (the FDA requires antiperspirants reduce perspiration by 20% to meet standard guidelines, and 30% to be considered extra-effective).

Do antiperspirants contribute to the problem? Yes. They use aluminum-based compounds that cause perspiration ducts to swell and block moisture from releasing. However these ingredients bond with perspiration and when they do escape they create stains.

Nudy Patooty's patent pending undergarments are specially designed to fit snugly to the body so they can be inconspicuously worn under almost any style clothing.

1) Fit: 

As most women’s garments are fitted or made of a delicate fabric we recognize the importance of an undergarment fitting perfectly.  Nudy Patooty's pay special attention to detail to make sure they can be worn under most styles of clothing without being detected.

  • No bulky sleeves:  The sleeves have been expertly tailored to lie flat against the arm so there is no extra fabric adding bulk.  
  • Low neckline:  The neckline is cut low to the apex so the shirt can be worn under low or high neckline tops and dresses.  
  • Delicate hem:  The hems have been finished with a delicate stretch lace to lie flat to the body.  
  • Two sleeve lengths:  Two sleeve lengths each address different needs of different style garments.   Short sleeve, and three quarter length which hits just about the elbow and blends in with the creases naturally formed by your arm.

2) Comfort:  

The perfect undergarment should be so comfortable that you don’t want to wear your clothes without one.  For this reason we have used a premium bamboo fabric.

  • Luxurious bamboo fabric:  The shirts are made of bamboo fabric, with a touch of Spandex for stretch, which is luxuriously soft against the skin.
  • Anti-odour:  Bamboo fibers naturally have anti-bacterial properties and these properties stay in the fiber even after they have been processed into fabric.  Bamboo is also a renewable resource and no chemical pesticides are used.
  • Regulates body temperature:  Bamboo fabric has micro-gaps, which aid in ventilation, meaning they trap cool air in the summer and warm air in the winter to regulate your body temperature. 
  • Super absorbent:  The porous nature of bamboo fabric also means it is three to four times more absorbent than cotton, allowing it to wick and absorb perspiration away from the body allowing you to stay dry and comfortable all day long. 

3) Reinforced underarm:  

One of our main concerns is preventing embarrassing perspirations stains from damaging clothing (and confidence!), we have added an extra layer in the underarm.

  • A reinforced layer in the underarm allows for extra absorption, wicking moisture away from your body and absorbing it into the shirt to prevent perspiration stains from leaking through.

What are the colours?

Both styles come in nude or black, which you can select after the project closes.

How do Nudy Patooty's fit?

Why do YOU need to wear a Nudy Patooty?:

We all have enough things to worry about – whether it's a job interview, review with your boss, a first date, or trying to let loose with your girlfriends on a Saturday night – no one should have to worry about perspiration stains!  It is hard to feel and act like the fabulous woman you are while trying to conceal embarrassing perspiration stains.  Nudy Patootys will give you an extra layer of confidence!

Do you save your favourite clothes for a “special day” because you know you can only wear them once before they need to go back to the dry cleaners?  You bought your clothes to wear not look at in the closet!  A Nudy Patooty will get your favourite clothes back into regular wardrobe rotation without you having to worry about damaging them or what each wear is going to cost at the dry cleaners.

No matter how little you sweat, or how good your deodorant is, some materials are just more prone to perspiration and odour stains.  Or maybe your skin is sensitive to certain fabrics so you have avoided wearing them at all.  A Nudy Patooty fits perfectly under almost all materials.

The Story:

Nudy Patooty founder Michelle Shemilt was inspired to create an undershirt line when she realized she wasn’t wearing her favourite clothes either because they were prone to causing embarrassing odour and perspiration stains or they were dry-clean only which was costly! These are problems common to most women, and yet there was no practical solution available on the market, so Michelle set out to create the perfect undershirt. Her goal was to create an undershirt that could be worn under almost any style clothing to reduce the frequency of laundering, and most importantly prevent embarrassing odour and perspiration stains. Michelle felt women should be able to go confidently through their day in comfort, without sacrificing their style. In short, she wanted to create an extra layer of confidence! Michelle collaborated with a top New York manufacturer and pattern maker to develop the perfect fitting undergarment, and the Nudy Patooty was born!

We are ready to launch but need your help!

We are ready to start production but need your help to meet production minimums.  We are looking to raise $35,000 that will all go towards our first production run.  

Please help support our undergarment revolution by pre-ordering your Nudy Patooty today and wear an extra layer of confidence!  

Risks and challenges

We've spent the past six months working with a top manufacturer in NYC who has over 50 years experience in the garment manufacturing industry but we know there is still the possibility of hurdles along the way.  We will always share updates with our community about any challenges that may arise, including the following:

Ship date:  We've built in extra time for the production and are confident we'll ship by the estimated dates, but there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned.

Product:  We have worked diligently with pattern makers to get the fit of the undershirts perfect and to ensure everything is done to the highest quality and comfort standards.  But once we put the order into the factory for production we will go through one last set of samples and size grading so if any tweaks need to be made at that point than we will take the time to make the necessary corrections.

A special thank you to:

Nadia Cheema for her amazing photography and Whitney at Spot 6 Management for being our beautiful model.

FAQ's

When will my Nudy Patooty be ready?

We are targeting an October delivery for all finished goods.  We've built in extra time for the production and are confident we'll ship by the estimated dates.  But once we put the order into the factory for production we will go through one last set of samples and size grading so if any tweaks need to be made at that point than we will take the time to make the necessary corrections.

Are there any special care instructions for bamboo fabric?

We recommend you wash your Nudy Patooty in cold water and tumble dry, just as you would any garment you want to last longer.

When do I get to pick my size and colour?

We will send you a link once the campaign has been completed where you will be able to select your desired size and colour.

Do you plan on making additional styles and colours?

Yes!  We appreciate that women have different style needs and have plans for additional colors, sizes and designs to address them.  We'd love to hear your feedback, so please share any particular garment problems that you have.

How does Nudy Patooty help women in the community layer confidence?

At Nudy Patooty we believe that having a strong support system is fundamental to layering confidence in women.  $1 of every Nudy Patooty sold is donated to a local women's shelter where women with no where to turn can find a safe, welcoming and supportive environment.

 

 

Video music credit.

story:
Worn for 200 Days Straight - Still As Comfortable as Day 1.

photo credit: Simply Liv & Co

As seen in:

 

Have you ever tried to have a relaxing day at the beach, then within a few hours your feet start to hurt?

You know how it is...

You're with the family trying to spend a nice day at the beach. Between walking back to the car for the twentieth time because the little one forgot their such-and-such and taking a romantic walk with your significant other and the next thing you know your feet hurt.

It's not even halfway through the day and your name brand flip-flops have failed you.

Is that just the way it is? Do we have to expect foot pain when spending the majority of the day in flip-flops?

NO!

That’s exactly why we created Olli.

 

You don't have to worry about such a story with Olli. In fact your story can have a much happier ending.

Olli uses a secret ingredient that completely changes the way your foot enjoys your long days at the beach.

This ingredient can greatly reduce your foot pain on a typical day out. Whether you’re at the beach or just running errands around town.

What is the secret ingredient?

Premium grade natural rubber tapped directly from the finest rubber trees of Sri Lanka.

Why natural rubber?

Well it’s a good question… to be honest I didn’t know much about it either until I started this journey to make the perfect flip-flop.

Here’s what I learned about natural rubber - specifically for footwear - over the past 2 years of developing the world’s best flip-flops...

It’s incredibly durable! I’ve been wearing my flip-flops for the last 200 days straight. Let’s be real I’m not the most delicate person when it comes to how I treat my flip-flops. I’ve taken these bad boys through some pretty rough terrain. Mountain roads? Been there. Sunny beaches? Done it. Errands for the day? Success! These things just don’t give out. The reason? Natural Rubber is incredibly elastic and when mixed with the right balance of other natural ingredients to make the perfect latex compound it becomes super spongy. It’s this sponginess that allows it to maintain it’s structure and remain strong no matter what you throw at it.

photo credit: Leotie Lovely, @flaco_d_oro / Shane Woodward 

It’s super light-weight and freaking soft! Natural rubber has a silky smooth texture. The only thing I can think to describe it is silk. The stuff just feels like silk. Believe it or not, it actually looks like a perfect satin milk when it comes out of the tree. That definitely translates to more comfort on your foot. Between the cloud-like softness and the fact that they literally feel like they weigh nothing I often forget that I’m even wearing anything.

It automatically molds to your foot. This was an amazing discovery! We had been playing around with different natural rubber compounds that mixed the right amount of comfort and firmness to get through everyday life adventures. I knew we had it perfect when the flip-flops were molding to my feet but still able to provide enough support to wear constantly. This is due to the fact that we use a solid half inch of our special premium natural rubber compound recipe. This provides some really cool extra added benefits…

  • You get support exactly where your foot needs it! Because the natural rubber is conforming to the unique curves of your foot each flip-flop provides support exactly where your foot needs it most. This is no one size fits all. You could say natural rubber has built-in smart technology that just knows your foot’s needs.
  • No more irritation between your toes. Raise your hand if you’ve ever worn a pair of flip-flops that irritated your toes in the area where the thong stretched between your big toe and your index toe? Go ahead I’ll wait. You can raise your hand. I learned - by the way - that part is called the “toe plug”. Get this, because our natural rubber compound provides just the right amount of soft conformity the toe plug actually molds into the shape between your toes. Which means there is no unnecessary rubbing. It’s the only way I could have worn them 200 days straight without losing all my skin!

photo credit: Konscious Whispers

It’s only harvested in special climates. Believe me when I say, “this stuff was not easy to find.” Natural rubber just doesn’t grow everywhere. We had to go to great lengths to obtain it. Actually, we even went one step further than most that use rubber - we only use fair trade natural rubber. It took over 2 years even to just get all the suppliers in place but because of all this hard work up front we are confident that this is THE best material to create flip-flops.

photo credit: Leotie Lovely, @flaco_d_oro / Shane Woodward 

Your foot doesn’t stand a chance at the beach all day, out with the kids on a Saturday, or through any other of life's daily toils without being supported by the finest quality materials.

With the natural rubber from Sri Lanka’s finest rubber plantations we’ve worked with master artisans and rubber tappers to create the OLLI.

But we didn't stop there.

This story doesn’t end with the highest quality materials in any flip-flop... ever!

Because, as I set out to find natural rubber to add to the perfect flip-flop I found myself in the countryside of India and the backwoods of Sri Lanka at rubber plantations. It was deep in these plantations the exploitative nature of the rubber industry became very clear.

You wouldn’t believe the despair just to get a bucket of raw rubber.

Workers living in the most despicable conditions, getting paid outrageously meager wages, and treated like the lowest of low.

This reality is far worse than the harshness of bad chemicals or uncomfortable overpriced flip-flops.

I wanted no part in this.

So I set out to find rubber harvested on fair terms, rubber that cared for it’s people at every step of the process.

That’s when the full idea for the perfect flip-flop was born.

That's when Olli was born.

photo credit: Simply Liv & Co

Thus began my journey to find natural FAIR TRADE rubber.

Olli flip-flops would not only be better for the environment, but better for those involved in production.

I joined the Fair Rubber Association, which means Olli only purchases rubber from audited plantations that maintain Fair Trade standards that include safe working conditions, medical care, and a fair wage. We pay a premium for our rubber which goes directly to the rubber tappers.

A rubber worker cutting natural sheets of Olli rubber

Like I said before, I’ve literally been wearing my Olli perfect flip-flops almost every day for the past 6 months - with the exception of the unforgiving Ohio winter; frostbite doesn’t need to be a part of this story.

At first I was wearing them everyday just to test the true durability and then after about 3 months of non-stop wear they became an extension of my foot.

Now the time has come to present to you the Olli perfect flip-flop; fit for - almost - every occasion.

photo credit: Simply Liv & Co 

photo credit: Tara Teng

photo credit: Tara Teng

OLLI Special Indiegogo Packages

Get your pair of Olli flip-flops while the price is special. See the reward levels below and choose your reward on the right... 

  

Every purchase changes a life. 

When you buy an Olli perfect flip-flop you’re buying more than just a flip-flop. You’re directly impacting the livelihood of the person that made the flip-flop.

Like Sudhan.

Sudhan is able to retire with an extra retirement fund provided by the monies directly provided by the Fair Rubber Association. Money directly related to the production of the Olli flip-flops.

It’s not just an extra retirement fund that Sudhan is receiving. He also gets his very own rubber tree - to own for himself! This will provide him with an extra source of ongoing income as he is able to sell what he taps from the rubber tree, for profit.

Rubber tappers like Sudhan are receiving similar generosities because of the consumers who buy fair trade rubber. Because of you!

Other rubber tappers have received university scholarships, rebuilt schools for their children, infrastructure projects for deeply outdated villages, clean water wells, and much much more.

You are making all of this possible.

And we’re excited to partner with you to make it a reality.

But listen... we're not just wingin' it!

For the better part of two years we’ve been on the search to pinpoint quality and reliable partners to complete our natural rubber perfect flip-flop. Not only do we have the “making” part down to a science, we also assembled “shipping and logistics” partners that we’ve rigorously tested with numerous sample runs. With our supply chain tested and complete the only missing element to the chain is YOU. Here is the timeline you can count on to deliver your Olli perfect flip-flop to your feet.

Let’s Change Flip-Flops Together 

And, while we’re at it, why not change the world together?! 

With less than the cost for a replacement charger to your iPhone - that you’ve lost for the countless time - you can help bring the first natural rubber flip-flop to life! The truth is, without you Olli can’t exist and we can’t champion the cause for fair trade across the rubber industry and hopefully across ALL industries in the near future. Let’s make brand consciousness a norm across fashion. Buy yourself a pair of extremely comfortable and simply stylish Olli perfect flip-flops.

“For 8 days I lived in these shoes, escorting me on shopping trips, beach dates, and even an afternoon spent strolling on a boardwalk spotting manatees.

The first thing I noticed was how much softer they felt than my other flip-flops.  Also, they were much more flexible and comfortable.  After wearing them for several hours I didn’t feel the fatigue in my feet that I usually get while wearing flip-flops.  I also didn’t experience the chaffing I usually do when breaking in a new pair of sandals.  It was like they were instantly broken in. Even while hiking on the boardwalk, which I typically wouldn’t do in flip-flops, I felt no discomfort.” - Natasha McKenty - Trybelle Magazine

OLLI for ALL

We know you’re not alone. There is someone you know that wants to know about Earth’s favorite flip-flop. 

Share our Fair Trade natural rubber perfect flip-flops with your friends using our share links here:

Risks and Challenges

We're excited to launch Olli, Earth’s favorite flip-flop. It's unique design is simple yet highly important. It's far more than a concept or idea, it's already a production ready flip-flop.
We have preliminary agreements in place with our manufacturers and logistic companies. But there still might be a risk of delay due to unforeseen circumstances, since challenges tend to arise during production. But we're prepared to tackle these challenges, having teamed up with product developers with decades of experience in the field.
Our mission with Olli is to make fair trade a standard with fashion brands the world over while still providing the highest quality products in the world. And we won't rest until Olli is between your toes!
story_txt:
Worn for 200 Days Straight - Still As Comfortable as Day 1.photo credit: Simply Liv & CoAs seen in: Have you ever tried to have a relaxing day at the beach, then within a few hours your feet start to hurt?You know how it is...You're with the family trying to spend a nice day at the beach. Between walking back to the car for the twentieth time because the little one forgot their such-and-such and taking a romantic walk with your significant other and the next thing you know your feet hurt.It's not even halfway through the day and your name brand flip-flops have failed you.Is that just the way it is? Do we have to expect foot pain when spending the majority of the day in flip-flops?NO!That’s exactly why we created Olli. You don't have to worry about such a story with Olli. In fact your story can have a much happier ending.Olli uses a secret ingredient that completely changes the way your foot enjoys your long days at the beach.This ingredient can greatly reduce your foot pain on a typical day out. Whether you’re at the beach or just running errands around town.What is the secret ingredient?Premium grade natural rubber tapped directly from the finest rubber trees of Sri Lanka.Why natural rubber?Well it’s a good question… to be honest I didn’t know much about it either until I started this journey to make the perfect flip-flop.Here’s what I learned about natural rubber - specifically for footwear - over the past 2 years of developing the world’s best flip-flops...It’s incredibly durable! I’ve been wearing my flip-flops for the last 200 days straight. Let’s be real I’m not the most delicate person when it comes to how I treat my flip-flops. I’ve taken these bad boys through some pretty rough terrain. Mountain roads? Been there. Sunny beaches? Done it. Errands for the day? Success! These things just don’t give out. The reason? Natural Rubber is incredibly elastic and when mixed with the right balance of other natural ingredients to make the perfect latex compound it becomes super spongy. It’s this sponginess that allows it to maintain it’s structure and remain strong no matter what you throw at it.photo credit: Leotie Lovely, @flaco_d_oro / Shane Woodward It’s super light-weight and freaking soft! Natural rubber has a silky smooth texture. The only thing I can think to describe it is silk. The stuff just feels like silk. Believe it or not, it actually looks like a perfect satin milk when it comes out of the tree. That definitely translates to more comfort on your foot. Between the cloud-like softness and the fact that they literally feel like they weigh nothing I often forget that I’m even wearing anything.It automatically molds to your foot. This was an amazing discovery! We had been playing around with different natural rubber compounds that mixed the right amount of comfort and firmness to get through everyday life adventures. I knew we had it perfect when the flip-flops were molding to my feet but still able to provide enough support to wear constantly. This is due to the fact that we use a solid half inch of our special premium natural rubber compound recipe. This provides some really cool extra added benefits…

You get support exactly where your foot needs it! Because the natural rubber is conforming to the unique curves of your foot each flip-flop provides support exactly where your foot needs it most. This is no one size fits all. You could say natural rubber has built-in smart technology that just knows your foot’s needs.

No more irritation between your toes. Raise your hand if you’ve ever worn a pair of flip-flops that irritated your toes in the area where the thong stretched between your big toe and your index toe? Go ahead I’ll wait. You can raise your hand. I learned - by the way - that part is called the “toe plug”. Get this, because our natural rubber compound provides just the right amount of soft conformity the toe plug actually molds into the shape between your toes. Which means there is no unnecessary rubbing. It’s the only way I could have worn them 200 days straight without losing all my skin!
photo credit: Konscious WhispersIt’s only harvested in special climates. Believe me when I say, “this stuff was not easy to find.” Natural rubber just doesn’t grow everywhere. We had to go to great lengths to obtain it. Actually, we even went one step further than most that use rubber - we only use fair trade natural rubber. Money directly related to the production of the Olli flip-flops.It’s not just an extra retirement fund that Sudhan is receiving. story:
Premium Design I Charging System I Organizational Pockets

For people on the go in today’s fast paced world, losing a precious charge at the wrong moment can make or break a day. The Moovy bag is a sleek, modern high-tech backpack which keeps users organized and connected, on the go.

 

 

 

Cult Of Mac: "This solar backpack is a godsend for digital nomads"

BroBible: "The next “big thing” in backpack gadgetry"

Trend Hunter: "The Moovy Bag Doubles as a Mobile Work Station"

Yanko Design: "Moovy will make your regular bag jealous"

HiConsumption: "Keep your tech stored and charged in a sleek yet powerful manner"

Journal Du Geek: "Un ingénieux sac-à-dos pour geeks nomades"

Smart Backpack carefully crafted with premium fabrics. The bag is safe, secure and dry as it is repels and blocks all intruding materials to keep your devices safe for the duration you are on the road.

It is an intelligent battery designed for the Moovy Bag, that will transform it into a portable power station. You will power any mobile devices anywhere anytime.

Automatic Detect IC Technology: Charge all your devices simultaneously and automatically optimize the charging mode of each one.

Qualcomm QC 3.0 technology: Charge faster your devices with safety functions

Power Delivery 3.0: 2 Ports type C PD 3.0 IN and OUT 45W (Max)

Li-polymer Battery: High safety, high energy density, excellent cycle performance, no memory effect, green environmental protection

What makes this battery so unique also, is the 2 input in Micro USB and USB-C. You just have to plug both cables and it will charge the whole battery within 3h00. It makes it easy to recharge anywhere (home, office, in car, outdoor).

Charge your battery with a power outlet or solar panel

Bring unlimited & renewable energy with you everywhere you go

Open your bag to recharge the battery. Thinnest and lightest solar. Only 190 grams for 12 Watts. The Moovy Solar absorbs light over the widest spectral range that means it can capture light for a longer period of time thanks to the Sunpower cells.  Sunpower is the highest efficiency solar panel on the market today. In good conditions, you can charge your Moovy battery in 9 hours.

The Solar panel charges the battery that will charge all your devices. It can be used both indoor and outdoor.

Keep Charging Easy and Organized with Moovy Charging Solutions

Moovy Bag comes with all the cables to charge any mobile devices anytime, anywhere: iPhone lightning, micro USB, and USB-C devices.

The sleek, minimalistic Moovy bag has an exceptionally built in charging solution. Each compartment has been designed for a well-organized functionality. It can charge nearly every mobile devices. 

.

Each Moovy Bag includes a universal charging cable that's compatible with all phones including Apple (Lightning) and Android  (USB-C.)

We have designed a cable compatible with all models of tablet with Apple lightning, Micro USB and USB-C connection. The cable has a rotating head with 3 connectors.

With the Moovy bag, you will always be assured of an organized bag and devices for all your commuting needs. There is two kind of material for the cover: Vegan Leather and Nylon.

Organize your essentials with a dedicated spot for everything

We create Moovy Boards to help organize your essentials. One Board for your tablet and one board for your accessories & essentials. You can use this for anything: phone, smartwatch, Bluetooth headphones or it doesn't have to be tech. When you slide the board in and out, everything is left where you expect to be.

Designed with the modern "digital nomad" in mind, this bag comes equipped with smart storage, providing organized space for everything from umbrellas to file folders.

Easy set up for umbrella or bottle compartment and Waterproof Cover

The Moovybag also has a Rfid pocket with advanced unique proprietary blocking material to protect your personal information and your Bank cards. 

Side pocket for your metro card and Retractable key-chain. 

All front pockets are well secured with selected zipper, each zipper is very strong and resistant. Don't worry if you drop your Moovy Bag, we use EVA material to absorb shocks.  EVA is the best material to absorb energy from impacts. Also the battery is safely surrounded by an extra layer foam all the way around. The shock absorbent lining ensures that your devices stay safe all day long.

For the urban worker, the professional, the student – anyone who needs that constant connection and just can’t afford that dead battery alert – the Moovy bag is here to keep you linked to the outside world.

We designed the Moovy Bag because we wanted a sleek, rugged, stylish backpack to use while we're walking into meetings in different major cities. Then we made is super-functional, adding a full device charging system. Without compromising the look, weight, or what we call carry-ability.

Flexible straps that switch easily from backpack to shoulder or carry.

 

 

WHAT THEY SAY ABOUT THE MOOVY BAG

THANK YOU DEAR BACKERS

 

Analyst's Choice for innovative products at Hong Kong Electronics Fair

 

We are Julien Long and Bruno Lin, founders of OUI Smart, a company dedicated to delivering sustainable, high quality tech solutions that improve everyday life, and creators of the game changing Moovy bag. 

 

 

 

PRODUCT WARRANTY

THE MOOVY BAG - 1 Year warranty against any manufacturing defects.

THE HIGH TECH FEATURES - 1 Year warranty as per standard international agreements on electronics. It is not our policy to offer refunds or returns on items received as Kickstarter rewards. We will consider exchanges on a case-by-case basis. 

SHIPPING, VAT, CUSTOMS & DUTIES:

European pledge include VAT and custom duties paid. For other countries, VAT, GST, or other country taxes are not included. For european orders, we will import the goods in France and ship from France warehouse, so no import duty or VAT will be applied to the european orders.

All order will ship directly from our distributions centers in France, China and the US. Each package will come with a tracking number and we will be happy to help solve any problems that arise during the shipping processes. 
You will receive a survey to fill your information (address, receiver name, phone number, European or US plug etc.) after you pre ordered.

Thank you for your support!
