story:
Thank you for making us the most successful exoskeleton project on crowdfunded! 

Almost all of us have suffered from bad posture, felt fatigued on long commutes and weighed down by heavy backpacks. These physical issues are vexing, ever-present and cannot be solved by smartphone applications or digital gadgets.

The LEX is a bionic wearable that enhances posture, comfort, and life. It is designed to let you relax anywhere with a perfect sitting posture and protect your shoulders while on the move by making the backpack feels almost weightless. 

 
The LEX weighs a little more than 1 kilogram so it can be worn comfortably at all times. In just a few steps, the LEX turns into an ergonomic chair built to withstand up to 120 kilograms (264 lbs) of weight. Immediately feels relaxed as your back straighten and breathing becomes easier the moment you sit. The longer you use the LEX, the posture improvement will give you long-term physical benefits.

When you are on the move, our one-of-a-kind load-transfer module will shift the weight of your backpack from your shoulders to the core of your body, ensuring comfort while reducing the risk of long-term injuries.

 

 

Our goal in creating the LEX is to use our background in robotics and exoskeleton to enhance lives in new, exciting ways. 

Correct posture is very important to our well-being. Going through life with a wrong posture will give you soreness and physical pain while sitting or standing with a correct posture helps avoid stress, injury and gives our body and mind powerful boosts. The LEX always correct and improve your posture whether sitting, standing and on the move. 

 

The science of posture is heavily researched and widely understood but the challenge has always been how to constantly maintain the correct posture while we go about our daily life. We know from our own experience and numerous studies that posture-related injuries among urban dwellers are usually caused by a long period of slouching in office chairs, the inability to rest during long commutes and shoulders strain from carrying heavy backpacks daily.

 

 

We created the LEX as a bionic chair that allows you to rest anywhere you want with a posture that creates a positive impact on your body. The way the LEX automatically adjusts your sitting posture is based on extensive research to create a natural resting position where the back remains upright while the thighs bend forward with the feet firmly planted on the ground to reduce the burden placed on the buttock. This position helps relax the muscles, encourage easy breathing and relieve pressure on the stomach.

 

 

This sitting position achieved by the LEX also gives the wearer higher mobility to shift between sitting and standing, making life less sedentary and more active.

 

 

Another key feature of the LEX is the innovative load-transfer module that shifts 50% of the backpack weight from the shoulders to the core of your body.

Backpacks cause more than the short-term strain on your shoulders while commuting, prolonged use of backpacks can create serious injuries and chronic pain. 

To prevent this, the LEX load-transfer module works by extending a flexible panel upwards to hold the weight of the backpack and transfer it to the LEX unit worn around the waist. This lessens the load put on the shoulders and makes the backpack feels weightless, creating an amazing feeling of relaxation while you are on the move.

With these 3 main features designed specifically to enhance the wearer's posture, comfort, and endurance. The LEX opens a door to the future where human augmentation and improvement can be gained on-demand and off-the-shelf.

 

 

Hear it from our Beta Testers.

Simplicity is the essence of our design philosophy. We want the LEX to be easy to put-on, wear and take off for a wide range of sex and age. It must be easy to put on as another piece of clothing.

Many hours were spent to design the shape of the components and how to place them so it gives the wearer full freedom of movement. At the same time, we ensure that wearers can effortlessly put on the LEX.

To wear the LEX, just 3 straps are needed to fits the LEX with your body just like a belt or backpack. When in folding mode, the LEX can barely be seen from the side. 

 

 

To deploy the LEX in sitting position is beyond simple, our patent-pending Swiftsit technology is designed to let you sit down with a natural, perfect sitting from a folding position in 5 seconds.

 

 

When you want to be on your way, pull the LEX back up and fold it discreetly.

To use the load-transfer module. Put on your backpack then wrap the load-transfer distribution module strap across your backpack starting at either side of your waist. Once the strap is fastened around your backpack, you will immediately feel the weight on your shoulders disappear.

You can use the load-transfer module even while sitting so long queues won't hurt your shoulders.

 

The LEX also includes a hook for convenient hanging and the whole unit can be rolled up when not in use.

 

 

We want to build an exoskeleton that looks and feel cool, can stand up to 120 Kilogram (264 lbs) of weight, yet lightweight enough to be easily worn all day and realistic to manufacture with today's technology at an affordable price.

The LEX exoskeleton is built from the ground up incorporating many advanced design elements to ensure that it can meet an uncompromising ergonomic requirement. 

The grooves and channel cut into the aircraft-grade aluminum frame helps reduce weight to a bare minimum but is meticulously calculated to maintain strength and integrity enough to withstand daily use. 

Non-allergic materials are carefully selected then manually grafted onto the frame. The thinnest and most comfortable memory foam were sourced and integrated into the seat to make sure every posture perfect moment is a comfortable one.

The LEX is made to be safe and the sitting angle is recoverable, this means unlike traditional 90-degree body and thigh sitting posture, you can easily stand up should you lose your balance.

Our team has spent the past decade delivering engineering hardware and software products to some of the world's largest companies and the best standards are maintained throughout the entire design and manufacturing process.

 

The LEX can be used every day in all types of scenarios as it constantly enhances your posture and comfort in a way no other wearable can. 

The LEX is your extra pair of legs whenever you want to sit and an extra set of shoulders whenever you have to commute. The only limit is where you want to go.

 

 

There has never been a more awesome way to sit and carry backpacks healthily and we want you to wear the LEX in your own way.

Choose between 4 colors and 3 sizes to match your body type and lifestyles. Make the LEX stands out with bright, bold colors or picks a darker tone to make it blend effortlessly with your work cloth.

 

Our 4 colors, Titan Black, Yaksa Red, Jovian Orange, and Jotunn Blue makes the LEX not just an essential daily item, but also one of the coolest too! 

We spent more than a year doing research and development, we have decided to launch when it was certain the LEX can be delivered to you safely, affordable and on-time.  

The design has gone through multiple iterations and you can see some of them in our blogs and website. The LEX design represents the limit of what can be achieved with today's bionic chair exoskeleton technology. 

What we need now is to partner with you, our backers to reach a minimum order so our manufacturing vendor can begin production. After the production starts we will work to ensure that all orders are fulfilled within 12 to 16 weeks.

We look forward to putting on the future with you. It is an honor and a privilege to be on Indiegogo. Thank you again for supporting us!
story_txt:
Thank you for making us the most successful exoskeleton project on crowdfunded! Almost all of us have suffered from bad posture, felt fatigued on long commutes and weighed down by heavy backpacks. These physical issues are vexing, ever-present and cannot be solved by smartphone applications or digital gadgets.The LEX is a bionic wearable that enhances posture, comfort, and life. It is designed to let you relax anywhere with a perfect sitting posture and protect your shoulders while on the move by making the backpack feels almost weightless. 

 
The LEX weighs a little more than 1 kilogram so it can be worn comfortably at all times. In just a few steps, the LEX turns into an ergonomic chair built to withstand up to 120 kilograms (264 lbs) of weight. Immediately feels relaxed as your back straighten and breathing becomes easier the moment you sit. The longer you use the LEX, the posture improvement will give you long-term physical benefits.
When you are on the move, our one-of-a-kind load-transfer module will shift the weight of your backpack from your shoulders to the core of your body, ensuring comfort while reducing the risk of long-term injuries. 
  Our goal in creating the LEX is to use our background in robotics and exoskeleton to enhance lives in new, exciting ways. Correct posture is very important to our well-being. Going through life with a wrong posture will give you soreness and physical pain while sitting or standing with a correct posture helps avoid stress, injury and gives our body and mind powerful boosts. The LEX always correct and improve your posture whether sitting, standing and on the move.  
 The science of posture is heavily researched and widely understood but the challenge has always been how to constantly maintain the correct posture while we go about our daily life. We know from our own experience and numerous studies that posture-related injuries among urban dwellers are usually caused by a long period of slouching in office chairs, the inability to rest during long commutes and shoulders strain from carrying heavy backpacks daily.  We created the LEX as a bionic chair that allows you to rest anywhere you want with a posture that creates a positive impact on your body. The way the LEX automatically adjusts your sitting posture is based on extensive research to create a natural resting position where the back remains upright while the thighs bend forward with the feet firmly planted on the ground to reduce the burden placed on the buttock. This position helps relax the muscles, encourage easy breathing and relieve pressure on the stomach.  This sitting position achieved by the LEX also gives the wearer higher mobility to shift between sitting and standing, making life less sedentary and more active.  Another key feature of the LEX is the innovative load-transfer module that shifts 50% of the backpack weight from the shoulders to the core of your body.Backpacks cause more than the short-term strain on your shoulders while commuting, prolonged use of backpacks can create serious injuries and chronic pain. To prevent this, the LEX load-transfer module works by extending a flexible panel upwards to hold the weight of the backpack and transfer it to the LEX unit worn around the waist. This lessens the load put on the shoulders and makes the backpack feels weightless, creating an amazing feeling of relaxation while you are on the move.With these 3 main features designed specifically to enhance the wearer's posture, comfort, and endurance. The LEX opens a door to the future where human augmentation and improvement can be gained on-demand and off-the-shelf.  Hear it from our Beta Testers.

story:
My name is Shannon McDonald and I am the Owner and Artist behind this project. This line of purses brings my paintings to life and into your everyday wardrobe. This entire project has been designed, printed and manufactured in the United States. When I say manufacturing this is really a small production of 50 purses with 6 different prints. So you are getting a true piece of art. This project is so important to me as I have been working on it for the last year and a half. I have stockpiled books of my drawings and paintings and decided on these 6 prints to introduce to the world.

What I Need & What You Get

In order to fully fund this project I am asking for $3,600.00. The funds break down as follows. The scanning of original paintings, paying a Digital Tech Photoshop time ($100 per hour), video production and marketing materials (hang tags, tassels, business cards, ect)  total: $1320.00 Printing the fabric, lining, zippers, tassels and  sew-in labels total $1210.00. The manufacturing which includes the sewing and assembly totals $1000.00.

There are different levels of support for this project. They range from a thank you on my website to a purse at a discounted rate. Buy the purses before they are going to be up in my shop and in stores. Be the first to own these new designs!

DIGITAL THANK YOU ON MY WEBSITE:

POSTCARD PACKAGE:

GREEN EVIL EYE PILLOW:

BLUE OCEAN EVIL EYE PILLOW:

BUNDLE PACKAGE:


 DESIGN OPTIONS: 

If this project is not fully funded the proceeds will go to the final payment of production.

The Impact

By purchasing one of the perks you are helping an artist’s vision come true. These purses have been in the works for the past year. I always thought about this project and one day I decided to take a leap. Being an artist is about pushing yourself and your work beyond your comfort zone. The impact? This is twofold, the first, being the success of funding this project and creating this line of accessories. The second impact: knowing that people supported me through this process and believed in it as much as I did. Of course that impact relates solely to me but both make such a difference in my life.

To give you an idea of my history I will fill you in on the details. Currently, I work full time and have an Etsy store called McDonald Mixed Media. I started making small clay bowls about 1.5 years ago. In that year and a half I have accomplished hundreds of sales (nationally & international) and wholesale to 11 stores (10 USA based, 1 Belgium). I have grown my social media followers by 500 people and continue to grow. I have worked hard to make my business life a success and take pride in my work.

Everything I create must pass my rigid standards and I will not accept an inferior product. I interviewed several companies before deciding on Marie from Moran & Motherway. I felt such a strong connection with Marie, the owner, and her excitement for my project. She has been a wealth of knowledge and simple great to talk to. Also, it is amazing to be able to support another small business owner. She is located in Brockton and I can stop, email or text her with questions I have and discuss ideas with her.

Risks & Challenges

There is little risk involved in funding this project. No matter how much funding I receive I will continue with this project. Your help is super important as I need your support. By getting in at the ground level of this project you are getting access to these beautiful purses at a discount and helping me accomplish this dream.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate please help me share this project! Set up a telephone hotline in my honor, buy a billboard or send out some smoke signals! Any sharing via social media like your blog, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Snapchat, Twitter, Tumblr or all of them would be much appreciated!!!

Thank you with all my heart,
Shannon

story:
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!

We added Faux Fur Neck Warmers! ($15)

Your favorite blogger loves our campaign!

-Marzia Bisognin(a.k.a. CutiePieMarzia) Via Instagram: @itsmarziapie

-Aino Rossi (Uino) via her blog & Facebook

-Sarah Hawkinson via Instagram: @sarahhawkinson
-Sarah Hawkinson via Youtube: @Sarahhawkinson

Get the Kate Moss/Rita Ora look for less, and also save a cat in the process! 

Kate Moss in Marc Jacobs' Striped fur coat ($6,500) 
- Source: La Model Mafia

Rita Ora in DKNY's striped faux fur coat ($651)
-Source: Splash

Also don't miss the faux fur clutch trend in 2014!

"A faux fur fold-over clutch is a definite nod to the Autumn/Winter 2014 catwalk scene and will earn you serious style points. Especially if you've got the outerwear to go with it."
-Daisy May Sitch, for MyDaily  (link)

Shrimps faux fur clutches ($289 - $304)
-Source: Dissecting The Look



The Coat

We proudly present you the Ragdoll Tabby Faux Fur Coat! Its soft white fur and black stripes were designed to represent the cute and ever-fluffy ragdoll tabby cat. 

Our coat is made of high-quality faux fur (ethically sourced as well!), with Storets' famous coat pattern that gives you a slim & feminine silhouette even though the coat is thick and cozy. 

The Neighborhood Cats Embroidery

Inside the coat, you can find a Neighborhood Cats logo embroidery at the right-hand bottom lining of the coat. Surrounding their iconic logo, we embroidered "Save a Cat with Passion for Fashion," which is what you will be doing by buying this coat and wearing it around. The embroidery is done directly on the lining with high-quality silk thread, making a polished and luxury detail. People can catch a glimpse of this as you move around with the coat on or take it off, making it a good conversation starter. Go ahead and proudly flaunt it around, so the world can know that you helped save a cat. 

Our Shorthair faux fur clutch comes out in two colors - Tabby and Cream. It's named after - you guessed it ― a shorthair breed of cats. The soft texture and warm fluffiness will have you petting it on your lap all day! Just like a cat!


Hi. My name is Bo, the founder and CEO of Storets. Storets is an online fashion brand that provides sophisticated, yet fun clothes for women. 
I am an avid animal lover, and I make sure our brand shows this by shamelessly showing our faux fur items to be better than the real deal. 
This season, we partnered up with Neighborhood Cats, a charity helping feral cats, to make a coat that can actually save cats. Our limited-edition Ragdoll Tabby Faux Fur Coat was designed for cat-lovers who want to look stylish, while providing help to the cats in need. 

Other than the stylish black & white look and the stunning, luxurious faux fur, we added a not-so-secret embroidery in the inside of the coat that tells the world you saved a cat!

How can a coat save a cat?

It's quite simple! All of our proceeds from this coat will be going to our partner, Neighborhood Cats! If you buy one coat, you are directly funding a veterinary appointment for 1 kitten. With a purchase of one clutch, you are providing an insulated shelter that will keep 4 cats warm in the harsh winter weather. 

Storets is a women's fashion brand that promises you to deliver sophisticated yet fun clothing items to your doorstep. We've been in the fashion business since 2009, and in the meantime, we were able to dress some high-profile fashion gurus as well! 

Storets Reviews

"I have nothing but good things to say about Storets.com. Seriously, everything I get from them I love. This skirt makes all my leather skirt dreams come true!"
-Ashley Madekwe, blogger (Ring My Bell)

"Storets faux fur coat: I have it in all colours and cannot live without"
-Chiara Ferragni, blogger (The Blonde Salad)

    Feral cats can be found in every community, whether urban, rural or suburban.  No one knows exactly how many there are, but because they can survive in most climates and conditions, estimates in the United States alone run into the tens of millions.  Because they are mostly afraid of close contact with people, they are not suitable as pets and their typical fate when brought to an animal shelter is euthanasia.  At the same time, they are not completely wild and, though living outdoors on their own, they still rely on people for food and shelter from the elements.  Without this support, their lives are short and difficult.


    Trap-Neuter-Return, or “TNR,” is a way to help feral cats.  The cats are spayed or neutered, vaccinated against rabies, marked for identification and provided ongoing care in their outdoor homes by caretakers.  No longer able to reproduce, the cats’ numbers decline over time, lessening their impact on the environment.   The cats themselves, once fixed, are healthier and become better neighbors, making less noise and becoming less visible.   When enough of the cats are TNR’d in a community, their offspring no longer flood local shelters, thus bringing down euthanasia rates.  TNR is the most humane and effective approach to managing feral cats and is truly a community solution.


    Neighborhood Cats began with one colony of feral cats in 1999 and has grown to become New York City’s primary resource for feral cat care, and a national and international leader in education and advocacy of TNR. 
    On the ground in New York, Neighborhood Cats staff and volunteers have trapped, spayed or neutered and cared for tens of thousands of cats. The organization has taken the practical knowledge gained from their hands-on experience and created numerous educational materials, including books, videos and their website.  They have worked closely with manufacturers to create equipment especially designed for feral cats, such as traps and carriers, and provide scholarships to veterinarians to learn high volume spay/neuter techniques.  
    Everything Neighborhood Cats does is aimed at making TNR the accepted, normal approach to managing feral cats everywhere.

    *These are the awesome guys that made it all happen! 

    1. $15 ― Don't need a coat? 
      2. We'll send your generous donation directly to Neighborhood Cats. Your contribution will directly vaccinate one cat against rabies. Thank you so much for your generous donation!
    2. $18 ― Faux Fur Neck Warmer

      3. Get your faux fur neck warmer (available in 4 colors) at a bargain! 

    3. $30 ― BOGO Faux Fur Neck Warmer
    4. $85 ― Shorthair Faux Fur Clutch + 5% STORETS Discount

      5.  

       A high-quality faux fur clutch to carry your belongings in style! One purchase of our clutch means one insulated winter house for 4 kittens to keep warm. 

    5. $130 ― BOGO Clutches! + 5% STORETS Discount
      6. Buy One Gift One Faux fur clutch and spread the love! You will be donating two warm houses and give 8 kittens a warm home.
    6. $240 ― Ragdoll Tabby Faux Fur Coat + 5% STORETS Discount

      7. Get Storets' exclusive, limited edition quality faux fur coat! Also by choosing this perk, you are directly giving a kitten its first health checkup ensuring a healthy start in life.
    7. $300 ― Ragdoll Coat & Shorthair Clutch + 5% STORETS Discount

      8. You're in for the whole deal! Get both the coat & clutch set and you'll be warm and ready for the holiday season! Also, you will be gifting a health checkup as well as an insulated winter house! You just helped save 5 cats! That's awesome!

    8. $600 ― Custom stitch & x2 Donation! + 10% STORETS Discount

      9. You are awesome!! You get the Ragdoll Faux Fur Coat as well as the handwarmer with this perk. We'll add a high-quality custom stitch of your name, your loved one's name, or any writing you want on your coat! Also by selecting this perk, you are actually doubling the amount of funds that go to saving kittens. We send you virtual hugs and kisses for your generosity. Email holim.wang@storets.com with what you would like your custom stitch to say. 
    9. $800 ― FAUX FUR MANIA + 10% STORETS Discount

      10. So, you're really into the faux fur look and would like a full wardrobe? We'll send you 3 different designs of fur coats (including our Ragdoll Tabby faux fur coat) PLUS an exclusive blouse that's not for individual sale on our site. You can check the other faux fur coats at our website's "Faux Fur" category. Choose two more coats and send us an email at holim.wang@storets.com! (Neighborhood Cat Stitch is not included in the other faux fur coats)
    10. $1,080 ― Shopowner's option

      11. This is a perk for shopowners willing to carry our famous faux fur coats! 3 types of coats, 3 items each! You can choose the additional two coats from our website's "Faux Fur" category. Our coats are high quality, and perfect for display for the holiday season! (Neighborhood Cat Stitch is not included in the other faux fur coats) Also, please give us an email if you are interested in further wholesale! 

    How will the coat arrive to me?

    We use expedited shipping (EMS, DHL, FedEx, SF Express, etc.) So you can expect to find your package at your doorstep 2-5 business days after dispatch. 
    We will need your signature once the product arrives to make sure that the delivery was successful.  Because of this, we cannot send your package to a P.O. box or A.P.O ((because we need to get your signature!). Kindly provide your home or office address instead! We thank you in advance! 
    Please note that you will be responsible for any applicable VAT/duty charges. 

    How long will it take for my order to arrive? 

    We'll try to ship your order as soon as we receive a contribution. 

    However, for the first 20 coat orders of your size, there may be a delay due to minimum production requirement. We'll let you know as soon as your product is sent!

    Is there a charge for international shipping? 

    No! It doesn't matter where you live, we'll send it to you anywhere you live. Storets is all about delivering reasonably-priced, high-quality fashion fast. Except for the faux fur neck warmers (because they're such a discount!), no extra shipping costs are added. 

    What is the measurement of the coat? 

    Sizes are available in Small, Medium, and Large. 

    Small size flat measurements: 

    Bust: 19.75in (50cm)

    Length: 29in (75cm)

    Once you have contributed to a perk, please follow this link (http://goo.gl/forms/Tm5IxZc5RO) and enter your email and order information (size, color etc). We'll match it with our contribution list and send out your desired size. 

    We'd love to hear from you! But please read the FAQs first. Most of your questions should be there. (Also please check out our homepage's customer care menu for general shipping & payment information)
    Backers: sy.kim@storets.com
    Business Enquiries: by@storets.com
    Press Enquiries: holim.wang@storets.com
    Bless your heart for reading through until the end! Please share with your friends and get the word out about us! 

    #FakeItForTheCats

Hi. My name is Bo, the founder and CEO of Storets. Storets is an online fashion brand that provides sophisticated, yet fun clothes for women. 
I am an avid animal lover, and I make sure our brand shows this by shamelessly showing our faux fur items to be better than the real deal. 
This season, we partnered up with Neighborhood Cats, a charity helping feral cats, to make a coat that can actually save cats. Our limited-edition Ragdoll Tabby Faux Fur Coat was designed for cat-lovers who want to look stylish, while providing help to the cats in need. 

Other than the stylish black & white look and the stunning, luxurious faux fur, we added a not-so-secret embroidery in the inside of the coat that tells the world you saved a cat!


How can a coat save a cat?

It's quite simple! All of our proceeds from this coat will be going to our partner, Neighborhood Cats! If you buy one coat, you are directly funding a veterinary appointment for 1 kitten. With a purchase of one clutch, you are providing an insulated shelter that will keep 4 cats warm in the harsh winter weather. 


Storets is a women's fashion brand that promises you to deliver sophisticated yet fun clothing items to your doorstep. We've been in the fashion business since 2009, and in the meantime, we were able to dress some high-profile fashion gurus as well! 
Storets Reviews



"I have nothing but good things to say about Storets.com. Seriously, everything I get from them I love. This skirt makes all my leather skirt dreams come true!"-Ashley Madekwe, blogger (Ring My Bell)






"Storets faux fur coat: I have it in all colours and cannot live without"-Chiara Ferragni, blogger (The Blonde Salad)
  










Feral cats can be found in every community, whether urban, rural or suburban.  No one knows exactly how many there are, but because they can survive in most climates and conditions, estimates in the United States alone run into the tens of millions.  Because they are mostly afraid of close contact with people, they are not suitable as pets and their typical fate when brought to an animal shelter is euthanasia.  At the same time, they are not completely wild and, though living outdoors on their own, they still rely on people for food and shelter from the elements.  Without this support, their lives are short and difficult.
Trap-Neuter-Return, or “TNR,” is a way to help feral cats.  The cats are spayed or neutered, vaccinated against rabies, marked for identification and provided ongoing care in their outdoor homes by caretakers.  No longer able to reproduce, the cats’ numbers decline over time, lessening their impact on the environment.   The cats themselves, once fixed, are healthier and become better neighbors, making less noise and becoming less visible.   When enough of the cats are TNR’d in a community, their offspring no longer flood local shelters, thus bringing down euthanasia rates.  TNR is the most humane and effective approach to managing feral cats and is truly a community solution.




 Neighborhood Cats began with one colony of feral cats in 1999 and has grown to become New York City’s primary resource for feral cat care, and a national and international leader in education and advocacy of TNR. 
On the ground in New York, Neighborhood Cats staff and volunteers have trapped, spayed or neutered and cared for tens of thousands of cats. The organization has taken the practical knowledge gained from their hands-on experience and created numerous educational materials, including books, videos and their website.  They have worked closely with manufacturers to create equipment especially designed for feral cats, such as traps and carriers, and provide scholarships to veterinarians to learn high volume spay/neuter techniques.  

Everything Neighborhood Cats does is aimed at making TNR the accepted, normal approach to managing feral cats everywhere.


*These are the awesome guys that made it all happen! 






$15 ― Don't need a coat? 
We'll send your generous donation directly to Neighborhood Cats. Your contribution will directly vaccinate one cat against rabies. Thank you so much for your generous donation!$18 ― Faux Fur Neck Warmer
Get your faux fur neck warmer (available in 4 colors) at a bargain! 


$30 ― BOGO Faux Fur Neck Warmer
$85 ― Shorthair Faux Fur Clutch + 5% STORETS Discount


  A high-quality faux fur clutch to carry your belongings in style! One purchase of our clutch means one insulated winter house for 4 kittens to keep warm. 
$130 ― BOGO Clutches! + 5% STORETS Discount
Buy One Gift One Faux fur clutch and spread the love! You will be donating two warm houses and give 8 kittens a warm home.$240 ― Ragdoll Tabby Faux Fur Coat + 5% STORETS Discount
Get Storets' exclusive, limited edition quality faux fur coat! Also by choosing this perk, you are directly giving a kitten its first health checkup ensuring a healthy start in life.$300 ― Ragdoll Coat & Shorthair Clutch + 5% STORETS Discount
You're in for the whole deal! Get both the coat & clutch set and you'll be warm and ready for the holiday season! Also, you will be gifting a health checkup as well as an insulated winter house! You just helped save 5 cats! That's awesome!
$600 ― Custom stitch & x2 Donation! + 10% STORETS Discount
You are awesome!! You get the Ragdoll Faux Fur Coat as well as the handwarmer with this perk. We'll add a high-quality custom stitch of your name, your loved one's name, or any writing you want on your coat! Also by selecting this perk, you are actually doubling the amount of funds that go to saving kittens. We send you virtual hugs and kisses for your generosity.  Email holim.wang@storets.com with what you would like your custom stitch to say. $800 ― FAUX FUR MANIA + 10% STORETS Discount

So, you're really into the faux fur look and would like a full wardrobe? We'll send you 3 different designs of fur coats (including our Ragdoll Tabby faux fur coat) PLUS an exclusive blouse that's not for individual sale on our site. You can check the other faux fur coats at our website's "Faux Fur" category. Choose two more coats and send us an email at holim.wang@storets.com! (Neighborhood Cat Stitch is not included in the other faux fur coats)
$1,080 ― Shopowner's option
This is a perk for shopowners willing to carry our famous faux fur coats! 3 types of coats, 3 items each! You can choose the additional two coats from our website's "Faux Fur" category. Our coats are high quality, and perfect for display for the holiday season! (Neighborhood Cat Stitch is not included in the other faux fur coats) Also, please give us an email if you are interested in further wholesale! 



How will the coat arrive to me?
We use expedited shipping (EMS, DHL, FedEx, SF Express, etc.) So you can expect to find your package at your doorstep 2-5 business days after dispatch. 
We will need your signature once the product arrives to make sure that the delivery was successful.  Because of this, we cannot send your package to a P.O. box or A.P.O ((because we need to get your signature!). Kindly provide your home or office address instead! We thank you in advance! 
Please note that you will be responsible for any applicable VAT/duty charges. 
How long will it take for my order to arrive? 
We'll try to ship your order as soon as we receive a contribution. 
However, for the first 20 coat orders of your size, there may be a delay due to minimum production requirement. We'll let you know as soon as your product is sent!
Is there a charge for international shipping? 
No! It doesn't matter where you live, we'll send it to you anywhere you live. Storets is all about delivering reasonably-priced, high-quality fashion fast. Except for the faux fur neck warmers (because they're such a discount!), no extra shipping costs are added. 
What is the measurement of the coat? 
Sizes are available in Small, Medium, and Large. 
Small size flat measurements: 
Bust: 19.75in (50cm)
Length: 29in (75cm)
Once you have contributed to a perk, please follow this link (http://goo.gl/forms/Tm5IxZc5RO) and enter your email and order information (size, color etc). We'll match it with our contribution list and send out your desired size. 
We'd love to hear from you! But please read the FAQs first. Most of your questions should be there. (Also please check out our homepage's customer care menu for general shipping & payment information)

Backers: sy.kim@storets.com

Business Enquiries: by@storets.com

Press Enquiries: holim.wang@storets.com
Bless your heart for reading through until the end! Please share with your friends and get the word out about us! 

#FakeItForTheCats

story:
Hello and welcome to the latest project by Pegasus Watches Venezia. We aim to disrupt the luxury watch concept by offering exclusive Italian timepieces at a fraction of their retail price. We are convinced that a consumer should only pay for the quality of the watch and not for all costs related to distribution such as agent fees and traditional retail markup.

The traditional distribution channel is based on different steps, involving extra costs for the final customer. We do things in a different way: we cut this chain. By skipping any intermediary we are able to offer you an exclusive Italian luxury watch at the price of €199.

We are convinced that great attention to every detail is fundamental in order to create a high-end watch. This ambitious result can only be achieved with the handwork of skilled artisans.

Our Prometeo watch will be a masterpiece on your wrist. Sounds interesting? So keep reading.

MANUFACTURING

As you can see from the pictures we have taken, we pay great attention to details. This result has been possible thanks to the cooperation with experienced watch manufacturers that have produced luxury watches for notorious brands. All the stages of the process aim at removing even the smallest imperfection. Once the assembly process is concluded, watches pass through the quality control department. Here all the components are inspected. Only the watches that meet the specifications can pass this stage. No mistake is tolerated. 

 

TECHNICAL INFO 

CASE: 316L stainless steel, Ø40,5mm

MOVEMENT: Automatic 821A Miyota (Citizen) made in Japan

GLASS: Double domed sapphire glass

INDEXES: Diamond cut indexes

WATER RESISTANT: 10ATM (100 meters)

STRAP: Handcrafted Italian Leather

The Prometeo watch is made of 316L solid stainless steel. This material can be successfully used in the horology field since it offers high resistance to corrosion and shock.The 316L stainless steel, thanks to its amazing properties, is used in marine environments.

The sapphire glass is a crystal that requires a long and expensive procedure. By the way, amazing results are never easy to get! If you want to produce it you need to crystallize corundum, or aluminum oxide, at temperatures of 4000° F and then you have to mold the mixture into clear disks.These disks are then processed to obtain the proper crystal size, finally polished, and made perfectly fit to the watch case.

The result is a transparent crystal that cannot be scratched by any material with the only exception of the diamond.

In fact, sapphire has a hardness of 9 on the Mohs scale, ranging from 1 to 10, and is surpassed in hardness only by diamonds. The major advantages of sapphire and the drawbacks of mineral crystals are summed up in the table above. 

Calibre 821A used in the Prometeo watch is an accurate high-spec, Japan-made automatic movement (42-hour power reserve).

Stones or jewels were used in the horology field in order to reduce friction at the points of heaviest friction so that the automatic heart of the watch can work efficiently for longer periods.

Therefore, watchmakers have decided to use rubies in order to prevent the metal-on-metal wear. They have been chosen because their hardness on the mohs scale is similar to the one of diamonds.

Leather processing is an ancient procedure dating back to prehistoric times when leather was used for human protection from weathering. The tanning process consists of several stages:

Preservation: after being flayed, leather is treated with salt and then dried so that as much water as possible is eliminated in order to protect it from the attack of bacteria and microorganisms.

Preparation to tanning through rehydratation: that is the reacquisition of the water lost in the previous stage; liming and further finishing operations.

Tanning: chemical process that prevents water from putrefying by placing it in wooden barrels that turn around.

Post Tanning: used for improving the appearance of leather

All the types of leather used are from Veneto and Tuscany, two well known Italian tannery districts. Therefore, thanks to the expertise of our local and skilled artisans we provide soft, vintage and durable straps.

The hides we use are tanned according to traditional, natural methods, without colourings, chrome, formaldehyde and pentachlorophenol and they are processed in compliance with current laws. 

 

WHICH DESIGNS CAN I CHOOSE? 

All combinations are possible, here is a reference chart. All backers will be free to choose the designs by filling a survey that will be sent out once our project ends.

Pegasus Venezia wooden boxes and packaging have a unique flavor that goes beyond standard shapes and manufacturing solutions. Our design, is, in fact, inspired by tradition.

For the production of our boxes we rely on a craft company that was established in the heart of the "Chair District" in Friuli, a region where woodworking is not only part of local history and culture but also represents an international trademark associated with the excellence of “Made in Italy” products. With over 40 years of woodworking experience they have become partner of many leading wine and spirit producers, combining of craftsmanship, technology and special attention to design.

The traditional distribution channel is based on different steps, involving extra costs for the final customer. We do things in a different way: we cut this chain. Our prices derive just from the fine components we use for our watches.

Our customers only pay for the quality of the watch and not for all the costs related to distribution such as agent fees and traditional retail markups. The chart below provides an insight into our costs.

FAQ 

The movement: When do I need to change the battery? NEVER! The watch has a mechanical movement that is powered by you.

The movement: Why did you decide on Japanese movements for the Pegasus Prometeo collection? Well, the Japanese movements are just as reliable as any ETA movement - if not even more reliable! If we did use an ETA movement the watch would have almost doubled the final cost of the product. 

When will my card be charged? If you’re new to Indiegogo this might be confusing to you but here all cards will be charged as soon as the campaign has been officially funded and the time has ran out on the campaign. You should see a charge on your account 3-5 days after the campaign ends

How long will my watch be warranted? We will work with all customers case by case but all watch movements will be insured for up to a year after the campaign ends. We cannot warrant customers who break their watches due to wear and tear.

Do all backers benefit from Stretch Goals? Absolutely. It doesn't matter if you were the first or the last to back our project, all backers qualify for the stretch goals.

Who do you use for shipping international orders? We use DHL Express for all international and domestic shipments (excluding PO Box addresses).

Risks and challenges

Prometeo will be not only the third timepiece we have produced but also the third crowd-funding project that we have launched. As it is possible to see from our previous Kickstarter campaign, we have successfully delivered every single watch well in advance. We have received a very positive feedback from our backers. 
Issues can always happen, however we can assure you that you will have a wonderful and solid customer experience with us.

story:
Universal Gesture Control Interface for Your Wrist

GyroPalm is a patented wearable gesture control system for your wrist, unprecedented in the world, that empowers you to control electronics, computers, appliances, robotics, and IoT devices with a flick of the wrist! With our wearable, and in some cases with our base too, users can control devices and drones within 3,000 feet. With WiFi setup in advance, users can even control these items in different parts of the world. Our wearable also has most, if not all, of the functions of a typical smartwatch, such as step tracking, notifications, temperature indication, etc.

GyroPalm is the trend for tomorrow, the next-generation smartwatch! According to the editor of GadgetFlow, "It's a connected smartwatch that is actually smarter than the rest."
 


There are three aspects of the product: a wristband, the GyroPalm cloud platform, and one or more hardware-based accessories. GyroPalm is easy to be used out of the box. Most people can adequately use GyroPalm through 4 or 5 simple preset motions. Moreover, you can create customizable gestures to be mapped to various actions as you desire.

For advanced users, GyroPalm features a dedicated IDE programming environment that allows them to extend the functionality of the wearable.
 

 

 


 



 

Simplify your daily routines & enhance your lifestyle


GyroPalm is a patented wearable gesture-control system which is versatile, robust, and customizable. Essentially, GyroPalm gives meaning to hand motions and provides a platform for users to interact with known devices in new yet intuitive ways.

Our technology can be suitable for many people for leisure, convenience, and use in the industry. Most users such as gamers, home automation enthusiasts, developers, and the elderly would appreciate the flexibility provided by our gesture-controlled platform.
 


The universal interface of GyroPalm revolves around gesture recognition. Hand gestures have been a medium of human-to-human communication for over a thousand years. GyroPalm aims to achieve human-device interaction through a language that is not spoken, but rather conveyed by motions which can be performed in either a subtle or explicit manner. Occasionally, gestures are a convenient way to quickly communicate with another person depending on the situation or location. Likewise, the same can be applied to controlling devices around your home or office in a pleasant and seamless manner.

Today, GyroPalm empowers you to interact with devices around you with single-hand gestures, even in noisy and/or dark environments. 
 


Superpowers at the flick of your wrist

GyroPalm is a wearable device that allows anyone to control electronic devices, appliances, computers, smartphones, smartlock, and robotics with a flick of the wrist.
 


Turn your house into a gesture-controlled smarthome


GyroPalm offers a colorful RGB+W LED smart bulb to set the mood in your home. Use GyroPalm to impress your family and friends by magically waving your hand to change colors or dim the lights for a pleasant dinner.


Control your TV


GyroPalm Infrared supports nearly all major TV brands. Control your TV with ease!


Control your media player


You can enjoy life by controlling the media player through GyroPalm.


Control your computer

GyroPalm allows users to control computers with a flick of the wrist.


Control your presentations


Take your presentations to the next level by using GyroPalm's simple, pre-defined gestures to easily navigate through your slides.


Control your drone


Put down your bulky remote controller and use your GyroPalm to control your drone! GyroPalm is currently compatible with all DJI Phantom series drones.


Control your robotics


Gyropalm can act as a wearable joystick to control your robot with simple hand movements.


Control your machines


Use your GyroPalm wearable partnered with the GyroPalm Smart Outlet to control tools in your workshop! All GyroPalm Smart Outlets have auto on/off timer capability.


Control appliances easily


Now walking up and down the stairs numerous times a day is not needed.  GyroPalm is welcomed by people of all ages including senior citizens. It can even help medical professionals to monitor patients’ motions (health informatics).

Hands-free gesture recognition


Using the power of GyroPalm's Gesture Engine technology, you can interact with GyroPalm using only one hand using finger-snaps, simple motions, and customizable gestures.


Step tracking


GyroPalm has most, if not all, of the functions of a typical smartwatch including step tracking. 


Timekeeping and smartphone notifications


 


Tired of constantly checking your phone? Never miss a notification with GyroPalm.

See texts, calendar alerts, weather, and more with simply a glance.


Pick up your calls

Don't miss another call while you're on the road! GyroPalm's Bluetooth connectivity makes it easy and safe to control your phone to answer/decline a call while driving.


Built for performance and hands-free interaction


GyroPalm is built for performance with durable Gorilla Glass, interchangeable watchstraps, and convenient micro USB charging.


Versatile Wireless Technology


The potential number of devices that can be controlled with GyroPalm is virtually limitless. GyroPalm is future-ready and can control electronic devices, appliances, computers, smartphones, smartlock, and robotics with a flick of the wrist!

 

What We Need / What You Get

We need your support to bring GyroPalm to life. Your contribution will go towards mass production and fabrication of GyroPalm. Choose a GyroPalm package and enhance your lifestyle with our extraordinary product!
 

GyroPalm Wearable

The GyroPalm wearable features Gorilla Glass, tap/snap detection, menu buttons, interchangeable straps, bidirectional learning IR blaster, auxiliary LED, micro USB charging port, and gesture engine.
 


Customize GyroPalm with various colors


GyroPalm Home Accessories

In various packages, we offer GyroPalm home accessories that work with the GyroPalm wearable. Accessories may include, from left to right, our GyroPalm premium smart dimmer, smart power strip, smart outlets, base, smart bulb, and smart wall switch.
 

Our new technology works with many accessories enabling it to be incorporated into so many varieties of uses, thus offering an almost endless number of new gadgets and applications. In addition, accessories last for a long time, for example, LED smart bulb usually lasts for more than a year.


Simultaneous and Alternative Control:  GyroPalm allows the user to instantly share control with anyone with an additional GyroPalm wearable. However, with GyroPalm’s alternative control, only one person can control a specific device at a time. GyroPalm user’s family members, with or with our wearable, can still control the various devices in the same premise through our apps and a smartphone.


​For more information of each package, please scroll to the top of the page and click the name of the package.


More Information


 

Interview of Dominick Lee, our CEO, at a recent high tech trade show in San Francisco

 

Customizable Gesture Control

To control devices, an activation gesture is performed. After successfully performing the activation gesture, the GyroPalm wearable will confirm with a small vibration. The user may then freely perform any predefined or customizable gestures as desired.
 


The GyroPalm Gesture Engine is a patented framework on the GyroPalm Wearable that comprises of complex algorithms for dynamic gesture recognition. The Gesture Engine is responsible for recognizing gestures locally as well as synchronizing them to the cloud.

[GIF of Drag-Drop Gesture Mapping]

 

GyroPalm Developer

GyroPalm is great for researchers and developers! GyroPalm features a dedicated IDE programming environment that allows developers to extend the functionality of the wearable.

 

GyroPalm Home Control

GyroPalm Premium Smart Dimmer

GyroPalm works synchronously with a Smart Dimmer switch that displays the level of the light brightness and let you control the level by using a simple hand motion such as turning a knob. 


GyroPalm Smart Outlet

Plug your projector or any other home appliance into a GyroPalm Smart Outlet or Smart Power Strip and instantly be able to control it with your GyroPalm wearable.


GyroPalm Smart Wall Switch

At home, GyroPalm can easily control lights, fans and anything else you can dream of!


GyroPalm Nest Thermostat Control

Change the room temperature with a quick gesture—from anywhere in your house. Nest is not included in any package.


Control electronic devices from different parts of the world!

With WiFi setup in advance, GyroPalm can allow you to control electronic devices in different parts of the world. On another note, GyroPalm provides long-distance low-latency wireless transmission to a receiver base that can be configured especially for outdoor operations.  
 

Easily flick on the lights at your office without touching a light switch!

 

GyroPalm Perform

GyroPalm Air Mouse


 

Replace your traditional computer mouse with your GyroPalm wearable. Simply enter the aspect ratio of the screen you want to hover your pointer across and GyroPalm Perform uses its smart algorithms to automatically quantify the screen area to your pointer location.


Real-time Gesture Tracking


Virtual Joystick for Video Games

 

GyroPalm Infrared

Control a DSLR camera

Take stunning photos or group pictures without timers or remotes by controlling your camera using GyroPalm's built-in IR blaster.

 

GyroPalm Drone

Fly DJI series drones


 

With the GyroPalm Drone app paired to the GyroPalm wearable, you can control a DJI series drone and fly it by tilting your hand!

 

Specifications

 

Our Team

Our Mission

GyroPalm, LLC is a company dedicated to the research, development, and manufacturing of the patented wearable gesture control which empowers users to control electronics, computers, appliances, robotics, and IoT devices with a flick of the wrist. GyroPalm is an unprecedented, dynamic, and one-of-a-kind invention in the world simplifying daily activities and enhancing the quality of life of people. Our company is in the United States of America.

Key Leaders

About Dominick Lee

The inventor and patent owner of GyroPalm is Dominick Lee who owns different patents from the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) and graduated from Purdue University, a top ten U.S. university in technology. Dominick and his inventions have been featured by different popular technology websites/publications before. He is an expert, a cross-platform software developer with more than 15 years of experience in developing innovative solutions used by millions.
In addition, he is a passionate inventor who has been working with wearables, IoT devices, robotics, and mechatronics for many years. One of GyroPalm's first applications involves controlling an industrial robot from a long distance. Dominick aspires to help people through using GyroPalm as a means of providing a scalable technology platform that improves the lifestyle of many. He is supported by Purdue scientists as well as experts in different fields on this project.
 

About Vignesha Bhamidi

Vignesha is an outstanding engineer and scientist who is an expert in electronics manufacturing and research as well as supply chain management. He has been very helpful in sensor research, PCB fabrication, and management of the scalability of hardware. He has a master's degree from Purdue University and is associated with a worldwide network of engineers and academicians. Moreover, Vignesha has led teams of engineers from other high-tech companies and guided them in strategizing for experimentation, hardware production, and quality assurance. He aims to use his knowledge to make high quality solutions that add value to people's lives.
 

Other key team members include but not limited to:

•    Frank Lee
•    Wilson Young
•    George Eliopoulos
•    Saawan Patel
•    Francis Ho
•    Matthew Jordan
•    Fernando Barrera
•    Matthew Nogay
 

 

Risks & Challenges

For backers outside USA, please be responsible for taxes and duties as both Indiegogo and GyroPalm, LLC will not collect any tax and duty regardless.  

All devices are tested in our facilities to conform with FCC requirements. In terms of the wireless transmission of GyroPalm, compatibility may vary depending on environment. For example with very weak router and/or very thick wall, performance may not be perfect.  

We expect to start production early 2020 and anticipate to make our first shipment around November 2020. Throughout this time, our team will make the best effort to produce and test each of our products to ensure that supporters receive the best quality possible. Our wearable is designed and made in USA. We do not expect complications, though as with any technology product, delays in manufacturing or shipping may occur. However, our team is committed to delivering the product to you near the dates promised. In any condition where we face delay, we will update you on our website and via email. We are excited to bring you the best of GyroPalm and hope you will enjoy using our product as much as we do!

 

FAQs

1. What gestures do I need to perform to control my home appliances?

Answer: To control a device, users will typically perform a predefined activation gesture and then perform a navigation gesture or customizable gesture. These are very easy to learn and one can learn how to use GyroPalm within minutes.

2. Do I need to learn many gestures to use this product?

Answer: No, most users can adequately use GyroPalm through 4 or 5 simple motions which are rather easy. Additionally, users can customize more gestures as desired.

3. Can I change my activation gestures?

Answer: There are currently two activation gestures. Users can choose one of them based on their preference.

4. How many gestures can be used with the GyroPalm?

Answer: Ideally up to 6 customizable gestures at a time, in addition to the 4 preset gestures. Gesture performance and recognition may vary by the type of gesture set and the consistency when performing gesture recognition.

5. How long does it take to convert my ordinary home into a smart connected home using GyroPalm?

Answer: Using one of the GyroPalm packages, you can set up the home accessories within an hour or less in most cases.

6. How long does it take for GyroPalm wearable to be charged?

Answer: Between 3 to 5 hours to be fully charged.

7. How long can GyroPalm battery last after a full-charge?

Answer: Usually between 6 to 8 hours depending on your usage.

8. What technology do you use to get GyroPalm work with other devices?

Answer: Infrared, Bluetooth, Long-range, and WiFi.

9. When do I need to use the base?

Answer: Users should use the base for best performance in controlling drones outdoor (up to 3,000 feet).  For indoor operations, the base is needed to enhance performance when the router is too weak and/or the wall is too thick.  Developers can use the base for high quality and long distance transmission.

10. When do I need to use WiFi?

Answer: Users need to use WiFi with indoor operations.  With WiFi setup in advance, users can even control electronic devices in different parts of the world.

11. Does GyroPalm use apps for operation?

Answer: For an ordinary user, he/she usually can adequately use GyroPalm with 4 to 5 motions without using apps, with the exception of the initial setup. But we do have Android and iOS apps which can provide advanced users with more services or functions. We will further develop in this area to provide more services and functions through the cloud.

12. How sturdy is the glass of the wearable?

Answer: As opposed to most watches, we use Gorilla Glass which is sturdy and hard to be scratched or broken.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Your support means a lot to us! You can earn discounts by sharing the campaign via your social media on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, etc. Please also connect with us on our social media below:

 

Our Press Release Materials can be downloaded here.
story_txt:
Universal Gesture Control Interface for Your Wrist
GyroPalm is a patented wearable gesture control system for your wrist, unprecedented in the world, that empowers you to control electronics, computers, appliances, robotics, and IoT devices with a flick of the wrist! With our wearable, and in some cases with our base too, users can control devices and drones within 3,000 feet. With WiFi setup in advance, users can even control these items in different parts of the world. Our wearable also has most, if not all, of the functions of a typical smartwatch, such as step tracking, notifications, temperature indication, etc.
GyroPalm is the trend for tomorrow, the next-generation smartwatch! According to the editor of GadgetFlow, "It's a connected smartwatch that is actually smarter than the rest." 

There are three aspects of the product: a wristband, the GyroPalm cloud platform, and one or more hardware-based accessories. GyroPalm is easy to be used out of the box. Most people can adequately use GyroPalm through 4 or 5 simple preset motions. Moreover, you can create customizable gestures to be mapped to various actions as you desire.
For advanced users, GyroPalm features a dedicated IDE programming environment that allows them to extend the functionality of the wearable. 

 

 
 
 
Simplify your daily routines & enhance your lifestyle


GyroPalm is a patented wearable gesture-control system which is versatile, robust, and customizable. Essentially, GyroPalm gives meaning to hand motions and provides a platform for users to interact with known devices in new yet intuitive ways.
Our technology can be suitable for many people for leisure, convenience, and use in the industry. Most users such as gamers, home automation enthusiasts, developers, and the elderly would appreciate the flexibility provided by our gesture-controlled platform. 

The universal interface of GyroPalm revolves around gesture recognition. Hand gestures have been a medium of human-to-human communication for over a thousand years. GyroPalm aims to achieve human-device interaction through a language that is not spoken, but rather conveyed by motions which can be performed in either a subtle or explicit manner. Occasionally, gestures are a convenient way to quickly communicate with another person depending on the situation or location. Likewise, the same can be applied to controlling devices around your home or office in a pleasant and seamless manner.
Today, GyroPalm empowers you to interact with devices around you with single-hand gestures, even in noisy and/or dark environments.  


Superpowers at the flick of your wrist
GyroPalm is a wearable device that allows anyone to control electronic devices, appliances, computers, smartphones, smartlock, and robotics with a flick of the wrist. 


Turn your house into a gesture-controlled smarthome

GyroPalm offers a colorful RGB+W LED smart bulb to set the mood in your home. Use GyroPalm to impress your family and friends by magically waving your hand to change colors or dim the lights for a pleasant dinner.

Control your TV

GyroPalm Infrared supports nearly all major TV brands. Control your TV with ease!

Control your media player

You can enjoy life by controlling the media player through GyroPalm.

Control your computer

GyroPalm allows users to control computers with a flick of the wrist.

Control your presentations

Take your presentations to the next level by using GyroPalm's simple, pre-defined gestures to easily navigate through your slides.

Control your drone

Put down your bulky remote controller and use your GyroPalm to control your drone! GyroPalm is currently compatible with all DJI Phantom series drones.

Control your robotics

Gyropalm can act as a wearable joystick to control your robot with simple hand movements.

Control your machines

Use your GyroPalm wearable partnered with the GyroPalm Smart Outlet to control tools in your workshop! All GyroPalm Smart Outlets have auto on/off timer capability.

Control appliances easily

Now walking up and down the stairs numerous times a day is not needed.  GyroPalm is welcomed by people of all ages including senior citizens. It can even help medical professionals to monitor patients’ motions (health informatics).

Hands-free gesture recognition

Using the power of GyroPalm's Gesture Engine technology, you can interact with GyroPalm using only one hand using finger-snaps, simple motions, and customizable gestures.

Step tracking

GyroPalm has most, if not all, of the functions of a typical smartwatch including step tracking. 

Timekeeping and smartphone notifications
 

Tired of constantly checking your phone? Never miss a notification with GyroPalm.
See texts, calendar alerts, weather, and more with simply a glance.

Pick up your calls

Don't miss another call while you're on the road! GyroPalm's Bluetooth connectivity makes it easy and safe to control your phone to answer/decline a call while driving.

Built for performance and hands-free interaction

GyroPalm is built for performance with durable Gorilla Glass, interchangeable watchstraps, and convenient micro USB charging.

Versatile Wireless Technology

The potential number of devices that can be controlled with GyroPalm is virtually limitless. GyroPalm is future-ready and can control electronic devices, appliances, computers, smartphones, smartlock, and robotics with a flick of the wrist!
 What We Need / What You Get
We need your support to bring GyroPalm to life. Your contribution will go towards mass production and fabrication of GyroPalm. Choose a GyroPalm package and enhance your lifestyle with our extraordinary product! 
GyroPalm Wearable

The GyroPalm wearable features Gorilla Glass, tap/snap detection, menu buttons, interchangeable straps, bidirectional learning IR blaster, auxiliary LED, micro USB charging port, and gesture engine. 


Customize GyroPalm with various colors


GyroPalm Home Accessories

In various packages, we offer GyroPalm home accessories that work with the GyroPalm wearable. Accessories may include, from left to right, our GyroPalm premium smart dimmer, smart power strip, smart outlets, base, smart bulb, and smart wall switch. 

Our new technology works with many accessories enabling it to be incorporated into so many varieties of uses, thus offering an almost endless number of new gadgets and applications. In addition, accessories last for a long time, for example, LED smart bulb usually lasts for more than a year.
Simultaneous and Alternative Control:  GyroPalm allows the user to instantly share control with anyone with an additional GyroPalm wearable. However, with GyroPalm’s alternative control, only one person can control a specific device at a time. GyroPalm user’s family members, with or with our wearable, can still control the various devices in the same premise through our apps and a smartphone.
​For more information of each package, please scroll to the top of the page and click the name of the package.

More Information


 
Interview of Dominick Lee, our CEO, at a recent high tech trade show in San Francisco
 Customizable Gesture Control
To control devices, an activation gesture is performed. After successfully performing the activation gesture, the GyroPalm wearable will confirm with a small vibration. The user may then freely perform any predefined or customizable gestures as desired. 

The GyroPalm Gesture Engine is a patented framework on the GyroPalm Wearable that comprises of complex algorithms for dynamic gesture recognition. The Gesture Engine is responsible for recognizing gestures locally as well as synchronizing them to the cloud.

[GIF of Drag-Drop Gesture Mapping]
 GyroPalm Developer


GyroPalm is great for researchers and developers! GyroPalm features a dedicated IDE programming environment that allows developers to extend the functionality of the wearable.
 GyroPalm Home Control
GyroPalm Premium Smart Dimmer

GyroPalm works synchronously with a Smart Dimmer switch that displays the level of the light brightness and let you control the level by using a simple hand motion such as turning a knob. 

GyroPalm Smart Outlet

Plug your projector or any other home appliance into a GyroPalm Smart Outlet or Smart Power Strip and instantly be able to control it with your GyroPalm wearable.

GyroPalm Smart Wall Switch

At home, GyroPalm can easily control lights, fans and anything else you can dream of!

GyroPalm Nest Thermostat Control

Change the room temperature with a quick gesture—from anywhere in your house. Nest is not included in any package.

Control electronic devices from different parts of the world!

With WiFi setup in advance, GyroPalm can allow you to control electronic devices in different parts of the world. On another note, GyroPalm provides long-distance low-latency wireless transmission to a receiver base that can be configured especially for outdoor operations.   

Easily flick on the lights at your office without touching a light switch!
 GyroPalm Perform
GyroPalm Air Mouse
 

Replace your traditional computer mouse with your GyroPalm wearable. Simply enter the aspect ratio of the screen you want to hover your pointer across and GyroPalm Perform uses its smart algorithms to automatically quantify the screen area to your pointer location.

Real-time Gesture Tracking


Virtual Joystick for Video Games

 GyroPalm Infrared
Control a DSLR camera

Take stunning photos or group pictures without timers or remotes by controlling your camera using GyroPalm's built-in IR blaster.
 GyroPalm Drone
Fly DJI series drones
 

With the GyroPalm Drone app paired to the GyroPalm wearable, you can control a DJI series drone and fly it by tilting your hand!
 Specifications

 Our Team
Our Mission
GyroPalm, LLC is a company dedicated to the research, development, and manufacturing of the patented wearable gesture control which empowers users to control electronics, computers, appliances, robotics, and IoT devices with a flick of the wrist. GyroPalm is an unprecedented, dynamic, and one-of-a-kind invention in the world simplifying daily activities and enhancing the quality of life of people. Our company is in the United States of America.
Key Leaders
About Dominick Lee

The inventor and patent owner of GyroPalm is Dominick Lee who owns different patents from the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) and graduated from Purdue University, a top ten U.S. university in technology. Dominick and his inventions have been featured by different popular technology websites/publications before. He is an expert, a cross-platform software developer with more than 15 years of experience in developing innovative solutions used by millions.In addition, he is a passionate inventor who has been working with wearables, IoT devices, robotics, and mechatronics for many years. One of GyroPalm's first applications involves controlling an industrial robot from a long distance. Dominick aspires to help people through using GyroPalm as a means of providing a scalable technology platform that improves the lifestyle of many. He is supported by Purdue scientists as well as experts in different fields on this project. 
About Vignesha Bhamidi

Vignesha is an outstanding engineer and scientist who is an expert in electronics manufacturing and research as well as supply chain management. He has been very helpful in sensor research, PCB fabrication, and management of the scalability of hardware. He has a master's degree from Purdue University and is associated with a worldwide network of engineers and academicians. Moreover, Vignesha has led teams of engineers from other high-tech companies and guided them in strategizing for experimentation, hardware production, and quality assurance. He aims to use his knowledge to make high quality solutions that add value to people's lives. 
Other key team members include but not limited to:

Our wearable is designed and made in USA. We do not expect complications, though as with any technology product, delays in manufacturing or shipping may occur. However, our team is committed to delivering the product to you near the dates promised. In any condition where we face delay, we will update you on our website and via email. story:
Our story began one year ago with a desire to create a meaningful, high-quality watch that didn't compromise on design or affordability.  After developing relationships with watch makers from around the world, we were able to design the pieces we desired, and a unique business model that allows us to help with a cause that holds meaning for us: Water.

Nearly one billion people globally live without access to clean water. Everyday millions of people sacrifice their health, education and economic opportunities searching for something many of us take for granted everyday.
 

          We believe that together, we can help change that. Just $.63 can give someone water for a year. At Water Watch Company, we make sure that person can get clean water for much longer. For every watch sold, we will match that purchase with the funds to provide clean water to one person for their entire lifetime. 

 

       Become a part of ending the global water crisis.

                           Become a part of redefining what it means to give, in business.   

 

We are confident in the quality and craftsmanship of our watches. Each Water watch is backed by a five year warranty.

 We source only the best leather for our watches. With full-grain, vegetable tanned, Italian leather, you will reap benefits for years. 

Vegetable Tanning

Our leather comes from environmentally responsible tanneries in Italy that use a traditional method of tanning called vegetable tanning. This method is free of harmful chemicals and uses natural tannins from ingredients like tree bark. Vegetable tanning produces a natural look to the leather, is more sustainable, and helps age your watch strap beautifully over time.

Full-grain 

At the tannery, hides are split and sold as different types of leather. The most durable, longest lasting of that material is called “full-grain” and is the outermost layer of the hide. All of our leather straps are made of full-grain leather.

Our Beck Series watches feature an optional 316L Stainless Steel band. Upgrade at 50% off ($34.50) Indiegogo exclusive. (You can add this amount to your pledge to secure your order!)

Our watches are packaged in finished wooden boxes with a velvet lining. Every watch comes with a certificate of authenticity that identifies and guarantees your timepiece. 

The standard premium watch is sold under the traditional distribution model (sales agents, retail stores, marketers) resulting in dramatic overpricing. By selling our watches directly to you, online, we can cut out the middlemen and provide fair and honest pricing. This leaves you with an affordable premium product, and our charity partners with the funds to do what they do best.

Water timepieces are inspired by all forms of water. Lakes, oceans and rivers are made of this transparent, tasteless and colorless substance. Yet, it flavors and colors our world in every way. Our proximity to it changes the way we live, what we eat, how we move; everything begins with water. 

Our Harbor Series— A Harbor /ˈhärbər/ is a place on the coast where sea vessels find shelter from harsh waters. This watch pays homage to what we know best: minimal, elegant, clean design. We wanted this watch to be free of frills and distractions. Harbor is a place to call home. 

Our Channel Series— A Channel /ˈCHanl/ is a narrow part of the sea between a continent and an island. It is a passage for water to flow, a route for vessels to travel. This watch is inspired by connection. Sleek, and sophisticated, its luminescent hands serve as a bridge from light to dark, from place to place. 

Our Beck Series— A Beck /bek/ is a swiftly running stream with surface water flowing within the bed and banks of a channel. This watch is a bold, on the go, adventure seeking piece. Beck is inspired by the journey. 

Inspired by water, and created to give water.  

Just .63 cents helps provide one year of clean water for one person. At Water Watch Company, with every watch sold, we provide the funding to give clean water to one person, for a lifetime.

We've chosen to partner with the most transparent organizations working to solve the water crisis. With GPS tracking and site monitoring provided by our charity partners, we can share with you where we've helped give clean water. We will be issuing quarterly impact statements on our website and newsletters with details about: where, when, who and how, your watch has made an impact. Our first issue is planned for January 2019.

A large part of our business model consists of our partnerships with suppliers that understand and support our cause. Without them we wouldn’t be able to do what we do. Together we’ve created amazing, affordable products that will impact communities around the world for years to come. 

 When selecting the finest materials for our watches, we were set on finding the best ways to showcase them through our designs. 

We went back and forth with our manufacturers on drawings, and 3D renderings. In the end we decided on what came natural to us: minimal, elegant, and timeless. 

Our Harbor series is of a fine and minimal aesthetic. These watches can be dressed up or down, ready for any occasion. 

  • 316L stainless steel case with polished finish 
  • Scratch resistant sapphire crystal glass
  • Citizen Miyota Quartz GL20 Movement 
  • Case size 38mm, or 40mm
  • Case thickness 7mm
  • 3 ATM Water resistance 
  • Band width 18mm
  • Comfort fit crown at 4 o'clock
  • Full-grain, vegetable-tanned, Italian leather straps (interchangeable)
  • Individually numbered 

Sleek, refined and sophisticated, our Channel Series watches feature Swiss Super-Luminova® for increased visibility when light diminishes.

  • 316L stainless steel case with polished finish 
  • Scratch resistant sapphire crystal glass
  • Citizen Miyota Quartz 9U13 Movement 
  • Case size 38mm, or 42mm
  • Case thickness 8mm
  • 5 ATM Water resistance 
  • Band width 20mm
  • Swiss Super-Luminova® luminous indications
  • Date display
  • 316L stainless steel mesh straps (interchangeable)
  • Individually numbered 

Our Beck series is bold, durable, robust and eye-catching. With a day date display and sub-second dial, it's the perfect combination of form and function. Be one of the first in the world to own a watch with this NEWLY RELEASED movement. 

  • 316L stainless steel case with polished finish 
  • Scratch resistant domed sapphire crystal glass
  • Citizen Miyota Quartz NEW 0T50 Movement 
  • Case thickness 11.5mm
  • Case size 38mm, or 44mm
  • 10 ATM Water resistance 
  • Band width 22mm
  • Day date display
  • Sub-second dial
  • Full-grain, vegetable-tanned, Italian leather straps (interchangeable) or optional 316L stainless steel bracelet (interchangeable and 50% off on Indiegogo!)
  • Individually numbered 

Our WATER brand cuff bracelet in silver. $49 on Indiegogo!

  Not sure what to give for the holidays? Let them decide.

        With a WATER gift card!

New to Indiegogo? No problem. Here is a quick guide on how to back our campaign. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask us at info@waterwatch.co or click the green "Chat" button on the bottom right of our website www.waterwatch.co

  • Click the button "Back this project"
  • Select a Perk- Choose your perk or reward to back. Early birds get the best deals!
  • Pledge- Fill out your shipping and payment information.
  • Sit back and relax- We’ll follow up for additional info just before the campaign ends.

Over the past year we’ve connected with some of the best manufacturers in the world and have made great progress in bringing our full watch collection to life. Our shipments are expected to begin in February. Early backers will have first dibs on February shipping. 

We're Markeda Shorter and Jaime Vargas, Co-Founders of Water Watch Company. Both born and raised in California, we're a couple of former college roommates turned entrepreneurs. Our passion for design and charitable giving brought us on this long journey and we're both excited to share it with all of you.

You can reach out to us at info@waterwatch.co 

If you like our campaign, please consider sharing it!

Thank you so much for your support.

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ
