Together we’ve created amazing, affordable products that will impact communities around the world for years to come.  When selecting the finest materials for our watches, we were set on finding the best ways to showcase them through our designs. We went back and forth with our manufacturers on drawings, and 3D renderings. In the end we decided on what came natural to us: minimal, elegant, and timeless. Our Harbor series is of a fine and minimal aesthetic. These watches can be dressed up or down, ready for any occasion. 
316L stainless steel case with polished finish 
Scratch resistant sapphire crystal glass
Citizen Miyota Quartz GL20 Movement 
Case size 38mm, or 40mm
Case thickness 7mm
3 ATM Water resistance 
Band width 18mm
Comfort fit crown at 4 o'clock
Full-grain, vegetable-tanned, Italian leather straps (interchangeable)
Individually numbered 

Sleek, refined and sophisticated, our Channel Series watches feature Swiss Super-Luminova® for increased visibility when light diminishes.
316L stainless steel case with polished finish 
Scratch resistant sapphire crystal glass
Citizen Miyota Quartz 9U13 Movement 
Case size 38mm, or 42mm
Case thickness 8mm
5 ATM Water resistance 
Band width 20mm
Swiss Super-Luminova® luminous indications
Date display
316L stainless steel mesh straps (interchangeable)
Individually numbered 
Our Beck series is bold, durable, robust and eye-catching. With a day date display and sub-second dial, it's the perfect combination of form and function. Be one of the first in the world to own a watch with this NEWLY RELEASED movement. 
316L stainless steel case with polished finish 
Scratch resistant domed sapphire crystal glass
Citizen Miyota Quartz NEW 0T50 Movement 
Case thickness 11.5mm
Case size 38mm, or 44mm
10 ATM Water resistance 
Band width 22mm
Day date display
Sub-second dial
Full-grain, vegetable-tanned, Italian leather straps (interchangeable) or optional 316L stainless steel bracelet (interchangeable and 50% off on Indiegogo!)
Individually numbered 

Our WATER brand cuff bracelet in silver. $49 on Indiegogo!  Not sure what to give for the holidays? Let them decide.        With a WATER gift card!New to Indiegogo? No problem. Here is a quick guide on how to back our campaign. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask us at info@waterwatch.co or click the green "Chat" button on the bottom right of our website www.waterwatch.co
Click the button "Back this project"
Select a Perk- Choose your perk or reward to back. Early birds get the best deals!
Pledge- Fill out your shipping and payment information.
Sit back and relax- We’ll follow up for additional info just before the campaign ends.
Over the past year we’ve connected with some of the best manufacturers in the world and have made great progress in bringing our full watch collection to life. Our shipments are expected to begin in February. Early backers will have first dibs on February shipping. We're Markeda Shorter and Jaime Vargas, Co-Founders of Water Watch Company. Both born and raised in California, we're a couple of former college roommates turned entrepreneurs. Our passion for design and charitable giving brought us on this long journey and we're both excited to share it with all of you.You can reach out to us at info@waterwatch.co If you like our campaign, please consider sharing it!Thank you so much for your support.Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ

story:
Who We Are

At Nicole Bridger, we design and manufacture ethical clothing for modern conscious people. Our mantra is I AM LOVE, which is about coming from that pure place of love in all that you do.

We make our clothing using sustainable fabrics and low-impact dyes. Sustainable fabrics come from renewable and recycled resources. The textile industry is #1 for toxic waste, destroying our waterways and people’s access to clean water around the world.

We use ethical manufacturing; 90% being made at our very own factory here in Vancouver and the other 10% using a fair-trade factory in Nepal. The world is awakening to the need for ethical garment manufacturing. No longer can workers suffer to meet the demands of the world.

We create clothes that help you to connect with yourself in a deeper, more loving way. When you feel good in the clothing you wear it helps you shine as your best truest self in your day. We sew a label that says “I am love” into each piece of clothing, reminding the wearer to be kinder to themself and those around them making them an agent of love in their own world. As we distribute clothing we are also distributing love.

What We Need

We have just recently doubled our wholesale orders and we need to purchase the fabric to fulfill them. We also need to increase inventory at our flagship store, increasing our sales so that we can open our second store next fall. It is our goal to have 20 stores by 2020.

That's where you come in, with your support we can meet these goals and continue the growth of the company.

 

What You Get

Choose from the following, indiegogo exclusive items!

1. Women's Mantra Tee

2. Men's Tee

3. Goddess Dress

4. Joyful Dress

5. Underwear

6. Kids Dress and Bloomers

7. Style Named After You

8. Warehouse Sale Item

If you wish to give any of these items as a Holiday Gift, we are happy to mail you a gift card.

 

The Impact 

We currently have one store in Vancouver. The store showcase modern green design and acts as a community building space; holding fundraisers, seminars and a monthly guided meditation night. We host in-store fashion shows, where real women models and customers interact, explore and dress their truest selves.

Over 90% of our workforce is women. In our factory we are providing jobs to skilled immigrants who often have boundaries to employment due to language barriers.

 

Help Spread the Word

Tell your friends, share on your favourite social media outlet. And thank you very much for your support! With your help, Nicole Bridger will continue grow and be an agent of love in this world. You will help us to show that there is a better way where neither the earth nor the people are compromised.

story:
UPDATE: 9/6/2013 

Media in our local area of New Hampshire and New England have begun to take notice of our campaign and the idea. We will update the Indiegogo and Philips Innovation Fellows Communities with the information and links to view these upcoming stories. What we are hoping for most is supporters. A contribution of just $1.00 lets us know we have people who support what we are trying to do. Thanks and keep looking for more updates. 

THE GUARDIAN ANGEL PROJECT

Our Mission: To create a warning system that alerts authorities and others to the existence of life threatening temperatures.

Last year alone; infants, children, the elderly and countless pets were lost to life threatening temperatures. Whether these situations occurred in vehicles or out in the open, the loss of life was tragic and needless.

The Guardian Angel Bracelet and Pet Collars are designed to assist in the prevention of these types of loss. The first of its kind, this innovation allows for universality helping pets and people alike. It is designed to trigger an alert to authorities, parents and pet owners if a life threatening temperature threshold is crossed. You can even use your cell phone to check your loved ones or pets vital signs.

  • Built in temperature and vital sign monitors.
  • Incorporated GPS tracking.
  • Multiple alert functionality. (Bluetooth, Wifi, Phone Call, SMS, App Interaction)
  • Programmable and customizable.

Q:  "Can we help in any way to save those who cannot save themselves?"

A:  "Yes we can."The impacts of this product are GLOBAL. By supporting this project, you ARE going to help save a life. We are hoping to raise enough through this campaign and contest to implement the innovation before next summer. We believe these bracelets and collars will have a direct impact on decreasing the number of people and pets lost every year to life threatening temperatures.

Until you see a Guardian Angel product on every at risk person, our job is not complete. Look at your family, your friends, your neighbors, your pets. Imagine how hard it would be to lose them to something that is easily preventable in our modern world. No matter who we are, or where we come from; the face of loss always looks the same. Help us to change this world for the better by supporting the Guardian Angel Project and why not get one of our stunning t-shirts while you are at it.

Our Project Leader is Michael Allsup, 28. In 2005 he joined the American Red Cross to aid in the relief efforts after Hurricane Katrina. In the following years he would continue as a volunteer and respond to disasters all over the country. He has described it as, "A life changing experience."

"I honestly feel like helping people is my calling in life. I believe that we all have the ability to change the world and that if you have a shot to do so, you should take it."

- Michael Allsup

 

Here are ways you can help:

  • Donate!
  • Show others where to contribute!
  • Utilize Social Media and other outlets to spread the word!
  • Encourage others to get involved!  
  • Leave comments of support on our site!


Contact us with any questions at TheGuardianAngelTeam@Gmail.com

 

Let's save a life together!

story:
We're Online! www.journeytobrazil.com

Thanks again to our supporters!

Short Summary

When you think of Brazil what comes to mind? Sunswept beaches, Rio de Janeiro, Bossa Nova music, or maybe partying during Carnival? I have created a collection of t-shirts inspired by my travels to this amazing country.

  • Hello, my name is John Smoot. I am an artist and I am passionate about Brazilian culture.
  • My campaign is to raise funds for the high quality professional web development of an Amazon.com e-commerce webstore. Since releasing a preview of just a few of my designs, there is already a high demand and excitement for the t-shirts.
  • Your support will enable the successful launch of a secure, trusted e-commerce webstore on Amazon.com capable of processing online sales orders worldwide.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need exactly $5000 to cover the web developer's fees for constructing the e-commerce site with Amazon.com. The company that will build the website is www.atmosol.com. They are an experienced partner with Amazon.com and have provided web solutions support for many high profile clients. Based on their expertise and track record, atmosol is the best company to construct our new website.
  • The demand for my designs are huge! I have actually moved the launch date to an earlier time (July 2013) just to accomodate. Everyone absolutely loves the travel appeal and the Brazilian theme of my designs! Customers wanting to purchase the t-shirts have told me they can't wait to get their hands on one. And YOU GET TO BE AMONG THE VERY FIRST TO OWN these eye-catching designs. People may even ask, "Did you get that while traveling?" or "When did you go to Brazil?"
  • If 100% of the funding is not secured through this campaign, the money received will still go towards web development with atmosol because I believe in the quality of their work, their experience and reputation which are all important factors for me with selecting a business partner to develop a secure, e-commerce webstore with Amazon.com.

The Impact

  • The JOURNEY TO BRAZIL t-shirt collection is unique because of its travel theme and international appeal. The designs are fresh, new and original that Men and Women can enjoy.
  • On the business side, we have t-shirt printing, fulfillment (Amazon), and design team (myself), website domain name and hosting already in place. We've done our homework and have already gone through the product, shipping & handling, and supply chain costs.
  • What this means for you (the contributor) there is no waiting around for us to buy tshirts, ink and eventually get around to making designs that you haven't seen. The product and the designs are ready, the ONLY part needed is the e-commerce web developer.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please tell your friends, Twitter and Facebook this campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Upon complete funding, this project is ready to launch immediately. Thank you for visiting the JOURNEY TO BRAZIL t-shirt campaign!

story:
MAKE YOUR PANTS MATCH YOUR PERSONALITY!

a new day, a new idea.

Imagine if you could change your jeans style everyday?
If you could add a layer of expression to your jeans?

Well now you can with Wollas!

You can turn one pair of jeans in 10 different looks or even more... Let's get creative!

After looking at so many jeans and styles, we saw a niche that allowed us to produce a look that doesn't exist in fashion today. We have seen a tremendous rise in the popularity of cuffed pants but there was nothing unique about it. All the cuffed pants looked pretty much the same at the bottom and there was no option to add any expression to it.

So, we felt like it was right time to do something about the problem. That's when Wollas was born!

Wollas is a lifestyle brand committed to producing and selling high quality interchangeable cuffs. Our company embraces the beauty of individuality. We want you to support Wollas not only because your believe in the product but also because you understand the importance of being unique.

Eye-catching designs, engineered for your style. Boost your look with the new exclusive cuffs.

We are launching Wollas with 10 initial interchangeable cuffs.

Stardust Wollas

Get you style rock’n roll and liberate yourself in red, white and blue. Stardust will make your pants rocking in any combination.

Leopard Wollas

Make a fashion stand with this fierce fabric. Unleash your style in the city jungle and show the playful side of any outfit.

Rainbow Wollas

Switch the mood to happiness and show it with the new rainbow style. Be playful and choose from endless possibilities by matching it up with colorful options!

Anchor Wollas

Set sail of your style and navigate through the city with this beautiful collage of anchors. The cool blue tones and pops of pink will keep you floating in the fashion’s harbor.

Geek Chick Wollas

Geek is the new sleek. Turn this well-known patter into something sophisticated by matching it up with most of all your chic wardrobe.

Rosegarden Wollas

Beautiful and natural, just like you. The colors of this pattern will POP out your style. Dress up any jeans or match it with your favorite red shoe.

Whimsical Garden Wollas

Revive you jeans with this whimsical garden pattern and add the beauty of pastel colors. The soft feminine touch makes this pattern great for any age and any outfit combination.

Pcockin Wollas

Wear peacock and stand proud like one, when all eyes are on you as show up with this cuff. Exotic blue tones with hints of gold shimmer allows you to be creative and dress up this beautiful pattern.

Native Pixel Wollas

Be the proud of the tribe! Set your style free with this beautiful blend of organic colors. This versatile pattern allows you to match to almost ANYTHING!

Polka Dot Wollas

Never getting old, this exquisite and chic pattern of black and white will dress up or dress down any outfit and even the most classic fashionista can step out of her comfort zone.

Why Indiegogo?

We chose to launch on Indiegogo because we felt it was the perfect place to introduce this cutting edge style not only to the market but more importantly to the people that support new and upcoming products and ideas.

What will the proceeds be used for?

Besides producing your Wollas, we will be using the proceeds to create new designs, create marketing collateral and invest in optimizing our e-commerce platform. 

What’s the quality like?

Excellent! We are committed to producing high quality cuffs. We only seek out the highest material for our cuffs and we have a highly skilled team of professionals creating our products.

Who can wear Wollas?

Wollas are designed for Kids, Ladies & Men of any ages. Our interchangeable cuffs come in 3 sizes (Small, Medium & Large) that will work with majority of the pants. They will compliment jeans and pants from toddlers to adults. (Note: Boot-cut & flared jeans do not work for these cuffs)

How do you Install Wollas?

Installing Wollas take no more than 2 mins. Each pair comes with an Attachment Kit and gives you step by step instructions on how to install Wollas.

Can you Remove the Cuffs?

Yes. You can remove the cuffs anytime without any special kit. You can put them back on in less than a minute.

Future Wollas with the MIX!


--------------------------------

--------------------------------

--------------------------------

--------------------------------

--------------------------------

story:
My Name is Rodney J. Burks, I am 48 years old and I have been married 13 years.  My wife and I have four children.  I feel extremely Blessed as I have been given a second chance at life when I was cured of  stage four sarcoidosis.  I have always paid attention to detail in any job or responsibility I have been given. I am a keen observer and creative problem solver, I recognized a common problem and set upon designing a simple solution.  While vacationing at the beach with my wife and children, I had to carry a cooler plus chairs for the children, my wife and myself.  This entailed more than one trip from the car to the beach.  A conventional beach chair carried with a single strap over the shoulder does not stay in place well enough so the hands and arms are free for carrying other items.  Knowing this is a problem for many families who wish to enjoy their time at the beach or picnic without having to make multiple trips to haul gear, I Rodney J. Burks have come up with an innovative answer. The Easy Seat.

About my project

The concept I envisioned is a way so anyone can carry multiple folding chairs at the same a time. The chairs will conveniently fold-up and connect together to form a backpack. A further, more detailed explanation of the functionality of this invention will be elaborated upon in the following segment.

How Does it Work?

As currently designed in the technical drawings and 3-D models, the Easy Chair has unique features not presently available in the marketplace.  Although the system has not yet been engineered and is still in the 3-D developmental stages, an explanation of possible operation is as follows:

These folding chairs have two attached straps so it will stay securely in place when worn on the back like a backpack.  Like conventional chairs, these are lightweight and they each have cup holders in the arms and a detachable table that fits into the rear pocket when it is not being used.  This pocket is handy for storing almost anything the owner needs to store.  The side table connects at two points to provide stability.  Both connecting points have soft rubber grips inside for friction resistance and sturdy plastic support pins to hold it securely in place.   On the underside of the seat are rotating connection pegs which will lock one chair to another so multiple chairs can be carried together at one time.  This feature provides a strong and stable way of connecting the chairs. To make carrying the chairs on the back more comfortable and secure, an adjustable belt is fastened across the chest.  The back pocket provides a place for buyers to individualize their chairs with logos or advertising.

There are three accessories which can be purchased separately and fit into the rear pocket when not being used.  These items are a soft-sided cooler, a footstool, and a comfy neck pillow. The cooler connects with Velcro at two points on the top and an additional connection point on the bottom to hold it securely while in use. This cooler is large enough to carry a six pack of bottled or canned drinks or a small picnic lunch. The foot stool is uniquely designed to fold down completely and it connects to the chair at two points.  Locking pins keep the foot stool securely in place. The neck pillow is also uniquely designed with two connection points each with soft rubber and Velcro straps to hold in place while making the user very comfortable.

This chair design can be modified to make smaller chairs for children or heavy duty chairs for the military. There could also be a high back version of this chair and that back would be adjustable.  All these chairs are designed so it is easy to carry multiple chairs at one time. The back of the chair could be imprinted with school logos or logos of various sports teams.  

 What Problem Does it Solve?

The unique features of this invention will benefit the users in the following ways:

  • It will be much easier and less annoying carrying necessities to the beach, high school football games, parades, and parks for picnics, etc.
  • Multiple chairs can be carried at one time leaving your arms and hands still free to carry other things
  • These chairs are lightweight and have handy components
  • Excursions to places like the beaches, parades, parks for picnics, high school football games and for activities like hiking and fishing will be more pleasant for all
  • The attachable neck pillow, foot stool and cooler are convenient enhancements making the use of these chairs very enjoyable.

 Marketing

I envision the Easy Chair appealing to the multitudes of people who enjoy spending time fishing, camping, hiking, relaxing on the beaches, etc. but don’t enjoy carrying all the necessities.  Today’s society is always seeking new ways to make our lives more convenient and this invention will certainly fit the bill.

The markets are extensive for an innovative product like this one as people everywhere enjoy the convenience of these chairs.  General supply retailers like Target, Wal-Mart and K-Mart are logical retailers for this product as are many of the large drugstore chains like CVS, Revco and Walgreens as they sell these as seasonal items.  Other outlets could be places like Sports Authority and Toys R Us.  Close to beaches, lakes, parks and recreation areas there are always specialty stores which carry a wide variety of items for outdoor use and this would be a popular new product to sell there.

I also wish to leave the market open for subsequent variances and possibilities that could improve the feasibility and marketability of this product, such as various designs or styles to suit user preference and necessity. 



Q: How heavy is it  

A: The weight has not been determined although my dream is under 5 Lbs each.

Q: What do you plan to do with the money? 

A: First I plan to get the finish engineering and proto type done and apply for the utility patent .

Q:How much will a prototype coast?  

A: the engineering and prototype will cost $20,000.00

Q:How much will a patent coast?  

A: $5,000.00

Q: What is your distribution plan?

 A: I plan to start with a web site (Money will be needed for this also) (this will raise awareness) and I Want to get ultimately a license deal. 

Q: What makes this product unique?

A: (my favorite question) this is the only chair that connects together with a patent pending locking system that makes it easy for one person to carry multiple chairs. 

Q: What is your target consumer group?

 A: Families that enjoy picnicking,  sporting games, camping, High school sporting events, fishing ETC.

Q:How do you plan to handle any setbacks? (late delivery, Poor quality form manufacture)

 A: I plan to be very hands on at every step B/C quality is the important

Q:How much is your projected retail price?

 A: I have seen similar Items sell for $39.00 to $109.00 so at this the price depends on the manufacturing coast (I must wait for the finished prototype to answer this question)


    Your donations are Greatly Appreciated and I Thank You in advance! There are also other ways You Can Help....

    1.  You can help get the word out about this campaign by using indigogo        share tools.


    2.  You can share on social media sites.
story_txt:
My Name is Rodney J. Burks, I am 48 years old and I have been married 13 years.  My wife and I have four children.  I feel extremely Blessed as I have been given a second chance at life when I was cured of  stage four sarcoidosis.  I have always paid attention to detail in any job or responsibility I have been given. I am a keen observer and creative problem solver, I recognized a common problem and set upon designing a simple solution.  While vacationing at the beach with my wife and children, I had to carry a cooler plus chairs for the children, my wife and myself.  This entailed more than one trip from the car to the beach.  A conventional beach chair carried with a single strap over the shoulder does not stay in place well enough so the hands and arms are free for carrying other items.  Knowing this is a problem for many families who wish to enjoy their time at the beach or picnic without having to make multiple trips to haul gear, I Rodney J. Burks have come up with an innovative answer. The Easy Seat.About my projectThe concept I envisioned is a way so anyone can carry multiple folding chairs at the same a time. The chairs will conveniently fold-up and connect together to form a backpack. A further, more detailed explanation of the functionality of this invention will be elaborated upon in the following segment.  How Does it Work?As currently designed in the technical drawings and 3-D models, the Easy Chair has unique features not presently available in the marketplace.  Although the system has not yet been engineered and is still in the 3-D developmental stages, an explanation of possible operation is as follows:These folding chairs have two attached straps so it will stay securely in place when worn on the back like a backpack.  Like conventional chairs, these are lightweight and they each have cup holders in the arms and a detachable table that fits into the rear pocket when it is not being used.  This pocket is handy for storing almost anything the owner needs to store.  The side table connects at two points to provide stability.  Both connecting points have soft rubber grips inside for friction resistance and sturdy plastic support pins to hold it securely in place.   On the underside of the seat are rotating connection pegs which will lock one chair to another so multiple chairs can be carried together at one time.  This feature provides a strong and stable way of connecting the chairs. To make carrying the chairs on the back more comfortable and secure, an adjustable belt is fastened across the chest.  The back pocket provides a place for buyers to individualize their chairs with logos or advertising. There are three accessories which can be purchased separately and fit into the rear pocket when not being used.  These items are a soft-sided cooler, a footstool, and a comfy neck pillow. The cooler connects with Velcro at two points on the top and an additional connection point on the bottom to hold it securely while in use. This cooler is large enough to carry a six pack of bottled or canned drinks or a small picnic lunch. The foot stool is uniquely designed to fold down completely and it connects to the chair at two points.  Locking pins keep the foot stool securely in place. The neck pillow is also uniquely designed with two connection points each with soft rubber and Velcro straps to hold in place while making the user very comfortable. This chair design can be modified to make smaller chairs for children or heavy duty chairs for the military. There could also be a high back version of this chair and that back would be adjustable.  All these chairs are designed so it is easy to carry multiple chairs at one time. The back of the chair could be imprinted with school logos or logos of various sports teams.    What Problem Does it Solve?The unique features of this invention will benefit the users in the following ways:
It will be much easier and less annoying carrying necessities to the beach, high school football games, parades, and parks for picnics, etc.
Multiple chairs can be carried at one time leaving your arms and hands still free to carry other things
These chairs are lightweight and have handy components
Excursions to places like the beaches, parades, parks for picnics, high school football games and for activities like hiking and fishing will be more pleasant for all
The attachable neck pillow, foot stool and cooler are convenient enhancements making the use of these chairs very enjoyable.
   MarketingI envision the Easy Chair appealing to the multitudes of people who enjoy spending time fishing, camping, hiking, relaxing on the beaches, etc. but don’t enjoy carrying all the necessities.  Today’s society is always seeking new ways to make our lives more convenient and this invention will certainly fit the bill.The markets are extensive for an innovative product like this one as people everywhere enjoy the convenience of these chairs.  General supply retailers like Target, Wal-Mart and K-Mart are logical retailers for this product as are many of the large drugstore chains like CVS, Revco and Walgreens as they sell these as seasonal items.  Other outlets could be places like Sports Authority and Toys R Us.  Close to beaches, lakes, parks and recreation areas there are always specialty stores which carry a wide variety of items for outdoor use and this would be a popular new product to sell there.I also wish to leave the market open for subsequent variances and possibilities that could improve the feasibility and marketability of this product, such as various designs or styles to suit user preference and necessity.   I have invested approximately $10,000 getting The Easy Seat to this point. (The concept drawings, virtual prototype and Provisional patent)  The steps needed to finish are the engineered drawings and a complete working prototype and at that point a full utility patent can be applied for. When it comes to potential risk…. with any new project there are some:  first the patent process is one.  In this process we could face rejection and I would need to redesign the specs to insure The Easy Seat does not infringe on other products and with the design team at Idea Design Studios this could be done in a timely manner then reapply (Utility patent takes up to eight weeks). There could also be potential problems with production  (On time delivery and Quality) with my background in manufacturing I can get involved to streamline the processes to oversee any potential problems (I worked as a production /process engineer for Dana Corporation in Ohio for seven years). These are some answers to some FAQ’s    Q: How heavy is it  A: The weight has not been determined although my dream is under 5 Lbs each.Q: What do you plan to do with the money? A: First I plan to get the finish engineering and proto type done and apply for the utility patent .Q:How much will a prototype coast?  A: the engineering and prototype will cost $20,000.00Q:How much will a patent coast?  A: $5,000.00Q: What is your distribution plan? A: I plan to start with a web site (Money will be needed for this also) (this will raise awareness) and I Want to get ultimately a license deal. Q: What makes this product unique?A: (my favorite question) this is the only chair that connects together with a patent pending locking system that makes it easy for one person to carry multiple chairs. Q: What is your target consumer group? A: Families that enjoy picnicking,  sporting games, camping, High school sporting events, fishing ETC.Q:How do you plan to handle any setbacks? (late delivery, Poor quality form manufacture) A: I plan to be very hands on at every step B/C quality is the importantQ:How much is your projected retail price? A: I have seen similar Items sell for $39.00 to $109.00 so at this the price depends on the manufacturing coast (I must wait for the finished prototype to answer this question)  Your donations are Greatly Appreciated and I Thank You in advance! There are also other ways You Can Help....1.  You can help get the word out about this campaign by using indigogo        share tools.2.  You can share on social media sites.

story:
After purchasing and testing nearly every available natural deodorant, I found that either none were effective sticks OR luxurious. I decided to make my own deodorant stick and after hundreds of hours in my West Hollywood kitchen mixing formulas, I developed a sample and gave it to my family and friends. Everyone loved AGENT NATEUR and started asking me to make more.

I want to change the way the world views luxury cosmetics. If you choose to live a healthy, natural lifestyle, the application and absorption of healthy cosmetics are as critical as the ingestion of healthy food. Your skin is the largest organ of your body and since it is porous, it absorbs whatever you put on it. Sweating is actually GOOD for you. There is scientific evidence that sweat contains antimicrobials that fight harmful infections. Sweat is a natural antibiotic.

A study in the American Journal of Public Health reported that the skin’s absorption rate of the chemicals found in drinking water averaged 64% of the total contaminant dosage. Other studies reported an absorption rate of 100% for underarms. The products that we apply to our skin are absorbed into our body.

AGENT NATEUR N ° 3 d e o d o r a n t is formulated with only the finest ingredients including organic raw coconut oil, beeswax, sodium bicarbonate, avocado butter, sunflower butter, castor oil, raw organic honey and healing essential oils. The fragrance is beautiful and most importantly, AGENT NATEUR N°3 d e o d o r a n t WORKS! I ship free samples to whomever asks because I am so confident that this deodorant is effective and will be loved by nearly everyone who applies it.

HERE IS THE REASON WHY I AM ASKING FOR YOUR HELP

I AM OUTGROWING MY KITCHEN! Both national and international stores are contacting me to carry Agent Nateur with major distribution. I need to place a minimum quantity of to manufacture the packaging, bottles and formula which will cost about 30,000. It's getting difficult to continue cooking and packaging the deodorant in my kitchen. 10% of all sales will fund breast and ovarian cancer research at Dana Farber Cancer Institute in Boston, Massachusetts. Thank you so much for taking the time to read this! It feels good to make a beautiful product that is actually healthy for your body.

WHERE THE FUNDING WILL GO

PRODUCTION OF BOXES

PRODUCTION OF BOTTLES AND LABELS

MANUFACTURING COSTS

ABOUT JENA

From an early age, I've suffered from hormone-related health problems including endometriosis and fibroids. I began changing my lifestyle by eliminating all pesticides through an organic diet. Pesticides contain endocrine disruptors known as xenoestrogens that mimic estrogen and alter the normal function of hormones. These toxic chemicals are also found in plastic, household cleaning supplies and cosmetics. The transition to eating organic food and using non-toxic cleaning supplies was relatively easy as products were readily available; however, the search for beautiful, holistic cosmetics and an effective deodorant proved to be futile.

Fore more information about Agent Nateur, please visit www.agentnateur.com or email us directly at agent@agentnateur.com

story:
My Story

Design is my passion....publicly and privately. I love creating, taking someone's dreams, visions, desires and passion and turning it into a visual identity and statement that's created just for them. I've been designing for over 12 years and my clients are predominately small businesses and individuals, as well as faith-based and non-profit groups. I never duplicate, but always try to authenticate my clients' designs.

The Impact

My design campaign is now moving to the next level and I'd like to go from just designing to printing to make each project personal and complete. The impact on small business increases their visibility, gives them professional presence, and preserves their small budget. The impact on faith-based groups and organizations gives their vision and messages an appealing look that futher delivers their message to their audience. The impact to individuals (the family who has lost a loved one and needs a funeral program, or the couple who just wants their wedding invitation to be unique and special) meets their immediate needs but doesn't rob their wallets.

What We Need & What You Get

Plain a Simple....

A Color Printer to print projects that I've designed without outsourcing to expensive print houses.

 

Desired is a Xerox Color Copier or Phaser....

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word by sharing my link, my message and my campaign. Any donation and contribution and prayer is deeply and humbly appreciated and your investment will spread beyond your highest expectation.

story:
We designed the Rockready Volo gig bag to be tour ready; it's also the perfect solution for everyday gigs and rehearsals. The Volo helps you organize all your gig and rehearsal stuff with intelligently designed form factor pockets. Your stuff always within reach and easy to grab when you need it!


STORY:

Ever miss an important phone call because you couldn't find your phone in your gig bag? Search in seemingly every pocket twice before finding your keys? Pull out your tablet or phone only to find the screen scratched?

The Rockready Volo gig bag has you covered on all that and more. Never miss that important phone call or fumble for your keys again. Never worry that your tablet or other gadgets are not protected from unwanted scratches. And most importantly never worry about your guitar or bass if you accidentally drop the bag or it gets knocked over. We designed our Rockready Volo gig bag to be tour ready!

Rockready is a new concept in guitar accessories for the gigging musician: tour ready gear and also gives back to the music community.

Rockready delivers elegant, durable and functional solutions for musicians.

  • Designed by gigging musicians
  • Committed to stylish, functional, high value gear
  • Delivering form, function and details
  • Supporting our community! We donate 5% of proceeds from this campaign to Little Kids Rock, a non-profit organization that "transforms children's lives by restoring and revitalizing music education."

3 Great Reasons to Own a Volo Gig Bag


Reason # 1 : Get a tour ready gig bag at an affordable price.

Working musicians keep the music business alive and thriving. Without you performing every day and night of the year our world would be much less happy place. Really? Yes!  Studies show music effects the deep emotional centers in the brain helping make us a bit happier.

Reason #2 : Help kids learn music.

You can help the next generation of budding musicians as a portion of all Rockready proceeds will be donated to Little Kids Rock. LKR has helped over 400,000 children across the U.S. get a music education. Without children learning music, we could be missing out on the next Jimmy Page, or Jaco Pastorius.

Reason #3 : Own the most awesome gig bag on the planet.

After months of design, planning and testing we are ready to release our Rockready Volo gig bag; we think it's awesome. It's a tour ready bag with a durable outer covering, integrated ABS panels, cell phone cubby, plush and padded interior with neck support, reflective piping for safety at night, plus many little features that keep all of your gadgets at arm's length. There's also a detachable Tote Bag that has a shoulder strap and is perfect for carrying all your stuff.

BONUS : Get a Great Deal! AND be one of the first to get a Volo gig bag!

We're crowd funding this bag right now and wanted to give you the first opportunity to take advantage of a limited number of $99 Perks. This is a great opportunity for you to purchase a bag that will sell for $159 for only $99 including shipping. Remember, these prices are available only in our Indiegogo campaign

FEATURES:

We've packed our gig bag with features for today's gigging musician. Built to protect your guitar or bass for a long time with solid construction and features that every musician can use.

  • Durable outer covering
  • Integrated ABS panels
  • Detachable Tote bag


  • Keep your guitar safe from scratches. We've lined the inside of the Rockready gig bag with soft fabric and protective patches to keep both your guitar and bag protected.
  • Keep your neck safe and secure with our neck support. Our neck support locks and protects the most vulnerable part of your guitar or bass.
  • Thick padding to protect your guitar or bass against accidental drops and falls with extra padding at base with end-pin cut away


  • Tired of digging for keys and searching frantically for the phone when it's ringing? Our top pocket keeps your phone, keys, and pens all close at hand. Key holder keeps keys away from phone screen - no more scratches!
  • Hide away shoulders straps with a chest clip for those long hikes to the gate
  • High quality, locking zippers that keep working



  • The optional detachable Tote bag that's sized perfectly to carry a micro pedal board or tablet to your gig, rehearsal or writing sessions.
  • Need a safe place to carry your tablet or iPad to rehearsal, gig, or just around town? Tuck it into our form fitted padded pocket inside the Tote bag.
  • Our uni-strap adjusts for right or left shoulder carrying.
  • It'll become your indispensable bag for around town.


  • Be seen at night! With our reflective piping you're sure to be seen!


PERKS:


WHAT YOU GET:

  • Act now and get fantastic one time only pricing on our Rockready gig bag!
  • Don't worry, if you want, you'll get it.
  • We expect to ship perks at the end of July 2015.

WHAT WE NEED:

We need to raise $12,000 to bring our vision for gig bag perfection to the market. We feel our campaign will be successful. However, since this is a Flexible Campaign, we want to assure our backers that you will receive your rewards whether we make our goal or not.

THE TEAM:

  • Worked successfully in the industry from all sides of the fence. From designing and distributing gear to using it while performing on stage, our multifaceted team has many years of valuable experience. At Rockready we're combing our our passion for music and great gear to bring you the best value and the most feature rich guitar and bass accessories available.
  • Helped design and launch many products in the US and world market places including Mooer micro pedals, Pickboy picks, Dr J pedals, MTD Grendel and Kingston basses, EBS amps and pedals, and many more.
  • Delivered results to our brand partners. This time we're working directly with our artists and industry contacts to build the Rockready brand into a name that musicians around the world can trust.
  • Rockready - delivering elegant, durable and functional solutions for musicians.

Thank You!

    Your contribution helps us bring a great product and idea to market, helps some children with their music education and supports an independent business. If you like what we're trying to accomplish with Rockready there are some other ways you can help.

    Please show your support by sharing our campaign. We really appreciate it!

    Moa Henriksson / Dead Heroine

    Catch featured Rockready artist Moa Henriksson and her band Dead Heroine on Vans Warped Tour 2015. Find tour dates on their website www.deadheroine.com.

From designing and distributing gear to using it while performing on stage, our multifaceted team has many years of valuable experience. story:
Hi my name is Jo

To my close friends and family I'm known as 'Joey' - hence the name of my label.  For me this represents all the best things in my life - the people I love!  

'JOEY the Label' encompasses beautiful fabrics,  rich textures and embellishments. Working back with  timeless items like my classic Silk Slip Dress or Camisole Top...

    

 

I'm launching a small collection of pure silk essential items I've named the 'BASEline'.   

Items for every woman's wardrobe.  Available here on Indiegogo for 21 days!   At 40% or more off the retail price.  

The profits from this range will go towards funding my whole range which I intend to sell online and via selected boutiques in the future.

By purchasing an item from the 'JOEY the Label' BASEline collection you will be an integral part of fulfilling my life long dream.  MOST OF ALL you'll have a gorgeous item for your wardrobe.

 

Introducing THE BASEline.......

 

1.  ​Kitty Cat Choker

This Black Velvet Choker is finished with either Gold or Silver Beads.  It can be Tied in a Bow at the front for a classic French feel i.e. Michelle Williams at the Golden Globes this year. Or tie it at the back for an edgier look.

Available in BLACK only with either Gold or Silver Metallic Beads.  

Price: $15 AUD

 

The JOEY Cami

The Camisole Top is the ultimate item for every woman’s wardrobe.  

It can be paired back with anything from denim to an evening skirt.  Perfect in any occasion, it’s the ‘Go To’ garment above all!

FABRIC:  100% Pure Silk

SIZES: 8 - 14 Australian - see chart below

FEATURES:  Adjustable straps and can be worn with a Bra underneath -  achieving lovely proportion with no unsightly back straps.

PRICE: $69 AUD  Normal Retail $129

 

 

The JOEY Slip Dress

I believe every woman needs a Slip Dress!  

Whether its sashaying around the house barefoot or putting on your fave heels and a fab Jacket for Dinner this is the one.

Layer it up with Boots, Cardi and Jacket in Winter.  

Wear it Simple and elegant with a Heels.   Make it your own style..... Classic, Boho or Grungy - the list is endless.  

FABRIC:  100% Pure Silk

SIZES: 8 - 14 Australian - see chart below

FEATURES:  Adjustable straps and can be worn with a Bra underneath.  Our slip dress has a slight dip at the back hemline giving the appearance of longer looking legs.  Gotta Love that!  

PRICE: $99 AUD  Normal Retail $199

 

 

The Cutaway Top

This is a favourite of mine.  It has a floaty appearance that elegantly hides problem areas. 

The Cutaway top is flattering and extremely versatile. Pair it back with a sassy skirt, jeans, palazzo pants or shorts.  This top makes everything look good.  The drape of the Silk is so luxurious - you will Love it!

FABRIC:  100% Pure Silk

SIZES:  Small, Medium and Large   -  see chart below.                                                                                                                                 (S = 8 to 10,   M = 10 to 12,   L = 12 to 14 - Australian Sizes) 

FEATURES:   The Cutaway top has an adjustable neck tie and can be worn with either a strapless bra, a cross over bra or no bra at all.

PRICE: $79 AUD  Normal Retail $139 AUD

 

The Cutaway Dress

The big sister to the Cutaway Top.

It’s floaty, luxurious and so flattering. 

You can make it bohemian with boots and loads of jewellery OR wear it simply - as is - with a sequinned jacket over the top for an evening out. 

FABRIC:  100% Pure Silk

SIZES:  Small, Medium and Large - see chart below.                                                                                                                                   (S = 8 to 10,   M = 10 to 12,   L = 12 to 14 - Australian Sizes)

FEATURES:   The Cutaway Dress features side pockets.  It has an adjustable neck tie and can be worn with a strapless bra, a cross over bra or no bra at all.

PRICE: $129 AUD  Normal Retail $249 AUD

 

SIZING

 

To purchase any of these beautiful items just head over to the perks and click on whatever your heart desires.

And remember the profits from the BASEline will go towards funding the 'Main line'  - your purchase supports me getting my full range off the ground and into the world.

Thank you!

My Thanks...

I want to Thank and Hug a number of awesome people in particular,  who have been so giving of their Time, Experience, Skill set and Support.  Thank you all so much......

Amanda Reynolds - Graphics, Website

Campbell Knott - Photographer

Jemima Knott - Muse / Model

Rache Knott - Producer

Ben Eriksen - Camerman, Director, Editor, Video.

Esther Hawkins - Wordsmith.

Amanda Peppard - Video Coach, Sister

Becca Hetrel - Style Guru

Katy Reid - Fellow Crowd funder.

I'sha Kousar - Accessories, Props and fellow dreamer making it happen.

And to all the awesome people who have shown so much support on Social Media and Email - Thank YOU all.  

Joey

Xxxxxxxxxxxxxx
story_txt:
Hi my name is Jo
To my close friends and family I'm known as 'Joey' - hence the name of my label.  For me this represents all the best things in my life - the people I love!  
'JOEY the Label' encompasses beautiful fabrics,  rich textures and embellishments. Working back with  timeless items like my classic Silk Slip Dress or Camisole Top...
    
 

I'm launching a small collection of pure silk essential items I've named the 'BASEline'.   
Items for every woman's wardrobe.  Available here on Indiegogo for 21 days!   At 40% or more off the retail price.  
The profits from this range will go towards funding my whole range which I intend to sell online and via selected boutiques in the future.
By purchasing an item from the 'JOEY the Label' BASEline collection you will be an integral part of fulfilling my life long dream.  MOST OF ALL you'll have a gorgeous item for your wardrobe.

story:
Who is Operation Optimist?

We are people, just like you, who desire to put more kindness, optimism, smiling faces, and love for one another back into the world, as well as expose the good that is already all around us. That is what our message and mission are all about. We know that there are plenty of people out there that feel the same and we want to build a sense of community around our brand and message, all while doing a greater good to help others in need through charitable acts. 

Upon launching, our brand is initially the items you see here on Indiegogo. However, we have ideas for the future to keep our brand ever expanding and evolving and not being limited to the items you see here. 

What charitable acts is Operation Optimist performing? 

Our primary source of charity is with the wonderful non-profit, Children Incorporated. We will be donating 10% of all proceeds to this world wide child sponsorship organization. However, we will be focused on giving through other avenues as the company grows. 

PRODUCTS

Mens (unisex) Tees

Baseball (unisex 3/4 sleeve) Tees

Womens Tees & Tanks

Kids Tees

Snapback Hat 

Stickers included in Sticker Pack

Large Sticker Dimensions

 

 

Sizing Charts

Mens (unisex) Tee Sizing 

Baseball Tee (unisex) Sizing

Womens Tee Sizing

Womens Tank Sizing

Kids Tee Sizing

 

 

Our products on optimists . . . 

 

 

Challenges

Indiegogo has many amazing product campaigns on a daily basis. We feel truly grateful that you are even reading this right now. Aside from hitting our financial goal, one of our biggest challenges with this project is to get the word out and touch as many lives as possible. We can only do so much alone and we will take all of the help we can get. If you believe in our message and our brand, please share us with others. 

With that being said, most of our challenges are behind us. Everything is now in place and rolling smoothly so the only major challenge left is hitting our goal and getting our orders in so that we can get your gear out to you.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to support our cause and newly forming company! 

  • You can find us on social media (@operationoptimist) and like our stuff. 
  • You can donate or purchase our products here on Indiegogo by clicking the pink button close to the top right of the page that says, "Back It" and donate, or choose the "Perk" box you would like to purchase products from.
  • Spread the word! Start talking about us to friends and family. 
  • Visit our website at operation-optimist.com & shoot us an email to give us your thoughts. (Website not available for purchase until the end of the Indiegogo)
  • Rep your gear on social media with the hashtag #operationoptimist

story:
www.insjo.com

We are still trying hard to make Insjö possible, because we believe the bagINbag would bring benefits to your everyday life. Check out our site, you can trace our post-campaign effort there :)


Refer your Friends and Earn Rewards!


Help us to get our Keeper Bags noticed by referring this page to your friends. It's completely free, and when you share our page you must be logged in so that Indiegogo can log your referral and you can receive your reward! 


Insjö means "Lake" in Swedish. Lakes in the Nordics are beautiful, especially the smooth ripples across the surface.
We want to bring these smooth ripples to your everyday life through Insjö Keeper Bags. 



Keeper bags are a lifestyle product that combines organising your essentials in all of your handbags and always remembering to switch your must-have-items from one bag to another.


The small Keeper bag from the front..


the small Keeper bag from the back..



This is not just a bag, it is more than that, It is your calming influence during the day, your fashion companion, your third hand and an extension to your memory.



Arctic Startup says:

“Insjö - Get ready. This one is meta. It is a bag, that you put inside your bag! So instead of moving all of your items from one bag to the next, you just take this thing out and put it in your bag of choice for the day. Women, beware, they are trying to make you organized and logical”


Our founders story

'I had been using a bag organizer I bought online for a few months. The organizer was doing its job …OK, not super. But…it looked so bad, and the quality is so low, I was embarrassed when my colleagues saw it inside my handbag and so i didn't want to take it out. At that point I really wished I had a DECENT bag organizer so i decided to make one, 1 turned into 50 and people loved them so i decided to create my own brand of bags to help others who like the idea of a bag organizer but also want something of good quality with nice colours'




So we got the courage to make a range of lifestyle bags that are modern in design yet have the functionality to help improve some of life's small annoyances!

The Insjö design concepts are and will be inspired by Finnish people and meet the practical requirements of Nordic culture. Our first product helps you organise all of the things you need regularly throughout the day so you can grab them quickly. 



the measurements of the large Keeper bag..



the measurements of the small Keeper bag..


To complete the experience your keeper bags will have an easy-to-use, classic looking Key Chain with a clip to ensure you don't waste any time looking for your keys in your bag again.



The Keeper bag means now when you change bags for the evening you won't forget anything and transferring your essentials will only take a few seconds.


We add 8 pockets for cards in the small bag. You can now use it as your essential "big wallet", which can also hold your mobile etc. Now when you want to have a quick stop to kiosk near office, it is the only single thing you need to take.



Perks:

€53 - One large and one small Insjö Keeper bag; Yellow, Blue or Brow

€32 - Large Insjö Keeper bag in one of the following colours; Yellow, Blue or Brown

€24 - Small Insjö Keeper bag in one of the following colours; Yellow, Blue or Brown

€6 - Insjö cotton shopping bag with custom Insjö label

€1 -   We will be delighted to add you name to our early 'friends' list on our blog and social media sites and will promote your business in return! 

(Shipping cost INCLUDED!!!)


Colours

1. Fishermen Blue outside, sharp Yellow inside

2. Sharp Yellow outside & inside

3. Dark Brown inside, Pink inside



Natural colour cotton shopping bag



Our Plan

The funds raised through this Indiegogo campaign will be used to produce the first line of bags and help us cover some costs for R&D of the new product lines next year.


Where will the money raised be spent?

- €4500 for Manufacturing & logistics
- €2000 for R&D of 2 new lines for Sprint 2014
- €250 to cover Marketing material and our campaign costs
- €250 for Company Overheads


The Design challenge

Everyone is a unique individual, everyone’s daily habits and preferences are different. Even the best product won’t always please everyone.
However, we have tried our best to analyse our friend’s life habits and aesthetic preference so we hope you will be one of the people who like our bags.


The Manufacturing challenge

As we are such a baby start-up, our 1st batch of 1200 pieces is a very small order from the industry’s point of view.
It has been difficult to find a small supplier who maintains high quality and delivers on time but we have a winning partnership and have been delighted with our samples!
We hope to reach the right audience who will feel enthusiastic about the Insjö bag’s advantages and design just the way we do. 
If we achieve that, we will be on our way to providing Keeper Bags to the world.


Shipping time: 

Although we are based in Helsinki, Finland we have factored in the worldwide shipping prices already for your convenience.

Estimated to start shipping perks – Early Jan 2014
Estimated time for you to receive your perks – Early Feb 2014


Thank you!

story:
A Few Words from the Creator

 
Today you read about rape in the newspapers almost every day. You become anxious and wonder why no one does anything about it. However, media is starting to focus more attention on the matter, more and more women step out and talk about it. I believe this is because we are finally starting to react and take a stand against violence.
Nevertheless, it is still the case that many women choose not to report abuse. They are ashamed, they are afraid of not being heard or risk being exposed to further violence. Often it is a case of word against word in a trial and it is difficult for a woman to win. In a potential lawsuit, blame is often put on the woman with focus on whether or not she did something to provoke the attack. Had she had too much to drink? Was she wearing provoking clothing? Did she have a history of multiple sexual partners? Did she say anything to lead him on? How did she first react to the situation?
The penalty for rape is very low. In a majority of cases tried, the accused will not be convicted. I believe the problem lies deeper than we think. The question at heart is why some men decide to commit this heinous act. It is not a question likely to be answered in a day. It will take time. But we must not despair. We can actually begin here and now by thinking about problem and how to solve it. Then maybe our grandchildren can finish what we have started and stop the violence completely.
Fashion against rape is created to be a campaign for women’s rights. It is supposed to bring light to this big question and reach out to all those in need of this product. Since women are the ones in need of this belt, this product is designed to be trendy and fashionable. And accessible!
In addition, it is not an expensive product to neither manufacture, nor purchase. At the moment, I’m searching for movements, companies, organizations or even celebrities to help promote this product, introduce it to the public and reach out to women all around the world. I also need help finding a manufacturer for mass-production of the belt.
If you are interested in helping me, interested in buying the product or contribute in any other way, please don´t hesitate to contact me!
 
I need YOUR help!
 
_________________________________
Nadja Björk, 6/5 2013
 
 

Request for Funding:

 

 
 
 
 
 
On behalf of Fashion Against Rape, Nadja Björk hereby requests economic support for the ongoing development of the anti-rape buckle, an original design by Nadja Björk, founder and CEO of Fashion Against Rape.
We ask for an economic contribution of 14 000 Dollar = 80 000 SKR, but naturally, we appreciate any support we can get.
 
 

 Background

 
This product was invented in 2006 as part of a school project where students were encouraged to develop new innovations. The product is developed as a supplement to the two biggest anti-rape products on the market today, the panic alarm and protective spray. For different reasons, these two products do not always protect during an attack. For example, they may lie in an inaccessible hand bag, or they may have been left at home. They are hard to use and can, in many cases, be used against the woman.

Why the product exist…

 
According to the American Medical Association(1995), sexual violence, and rape in particular, is considered the most under-reported violent crime.
The most common reasons given by victims for not reporting rapes are the belief that it is a personal or private matter, and that they fear reprisal from the assailant. A 2007 government report in England says ”Estimates from research suggest that between 75 and 95 percent of rape crimes are never reported to the police.”
Fear of not being believed, not wanting to get their attacker – who is often known to them – into trouble and a sense that they could or should have avoided the assault mean only a fraction of rape cases are being reported.
·      Violence against women and girls is not confined to a specific culture, region or country, or to particular groups of women within a society. The roots of violence against women lie in persistent discrimination against women and girls.
·      According to data available at the time of this application being put together, up to 70 per cent of women experience violence in their lifetime,
·      According to World Bank data, women aged 15-44 suffer higher risk of becoming victims of rape and domestic violence than they risk cancer, car accidents, war and malaria, put together.
·      Every fifth women in the world is going to experience rape during their lifetime.
 
Information from World Health Organisation, Wikipedia and the book ”Rape; Challenging contemporary Thinking”.
 

 

The Product

 

 


How does it work?

 

The idea of the product is that wearing the belt will make it more difficult for the rapist to remove the victim’s pants!

The product consists of two laser cut metal plates. The plates are bent and formed into an additional buckle that attaches to the outside of your ordinary belt. In order to open it, you need to use both hands and move a button through a hidden labyrinth  witch, if you are not familiar with the design of the labyrinth, takes time. Some of the main features of the belt include:

·      Hard to open with one hand

This product is designed to be very difficult to open with one hand. This means the abuser cannot hold the women while trying to remove her pants.

·      Takes more time to open than a normal belt

The belt cannot be opened quickly. This gives the victim a chance to fight back, scream and use other products for protection.

·      Cannot be used against you

Unlike other products, such as pepper spray or stun guns, this product cannot be used against the victim.

·      Hidden Labyrinth for protection.

Hidden under the first layer of metal, is a labyrinth that you cannot see when the product is closed. That makes it very difficult to open the belt if you are not familiar with its layout.

·      Constant protection

Unlike a spray or an alarm, a belt is easy to remember bringing when you leave home. You don’t have to DO anything for it to help you. It’s just there, all the time.

 
 

Easy to  Use… 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1. Place part 1 on top of the normal belt buckle.Thread the belt through the loops on the pants.

2. Then tread the end of the Part 2. with a labyrinth  on the end of the belt.

3. Now close your normal belt.

4. To close the buckle for protection put the button on Part 1. in the beginning of the labyrinth on Part 2.

5. Move the button up and down the labyrinth to the end.

6. The buckle is now closed. To open go backwards. 

 Where Do the Money Go?

 

  • Create 3-5 new fashionable designs for the belt
  • Make prototypes of 3 new designs
  • Make product ready for the market

 

The first product has been successful. So far, we´ve sold a few hundred hand-made products. Now it is time for a new design and a bigger market. The plan is to make more products in different styles to suit all kinds of women. With a new design that is more attractive and more fashionable, this product can reach a bigger market quicker.
However, because this is a small company, additional funds are needed to pay manufacturing engineers and consultants to make it production-ready. We have a designer on staff waiting for assignments and a small photo portfolio for PR. We are also in the process of recruiting additional designers and consultants to further strengthen the project group. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
This is one of the new designs of the belt that will be produced.
 
 
 

Risks Analysis

 
There are many obstacles you may encounter when getting a prototype production-ready. The good news is: we’ve done it before, and our core technology is solid. However, there are a few bumps in the road we need to overcome.
 
·      Finding a good manufacturer that can assure a quick production with good quality, in a country with good working standards.  
 
We have high ethical standards and go through great lengths to make sure that the entire production process is according to our ideals.
 
·      Reach out to women all around the world.
 
A beautiful worldwide-website with good shipping and delivering service would greatly benefit our cause.
 
·      Finding a design and material that is attractive to most women.
 
By consulting fashion designers and consultants, we strive to create a product attractive to a wide range of personalities.
 

 

Budget

 

 

Time Frame

 

 

 

Contact Information

 

 

CEO and Designer - Nadja Björk

Phonenumber: +4794429252

Email: typ_nadja@hotmail.com

Blogg/Website: fashionagainstrape.wordpress.com

Please don´t hesitate to contact me!
story_txt:
A Few Words from the Creator

 
Today you read about rape in the newspapers almost every day. You become anxious and wonder why no one does anything about it. However, media is starting to focus more attention on the matter, more and more women step out and talk about it. I believe this is because we are finally starting to react and take a stand against violence.
Nevertheless, it is still the case that many women choose not to report abuse. They are ashamed, they are afraid of not being heard or risk being exposed to further violence. Often it is a case of word against word in a trial and it is difficult for a woman to win. In a potential lawsuit, blame is often put on the woman with focus on whether or not she did something to provoke the attack. Had she had too much to drink? Was she wearing provoking clothing? Did she have a history of multiple sexual partners? Did she say anything to lead him on? How did she first react to the situation?
The penalty for rape is very low. In a majority of cases tried, the accused will not be convicted. I believe the problem lies deeper than we think. The question at heart is why some men decide to commit this heinous act. It is not a question likely to be answered in a day. It will take time. But we must not despair. We can actually begin here and now by thinking about problem and how to solve it. Then maybe our grandchildren can finish what we have started and stop the violence completely.
Fashion against rape is created to be a campaign for women’s rights. It is supposed to bring light to this big question and reach out to all those in need of this product. Since women are the ones in need of this belt, this product is designed to be trendy and fashionable. And accessible!
In addition, it is not an expensive product to neither manufacture, nor purchase. At the moment, I’m searching for movements, companies, organizations or even celebrities to help promote this product, introduce it to the public and reach out to women all around the world. I also need help finding a manufacturer for mass-production of the belt.
If you are interested in helping me, interested in buying the product or contribute in any other way, please don´t hesitate to contact me!
 
I need YOUR help!
 
_________________________________
Nadja Björk, 6/5 2013
 
 

Request for Funding:

 
 
 
 
 
 
On behalf of Fashion Against Rape, Nadja Björk hereby requests economic support for the ongoing development of the anti-rape buckle, an original design by Nadja Björk, founder and CEO of Fashion Against Rape.
We ask for an economic contribution of 14 000 Dollar = 80 000 SKR, but naturally, we appreciate any support we can get.
 
 

 Background

 
This product was invented in 2006 as part of a school project where students were encouraged to develop new innovations. The product is developed as a supplement to the two biggest anti-rape products on the market today, the panic alarm and protective spray. For different reasons, these two products do not always protect during an attack. For example, they may lie in an inaccessible hand bag, or they may have been left at home. They are hard to use and can, in many cases, be used against the woman.
Why the product exist…
 
According to the American Medical Association(1995), sexual violence, and rape in particular, is considered the most under-reported violent crime.
The most common reasons given by victims for not reporting rapes are the belief that it is a personal or private matter, and that they fear reprisal from the assailant. A 2007 government report in England says ”Estimates from research suggest that between 75 and 95 percent of rape crimes are never reported to the police.”
Fear of not being believed, not wanting to get their attacker – who is often known to them – into trouble and a sense that they could or should have avoided the assault mean only a fraction of rape cases are being reported.
·      Violence against women and girls is not confined to a specific culture, region or country, or to particular groups of women within a society. The roots of violence against women lie in persistent discrimination against women and girls.
·      According to data available at the time of this application being put together, up to 70 per cent of women experience violence in their lifetime,
·      According to World Bank data, women aged 15-44 suffer higher risk of becoming victims of rape and domestic violence than they risk cancer, car accidents, war and malaria, put together.
·      Every fifth women in the world is going to experience rape during their lifetime.
 
Information from World Health Organisation, Wikipedia and the book ”Rape; Challenging contemporary Thinking”.
 

 
The Product
 

 


How does it work?
 
The idea of the product is that wearing the belt will make it more difficult for the rapist to remove the victim’s pants!
The product consists of two laser cut metal plates. The plates are bent and formed into an additional buckle that attaches to the outside of your ordinary belt. In order to open it, you need to use both hands and move a button through a hidden labyrinth  witch, if you are not familiar with the design of the labyrinth, takes time. Some of the main features of the belt include:
·      Hard to open with one hand
This product is designed to be very difficult to open with one hand. This means the abuser cannot hold the women while trying to remove her pants.
·      Takes more time to open than a normal belt
The belt cannot be opened quickly. This gives the victim a chance to fight back, scream and use other products for protection.
·      Cannot be used against you
Unlike other products, such as pepper spray or stun guns, this product cannot be used against the victim.
·      Hidden Labyrinth for protection.
Hidden under the first layer of metal, is a labyrinth that you cannot see when the product is closed. That makes it very difficult to open the belt if you are not familiar with its layout.
·      Constant protection
Unlike a spray or an alarm, a belt is easy to remember bringing when you leave home. You don’t have to DO anything for it to help you. It’s just there, all the time.
 
 
Easy to  Use… 

 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
1. Place part 1 on top of the normal belt buckle.Thread the belt through the loops on the pants.
2. Then tread the end of the Part 2. with a labyrinth  on the end of the belt.
3. Now close your normal belt.
4. To close the buckle for protection put the button on Part 1. in the beginning of the labyrinth on Part 2.
5. Move the button up and down the labyrinth to the end.
6. The buckle is now closed. To open go backwards. 

 Where Do the Money Go?
 

Create 3-5 new fashionable designs for the belt
Make prototypes of 3 new designs
Make product ready for the market

 
The first product has been successful. So far, we´ve sold a few hundred hand-made products. Now it is time for a new design and a bigger market. The plan is to make more products in different styles to suit all kinds of women. With a new design that is more attractive and more fashionable, this product can reach a bigger market quicker.
However, because this is a small company, additional funds are needed to pay manufacturing engineers and consultants to make it production-ready. We have a designer on staff waiting for assignments and a small photo portfolio for PR. We are also in the process of recruiting additional designers and consultants to further strengthen the project group. 
 
 
 
 

 
 
This is one of the new designs of the belt that will be produced.
 
 
 

Risks Analysis

 
There are many obstacles you may encounter when getting a prototype production-ready. The good news is: we’ve done it before, and our core technology is solid. However, there are a few bumps in the road we need to overcome.
 
·      Finding a good manufacturer that can assure a quick production with good quality, in a country with good working standards.  
 
We have high ethical standards and go through great lengths to make sure that the entire production process is according to our ideals.
 
·      Reach out to women all around the world.
 
A beautiful worldwide-website with good shipping and delivering service would greatly benefit our cause.
 
·      Finding a design and material that is attractive to most women.
 
By consulting fashion designers and consultants, we strive to create a product attractive to a wide range of personalities.

story:
• I'm Erwin Kingsley.  I am retired with over 40 years of experience in design and fabrication.  I have developed several successful products including fiberglass pool resurfacing and a unique wall mounted roll top desk.  My partner is Truman Allen who is a retired engineer with 40 years of experience in spring manufacturing and design of other related equipment. 
  •  We live in Nevada, the Silver State with a rich history in mining, and with the price of gold of course my thoughts turned to gold and how to get it out of our high desert hills.  Unfortunately, although there is lots of gold in Nevada, water is not plentiful.  The creative juices just don't turn off when retirement comes. I knew there must be a way to extract the gold without water.  After 3 years of design, building, redesign and rebuilding we have developed the Gold-Getter which has shown remarkable results in capturing gold without the use of water.The Gold-Getter is able to process approximately one cubic yard of material per hour and captures over 90% of the gold both a vast improvement over other dry separators.  
  • Our goal is to continue personal prospecting but also to build a second generation Gold-Getter that will process up to two cubic yards of material per hour. Which means almost a 100% increase in income. Additionally, we will market the Gold-Getter to other prospectors.   
  • With your contributions we will build our second generation Gold-Getter and market to other dry dirt prospectors as well as continue our person prospecting.  The second generation Gold-Getter will process approximately two cubic yards of material per hour doubling the gold captured.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 We are seeking $12400.00. 

  • 75% to 80% of monies would be used to buy equipment and tooling to build and test our second generation Gold-Getter. 
  • 20% to 25% of monies would support advertising in prospecting magazines.   
  • We value your support and interest and are offering three exciting perk to acknowledge your support: Nevada Gold Flakes sealed a plastic bag, a Nevada Gold paper weight or a Gold Getter 2 plus a day in the Nevada hills using your new machine.

The Impact

 
  • The Gold Getter is lightweight and very portable and our new model will process approximately 2 cubic yards of material per hour with a built in rock separator (not huge boulders).  This is very efficient.  It also has a very high percentage of gold recovery without a lot of set up time or adjusting as required with other dry dirt processors.  The Gold-Getter makes prospecting more attainable and successful for the beginner or seasoned gold prospector.

story:
Club Alert

...is an accessory developed for golfers, to help alert them when they are about to leave a club behind and walk away to the next hole. If you are a golfer - you will understand the problem and reason for this. If not then trust us, there is a need, ask any regular golfer.

 

The product comprises a small 'dongle' that fits neatly into the handle of the golf club, and a smartphone APP. When a club is removed from the bag the APP keeps track of it. If you stray more than 35yards from it then an alarm, or vibrate of the 'phone alerts you.

Up to 14 units can be purchased to cover every club in the bag.

Designers

The designers of this product had a working prototype 3 years ago, but due to the cost of production and technology, it was shelved as being too expensive to sell. Early last year when new technology became available, and smartphones able to be used as the 'receiver', the project was resurrected.

Working prototypes are now available, and it is only the cost of enclosure tooling and initial assembly costs that are holding things back.

One of the designers has over 35 years experience in running an electronics business, and the other experience of marketing and systems. Both are obviously keen golfers.

What We Need

We now have the prototypes working, and a limited number of handmade enclosures. What we need is the finance to produce the tooling for the enclosure, and then enough for setup and manufacture of the first 1000 units.

Equity/Shareholdings also available for the right funding, Contact us.
