story:
hi, my name is chi and i am the designer (and pattern maker, and seamstress ^^) of the last + the lost.

after pining over a job in the fashion industry for years, i finally made the leap into a fashion design program to pursue my passion. my personal interests, which center mainly around japanese culture, music, art, and of course street fashion, shine through in my work to create a unique view on personal style.

the last + the lost will be my debut as a women's wear designer and my chance to put what i know and what i love about fashion into the world. my design philosophy is centered around individuality and ease with a touch of fantasy, the key to a perfect outfit in my opinion! 

though i am still a student in design school, i am confident that i have a unique view in the fashion realm to share with the world. to take my designs from the sketch pad and put them on fashionistas on the street i need to be able to invest in a quality sewing machine and the best fabrics i can find to translate my vision. help me bring the last + the lost to life! ♡

story:
A few weeks ago, my GPA was taken from Stages Nightclub. Since then, I have gone through different stages of hatred for the thief and blaming myself for leaving it in that position, but none of that will bring it back. So a replacement is needed, and while the sentimental value lost is saddening, the financial cost needed for replacement is also quite a hit for someone on a college budget.

Knowing how our Unique Queen's community works, I have a plan to ease the financial strain, as well as give my GPA 2.0 a whole new meaning to me. By shamelessly selling myself out to anyone willing to help my cause, I will hopefully fundraise enough money to pay for another jacket, as well as jacket bars and sewing costs that I have put into my previous GPA. While the Goal I have set is 500$, that is simply because the jacket was fairly decorated at the time, and it will take some extra money to replace all the bars on the jacket. rest assured, I have no intents on spending any money on non jacket related expenses.

Rewards will work throughout the school year, and while I encourage you to use them up in this school year, I will never turn someone's request down if they have supported me through this.  After donation, I will message you my contact information for your use at any time. If for some reason, you haven't heard from me after two days of donating, please text me at 1-613-929-1755, or Facebook message me. The problem is probably that I can't find your contact information, as I really will try to contact everyone. Throughout the year, I will send small reminders to make sure you get your money's worth. 

IMPORTANT: IndieGoGo can be a little tedious to create an account to just donate 5$, so if you would rather just transfer money in person I will gladly bike to wherever you live and collect myself. Rewards will still count for any donations outside of the IndieGoGo.

If by chance that you lovely people give me more than I need, then I will pass it on to the next GPA-less student in need, and hopefully turn this initiative into a fun way for anyone to reimburse their jacket loss. 

I'm interested to see how you respond Queen's, hopefully you can give me a silver lining for this shitty luck.

story:
The Makeup Frame ~Organize Your Beautiful Life~

I've always had a passion for creating products that simplify life. Maybe that's just a fancy way of saying that I'm always looking to make life just a little bit easier. I'm a product designer/inventor that's been living my passion for the past 15 years. I have created products such as Zen-ergy and The Jewelry Frame in the recent past. Now with this product, The Makeup Frame, I truly believe that it will help many. Not only has it saved me time (not that I mind waiting for my wife) But also money because my wife no longer unnecessarily replaces makeup products because she simply can not find it! Well Indiegogoers, I humbly Thank You for your time and support and I know this product will be of great use!

 

The Makeup Frame Takes the clutter off your counter and beautifully organizes it on your wall. You'll love this product!!!

 

              Organize Your Beautiful Life

 

We have proven the concept, refined the design, finalized our production plans and have already established manufacturing partners. Due to the great initial cost of manufacturing we need your help to move this through to production. We will use the Indiegogo funds to not only move The Makeup Frame into production but also to get your very own Makeup Frame packaged and shipped right to your doorstep, or anywhere you please for that matter.

                      What can The Makeup Frame do for you?

  • Avoids Clutter
  • Avoids lost Makeup
  • Saves you time when getting ready
  • Creates Art on your wall
  • Great For Dorms as well
Look familiar??
 
SOLUTION!!!!

story:
We are launching a special Indie GoGo project for five days only!

Our project for the iPad will only be available on Indie GoGo until Friday, December 9th! This is the last chance to become a backer for the Styló stylus and purchase it for only $15 dollars (+ $5 shipping).


Styló | Never a pen, Stylus by Nature

Why does a stylus have to be a pen? Your interaction with touchscreen devices is so much different from your interaction with paper. Your touchscreen device is so much more sophisticated than paper. Now there is a stylus that will match the sophistication of your device.

The Styló stylus is what you were looking for in a stylus. It was designed from the very beginning to be a stylus. Each aspect, from shape to materials, serve a function essential to the final design. By supporting our project you could be one of the first to receive a stylus that truly looks and functions as it should.
















Styló | Why You Want It

There are some things your fingers just can't do. Sometimes you need precision and consistency that you can only get with a well designed tool. You don't finger paint your meeting notes, and you can't perform certain tasks with your fingers effectively on a tablet. It's very difficult to write notes or sketch effectively when you're just using your finger, therefore we designed the Styló stylus. Also, don't forget it's impossible to use your fingers when your wearing gloves!

The Styló stylus works with any capacitive touchscreen device. What devices are capacitive touchscreens? Pretty much any new touchscreen device is capacitive. Android, iOS, and Windows Phone 7 run on capacitive touchscreen devices, and the Styló stylus was designed for all of them. It's extremely responsive across all the devices we've tested!


Styló | Features


Rare Earth Magnets

The Styló stylus attaches to the screen of the iPad 2 with two rare earth magnets, it’ll even work with the Smart Cover. No pen clip and a streamlined design that’s comfortable and practical. It’s always with your tablet. There at your convenience.


Double Tip Design

We thought about how you interact with a tablet. It’s quick and intuitive and there’s no right or wrong way. That’s why you can just pick up the Styló stylus and interact, it’s as natural as using your finger. Don’t think, just draw.


Unique Design

Many say looks don’t matter, we disagree. Every element on the Styló stylus is there for a reason, both aesthetics and function. It’s an uncompromising designer stylus, yet affordable for everyone. Never a pen, stylus by nature.


Premium Materials

Only the highest quality materials and finishes were selected to provide you with the best possible stylus. High quality foam, anodized aluminum, and a rare earth magnet perform their functions flawlessly. No compromises, only the best.


Styló | Colors!

With your backing, you will get to vote on the first Styló stylus color that will be available! Check out our options below and select your favorite!












































































































Styló | Project Status

We have been crafting the Styló stylus for a while, making sure it meets strict quality requirements we determined. This process is nearing its end, and the Styló stylus will soon be available for purchase. We are missing one thing and need your help with it. Funding is the most important part of any project. Without funding, many projects don't suceed.

We are trying to raise $2,500 for the first production run of the Styló stylus and will reward you for your donation. If you are interested in our product, please contribute as much as you can. If you don't have a use for our product, please share our page with anyone you know. Word of mouth is the most powerful advertising tool and we could use your help!

If you need any other information, just let us know and we'll respond as soon as we can!


Styló | Get the Word Out!

We appreciate all your support with our project. There are several things you can do to help us that we'll greatly appreciate. Donations are obviously always welcome! We could also use your support in getting the word out about our project. Please share this project with whomever you can, it's the most important thing you can do to support us. The more people that hear about it, the greater chance we have in succeeding.

We're also big fans of critical feedback. If there's something we could improve, or that you just don't like, don't hesitate to let us know. We promise we won't be offended and we'd rather know about it now as soon as possible.

Thank you everyone for your support!


Styló | Thank you!

Because we can't thank you enough for your support, thank you again!
story_txt:
We are launching a special Indie GoGo project for five days only!
Our project for the iPad will only be available on Indie GoGo until Friday, December 9th! This is the last chance to become a backer for the Styló stylus and purchase it for only $15 dollars (+ $5 shipping).

Styló | Never a pen, Stylus by Nature
Why does a stylus have to be a pen? Your interaction with touchscreen devices is so much different from your interaction with paper. Your touchscreen device is so much more sophisticated than paper. Now there is a stylus that will match the sophistication of your device.
The Styló stylus is what you were looking for in a stylus. It was designed from the very beginning to be a stylus. Each aspect, from shape to materials, serve a function essential to the final design. By supporting our project you could be one of the first to receive a stylus that truly looks and functions as it should.















Styló | Why You Want It
There are some things your fingers just can't do. Sometimes you need precision and consistency that you can only get with a well designed tool. You don't finger paint your meeting notes, and you can't perform certain tasks with your fingers effectively on a tablet. It's very difficult to write notes or sketch effectively when you're just using your finger, therefore we designed the Styló stylus. Also, don't forget it's impossible to use your fingers when your wearing gloves!

The Styló stylus works with any capacitive touchscreen device. What devices are capacitive touchscreens? Pretty much any new touchscreen device is capacitive. Android, iOS, and Windows Phone 7 run on capacitive touchscreen devices, and the Styló stylus was designed for all of them. It's extremely responsive across all the devices we've tested!


Styló | Features

Rare Earth Magnets
The Styló stylus attaches to the screen of the iPad 2 with two rare earth magnets, it’ll even work with the Smart Cover. No pen clip and a streamlined design that’s comfortable and practical. It’s always with your tablet. There at your convenience.

Double Tip Design
We thought about how you interact with a tablet. It’s quick and intuitive and there’s no right or wrong way. That’s why you can just pick up the Styló stylus and interact, it’s as natural as using your finger. Don’t think, just draw.

Unique Design
Many say looks don’t matter, we disagree. Every element on the Styló stylus is there for a reason, both aesthetics and function. It’s an uncompromising designer stylus, yet affordable for everyone. Never a pen, stylus by nature.

Premium Materials
Only the highest quality materials and finishes were selected to provide you with the best possible stylus. High quality foam, anodized aluminum, and a rare earth magnet perform their functions flawlessly. No compromises, only the best.

Styló | Colors!
With your backing, you will get to vote on the first Styló stylus color that will be available! Check out our options below and select your favorite!






















































































































































Styló | Project Status
We have been crafting the Styló stylus for a while, making sure it meets strict quality requirements we determined. This process is nearing its end, and the Styló stylus will soon be available for purchase. We are missing one thing and need your help with it. Funding is the most important part of any project. Without funding, many projects don't suceed.
We are trying to raise $2,500 for the first production run of the Styló stylus and will reward you for your donation. If you are interested in our product, please contribute as much as you can. If you don't have a use for our product, please share our page with anyone you know. Word of mouth is the most powerful advertising tool and we could use your help!
If you need any other information, just let us know and we'll respond as soon as we can!


Styló | Get the Word Out!


We appreciate all your support with our project. There are several things you can do to help us that we'll greatly appreciate. Donations are obviously always welcome! We could also use your support in getting the word out about our project. Please share this project with whomever you can, it's the most important thing you can do to support us. The more people that hear about it, the greater chance we have in succeeding.
We're also big fans of critical feedback. If there's something we could improve, or that you just don't like, don't hesitate to let us know. We promise we won't be offended and we'd rather know about it now as soon as possible.
Thank you everyone for your support!


Styló | Thank you!
Because we can't thank you enough for your support, thank you again!

story:
Short Summary

Hello! Thanks for visiting this project! Tanya Huang here. I'm the designer and founder of Knot Theory design house.

Last year I started a Knot Theory project on KickStarter, and it was a successl. Following that, Knot Theory and I had an amazing experience pitching on the reality TV show Dragons' Den (Can't disclose the outcome until it airs!) Following that, we've been in magazines, newspapers, and TV shows. Knot Theory has been worn by actors and TV hosts on the red carpet. Right now we are in 3 stores in Canada, and online we have awesome customers from 14 countries around the world!

This year, I'd like to give back through this "Pink it up! For the great women in your life" campaign. We officially partnered with Canadian Breast Cancer Foundation, and will donate 20% of proceeds to the Foundation. Breast cancer doesn't just effect women - it affects all of us! Imagine the women in your life getting cancer. It would shake your world up! It shook up my world when my dear friend and role model passed away last year from breast cancer.

I truly believe we can create a future without breast cancer, through better prevention and early detection. So let's Pink it up! For the great women in our lives!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to sell 100 pink-knotted ties and pink bow ties!

In this campaign, you save up to 20% on Knot Theory with no taxes and no shipping (in North America), plus the first time ever offered Knot Theory lifetime VIP membership - giving all the Knot Theory perks in the future, plus 10% off on all Knot Theory products from our website, for life! A pretty sweet offer that may only be offered this one time!

Once we reach the $5000 funding milestone, everyone gets a PERK UPGRADE! If you live in Vancouver, Canada, you'll receive an invitation to our famous and exclusive Pink it up! photoshoot party! If you don't live in Vancouver, no worries, we have a long distance gift for you! You'll receive 20% OFF on your future purchase with Knot Theory from our website!

PERKS!

See more photos of coloured knots!

See more photos of the 4-way bow tie!

See more photos of Duel III necktie !

See more photos of Duel IV necktie!


See more photos of Duel V necktie!

See more photos of Duel VI necktie!


 

A Future Without Breast Cancer

In the past few years, breast cancer campaigns' main goals are simply to raise awareness. Now, we have established a solid foundation in aweareness, I'm happy to see the next goals, which are very concrete steps to create a future without breast cancer, such as through early detection and prevention. It is no longer an impossible vision, and your contribution will help achieve it!

Knot Theory has officially partnered with Canadian Breast Cancer Foundation, and will donate 20% proceeds to the Foundation. 20% is a big portion of our revenue! We are able to do this through the help of many great people! Models, actors, TV hosts, photographers, videographers, makeup artists, hair stylists and many more - everyone came together to support this initiative! 

If we reach or exceed our goal, we can make a real difference in diminishing breast cancer. The success of this campaign also means we can return next year to contribute more! 

 

About Knot Theory

Knot Theory ties and bow ties are like no other. Innovation is what we live by, so we constantly invent, improve, and re-engineer, to bring you the very best. interchangeable  coloured knots, new tie silhouettes, 16-way bow ties, and so much more.

You are what you wear - Knot Theory always attracts the creative and confident ones! ;)

We are super proud of our designs and quality, so check out our website (www.knotheory.com) for photos, videos, and testimonials!

 
 

FAQ

When will my pink perk arrive?

We will aim to ship out all orders by November 30th, 2012!

For Canadian orders, perks are shipped via Canada Xpresspost or Small Packet Air, arriving in 1 to 3 business days.

For US and International Orders, perks are shipped via Small Packet Air, arriving in 7 to 10 business days. 

If you need them sooner, you can also order from Knot Theory's website www.knotheory.com!

Is there a charge for international shipping?

Yes, but we want to give you the lowest shipping charge possible! For shipping outside of North America, please add $5 for knots and bow tie perks, and add $10 for necktie perks. For more than 3 ties, please contact us for shipping cost.

If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?

Just email us! info@knotheory.com

 

Ways you can help!

Here are the TOP 5  best ways you can help!

  1. Wear your pink-knotted ties and pink bow ties often!
  2. Post a photo of your gorgeous self in the tie, or send it to us to post!
  3. Gift the pink-knotted ties and pink bow ties to your loved ones!
  4. Like Knot Theory on Facebook and share our photos!
  5. Follow Knot Theory on Twitter and retweet us! (@knotheory)

 

Thanks for your support! I hope to see you soon - in a pink knotted photo onilne or at our Pink it up! photoshoot party!!

:)

love,
Tanya

 

 

Dawson (Wilhelmina Models Vancouver). Photo by talented Machuca Photography

Bridget (InspirationAll Talents & Modeling booking agent) and Andrew (Photographer, model). Photo by talented Machuca Photography

 

Actress Kyra Zargorsky and actor Patrick Sabongui. Photo by talented Machuca Photography 

InspirationAll booking agent Yogi Omar, actress Katie Findlay, fashion designer Carlie Wong. Photo by talented Machuca Photography

Laura Forsythe (CEO of Wilhelmina Models Vancouver), Tricia Romani (President of Wilhelmina Models Vancouver & InspirationAll Talents & Modelling Group), and the gang! Photo by talented Machuca Photography

Photo by talented Andrew Leduc

Photo by talented Andrew Leduc

Photo by talented Andrew Leduc

story:
endurance Junkie started in 2010 from a profound passion for Ironman triathlon and the simple idea of developing the best and most comfortable triathlon suit possible. How?  By integrating the extraordinary properties of Merino wool.

Soft next to the skin, breathable and anti-static, it keeps you warm when the climate is cold yet releases body heat and moisture when it’s hot. So it helps athletes perform at their peak, whether it is in Hawaii or in Norway.

The 2014 Sleeveless and Short Sleeved Sportwool Tri Suits

“I like this Sportwool Suit….a lot! By using Sportwool, endurance Junkie are doing something unique, bringing high performance technology to the triathlon market.” (Daniel Ward – Everymantri.com)

"Innovative tri-suit that performs superbly in open-water events. 91%"
(220 Triathlon Magazine)


The 2014 Hoodies

The 2014 T-Shirts

Why Did We Launch endurance Junkie

It all started with one merino and some twentyish Lycra bike jerseys. Whether I was going for a run or a bike ride, if that merino jersey was available, it was the jersey of choice. Cool, highly moisture wicking and oh so comfortable to wear. "Would this work in a tri suit?" I asked myself multiple times.

After saying and thinking along these lines for about two years, it was time to act. We sourced some fabric, had a couple of prototypes made and contacted some high level athletes to test the suits in race conditions.

The feedback we received was unanimously positive and that’s where the journey began!

How Can You Help

We’ve been working on race apparel for over four years now. We've added some two-piece race kits, hoodies and some basic bike gear to the range. We have Kona Age Group champions that train and race in endurance Junkie and a growing customer base. 

The feedback we have received from them has been incredible so far and now with your support we would like to continue to expand our product range. 

As an endurance Junkie backer, you will help fund: 

- Production of the summer bike training range.
- Development and production of a full range of winter training gear, like winter tights, wind gilets and rain jackets.
- Produce more tri suit color combinations so there is definitely one for you.
- Design and production of casual pre and post race gear, like t-shirts, hoodies and caps.

Men's Summer Bike Jersey's

And for the Ladies

Featuring a quarter-length zip with chin guard, 3 exterior back pockets with headphone cord pass-through and a silicone waist gripper, the jerseys are made from the same soft and light 20%-80% Merino/Polyester blend that is used in the Sportwool tri suits. They are ideal for Spring training rides but can also hold their own during long distance races in the hottest months of the year.

The Sportive Bib Short

The Impact

Our reach only goes so far beyond our networks. Liking us on Facebook, Twitter or sending a few quick emails to friends and family can go a long way to help us ensure success! Spread the word!


We are aware of the risks that similar crowdfunding campaigns face. We have worked hard to put all the necessary logistics in place to avoid such occurrences.  If somewhere along the way we find that there is a setback in production, or that we cannot make meet the deadline, we will be as transparent as possible to keep all of our backers informed.

In the end, we want to make endurance Junkie a long-lasting brand of top-notch endurance apparel. We will do whatever it takes to fulfill our promises and to deliver gear that will exceed our backers’ expectations.

So, we are working hard on this little business and have only one thing in mind: develop, manufacture and sell the best multisport and triathlon apparel available on the market, so that you can achieve YOUR sporting goals.

Thank you, thank you, thank you!

Peter


FAQ

A. If I pledge will I 100% get my perks?

That's 100% YES. We are a flexible funding campaign. This means even if we do not reach our funding goal all pledgers will receive there gear. 

B. When are we going to receive our perks?

Our goal is to begin shipping mid June 2014.

C. What sizes does endurance Junkie offer?

We offer womens size X-Small to X-Large and mens size Small to XX-Large. Please see our size guide for full details.

D. How do I add my size and color to my perk?

You don't :-) We will contact you by email to obtain your size and color choice.

E. I’m an international backer. Can you deliver to my country?

Yes, we deliver worldwide! After choosing your perk, please add € 5 to the "How Much Would You Like To Contribute" box for shipping to Europe and € 15 for all other destinations. Please note that we are not responsible for customs duties and procedures.

  • Sharing our website www.findmine.us 
  • Signing up for our private beta at www.findmine.us You won't get in as early as a contributor but you'll be in line ahead of the general public.

story:
----------------------------------------------------------------

WE DID IT!! THOUGH THE GOAL DOESN'T APPEAR TO BE ACCOMPLISHED, WE RENEGOTIATED WITH OUR MANUFACTURERS AND WILL BE BRINGING THE JULIA WATCH TO YOU OCTOBER 31, 2019!!!

----------------------------------------------------------------

 

BUILT FOR MEN AND WOMEN

WHO DESIRE A PERFORMANCE WATCH

 

 

TOUGH & AMBITIOUS, this watch will power all #PITCREW members at every turn in the road.

 

 

PACKED FULL OF FEATURES

Unlike many watches, the Julia  combines Style & Performance like a well-designed race car.  

 

CHOOSE YOUR STYLE

Case Color + Band Color = You become a part of the #PITCREW 

 

 

DRIVE WITH THE LOOK...

 

Performance Black

Undeniably cool and sleek, this watch is for our #PITCREW wanting to keep their edge. 

Champion Gold

Relentless luxury from the start to the finish line, this watch is for the "win-it-all" #PITCREW.

Quicksilver 

Tough and ambitious, this watch will power all #PITCREW members at every lap of the race. 

 

IT'S TIME TO START YOUR ENGINES... 

Since 2007, The Abingdon Co. has supported powerful women through timeless yet functional watches. THE JULIA is our latest addition. It's uniqueness is defined by offering critical time gauges for performance with the best functions of an Abingdon watch. 

UNIQUE TO THE JULIA

  • Miyota FS20 Japanese Multi Function Movement with 3 Hands and Date
  • Stopwatch up to 60 minutes
  • Inner Rotating Bezel for 2nd Time Zone
  • Military Time Conversion
  • Tachymeter for converting elapsed time (in seconds per unit) to speed (in units per hour)
  • 40mm Case Size
  • 316L Steel Case
  • Genuine Mother-of-Pearl Dial
  • 20MM metal and leather band options

 

STANDARD FUNCTIONS ON ALL ABINGDON WATCHES

(Including the Julia watch)

 

MEET THE CREW

Julia Landauer:  2X champion NASCAR driver, motivational speaker, and non-profit ambassador. She was the first woman to win a NASCAR Track Championship in her division at Motor Mile Speedway in 2015 and has continued to defy stereotypes in a male-dominated sports industry. 

Outside of her racing career, Julia travels around the country as a motivational speaker and advocates for STEAM education and women's empowerment for all ages.

Abingdon Mullin:  Pilot, SCUBA diver, and CEO of The Abingdon Co. She launched the company in 2007 when she wanted a pilot's watch made for her. Now 12 years later, The Abingdon Co. offers watches for female pilots, divers, travel junkies, and mechanics.

Abingdon also acts as President of the Abingdon Foundation, a non-profit which provides opportunities to women interested in exploring STEAM industries as a career or hobby.

 

 

OUR "BIG TICKET" FANS

The Abingdon Co. is grateful for our amazing customer support over the years. 

OUR (RACE) TRACK RECORD

When you race with us, you are guaranteed to win. 

With our past crowdfunding experience and strong customer base, we are confident that we will reach our funding goal. During our last Kickstarter campaign, we successfully exceeded our funding goal and delivered all of our perks early or on-time. 

Over 12 years in the watch industry, the Abingdon Co. has strengthened ties with manufacturers and trusted partners to continue to deliver the best products.

We will maintain our high standards for the Julia watch. 

 

THE COURSE 

 

Although the finish line is far ahead,

we are ready for this race.

Choose your perk and join our #PITCREW today.
story_txt:
----------------------------------------------------------------WE DID IT!! THOUGH THE GOAL DOESN'T APPEAR TO BE ACCOMPLISHED, WE RENEGOTIATED WITH OUR MANUFACTURERS AND WILL BE BRINGING THE JULIA WATCH TO YOU OCTOBER 31, 2019!!!---------------------------------------------------------------- BUILT FOR MEN AND WOMENWHO DESIRE A PERFORMANCE WATCH  TOUGH & AMBITIOUS, this watch will power all #PITCREW members at every turn in the road.  PACKED FULL OF FEATURESUnlike many watches, the Julia  combines Style & Performance like a well-designed race car.   CHOOSE YOUR STYLECase Color + Band Color = You become a part of the #PITCREW   DRIVE WITH THE LOOK... Performance BlackUndeniably cool and sleek, this watch is for our #PITCREW wanting to keep their edge. Champion GoldRelentless luxury from the start to the finish line, this watch is for the "win-it-all" #PITCREW.Quicksilver Tough and ambitious, this watch will power all #PITCREW members at every lap of the race.  IT'S TIME TO START YOUR ENGINES... Since 2007, The Abingdon Co. has supported powerful women through timeless yet functional watches. THE JULIA is our latest addition. It's uniqueness is defined by offering critical time gauges for performance with the best functions of an Abingdon watch. UNIQUE TO THE JULIA
Miyota FS20 Japanese Multi Function Movement with 3 Hands and Date
Stopwatch up to 60 minutes
Inner Rotating Bezel for 2nd Time Zone
Military Time Conversion
Tachymeter for converting elapsed time (in seconds per unit) to speed (in units per hour)
40mm Case Size
316L Steel Case
Genuine Mother-of-Pearl Dial
20MM metal and leather band options
 STANDARD FUNCTIONS ON ALL ABINGDON WATCHES(Including the Julia watch) MEET THE CREWJulia Landauer:  2X champion NASCAR driver, motivational speaker, and non-profit ambassador. She was the first woman to win a NASCAR Track Championship in her division at Motor Mile Speedway in 2015 and has continued to defy stereotypes in a male-dominated sports industry. Outside of her racing career, Julia travels around the country as a motivational speaker and advocates for STEAM education and women's empowerment for all ages.Abingdon Mullin:  Pilot, SCUBA diver, and CEO of The Abingdon Co. She launched the company in 2007 when she wanted a pilot's watch made for her. Now 12 years later, The Abingdon Co. offers watches for female pilots, divers, travel junkies, and mechanics.Abingdon also acts as President of the Abingdon Foundation, a non-profit which provides opportunities to women interested in exploring STEAM industries as a career or hobby.
  OUR "BIG TICKET" FANSThe Abingdon Co. is grateful for our amazing customer support over the years. OUR (RACE) TRACK RECORDWhen you race with us, you are guaranteed to win. With our past crowdfunding experience and strong customer base, we are confident that we will reach our funding goal. During our last Kickstarter campaign, we successfully exceeded our funding goal and delivered all of our perks early or on-time. Over 12 years in the watch industry, the Abingdon Co. has strengthened ties with manufacturers and trusted partners to continue to deliver the best products.We will maintain our high standards for the Julia watch.  THE COURSE  Although the finish line is far ahead,we are ready for this race.Choose your perk and join our #PITCREW today.

story:
Waving goodbye to cash

 

 

With the rise of contactless payments, more of us than ever are ditching cash in favour of the trusty debit/credit card. MD of leading payments company WorldPay said recently that “10% of us don’t carry cash on us at all". 

Despite this clear shift in spending patterns, the way we carry our money remains unchanged and out-dated, often with cumbersome leather wallets designed to hold notes and coins. Style and functionality just hasn’t caught up yet. 

This inspired us to design a sleek, no-nonsense cardholder which is both fun and functional whilst cutting out excess bulk and material you just don’t need. A cardholder that also helps protect your cards from RFID fraud and also prevents card clash.

Its precise edges and smooth body make it feel more like a piece of tech than a fashion accessory. And although the N1 & N2 are not tech devices, they deliver that same simplicity, minimalism and sophistication we now expect from our handheld products.

 

Features

 
  • Machined from high grade aluminium.
  • Carry up to 10 cards including a few bills.
  • RFID blocking.
  • Interchangeable coloured straps
  • Dimensions: 100m x 67m x 12m.
  • Easy access to your cards.

 

 
In the Press:
 

 

Team Bio

 

 

With a strong background and long careers in product design, branding and sales, We have the necessary skills and experience to develop and deliver a quality product.

Qualifications between us: 
- 1st Class Honours Degree in Product Design 
- BTEC Level 2 Diploma in Photography 
- Fellow of the RSA

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have established relationships with all our manufacturers and suppliers, agreed costs and timelines and are ready to go. We also have contingency suppliers/manufactures in place.

We have experience in planning and executing product delivery and are aware that delays and challenges do arise from time to time. We have learnt that the best way to deal with these is through clear and transparent communication with customers and effective problem solving and management of our suppliers/manufacturers.

story:
ABOUT THIS PROJECT

By purchasing a t-shirt, you are bringing joy to a child in the hospital fighting a battle.  With every t-shirt you purchase, we will give a t-shirt to a child in the hospital.

We all know the feeling of comfort putting on that favorite t-shirt of ours.  I think no matter how young or old we are, we are always excited to receive a cool, new t-shirt.  Noah's goal is to bring that same excitement to children in hospitals across the country, fighting their crusade.  

Every year thousands of children have lengthy hospital stays, some lasting months at a time.  Noah wants to bring hope, comfort, and smiles to these children by brightening their day with a new inspiring t-shirt.

"A single smile is a cure for anything.  It penetrates the human heart causing it to beat faster.  A single smile means warmth, satisfaction, happiness, and most of all it means life.  People smiling know and understand they have something worth living for."  -Andriana Kelisakieva

Click the link below to read the full about.

CLICK HERE - FOR FULL ABOUT

CLICK HERE - FOR FULL ABOUT

CLICK HERE - FOR FULL ABOUT

Where you come in.

I now reach out to you to help turn my vision into a reality.  Every contribution received will be GREATLY appreciated.  A handwritten thank you note will be sent to each person who has a hand in helping us get our start.  Also, for each level of donation, you will receive some fun perks!  Please keep in mind if this project is not fully funded we receive 0 funding!

We are running this campaign to help raise funds to cover our initial production costs. (screen printing fees, graphic designer fees, web fees, flyers, stickers, and various other materials)

*The limited edition t-shirt is a special shirt only for this occasion.  We will only make as many as the amount of people who donate at that level.  The t-shirt will never be reproduced or available to the public. 

1st Design of Children Designs


Few of Adult Designs

story:
Short Summary

Shai-anne is an up and coming athlete striving to be one of the best sprinters world wide. Her aim is to bring medals home for her country over the next several years.

With Worlds in Russia in 2013, Panams in Toronto in 2015 and The Olympics in Rio in 2016, Shai-anne is going to have her opportunity to get those medals! She is looking strong going into this season with more hunger than ever.

Her coaches and her are continuously making changes to her training plan so that she is able to reach her full potential.

What she needs: 

Getting to the next level is not only about the training, there are many other greater aspects to this that include the financial support that many international caliber athletes do not receive.

With your help and support, Shai-anne will be able to continue what she is doing and focus her time and energy on her training.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't in a position to give financially, please take a minute and share this page with your network of friends and collegues. Maybe there is someone out there looking to invest in an Olympic hopeful!

story:
Hi my name is Margo Tamara and I am the founder, designer for The Thick Shop.

The Thick Shop is an apparel line created for the fuller figure woman.  I can't tell you how many times I have went out to buy plus size clothing only to find that either they are not true to size or they shrink when you wash them.

After shopping for countless months I found a brand of shirts that were actually true to size and they maintained their shape after washing.  I purchased a few of these shirts and have various slogans on them.  Soon after I began wearing them I was always asked "Where did you get that shirt".  At that moment I realized that something so simple to me actually caught the attention of others.

I have been funding The Thick Shop out of pocket for a few months.  Sales would go better if I actually had some real funding.

I am trying to raise $1000. With all funds raised from this campaign I will be investing them in purchasing as many shirts, booty shorts, as possible.  It will also allow me to order the Rhinestones in bulk which would allow to better pricing.  I would love to be able to add non rhinestone designed shirts and boxers for men however on the budget I have at the moment it is just a dream. $1000 would also help me get the website up and running as well as help with marketing materials.

Believe it or not every little bit helps.


By helping fund The Thick Shop you will be helping to raise the self-esteem of plus size women.  Not only will they have access to affordable clothing that is their size, they will also having clothing that represents them.  I would be able to hire models, photographer, makeup artist to put out some really nice promotional material.



If you would love to help and just don't have the money at this time:
  • Share this campaign on your facebook or twitter. Help me spread the word.
  • Indiegogo has great share tool be sure to try them as well.


I thank you in advance for even taking the time to consider helping make The Thick Shop a true reality.

story:
Afterparty: 3 Days to Get Involved

Afterparty is the new era in fashion. A bold, sexy and uninhibited brand, designed for you. Nothing but sick streetwear!

We’re launching officially this summer BUT just before we do, we want to give you the chance to become part of the Afterparty family. We’re giving the people that choose to wear Afterparty, the chance to be involved in helping to create the future of fashion.

Be part of making Afterparty by supporting our goal, picking a perk and contributing whatever you like. The more you contribute, the sweeter the deal.

Wear Afterparty

New photos of the upcoming range will be posted here in the next few weeks so keep coming back to check them out! Or if you're a contributor, we'll email you.

Your Reward, from Afterparty

Everyone that contributes within our 30 day deadline gets their pic on the Afterparty photowall, which will be a permanent feature on the official Afterparty website. A small thanks for your support in helping make Afterparty come to life. We'll also give each of you a shout-out to all Afterparty followers on twitter! (@AfterpartyLdn)

You will also get exclusive access to the Afterparty online store (*PRE-LAUNCH*) where you can choose your free perk if applicable or alternatively you'll be able to pick up some fresh new Afterparty gear which will ONLY be available to IndieGoGo contributors for a limited number of days.

Finally, every single one of you that gets involved here on IndieGoGo will get early VIP access to new products, designs and events plus pre-launch exclusive offers.

Here are the details on all of your perks. Remember, all of the above stuff is included in addition to each of the rewards below:

£5

Thanks for getting involved! You're one of us.

Pin on Photowall, Social Shout-Out + Exclusive VIP Offers

£25

Classic Afterparty Tee or Vest

Pin on Photowall, Social Shout-Out + Exclusive VIP Offers

£50

1 Afterparty item of your choice

Pin on Photowall, Social Shout-Out + Exclusive VIP Offers

£100

2 Afterparty items of your choice

Pin on Photowall, Social Shout-Out + Exclusive VIP Offers

£250

5 Afterparty items of your choice

Lifetime Afterparty Membership + 10% VIP Discount

Pin on Photowall, Social Shout-Out + Exclusive VIP Offers

£500

10 Afterparty items of your choice

Lifetime Afterparty Membership + 20% VIP Discount

Exclusive Afterparty Events Access

Pin on Photowall, Social Shout-Out + Exclusive VIP Offers

There's More!

We've got a lot more planned for you that we can't mention here. But you can trust us when we say that we'll be looking after each and every one of you that gets involved today and becomes part of the Afterparty family.

We'll be in touch personally with everyone who gets involved via IndieGoGo with details of how to pick up your reward/s.

Wanna be part of the Afterparty team? Get in touch now!

Even if you decide not to contribute; if you love fashion, cool brands and want to be part of the hottest new label around, then get in touch right now…we WANT to hear from you!

Email: hi@afterpartylondon.com

story:
Because you deserve something better to keep you warm in cold temperatures

Regular winter jackets do not keep you warm. Luxury jackets are too expensive and do not keep you warm for long either. Existing heated jackets do not really work.

We brought you a fashionable Heated Vest which is for inner and outer use to ensure maximum thermal protection and performance with minimum weight addition. It keeps you warm and comfortable in cold environments while doing any kind of outdoor professional or leisure activities.

Featured in:

Heating locations:

The best strategy designed to make sure your body stays warm.

By locating the heating pads in the optimum locations on the body, full body heating can be achieved in a long-lasting, lightweight package.



Features and Benefits:

Rewards:

History:


2013-2014                                                            2015

From metallic heating pads                    Non-woven fabric heating pads

Warmest duration from 2 hours             7 hours approximately

Lowest warm duration 6 hours               18 hours approximately

Washable by hand                                     Washable in washer machine

Outer use of heated jackets                    Inner & Out use of Heated Vest

Inner & Outer Use

Machine washable:

Waterproof:

Relieve Back Pain: Chronic Pain


Stay Warm Longer:

The Story behind that exciting heated vest:

Being from the Dominican Republic, I am used to living in a tropical paradise. So you can imagine how shocking it was to experience my first winter in Germany! Needless to say, no matter how much money I invested in staying warm, I just could not get used to the frigid temperatures. Layering my clothing just made me look like a big puffy penguin. Believe me when I tell you this was not the sexiest or most masculine image! Plus, my pocketbook was becoming lighter and lighter as I tried without success to stay warm. Although that first winter was tough, I actually enjoyed watching the snow fall to the ground for the first time. There was something very beautiful about seeing ice-covered trees. I realized if I was going to call Germany home, I would have to find a solution to my winter dilemma.

For two years I put my nose to the grindstone working on various mock-ups of my ideal winter vest. I knew it had to be lightweight, fashionable, and warm. I had to avoid anything that seemed bulky or unattractive. After much trial and error, and with the strong support of a wonderful team, the Heated Vest was born. Weighing in at just under seven ounces, this vest can withstand temperatures as low as minus forty degrees Fahrenheit. Because of its sleek design, the heated vest can be worn under your current winter gear. How does it keep you warm? The secret is the battery-operated heating system that is temperature controlled for your comfort. The battery runs a full eighteen hours and is removable for washing. Rather than adding bulk to the vest, the battery weighs less than a pound and tucks comfortably inside the vest without compromising design and style.

As someone who has lived his whole life in a tropical climate, I assure you if this vest can keep me warm in the winter, it can keep anyone warm. I invite you to join me in this investment journey as together we warm the world!


Some of use cases:

Risks and challenges:

We believe that no one wants to see an excellent idea executed poorly, especially one called the Copertura Label fashionable heating jacket. We have worked extremely hard to get this product for Indiegogo. However, there could be things we might consider as risks:

MANUFACTURING: We are dealing with only one manufacturer. They have capacity to produce over a thousand pieces a day. More colors we have more time it requests to process the vests.

FULFILLMENT: To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks, we will use express services. In case of a delay, we have an other manufacturer as a backup supplier for the garments.

We are working with a manufacturer who have many years of experience in delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities in a very short time. We have no doubt that something can happen, but obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and providing the best possible fashionable heating jacket you, our first lovely customers.

Any pledge amount brings us one step forward to reach our aim. Help us make Copertura Label the first fashion brand that brings the first fashionable heated vest  by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by spreading the word in your social network or community.

Find us on our social media platforms, to know more and interact with us. Find us in Facebook and Twitter.

For you kindness, goodness and a better cold protection, we want to THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING US!

The team:

 Yves Pierre (Ivers) very passionate about technology and design. He has come up with a Concept brand name which combines both together to give us unique and special products. He has strong background in Sales, Business developement, Human resources and customer service. His background studies are layed on business studies, personal management and design.


Sarah Mensah, German-English has studied Paralegal with very strong background experience in office management and customer relationship with over 10 years of experience. She also enjoys designing clothes, doing illustrations as a hobby.

Darren Marlar is a voice artist, actor, and comedian in Chicago, IL. As an award-winning actor, Darren Marlar has been in dozens of TV and film projects with numerous award nominations at various film festivals, and winning “Best Supporting Actor” for his role in the film “Whom I Fear”.

Craig Sailor is a computer geek from way back and open source proponent as well as being a budding hardware enthusiast.

Timeline:


FAQ:

How can I help with this exciting heated vest?
There are many ways for you to help. You can either back us by placing an order or you can spread the word in your network of family, friends, work environment, etc..

I forgot to add the shipping cost. How can I do that now?
You can still add the shipping fee by using the box contribution to the right of the video.

What are the options of use for this heated vest?
This heated vest was designed to be used under hoodies, suits, and existing jackets and on top of t-shirts and shirts.

Can I get burned when wearing it?
Do not make direct contact of the heated vest on your skin. Always wear something under it to prevent any possibility of burns.

Does the heated vest replace all the jackets?
No. The heated vest was designed to be a complement to your existing garments. It helps you to stay warm in cold temperatures.

Do I need to throw the battery away after it gets discharged?
No. The battery is rechargeable.

How can I use the heated vest with the battery?
We will send you an instruction manual on how to use the battery and the heated vest.

If I order a battery can I use it for something else?
Yes. As long as you know what it can be used for. Plese be aware, in that case, you will automatically loose your warranty on it.

Can I do anything with the heating pads and the battery?
Yes. You are allowed to perform your own experiments with it. We would be very happy if you can show us what you did with it.

Can I order the heating pads and the battery and use it for my own company to build something else?
No. If you are a company, you need to contact our sales team.

What do I need to do if my company wants to order the heating pads to make it own garments?
Your company has to purchase a license from us in order to use it to make its own heated garments.

to experience my first winter in Germany!  Needless to say, no matter 
how much money I invested in staying warm, I just could not get used to 
the frigid temperatures.  Layering my clothing just made me look like a 
big puffy penguin.  Believe me when I tell you this was not the sexiest 
or most masculine image!  Plus, my pocketbook was becoming lighter and 
lighter as I tried without success to stay warm.  Although that first 
winter was tough, I actually enjoyed watching the snow fall to the ground
 for the first time.  There was something very beautiful about seeing 
ice-covered trees.  I realized if I was going to call Germany home, I 
would have to find a solution to my winter dilemma.
For two years I put my nose to the grindstone working on various 
mock-ups of my ideal winter vest.  I knew it had to be lightweight, 
fashionable, and warm.  I had to avoid anything that seemed bulky or 
unattractive.  After much trial and error, and with the strong support 
of a wonderful team, the Heated Vest was born.  Weighing in at just 
under seven ounces, this vest can withstand temperatures as low as minus
 forty degrees Fahrenheit.  Because of its sleek design, the heated vest 
can be worn under your current winter gear.
How does it keep you warm?  The secret is the battery-operated heating 
system that is temperature controlled for your comfort.  The battery 
runs a full eighteen hours and is removable for washing.  Rather than 
adding bulk to the vest, the battery weighs less than a pound and tucks 
comfortably inside the vest without compromising design and style.  As 
someone who has lived his whole life in a tropical climate, I assure you
 if this vest can keep me warm in the winter, it can keep anyone warm.  I
 invite you to join me in this investment journey as together we warm 
the world!

Some of use cases:





Risks and challenges:
We believe that no one wants to see an excellent idea executed 
poorly, especially one called the Copertura Label fashionable heating 
jacket. We have worked extremely hard to get this product for Indiegogo.
 However, there could be things we might consider as risks:
MANUFACTURING: We are dealing with only one manufacturer. They
 have capacity to produce over a thousand pieces a day. More colors we 
have more time it requests to process the vests.
FULFILLMENT: To minimize the possibility of manufacturing 
setbacks, we will use express services. In case of a delay, we have an 
other manufacturer as a backup supplier for the garments.
We are working with a manufacturer who have many years of experience 
in delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities in a very 
short time. We have no doubt that something can happen, but obstacle 
will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external 
expertise, and providing the best possible fashionable heating jacket 
you, our first lovely customers.
Any pledge amount brings us one step forward to reach our aim. Help 
us make Copertura Label the first fashion brand that brings the first 
fashionable heated vest  by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by spreading the word in your social network or community.
Find us on our social media platforms, to know more and interact with us. Find us in Facebook and Twitter.
For you kindness, goodness and a better cold protection, we want to THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING US!
The team:




 


Yves Pierre (Ivers) very passionate about technology and design. He has come up with a Concept brand name which combines both together to give us unique and special products. He has strong background in Sales, Business developement, Human resources and customer service. His background studies are layed on business studies, personal management and design.
	



 



Sarah Mensah, German-English has studied Paralegal with very strong background experience in office management and customer relationship with over 10 years of experience. She also enjoys designing clothes, doing illustrations as a hobby.
	



 


Darren Marlar is a voice artist, actor, and comedian in Chicago, IL.  As an award-winning actor, Darren Marlar has been in dozens of TV and film projects with numerous award nominations at various film festivals, and winning “Best Supporting Actor” for his role in the film “Whom I Fear”. 
	



 


Craig Sailor is a computer geek from way back and open source proponent as well as being a budding hardware enthusiast. 
	









Timeline:


FAQ:
How can I help with this exciting heated vest?
There are many ways for you to help. You can either back us by placing an order or you can spread the word in your network of family, friends, work environment, etc..

I forgot to add the shipping cost. How can I do that now?
You can still add the shipping fee by using the box contribution to the right of the video.

What are the options of use for this heated vest?
This heated vest was designed to be used under hoodies, suits, and existing jackets and on top of t-shirts and shirts.

Can I get burned when wearing it?
Do not make direct contact of the heated vest on your skin. Always wear something under it to prevent any possibility of burns.

Does the heated vest replace all the jackets?
No. The heated vest was designed to be a complement to your existing garments. It helps you to stay warm in cold temperatures.

Do I need to throw the battery away after it gets discharged?
No. The battery is rechargeable.

How can I use the heated vest with the battery?
We will send you an instruction manual on how to use the battery and the heated vest.

If I order a battery can I use it for something else?
Yes. As long as you know what it can be used for. Plese be aware, in that case, you will automatically loose your warranty on it.
Can I do anything with the heating pads and the battery?
Yes. You are allowed to perform your own experiments with it. We would be very happy if you can show us what you did with it.

Can I order the heating pads and the battery and use it for my own company to build something else?
No. If you are a company, you need to contact our sales team.

What do I need to do if my company wants to order the heating pads to make it own garments?
Your company has to purchase a license from us in order to use it to make its own heated garments.

story:
Our Users Have Asked Us to Make Merchandise!

You guys work hard for your money.  Why should you give it to a website that’s been up for about a month?  Well, here is where I’ll introduce myself, and I hope to earn your trust!

  • I’m Adam.  I’m 31 years old.  Originally raised in Pittsburgh, I worked as a concert promoter for nearly 15 years (yes, I got started young).  Now I own a financial planning practice, as well as a financial consulting firm.
  • What I’d like to do is to raise funds to print t-shirts, hoodies, play mats, buttons, and stickers for my regional Magic: The Gathering site, www.rustbeltplaneswalkers.com.
  • I’m passionate about this website, and I’d love to grow the site!  The game of Magic helped me through some really tough emotional times, so I’d like to give back to the community.
  • Before I ran this site, I ran a local punk rock website from 1995 until 2008, which at it’s peak saw 10,000 registered users, and corporate backing from EMI/Capitol Records (you know… the label the Beatles and Rolling Stones were on!)

What We Need & What You Get

So, here’s the deal:

  • We’re looking to raise approximately $825 to start printing merchandise.  We intend to use local print shops, environmentally friendly materials, and distribute through our network of partner local game shops.
  • Perks?  You want ‘em?  We got ‘em!  The essential idea is that you’ll be pre-paying for the merchandise that you’d like to buy.  But that’s not all!  I travel to each of the cities that our website touches, and a donation as little as $3, and I’ll meet you somewhere, and we can play a few games of Magic! 
  • If we don’t reach 100% funding, we’ll take the funds that you’ve been so generous to give us and put the use to a vote!  We’ll determine what items we’d be able to print with the money raised, and allow you to vote on what we have printed.

The Impact

Your contribution will help us to grow the site, and provide quality Magic content for free (something that can’t be said for certain other sites who charge $50 for premium content).  We’ll be able to provide our users with details about local shops and events.  We will also be able to provide our local game shop partners a platform to promote their events and promotions!

  • Sitting at home on a Saturday with nothing to do?  Maybe there’s a win-a-box or a win-a-Mox event going on within driving distance!  Check out our site, and you’ll know!  Remember – NOT all events are listed on Wizard’s Event Locator.  Most people I’ve talked to didn’t hear about the State Championships until two weeks before the event!
  • In the past, with my punk rock site, it evolved into a full-fledged social network (and this was before Friendster, Myspace, Facebook, or Twitter).  We also went on to promote huge concerts, with bands like the All-American Rejects, My Chemical Romance, Thursday, and many, many more.  The goal with this site is to do the same, keeping the punk rock ethics.  Ultimately, we’d like to run large regional Magic events, with good prize support that are well organized!
  • I’m not looking to get rich off of this!  I have a pretty great job that pays the bills.  Anything that this site makes will go back into the site.  I plan to pay our authors, grow the site, and ultimately become thedestination for Magic: The Gathering Players in the Rust Belt area of the United States.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute.  Jobs are scarce, the economy is weak, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Spread the word!  Let people know that we’re looking to help raise funds!  Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • We’re always looking for writers, video content producers, and much, much more!

Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Vinny the Pug's Jewelry Collection

                                                 by

                                    "Irish Crystal Company", Designers

                                         of "THE JOVANA COLLECTIONS"

                                                               


 

WHAT

The cccccccccccccc

 

 

 

WHO WE ARE

I am the trainer, photographer, biographer and publicist to Vinny the Pug, the worlds most recognized canine of his breed.  On March 15th at 3:PM, Vinny exciting quests for adventure quietly ended as he received a pharmasuitical injection which stopped his heart.  The death of Vinny the Pug ended my twelve year experiment to photograph the entire life of my pug which.  Vinny's extensive image library of many thousands extend from his third month after birth through a mere 3 minutes before he received the injection. 

 

VINNY THE PUG

Throughout his lifespan, Vinny won the affections of literally millions of people around the world who followed his many quests.  He is instantly recognizable as the pug posing atop boulders in the Sonoran Desert.  Nearly 99% of the images are of Vinny wearing his signature harnesses.  However, there are just a few instances where he was photographed without harness.  Vinny the Pug's image library contains numerous thousands of the most extraordinary images ever taken of an animal.

 

 

 

 

 

PET RESCUES ARE USING OBSOLETE FUNDRAISERS

 

OUR CHALLENGE


 

OUR NEED


OUR SELECTION COMMITTEE

 

OUR 100 CITY FUNDRAISER TOUR OF THE U.S & CANADA

 

TEAM VINNY SOLAVEI

 

OUR ULTIMATE GOAL

 

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

Contribute! Help Vinny reach his goal.  100% of the monies will be Publicly Awarded with Great Fanfare to 1,000 Pet Rescues. You can also help by spreading the word and encouraging everyone to donate and support Vinny's ten-year quest to end the needless killing. 

YOUR PERKS

Vinny the Pug has an exceptional selection of "Perks for You"!  They can not be gotten anywhere else.  There are even Signed and Limited Editions for serious collectors.  Most importantly, your donations will contribute towards ending the Slaughter of Health Pets who are being euthanized even as you are reading these words.  Help Stop the Killing!!!!

TOGETHER, WE CAN DO THIS!

Peace & Love,

Vincent Thomas Pug

aka Vinny the Pug

 VincentThomasPug@gmail.com

story:
Welcome!

My name is Stacy Hoopingarner Moreno - Designer/Creator/Ethereal Dreamer at Highgate Design from 1997 to present

I am working on the launch of my new endeavor …

Rococo Coquette

Artistry meets extravagance.
Decadence mingles with imagination.
Fashion enmeshes with fantasy.
Whimsy is alive!

 

What Is Rococo Coquette?

*Fashion and accessories that promote merriment and opulence, intrinsically inspired by Marie Antoinette, and the Baroque and Rococo periods.

*Corsets, bodices, panniers, gloves, cuffs, ruffs, spats, armings, and stomachers, a possible endless array of delectable wonders.

* Finery created to be nothing less than whimsical, quirky, amusing, vibrant, fanciful, lavish and sumptuous!

All of my items are handmade and not mass produced, so each piece is a unique work of art.

 

Background

I have over 15 years of experience working in fashion and costume design.  From 1995 - 1997, I attended The Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising. While in school I fell in love with draping and manipulating fabrics, researching historical style, and hand embellishment needlework. I left those hallowed halls in Los Angeles with a deep passion for historical clothing recreation, as well as pattern creations of caprice. I continued my education, post FIDM, by attending countless costume conventions and classes that focused on everything from glove making to armor fabrication. After FIDM I began my company, Highgate Designs. I specialized in gothic club attire and custom crafted period, and fantasy, costumes.

In 2009, I took a hiatus from designing to relocate to the East Coast and rethink where my creativity wanted to lead me. I am now beyond excited to begin this new venture!

This campaign will help me focus my efforts, and help me to obtain much needed supplies and equipment,  in order to launch my line whole-heartedly!!

 

What I Need & What You Get

This campaign will fund my first collection for Rococo Coquette.  With your help I can:

  • Produce first samples of new looks for my Etsy site
  • Create a dedicated website where you can keep up with my creations and watch my progress…maybe I’ll even blog there a bit!
  • Buy fabrics, trims, and notions for samples and final production
  • Photograph and put together look books for my line
  • Purchase and/or overhaul my seriously abused machines and dress forms
  • Purchase of pattern making supplies: graph roll, manila roll, various tools…
  • Printer supplies
  • Promotional package

 

The Perks:

 For everyone that contributes to this campaign I will give you something back. The perks range from a hand written note card to a one-of-a kind Rococo Glam corset ……. Everyone will of course receive a giant virtual hug!!

 If I do not reach my entire goal I will adjust the number of items I make, for example instead of doing 15 new styles I will do 10.

 

The Impact


I am very excited for this project and know that it will be successful with your help. In the past I have had to fully fund my projects completely on my own, and as a result I’ve never quite flourished the way I dream of doing. I’m hoping that with your help my dream will finally be fully and completely realized, and that then I can, in turn, support another here at Indiegogo with their dream.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In case you can't contribute there are still ways you can help out:

  • You can simply get the word out and make some noise about the campaign via Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, your phone, what-have-you…
  • Send my hubby cookies…I’ll be too busy sewing to be creative in the kitchen…  ; )
