story:
A Summary Of What We Know:

Our Team Members and Expert Consultants have more than 300 years of life experience and 150 years of business experience. Here's what we've learned:

-Most people enjoy celebrating with wine. Or sometimes, just the wine, without any official celebration. Or sometimes the act of drinking wine, in and of itself, qualifies as a celebration. 

-Everyone wears clothing, at least some of the time.

-Everyone likes to have fun, most of the time.

-Everyone appreciates fair prices.  

If you can relate to any of the statements above, read on!

 

Why The Name "SJ"? 

The video below addresses this complex question. There's much more to the story, and it will unfold in the coming weeks (and further down in this campaign)! 


Is This About Religion?

ABSOLUTELY NOT, other than to acknowledge the fact that we believe that HE was the greatest Sommelier the world ever knew. Yes, wine existed before HE did, but none of the previous Sommeliers from ancient times were ever able to make wine from water, were they? That's it. No preaching, no judging, and no guilt!! Just fun. 
And we also believe that HE has another side, one that people didn't really get to see the first time around. A lighter, more creative side. You'll get to see that in the video series!


This Pre-Sale Event Will Get Us Off The Ground With A Running Start - It's Not A Fundraising Event

Often times, crowdfunding campaigns want pure charity to help the owners achieve their lifelong dreams.  We prefer to achieve our goals with a different strategy. Why not give people something of value for each and every "contribution". Now don't get us wrong; if there is a supremely charitable benefactor out there who would like to donate huge amounts of money and seeks nothing in return, feel free to do so! However, our business model will allow us to be successful by selling items and then reinvesting into our business in order to reach our goals.


A Simplified Guide To The Perks: 

Perks #1, #2, & #3 are for original videos and/or membership discounts.
Perk #4 is the lowest cost Perk that includes a T-shirt or tank top.
Perk #5 is the lowest cost Perk that includes wine.
Perk #6 is the least expensive way to get both wine and a T-shirt or tank top.
Perk #8 gets you wine, a T-shirt, & a tank top with Executive logos.
Perk #9 - 12 gets you wine, a T-shirt, a tank top, and a bunch of other great stuff. Please read individual Perks for details!

Apparel Designs Currently In Production:

Note: These are just a few examples of our original designs. We are working on many more that will contain either the SJ Rising or the SommelierJesus logos! The campaign perks feature T-shirts and tank tops. After the campaign ends and orders are filled, our website will feature many more apparel types for sale, such as active and workout wear, sweatshirts, hoodies and more. We'll send updates as they become available! You can view these shirts, front and back, and other designs on our website slideshow on the products page  http://www.SJRising.com

  
                      

  


 


First Vintages In Production:

Robust red and white blends, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, with more to come next year and beyond!


What We Need And What You Get:

With your help, when we achieve our first funding level target of $47,500 USD, the remaining profit will enable us to purchase our own silk screening equipment and supplies. This will allow us much greater creative and administrative control of production and inventory, as we'll no longer need to rely on 3rd party shirt design makers and distributors. We already have the wheels rolling on the wine making and bottling part, and our first vintage will be ready in early 2015! 


What Happens After This Campaign?

After this Indiegogo campaign ends and order fulfillment is complete, we'll allocate capital as shown in the chart below during the normal course of business operations. We'll monitor and assess our budget model quarterly (or more frequently, as required) to ensure efficiency. 

Our first priority following the campaign will, of course, be order fulfillment to those who supported us here on our Indiegogo campaign! What you'll get are quality products that we believe have a value of at least as much as your contributions. You'll get to choose from a variety of great wines that we've created with the help of experienced winemakers from around the world. You can select from a vast array of shirts, tank tops, athletic wear, sweatshirts, and other apparel, all with original designs that reflect our brand of humor! We hope you'll agree that they are of great value. If you don't, we'd like to hear about it!


                 

  

Where Can I Get Products After This Campaign?

Our website is active right now. At this time, the Products page will direct you back here to our Indiegogo campaign. When the campaign ends, you'll be able to order items directly from our website.

How Are We Different Than Other Companies?

Our product line already has proven appeal to adults all over the world. There may be some people who won't identify with our brand of humor (in which case we hope they love the wine enough to deal with it), but we believe that many will appreciate it. So for those of you who enjoy wine, wear clothing, or just like to laugh, welcome to SJ! In addition to extremely competitive pricing on wine and all-original apparel, we have a compelling spokesperson and story line that will keep you interested for years to come. Follow SJ through his many plights and adventures. Some of them will definitely surprise you; but mostly, they'll make you laugh. And if you don't know who SJ is by now, we suggest you go back to the top and watch our video. Another key factor that distinguishes us from other companies is that once we become profitable (estimated to be 12 months) we'll donate 10% of all profits to charity or other worthwhile causes. More information on this topic below.

Why And When Will We Donate 10% Of Profits?

We believe that if a company runs efficiently and profitably, there is a built-in social responsibility to help support people and communities in need.  We'll research various projects as well as charitable groups and organizations and present information for you, our members, to explore. We'll ask you to vote, and for other forms of input. We'll take member votes into account when deciding, semi-annually, which group or groups to support. We sincerely hope that you will choose to be a part of this decision making process or at least offer suggestions as you see fit! Of course there is no obligation to do so. If you choose to not be a part of this process, that's fine! Feel free to simply sit back and enjoy our products and follow the adventures of SJ! 


I'm Confused - Is It SommelierJesus Or SJ Rising? 

This discussion turned into a very heated debate between SJ and the management team, and didn't end well for the people in the suits. You'll get to see that video in the very near future, while this campaign is still running live. Thank goodness the cameras were rolling during that meeting, but be warned; it's definitely not for the faint of heart! Back to the original question; the simple answer is that both names are correct! For now, all you need to know (it's for your own safety) is that SJRising is a division within SommelierJesus. 


What Impact Will Our Business Have On The World?

We understand that this business will not be solving for some of the more pressing issues in the world today. It's unlikely that we'll be resolving Global Warming anytime soon. It's even less likely that we'll be able to help people overcome the financial issues our country faces at the moment. But here's what we will do in order to help to make the world a little better:

1) We'll provide you with high quality, affordable products (wine, apparel, and humor) that, when used responsibly, will help to make you feel or just stay happy.

2) We'll treat you with respect.

3) We'll treat our employees with dignity.

4) We'll donate to charities that really do use the money for its stated cause; not for administrative costs or ridiculously large Executive salaries.


Risks & Challenges:

Here are some of the risks we are aware of:

1) People may stop drinking wine or wearing clothes, but these both seem unlikely. 

2) Extreme weather conditions- In the event of unusually extreme weather, grape production, processing, or shipping could be impacted. In order to mitigate some of this risk, we are partnering with producers in various parts of the world, where weather conditions will also vary from one to the next. 

3) The ever changing regulatory and compliance environment surrounding the issue of home delivery of alcoholic beverages. We are staying on top of these issues with our legal team and others in the industry. We fully support the idea of making sure that these beverages don't get into the hands of underage or otherwise irresponsible consumers, but we also fully support the idea that responsible adults should be able to order and receive these items through home delivery if they so choose. Our founding team and our expert consultants have a great deal of experience and success in navigating through the sometimes tricky waters surrounding government compliance issues, as well as the general challenges associated with starting up any business. 

*As of now, we know we won't be shipping wine directly to consumers in the states of MS, PA, or UT. If you do purchase a Perk that includes wine and you live in one of these states, or other states that have regulatory issues that impact our ability to ship, we will contact you to discuss other options.


    A Happy Consumer With Our First Endorsement:

     

    By the way, we promise to do our best to ensure that our next endorsement appears in a wide screen format instead of the vertical setting. Remember that our budget was EXTREMELY limited for this, our first-ever commercial. The actress has another career besides acting, and was willing to accept pay in the form of barter; more specifically, a bottle of wine. Please remember, Rome wasn't built in a day ;)


Stretch Goals Beyond Our Initial Target:

Our initial funding target will be a great momentum builder for the future of our company, and we thank you in advance for helping to accomplish it! We also believe there is a broader opportunity here, with your generous support. When we surpass the initial goal (either through this campaign or through other venues), here are our plans after the completion of order fulfillment:
$100K- We'll purchase silk screening supplies and equipment, which will be a great help to complete order fulfillment quickly and effectively.
$200K- We'll be able to commit to a significantly larger volume of wine with our vineyards and producers, which will allow us to purchase at lower price points and pass those savings along to you, our members. 
And if by chance we fall short of our initial funding target, the funds that we do receive will be used for order fulfillment as the first priority, before anything else.

    Ok, I'm In.  

    Great!  Please take a look at our Perks. You'll need to scroll back up and they'll be on the right hand side in a long column. Find the ones that best suit you, and order! You will receive our heart-felt gratitude as well as your fantastic products in exchange for your contribution. Please allow 4 to 8 weeks following the end of the campaign for the completion of order fulfillment of Perks. More specific estimates of delivery are contained within each Perk.


    Other Ways To Help, Even Without Contributing:

    Some people just won't be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. If any of this campaign, its products or goals or general style resonates with you in the least, but you simply can't afford to contribute anything, even the lowest cost Perk, please become an advocate!  Perhaps you could even send a private or public message about our campaign to your friends, or share or tweet about it on your favorite social media outlet. Chances are there are tons of folks just like you who would champion this cause if they knew about it. 

    Please remember one other thing; if friends of yours orders something from us through our Referral Campaign (will begin at about the halfway point of this campaign) you get rewarded! The more they order, the bigger your rewards. So becoming an advocate will do more than just help us; it can also help you! More information will become available through updates on this campaign, so stay tuned!  

    And that's all there is to it!
story_txt:
A Summary Of What We Know:
Our Team Members and Expert Consultants have more than 300 years of life experience and 150 years of business experience. Here's what we've learned:
-Most people enjoy celebrating with wine. Or sometimes, just the wine, without any official celebration. Or sometimes the act of drinking wine, in and of itself, qualifies as a celebration. 
-Everyone wears clothing, at least some of the time.

-Everyone likes to have fun, most of the time.
-Everyone appreciates fair prices.  
If you can relate to any of the statements above, read on!
 
Why The Name "SJ"? 
The video below addresses this complex question. There's much more to the story, and it will unfold in the coming weeks (and further down in this campaign)! 





Is This About Religion?

ABSOLUTELY NOT, other than to acknowledge the fact that we believe that HE was the greatest Sommelier the world ever knew. Yes, wine existed before HE did, but none of the previous Sommeliers from ancient times were ever able to make wine from water, were they? That's it. No preaching, no judging, and no guilt!! Just fun. 
And we also believe that HE has another side, one that people didn't really get to see the first time around. A lighter, more creative side. You'll get to see that in the video series!



This Pre-Sale Event Will Get Us Off The Ground With A Running Start - It's Not A Fundraising Event

Often times, crowdfunding campaigns want pure charity to help the owners achieve their lifelong dreams.  We prefer to achieve our goals with a different strategy. Why not give people something of value for each and every "contribution". Now don't get us wrong; if there is a supremely charitable benefactor out there who would like to donate huge amounts of money and seeks nothing in return, feel free to do so! However, our business model will allow us to be successful by selling items and then reinvesting into our business in order to reach our goals.


A Simplified Guide To The Perks: 
Perks #1, #2, & #3 are for original videos and/or membership discounts.
Perk #4 is the lowest cost Perk that includes a T-shirt or tank top.
Perk #5 is the lowest cost Perk that includes wine.
Perk #6 is the least expensive way to get both wine and a T-shirt or tank top.
Perk #8 gets you wine, a T-shirt, & a tank top with Executive logos.
Perk #9 - 12 gets you wine, a T-shirt, a tank top, and a bunch of other great stuff. Please read individual Perks for details!

Apparel Designs Currently In Production:
Note: These are just a few examples of our original designs. We are working on many more that will contain either the SJ Rising or the SommelierJesus logos! The campaign perks feature T-shirts and tank tops. After the campaign ends and orders are filled, our website will feature many more apparel types for sale, such as active and workout wear, sweatshirts, hoodies and more. We'll send updates as they become available! You can view these shirts, front and back, and other designs on our website slideshow on the products page  http://www.SJRising.com

                         
  
 


First Vintages In Production:Robust red and white blends, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, with more to come next year and beyond!



What We Need And What You Get:
With your help, when we achieve our first funding level target of $47,500 USD, the remaining profit will enable us to purchase our own silk screening equipment and supplies. This will allow us much greater creative and administrative control of production and inventory, as we'll no longer need to rely on 3rd party shirt design makers and distributors. We already have the wheels rolling on the wine making and bottling part, and our first vintage will be ready in early 2015! 

What Happens After This Campaign?

After this Indiegogo campaign ends and order fulfillment is complete, we'll allocate capital as shown in the chart below during the normal course of business operations. We'll monitor and assess our budget model quarterly (or more frequently, as required) to ensure efficiency.  
Our first priority following the campaign will, of course, be order 
fulfillment to those who supported us here on our Indiegogo campaign! 
What you'll get are quality products that we believe have a value of at 
least as much as your contributions. You'll get to choose from a variety
 of great wines that we've created with the help of experienced 
winemakers from around the world. You can select from a vast array
 of shirts, tank tops, athletic wear, sweatshirts, and other apparel, 
all with original designs that reflect our brand of humor! We hope 
you'll agree that they are of great value. If you don't, we'd like to 
hear about it! 


                   
Where Can I Get Products After This Campaign?
Our website is active right now. At this time, the Products page will direct you back here to our Indiegogo campaign. When the campaign ends, you'll be able to order items directly from our website.

How Are We Different Than Other Companies?
Our product line already has proven appeal to adults all over the world. There may be some people who won't identify with our brand of humor (in which case we hope they love the wine enough to deal with it), but we believe that many will appreciate it. So for those of you who enjoy wine, wear clothing, or just like to laugh, welcome to SJ! In addition to extremely competitive pricing on wine and all-original apparel, we have a compelling spokesperson and story line that will keep you interested for years to come. Follow SJ through his many plights and adventures. Some of them will definitely surprise you; but mostly, they'll make you laugh. And if you don't know who SJ is by now, we suggest you go back to the top and watch our video. Another key factor that distinguishes us from other companies is that once we become profitable (estimated to be 12 months) we'll donate 10% of all profits to charity or other worthwhile causes. More information on this topic below.


Why And When Will We Donate 10% Of Profits?


We believe that if a company runs efficiently and profitably, there is a built-in social responsibility to help support people and communities in need.  We'll research various projects as well as charitable groups and organizations and present information for you, our members, to explore. We'll ask you to vote, and for other forms of input. We'll take member votes into account when deciding, semi-annually, which group or groups to support. We sincerely hope that you will choose to be a part of this decision making process or at least offer suggestions as you see fit! Of course there is no obligation to do so. If you choose to not be a part of this process, that's fine! Feel free to simply sit back and enjoy our products and follow the adventures of SJ! 



I'm Confused - Is It SommelierJesus Or SJ Rising? 
This discussion turned into a very heated debate between SJ and the management team, and didn't end well for the people in the suits. You'll get to see that video in the very near future, while this campaign is still running live. Thank goodness the cameras were rolling during that meeting, but be warned; it's definitely not for the faint of heart! You will receive our heart-felt gratitude as well as your fantastic products in exchange for your contribution. Please allow 4 to 8 weeks following the end of the campaign for the completion of order fulfillment of Perks. More specific estimates of delivery are contained within each Perk.

Some people just won't be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. If any of this campaign, its products or goals or general style resonates with you in the least, but you simply can't afford to contribute anything, even the lowest cost Perk, please become an advocate!  Perhaps you could even send a private or public message about our campaign to your friends, or share or tweet about it on your favorite social media outlet. Chances are there are tons of folks just like you who would champion this cause if they knew about it. 
Please remember one other thing; if friends of yours orders something from us through our Referral Campaign (will begin at about the halfway point of this campaign) you get rewarded! The more they order, the bigger your rewards. So becoming an advocate will do more than just help us; it can also help you! More information will become available through updates on this campaign, so stay tuned!

story:
Have you ever dreamed about having fun with fantasy creatures, animals or just with something that has a very  special shape?

Do you want to try something very special but there is no place to purchase it?

Or do you want something unique?

A lot of people think this way but there is no place that is satisfying their needs.
My idea is to make people like you happy, to build what >you< want! In any shape, size and color.

Made in Germany.

There are two possibilities. 

You can either choose an item from my gallery or you can order a custom toy that I will craft for you.

Custom Toy: 

  1. You send me a request with corresponding description about what you want. You may include reference pictures, dimensions and colors. 
  2. We will talk about pricing and details together 
  3. I will start my work. You will receive commission updates during every working step.
If something isn’t for your liking we can change it. 

Gallery: 

Just have look in my gallery and choose a toy I have built before and order a personalized copy. Choose your colors and contact me.

How it works for Me?

You send me the description of what you want. I will check if it is possible for me to fulfill your wish.

Afterwards i will build your toy with clay

Regularly updates with picture will give you the chance to change some details if you wish.

If you are satisfied with what I came up I will give the clay model a finish polish and build the silicon Mold.

The next step: I will create a resin mother mold to stabilize your form to make sure that the toy does not deform while casting.

After this I will remove the clay model from the mold. With this mold I will craft your toy.

Therefore I will mix some special high-quality silicone with your chosen color.

The silicon is save for your body, save for your health and odorless.

I use the silicone to fill up the mold.

A vacuum chamber is used to suck all the air out of the silicone, to avoid little air bubbles inside the sculpture  

When the silicon is hardened your toy is clear for shipping.

Every piece is handmade - an individual piece of art.


They will have the highest detail and quality I am able to create.

I am aware that the silicone quality is a very important aspect and I will only choose between high quality ingredients.

Furthermore I offer you an 1 year "handshake-warranty". If something is wrong with your toy we will try to figure out a solution together.  

There are 3 things I need. 

  •  A bigger vacuum pump 
  •  A bigger Plexiglas plate 
  •  Some materials to get started 

Vacuum pump 

A strong vacuum pump is vital to assure that the silicone doesn’t contain air bubbles.

My current pump takes 1/2h to degas the silicone. That's way too long!

The silicone starts to harden after half of the time and get too thick/firm.

Plexiglas 

A bigger and thicker Plexiglas plate is needed to close my vacuum chamber.

The current plate is to thin and it bends dangerously strong when the chamber is in use.

Due to the deformation the chamber leaks air and I'm not able to maintain a good vacuum.

Materials 

The rest of the money is for the ingredients: High quality, non-poisoning and healthy silicon. 

It's expensive and I need a lot of it.

Just as resin, mixing cups, clay, gloves, and many other things.

The most expensive part is the pump: ~300€ (~380 $) 

The Plexiglas plate costs about: ~160€ (~203 $) 

Silicon 40€/kg (~50$/2lb) 

My Goal: Funding’s about 1000$


However these are my backup plans if I don't reach the final goal.

Less than 400$

>You all get your money back. 

Over 400$

>Slow start. I am able to buy the most important things and will start my production as good I can. 

Over 800$

>I am able to buy all I need and a small amount of silicone. 

Goal 1000$

>Yay. Everything I need. I will start the project with all my energy. 

2000$

>I am able to buy or build another vacuum chamber to provide bigger toys faster. 

3000$

>I can buy a 3D printer and be able to make more perfect toys faster. 

Over 4000$

>WTF! I believe I’m getting a heart attack... 

Over 5000$

>R.I.P the second heart attack kills me. 


Plase share this with your friends.

story:
Hi, my name is Žan Ograjšek and I come from Trebnje, sLOVEnia. I have been playing the guitar since I was 8 years old.  I was always losing a lot of picks when playing at scout camps, on music festivals and when I was just hanging out or jamming with my friends. I spent a lot of money buying new ones and of course they did not last long as I managed to lose them all. That is when I got the idea for the WristPick.

Wristpick is a stylish wristband for all guitar players who know how easy it is to lose a pick, while rocking out on their guitar. Every Wristpick is handmade from natural leather, which makes every product unique, high quality, and incredibly useful!

Losing picks will no longer be a problem since the pick is attached to the wristband, specially designed to not to interfere with playing. After a jam, the pick can be neatly stored leaving you with the awesome leather wristband. In short:  Wristpick is a must-have for every guitar player. 


Handcrafted from premium natural leather with amazing color shades makes every product unique and personal. A high-quality and long-lasting nylon pick ensures the long lifespan of the WristPick.


Furthermore, I can customize it to match your wrist circumference. 





I believe in WristPick with all my heart and this is why I decided to invest all my time and energy to make it happen. However, the idea itself is not enough and I need your support to equip my shop with tools and develop new WristPick designs. It would help me a great deal if I could afford to buy a laser-cutting and engraving machine. Right now, I cut the leather manually, the reason why my first series will come only in one shape. 

However, with a cutting and engraving machine, the production will be faster and Wristpick would become customizable, meaning that each player could select their own preferred colour, custom shapes, etc. In addition, names, quotes, and logos could be engraved, making this product fully individualizable. To make my campaign a success, I need your support and contribution.

* Wristpicks will be send as soon as possible, info above is just to make sure perks will be delivered on time.


PUBLISHED

story:
A website that simplifies the parliament to empower YOU!


SansadBhavan.com enables democracy 2.0 

We simplify information from our country's parliament to engage a common man. 



We pledge to make the Sansad:

  • simple
  • accessible
  • intuitive
  • fast.
We will make it simple by taking politics - which is, by and large, inaccessible - and making it understandable. Using the correct language, we'll break down complex party policies into accessible and understandable information. 

We will make it accessible by building it as a responsive web application that encourages 'pick up and play' nature. Although we're targeting this at a younger demographic, anybody can use it. There will be hints and 'help' throughout enabling you to feel confident at all times.

We will make it intuitive by creating it in a way that young people are used to with the help of influencers from social networking sites and the 'pinch and swipe' culture that's now the norm for young people when interacting online.

We will make it fast as, in today's world - with all the options available to us, it needs to be. Our target audience expect this, and we'll deliver it.


         


We organize what is happening inside the parliament to keep you informed and involved.

Our goal is to help you make informed decisions, and to that affect, we are a politically impartial, data-driven organization.


Do you know what your neta is up to?

 

Inside the Parliament are some of the best brains in the country. Believe it or not!

But as a common man, could you name the last piece of legislation that your representative voted on? Did they vote for or against that bill? The truth is none of us have the time we need to keep track of what our representatives are doing. 

Sansad Bhavan will change that! 
We make that hard data easy to digest and follow! Like these draft samples of 'Neta Cards'. Imagine your "trump cards" for MPs!


We're creating a better way. 

Let's help our MPs run our country. 

They are becoming savvier and want to connect with junta and hear you out. Help create better decisions based on better information and your participation.


A for Answers

Know how active are each Ministry with list of answers given and pending questions

B for Bills

Identify all the Bills at what stage they are and participate in informed discussion

C for Causes

Discuss matters that your leaders champion and contribute to your own abilities

D for Debates

Stay informed and entertained with the nuances most relevant to the subjects


Sansad Bhavan allows this & more but we need your support to carry on! 

We assembled an amazing team who've developed the idea up to the point of it being made. Now we need you!

We know that to build this democracy tool we'll need to raise money. It will cost an estimated $10,000 to kick start this, so if you feel as passionate about this as I do (which is 'very'), then please back and share this campaign.

We are already on our way with three employees and a few volunteers, committed to bring Sansad Bhavan to life.

Your contributions would help us for the production of the site, the analysis of legislations, and building awareness campaigns. Specifically:


Develop platform and cover the maintenance for the next year.
Strengthen our awareness raising campaign with the printing and distribution of Sansad Bhavan leaflets, access to advertising space on websites (banners), the creation of a series of promotional animated videos targeted at younger audiences and the organization of events such as political debates with the active participation of citizens!
Introduce new innovative democracy promoting tools on our platform that significantly enhance its scope and impact, Namely: the "policy monitoring tool" which will allow citizens to compare, contrast, have a say and potentially influence official party positions on a set of topical issues
GROW AND DRIVE THIS CHANGE. TO BE ABLE TO CREATE - 
#ofpeople4peoplebypeople


How can you help?


1. Share our campaign

First and foremost, we need to get our message spread far and wide. This can only be achieved with your help. Please take time to share this page with friends, family and colleagues who you think will be interested. Sharing via Facebook, via e-mail or even on Twitter could make all the difference.

Second, you need to follow our campaign on social media. You can do this by following @simplifysansad and over at Facebook where you'll find daily updates, new perks, further insights and info on how the campaign's going and how your contributions are making a difference. 


2. Become a backer 

We can't achieve anything without you. We need a lot of people to chip in a little for this to become a reality.

Just 1000 people donating less than the price of their lunch would revolutionize Indian democracy, forever. We know times are tough, but you truly can make a difference by putting in something small!

We request you to share this campaign with your peers, friends and family as much as you can. Even every tweet and like are building blocks! Also please feel free to reach out for volunteer work.

Be part of the change; join our efforts to empower democracy in India!

The quicker we hit our initial target, the faster we bring out the stretch goals!


Back it. Share it. Help us make it! 

#power2thepeople 

Let's Do This!
